2a1(rgyud): gsol pa/ ston pa dang nga bskur rnam bdun dang // rnam
2b1(rgyud): cig zlu bzang dbang nga skur nger// rnam pa bdun dang rnam gsum
2b2(rgyud): pa yis khyed la ba shang // rgyung du mdor bstan rnam gsum
3a1(rgyud): tu mdor bstan mdor bstar che// rab tu rgyas par bshad pa
3a2(rgyud): gzhan// mdor bstan rgyas pa ra ba shad pa nyid// rgyud yong dag bAr bsdus par
3a3(rgyud): brjod// rab tu ma dor bstan rgyas bshad pa// dka' 'gre/ la tshig ni 'byed
3a4(rgyud): pa'o// mdo rub stan chen po rgyas bshad pa// 'gro/ kyil bshad thams
3a5(rgyud): cang don ston byeng // de ni mngon shes thob rnams kyis// ba yi mkhas rnams kyis
3a6(rgyud): min nyid// de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi dang
3b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi rnams dang // phung khams skye mched rigs drug rnams// dag pa 'jig rten khams
3b2(rgyud): la sogs// le'u lngar ni 'dod rnams kyis// bodon gnyis dang po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// dus kyi
3b3(rgyud): 'khor lo mngon brjod byed// dang por dbang bskur bdun po gang // byis pa rnams ni gzhug
3b4(rgyud): pa'i phyir// rnam ga sum 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis// dam pa'i don gyis bzhi pa'o// bden
3b5(rgyud): pa gnyis kyi chos rnams kyi// rdo rje can bdag gis bstan pa// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang // dam pa'i
3b6(rgyud): don gyis bden paso// chu dang cod pan dar dbyangs dang // rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs che// ming dang rjes gnang
3b7(rgyud): yang dag ldan// dbang bskur rnam bdun ma yo bdag / lus ngag sems ni legs dag pa// mngon par
4a1(rgyud): dbang bskur gnyis gnyis// rjes gnang ye shes yang dag dag/ gzhan pa khams sogs dag pa las// chun khams kyi dag pa ste/ cod pan
4a2(rgyud): phung po rnam sbyong bad// dar dbyings pha rol phyin pa dag/ rdo rje dril bu mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas skad rgyun mi 'chad pa// nyi zla gcig tu dag par byed// yul dang dbang po
4a3(rgyud): legs dag po// 'a pho med rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'gyur// mang ni byams sogs yang dag dag rjes gnang sangs rgyas nyid dag byed// dang bskur bdun po 'di
4a4(rgyud): rnams yin// dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas spyi na bar bya// bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang // shes rab ye shes mngon brjod pa// slar yang shwa
4a5(rgyud): rab chen po nyid// de yi ye shes mngon brjod byed// 'gyur dang 'gyur ba de nas 'dzag/ de nas gzhan yang mi 'dzag pa'o// lus ngag sems ni
4a6(rgyud): lcags dag pas// dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis// bzhi pa ye shes yang dag dag/ lus ngag sems ni dag par byed// byis pa dar ma de nas rgun// bzhi pa
4a7(rgyud): skye dgu'i bdag po'o// shes rab nu mar yan lag ni// reg pas byang chub sems 'pho'i bod// 'o ma 'dzin pas dbang bskor ba// gang las bde thob da bis
4a8(rgyud): pa'o// yun ring gsang bar spro las skyes// byang chub sems ni 'pho ba'i bde// gsang ba'i dbang bskur gsang ba ni// gang las bde thob de dar ma// yuni ring
4b1(rgyud): gsang bar spros las skyes// rdo rje'i rtse mor g.yo ba'i bde// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba// gang las g.yo ba'i bgrod du rgan// phyag rgya chen po rjes chags las// skyes pa
4b2(rgyud): g.yo med bde ba ni// shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba// gang las g.yo med rtogs pa de// skye dgu'i bdag por rnam shes pa// skyob pa thams cad bskyed mdzad pa// rdo rje seMnga'i seng
4b3(rgyud): che byang sems gnyis med mi 'gyur ba// 'di ni dam tshig sems dpar 'gyur// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi// dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir bshad pa// rnal 'byor pa yi thar ster byed// 
4b4(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi ni bsgrub pa bya// rab gsol bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// du sogs mtshan me de rnams kyis// shes rab gzugs brnyan na mkha' mnya mo// yod dang med las rnam
4b5(rgyud): par 'das// rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyi don// rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams// kun nas yongasu dor ba yi sa// du ba smig sgyu mkha' snang dang // sgron ma 'bar ba
4b6(rgyud): zla nyi ma// mun can cha dang thig la che// sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba// bkab dang ma bkab mig dag gis// stong par 'di ni rjes brtags min// rmi lam bzhin du gzugs
4b7(rgyud): mthong 'gyur// rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya// dngos med gzugs la sgom pa de// rnal 'byor pa yi sgom ma yin// dngos po dngos med sems kyi min// stong par ma brtags mthong
4b8(rgyud): phyiraro ji ltar pra phab me long la// gzhonu mas mthong dngos med skyes// de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs chos// mkha' la de nyid rnal 'byor pas// 'di la dngos po dngos med 'gyur// dngos po ste// 
5a1(rgyud): pa'i don mthong phyir/ dngos po dngos med don yod pa// sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'phrul bzhin// med pa'i chos can dag la chos// skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong // yid bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas
5a2(rgyud): ba'i// sen bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// pra phab pa yi gzhon mas// mi mthong ba yi rkun po mthong // nyi che ba yi mig dag gis// song nas sgrub pa po yis mthong // gal te yod pa'i gzugs
5a3(rgyud): mthong na// rang gi gdong pa cis mi mthong // gal te med pa'i gzugs mthong na// ri bong rwa ni ji ltar min// gzhan gyi mig gis mi mthong zhing // rang gi mig gis mthong min pa// skye ba med pa mtha
5a4(rgyud): ba ni// gzhonu ma yi bu ji bzhin// gzugs brnyan mthong na de nas ni// bar ma chad par srog brtsol ba// stang 'og rtsag/ sum po rnams la// lus ngag sems ni 'gog pa las// zla nyi sgra
5a5(rgyud): gcan bshang gci dang // khu ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams// chu ma stong pa sa dang rlung // ye shes khams kyi ri rnams la// gang zhig zla nyi mun can dang // bshang gci khu ba 'bab ma rnam
5a6(rgyud): srog dang thur sel rim pa las// lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnam so// zla ba thabs kyi sku yin te// nyin mor byed pa shes rab gsung // shes rab sku ni bshang ba'i rtsa// ci ba 'bab ma gtso bo'i gsung / 
5a7(rgyud): steng 'og thugs kyi rtsa gnyis dag/ mun can khu ba 'bab ma'o// thabs kyi thugs ni mun pa can// khu ba 'bab ma shes rab kyi// stang 'og rigs drug 'di rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'ab
5a8(rgyud): las shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// lus can kun la yang dag gnas// 'chi ltas lus ngag rtsa dag la// steng 'og lhag pa'i rlung rnams kyis// mun can khu ba 'bab ma la// skye ba dang
5b1(rgyud): ni 'chi ba gnas// skye dang 'chi dang 'khrig pa yi// dus khu ba 'bab pa'o// mun can ma yang steng du 'bab// nyi ma'i 'pho ba mnyam pa las// dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon mtshamasu// dbu ma nas ni mnyam
5b2(rgyud): pa'abab/ rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug 'byung dang 'jug pa'o maM yi bdag / bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag pa yis// drug brgya nyin dang mtshan la'o// drug brgya rnams kyis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shuH
5b3(rgyud): gcig po// 'di yis dman pa gang de rnams// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rtsar 'bab po'o// phyogs gsum dang bcas lo gsum rnams// lo brgya rnams las dbu ma'o// steng du g.yon g.yas zla nyi ma
5b4(rgyud): brkyang ma lugs dang sar skya gzhan// chu dang ma yi rang bzhi na can// pad+ma rin chen 'dzin por 'dod// 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dag/ sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can// dbu ma'i rtsa dang g.yon pa yang
5b5(rgyud): 'khor lo rikhri 'dzin par 'dod// steng dang 'og tu dbu ma g.yas// sgra gcan khu ba rab 'bab pa// stong pa ya sa rang bzhin can// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod// zla ba'i lam gyis
5b6(rgyud): bshad ba'i rtsa// nyi mas gci ba 'bab pa ste/ skye 'tshe mnyam pa chags pa la// sgra gcan khu ba rab tu 'bab// zla ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma// gang de yid bzang mun pa 'bab// 'og tu khu ba 'bab gang
5b7(rgyud): da mkha'agro gdong dang dung can ma// lte ba'i chu skyes snying mgrin dang / dbral ba gtsug ter 'dam skyes la// sa chu ma rlung stong pa rnams// rab tu 'bab pa sdud pa yis// 'byung 'gyur da ni 'jug pa dag/ bskyed
5b8(rgyud): bas 'jug ste sa la'o// lte ba nas ni lte ba'i dbus/ a ba d+hU tir 'gro dang 'ong // lte gsang nor bu'i chu skyes la// lus ngag sems rnams 'bab pa ni// 'byung dang don 'jug pa dang/ sdud dang bskyed pa'i
6a1(rgyud): rang bzhin can// dung can skye bo thad kyi// thur sal rlung ni 'bab pa'o// 'di rnams bud med bde ba las// khu ba khrag 'bad dus dag tu/ shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// steng du g.yas dang g.yon
6a2(rgyud): ngag dang // 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dang // rdul dang khu bo 'bab po dag// rdul 'bab phyir dag tum ste// khu ba 'drab pir mkha'agro gdong // steng du brjongs bud med kyi// g.yung mo skyes bu'i kun 'dar ma// rnam shes la
6a3(rgyud): soHdkyil lnga// rtag tu g.yon pa'i rtsa la'o// sa sogs g.yas pa'i rtsal ste// dbus dag pa 'bab pa'o// lto ba'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// dkyi drug cu rnams rim bzhin// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i dus sbyor ni// lug
6a4(rgyud): soDa glang la soDa pa la/ rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas// stang dang dbusu rim pas rlung // sa sogs dkyor re re zhing // dbyu gus sna bug dag la'o// rim pas chu tshod 'bab pa ni// drug cu dang bcas sum
6a5(rgyud): brgya'i dbugs// brgya phrag bco brgyad dbugs de rnams// chu tshad lngar ni 'bab pa'o// chu tshed drug cu nyin mtshan du/ lus la dkyil 'khor rnams zhes pa'o// mdab ma'i dbus dang de
6a6(rgyud): nas shar// g.yas g.yon gzhan du rim pa yis// g.yon par rtag tu namakha' sogs// g.yas par sa sogs gzhan laso// g.yon par rnam shes sor 'byung ba// g.yas pas so sdud pa'o// nub dang
6a7(rgyud): shar du 'dzin ma rlung // phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// mthe bong ming med dag gis ni// gang phyir kha la dbang bskur ba// g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu// phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// gang mo mdzub
6a8(rgyud): mo gnyis dag gis// gang phyir 'a khrir 'gyur ba'o// zla phyed rnam pa'i phyag rgya ni// mche ba gri gug mthe chung ste// stong pa mi 'gyur steng 'og tu// phan tshun thabs dang shes rab po// dkyil 'khor bcu po yang
6b1(rgyud): / dag sbyor// sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du// mgo bor lag mthil sbyar ba la// gri gug dang bcas rtsa gcig// dbu ma'i rtsa la mnyam pa de// bskrad dang sdud pa'i byed pa po// phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum// gcig
6b2(rgyud): nyid dbu mar son pa na'o// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags na// bshang po gci ba'i rtsa 'gago// sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gags pa na// 'og tu khu ba 'babo 'gags 'gyur// bskyed dang sdud pa'i bde pa can// 'di rnams grol
6b3(rgyud): na grol bar 'gyur// srog dang thur sel lam gsum gyis// 'di ni rtsa yi kun spyod// g.yon pa 'am ni g.yas pa la// mtshan mo gcig dang de bzhin lngar// lhag pa'i rlung ni rab 'bar ba// de las
6b4(rgyud): lo gsum na mchi'o// g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la// lnga dang phyogs chos nyi shu dang // de nyid gcig lhag gzhanari ma pas// nyin nag sum cu gsum rgyun// gsum gnyis gcig
6b5(rgyud): lo zla ba ni// drug gsum zung zla nyin zhag tshes// phyogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig gis// lus can rnams kyi tshe 'dro/ 'o// rtsa ba nas gcig lhag pa yis// g.yon par zla ba'i rgyu bar
6b6(rgyud): 'gyur// nyin zla nyin nag zla nyan// nyin zhag gsum rnams zla ba gsum// nyin la 'chi ltas zla bar dge/ 'phel 'grib de nas 'di dag la// dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba ni// lo brgya yongasu rdzogs pa yis/ 
6b7(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam nyi ma nag rnams// skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// de rgyu g.yas dang g.yon la yang // phyogs gnyis rnam par nyams pa las// gzhan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// phyogs
6b8(rgyud): gnyis yang dag gnas pa na// g.yas dong g.yon pa'i kun spyod dang / dkyil 'khor lnga rnams 'bab pa'i phyir// 'o chi ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni// srog ni thig ler gzhug par bya/ oM ba d+hu/ 
7a1(rgyud): // ti'i zhabs brtan nas/ mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya// zla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms pa las// gzhan du kun 'dar yan lag la// srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa me
7a2(rgyud): 'og tu'ang dung can mthur sel/ de ma zhugs las 'chi ba'o// 'chi ltos slu ba rnal 'byor pa'o// 'di na dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur/ mgo bo'i pad+mo gi tsug tor las// khu ba 'ongs po dag rab ste/ mgrin
7a3(rgyud): pa snying khar mchog dge'o// dga' bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur// smo ba dga' ba lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar gang 'ongs pa'o// gsang nas rdo rje nor bu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dga' mi 'pho ba// rab gnA
7a4(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa min// chags chen mi 'gyur khyab bdag / po// 'dod chags bral las 'pho med pade// de ni mya ngan las rab gnas// khu bzla 'char gtsug tor du// rdzogs pa gsang ba'i
7a5(rgyud): mtsho skyes la// bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i// pad+ma brdo rje rtse mor gnas// de steng 'pho ba'i dus 'gyur// nag po'i tshe sa gcig 'ongs pa na// 'dod chags bral bas gnas stong la/ !
7a6(rgyud): ma mdzod spu'i gnas 'gro// de yi cha shas bcu drug la// gtsug tor pad+mar son pa'o// zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod// chags pa'i bde la chags bral phyir// lus can thang 'chib ma/ zla ba bdud rtsi 'og tu 'gro/ 
7a7(rgyud): steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la// de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni// steng du bgrod bya mi yi bdag/ 'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcano// rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la// sang+yas kun gyi mdzod
7a8(rgyud): bu li// pad+ma zla ba bdud rtsi nya// nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar te// gautsug tor nor bu dade dag/ ces pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i tshig/ lus can kun gyi phyin ci log/ rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min/ khams/ 
7b1(rgyud): rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur// nor bur thugs dang gsang bar gsung // lte bar sku ste bde chen las// chos dang long spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'di rnams dag pa'i sku las spro// thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal po
7b2(rgyud): dbang shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur// 'di yi dpral bar sku rdo rje// mgrin pa snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la// gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams// sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro
7b3(rgyud): phung po khams rnams spro ba ni// sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba las// las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang // ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang // phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas// me
7b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba de 'phel bar 'gyur// 'phel ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ba med// nyams pa'i nyams pa nyid kyang med nub pa de yi nub pa med// 'char ba yi ni 'tshor ba med// @
7b5(rgyud): tu gsal ba'i rab gsal med// bkab pa'i bkab/ pa yang mdo// skye ba'i skye bar 'gyur nyid med// 'chi ba 'i 'chi ba yang mad // grol ba'i grol bar 'gyur ba med// mi
7b6(rgyud): gnas pa yi mi gnas med// dngos po med pa'i dngos med med// dngos po'i dngos po nyid kyang med// 'gyur ba'i 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi 'gyur ba yi yang mi 'gyur// rang bzhin
7b7(rgyud): med pa'i chos rnams kyi// skye 'jig sgyu ma de bzhin no// 'byung rnams 'jig par 'gyur men te// rang bzhin nyid kyis sgyu mi 'gyur// sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med// dngos po dngos
7b8(rgyud): med mtshan nyid cig/ rang gi shes rab la 'khyud sems// rdo rje nor bu'i pad+mar san// der son zla ba g.yo ba med// mi g.yo ba dang mi 'gyur sgom// lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams
9a1(rgyud): sku gsus thugs rnams sgom ba ste// rdo rjegasu rnams legs bsdus pa/ ye shes du namar sgom pa'o// shes rab chags pas la yi// jig
9a2(rgyud): le rim pas mgo bi las// rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams kyang // 'ching ba dam pa'i don gyis so// ji ltar zla shar rim pa yis// cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par
9a3(rgyud): 'gyur// grib ma nyams pa rdzogs pa ste// zla ba chang dang rdzogs pa min// de bzhin ye shes shar rim pas// sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs la
9a4(rgyud): segs nyams pa rdzogs// ye shes cha nga rdzogs pa min// ji ltar ri bong mtshan mas dbus// rdzogs par ro bong can mi gnas// de bzhin 'gyur med bde bar
9a5(rgyud): sems/ 'khor ba'i bag chags mtshan ma yis// bskyed dang rab tu nyams pa'i bogs// dkar po na/ ga po rab tu gnas/ de dag dbus rdzogs pa gang // de ni
9a6(rgyud): rdzogs par mi gnaso// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa la ni g.yo mi 'gyur// gang tshe rdo rje nor bur sems// de ni skad cig thams cad rdzogs// dkar po
9a7(rgyud): ngogs la 'di mi gnas// res 'ga' dkar min la mi 'gro// phyogs gnyis po yi dbus gnas pa// rdzogs pa la gnas gnyisu med// gtsug tor las ni shar ba de'i// rdo rje nor
9a8(rgyud): bur rdzogs par 'gyur// de chags bral las cha nyams pa// rdo rje nas nyams la rab rdzogs// slar yang gtsug tor du shar ba// slar yang rdo rje nir bur rdzogs// de chags bral las
9b1(rgyud): nyams pa// lus can ye shes nyams pa min// 'di yi bde ba che rang bzhin// rdzogs pa'i sgra yis brjod par bya// dngos po bar ma gzhan thams cad// 'byung dang sdud pa'i rgyu yin no// srid
9b2(rgyud): las mya ngan 'das par 'gro// de las slar yang srid par 'ong // rang phyogs dag las zla bzhin dang // bgod pa dag las snang byed bzhin// rdzogs par mi g.yo ba 'di ni// sa rnams kyis
9b3(rgyud): ni yongs rdzogs nyid// nyi khri brgyad gnyis brgya yi dbugs// 'gyuro med skad cig zos rnams kyis// phyogs gnyis yang dge gnon pa ni// sa rnams kyis ni yongasu rdzogs// bden don
9b4(rgyud): rnam pa bcu gnyis pa// rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur ba med// rnam pa bcu gnyis sa rnams kyis// rdzogs pa gnyis med pa mchog/ cha shas rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems// 
9b5(rgyud): rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba// don gcig gnyis su med pa chos// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs son pa'i sems// kun nas rab tu rdzogs
9b6(rgyud): ba'o// chags bral dang po chags pa che// rdo rje lus med mi 'gyur che// yongasu rdzogs pa phyogs gnyis kyis// bag chags rnams kyis ma mkhyad pa'o// ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhugs pa// 
9b7(rgyud): ni rgya mtsho'i chur mtshungs pa// de bzhin dngos po'i tshigs 'di no// 'gyur ba med pa 'gyur med mtshungs// ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa 'di// zos pa las ni re nyid 'gyur// sa ben
9b8(rgyud): rang bzhin sa bon gyis// 'bras bu'i dus nga rgyal spangs// de ltar dngos po'i tshigs pa yang // mchog tu mi 'gyur zos pa yis// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur// rnam pa thams
10a1(rgyud): cad rang bzhin 'dzin// mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ni// dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na// rgal rig min gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// de bzhin
10a2(rgyud): rnal 'bor dam pa'i bde// sems rdzogs char gyur na rdo rje// nor bur rig min gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// ji ltar re chen lcags rnams kyi// phyogs gcig yang dag
10a3(rgyud): gnas pa ni// lcags la drag po'i mes gdus na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med pa de// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa yang // sems la 'dod pa'i mes
10a4(rgyud): gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni// 'ga' zhig du yang dri ma med// de bzhin du ni phug pa'i sems// 'ga' zhig du yang bag cha
10a5(rgyud): med// lcags ni gas de nyid gyur pa// me yos dri ma med par 'a gyur// de bzhin yang dang yang du sems// 'dod chags me yis dri ma med// ji ltar nor bu che reg las// rje ni rab tu
10a6(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'gyur med bde reg las// sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur// 'dir ni mang po brjod pas ci// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yi// lcags rnams rab tu 'dzugs byed pa// ro yi mthu
10a7(rgyud): ni brtag pa min// ci zhig slar yang don dam pas// blo bur dri mas g.yogs pa yi// sems ni rab tu 'bugs pad pa// ye shes mthu ni brtag pa min// sems la glo bur di ma med// sems las yun
10a8(rgyud): ring dus tson min// sems med par ni skye ba med// sems la mi zad gnas pa min// gal te 'di nyid blo bu ba// de tshe sngon du sems dri med// gang tshe sems las des ring can// da tshe de ni ci las skyes
10b1(rgyud): gal te sems med par skye na// de chen mkha'i me tog mtshungs// gal te sems la rtag tu gnas// de tshe kun tu bar pa min// ji ltar zangs kyi dri ma ni// re yi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// de yi yod nyid
10b2(rgyud): nyams pa med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// de bzhin sems kyi dri ma ni// steng nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur// de yi ye shes nyid nyams med// de med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// ji ltar
10b3(rgyud): bcud kyis phugs pa'i lcags// lcags nyid ni rjes 'gro min// de bzhin bde bas phugs pa'i sems// sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gre min// chags bral las gzhan sdig pa med// bde ba las gzhan
10b4(rgyud): bsod nams med// de phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems// mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya// gzhon nu me yi dga' ba ni// med par bde/ ba smra mi nus// lang tshe'i dga' ba thob pa na// bde ba
10b5(rgyud): chen po rang gis rig/ de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral ba'i// bde ba smra bar nus ma yin// 'gyur med ting 'dzin thob pa na// rnal 'bo ra pa yis rang rig 'gyur// 'gyur med las skyes
10b6(rgyud): bde rig pa// thams cad mkhyen la'ang the tshom za// de lta na yang yid bde man// chags bral nyid du mi ba'o// 'phos pa las ni chags dril 'gyur// chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung // 
10b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed// zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod// shi nas slar yang de rnams kyi// srid pa'o srid las slar 'chi 'pho// da ltar sems can gyi srid pa// chags bral
10b8(rgyud): las 'byung gzhan du min/ de phyir 'dod pa thams cad kyis// 'pho ba'i chags pa rnam par spang // gang gis 'gyur med bde bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor 'khor ba bcings pa yis/ 'dod ldan
11a1(rgyud): yang ni chags bral bar// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod// bdag gis brjod pa'i rgyur tu slar// rnal 'bor pa ci sdug bsngal 'dod// khu ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis// mchog
11a2(rgyud): tu mi 'gyur bsgrub par bya// rten ni 'pho ba thob pa na// brtan pa'i 'dod chags bral ba nyid// rten dang brten pa lags rdzogs pa// ji srid 'gyur med nyid du 'gre/ sems kyi 'gyur med nyid thob na// rten
11a3(rgyud): dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid med// 'gyur med las byung sku yi ni// mdzod spu'i 'khor lor son pa'i yang // A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// hUM yig mi 'dod mi yi bdag/ stong pa las byung gzugs
11a4(rgyud): brnyan rgyu// mi 'gyur las skyes bde ba 'bras// rgyu ni 'das bu sa rgyas btab pa// 'bras bu rgyu yis rgyas btab pa'o// stong nyadad gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu// snying rje 'gyur med
11a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'bras// stong nyid snying rje dper med pa// byang chub sa mas demi 'pho pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa dal ba'i gzugs// 'khor ba las 'das mi 'gyur ba// de dag sbyor ba gnyis
11a6(rgyud): med mchog/ rtag dang tshad las nges par gol// dngos med las byung mtshan nyid pir// gzugs ni dngos po med pa min// dngos po las byung mtshan nyid pir// 'gyur ba med pa dngos po min// dngos
11a7(rgyud): po dngos med yang dag sbyor// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog/ gzugs dang gzugs min rnam par grol// pra phab me long la bzhi no// gzugs ni srid par mi 'ong ste// 'gyur med mya ngan
11a8(rgyud): 'das ma 'gro/ phan tshun mkhyud bzhi pa ste// ma ning gi ni go 'phang mchog/ shes rab rgyu las ma byung zhing // shes rab rgyu las byung ba 'bras/ shes rab rgyu las byung skyes phyir/ 
11b1(rgyud): shes rab la skyes rgyu skyes min// de pir ye shes rgyu skyes min// shes rab ye shes bla na med// 'bras bu rgyu yis gzhan dang gzhan// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad ga
11b2(rgyud): de ni rten cing 'dral bar 'byung // phan tshun rgya yis btab pa'i gzugs// skye min mya ngan 'das pa'ang min// shes rab kun nas mya ngan 'das// skye ba mchog tu 'gyur ba med// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam nges
11b3(rgyud): grol/ phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'o// shes pa gang zhig 'dir mthong ba// de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin// pi yi shes pa rnam 'byed phyir// de phyir bdag gis
11b4(rgyud): bdag nyid la// 'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin// ral gri chen po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci// mo gau sham bu mo dang 'grogs pas// rmi lam du ni bde
11b5(rgyud): 'gyur ltar// na mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni// bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no// shes rab ma yin thabs kyang rmi/ na// 'di ni lhan skyes shes rab bcas// kun nas
11b6(rgyud): bde ba rdzogs pa las// sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste// nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// yul dang dbang po spangs pa ni// kun nas 'byung po kun la gnas// bcad med pa dbye ba spangs// rang
11b7(rgyud): byung rdo rje sems dpa' 'di// don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che// nyon mongs zad pa
11b8(rgyud): dgra chen po// dam tshig sems dpa' gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje'i rnal 'bar khro ba che// lha min khro bo dgra chen po// dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che// 'pho ba'i chags pa
12a1(rgyud): / sel bar byed// rdo rje mi byed zhes par brjod/ 'dir ni don chen bcom ldan 'das/ sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid/ mchog tu mi 'gyur brjod par ba// mchog tu mi 'gyur
12a2(rgyud): brede ba rdzogs// sa rnams yongasu rdzogs pa yis// 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// ngang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni// mi g.ye de pir byang chub
12a3(rgyud): sems// nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs// zhe sdang chen po dag che ba// dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi// khu ba'ape med de za 'o// dam tshig sems dpa' re rigs 'dis// gti mug blo staM gti mug
12a4(rgyud): sel// rdo rje thams cad gcig pa nyid// shes rab sku dang mi 'a gyur bcas// khro ba chen po dgra chen po// khro ba'i gzugs can pa dung rnams kyis// 'gyur med bde ba che thabs las/ 
12a5(rgyud): nam yang sems can don mi 'dor// sems can grol nas cha/ gas chen po// 'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// 'di rnam sa rnam pa drug tu brjed// mi 'gyur ye shes tsher ba
12a6(rgyud): dang rnam shes gzugs dang 'du byed dang // 'du shes de rnams phung po'i rigs// ye shes me dang na mkha' sa// rlung chu rnams kyi rim pa bzhin// yid mig rna ba lus dang sna// lce rnams kyi yang de
12a7(rgyud): bzhin nyid// sgra re chos kyi dbyings dang dri// reg pa kha dog rnams kyis yang // khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// rigs drug rnams kyi yongs dag pa// lus dge gsang ba dbang po sems// 
12a8(rgyud): rtag zhud dkyil 'khor rnam po gsum/ shes rab babs kyi rdo rje gsum/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni dbang gis sgrib babs te/ mchog tu mi 'gyur sgrub pa'i thabs// dra da migs
12b1(rgyud): pa yang dag ldan// zla ba mdor bstan pa yis bshad// ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi le'uru le'u lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gis sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so// 
12b2(rgyud): 'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang // bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa las/ slar yang rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpal nA re ba'i 'grel
12b3(rgyud): bshad dang 'thun par bsgram zhag par byas pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma A di bad+d+ha ud d+hi ta shri ka la tsakra nA ma tan+da rA dzA/ bod skad du/ mchog gi dang po'i
12b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'kho ra lo zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phag 'chelo// mas cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed
12b5(rgyud): po'i sku ste pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan// sangs rgyas sing+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis btud la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yi// mgo bos rab tu pheg 'tshal log pa'i
12b6(rgyud): pad+ma sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni// rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i a 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i don tu'o// stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog
12b7(rgyud): mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang // phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang // lus la sna tshogs tshad dang srid pa gsu
12b8(rgyud): gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyad dang // dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol// zla ba bzang po khyed la bdag mgu
13a1(rgyud): / gang zhig khyed kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams dang // mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags dral bub mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pa min paso// mya ngan 'das pa la sogs
13a2(rgyud): 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni// lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par ba yis mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon// dus kyi stong pa rnams las rlung
13a3(rgyud): dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang // rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang song lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang // dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang
13a4(rgyud): 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang // stong pa'i da bus yang dag 'byung ste tshul lan tshwa dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgongaskyes bzhin// lus dang ye shes na mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang
13a5(rgyud): chu dang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba bskyed min dag dang srid pa rnams bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus dag las// sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur
13a6(rgyud): zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te// de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sems kyi kun tu rtog pa dag las grol// g.yon gyi yan log du ni dkar po 'bar ba 'ge ba'i
13a7(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i cha dang g.yasu dmar po mdog// sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang // mjug rings dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams
13a8(rgyud): ni zung bdun po// 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de muni pa med bzung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o// rgyab tu ser pa yang ni skar ma lha gnus ste do ni rnam gni gnyis kyi bye bso// srog ces
13b1(rgyud): bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi ba rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o// dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'og du gnas// kun tu ye shes dang ni steng pa'i zhi ba
13b2(rgyud): gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol// a sogs sum cu'i dbangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang // ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dpangs dang bcas pa nyin
13b3(rgyud): zhag stong dag me yi tshad kyis sprod par bad// ha sogs dbangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha mi gdengs can 'byung po'i snyi gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa// a sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar
13b4(rgyud): khams gsum dag ni nges par skud 'gyur mi yi pad ga/ dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan zla la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyis skye ba'i gnas// mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha'
13b5(rgyud): rlung bsreg pa las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dgo/ a sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste// sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can
13b6(rgyud): dang gser 'od phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o// rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams dmal pa gdengs can grong kher la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum
13b7(rgyud): phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshegs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga// mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'bangs g.yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga// de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig
13b8(rgyud): tu srid pa gsum dral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o// rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la snying dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// gzhi byed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtsa
14a1(rgyud): me can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis// dbus ma lhun pa gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor le skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste// cha drug la
14a2(rgyud): ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi ster ba dag las rab tu skyes// 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug du ni bad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste// sa yi khom/ 
14a3(rgyud): yug 'bum phrag gsum dang che me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim paso// mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa// de ni sa yi steng gi gan+da
14a4(rgyud): su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang // / phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra ma 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste// 'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas te/ 
14a5(rgyud): ltos 'gro nas kyis sor mo nyi ma ni// zung gis khri'i khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grag sa dag tu 'gyur// rgyang grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad
14a6(rgyud): de yis lha yul sa dang na mkha' dag la tshad yino// dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang
14a7(rgyud): ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig/ gzugs med dag ni a sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te i la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs// ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod
14a8(rgyud): pa rnam bcur rab thugasal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o// srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khrims gsum// srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje
14b1(rgyud): gsum du 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bso// rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmal bar nges par brjod de be ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o// 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzang du bdag dang me dang mun pa
14b2(rgyud): dang ni ngu 'bod bdun pa dang // lan tshwa chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun ter po ni// 'od sngon man da ra r-i ni Sha Ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro Na bsil ri rdo rje'o// gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag
14b3(rgyud): dang rab mchog kuM sha dang ni mi 'am ci dang khrung khrung dang // dag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa 'dzam+bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyis// shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag
14b4(rgyud): pe lho ru me ni gru gsu mo// bang du chu ni pad kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchogs ni mu yi gter gyi zur// ri rab lhun po stong dba'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi
14b5(rgyud): dbusu ste// sa yi steng du dang gi tshod stong phrag rnams// nai ri dang klu dang gza' dang legs rnams dag du 'gyur// lhun phra yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa shin dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams
14b6(rgyud): kyi snying phrag ni// lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi ge zhe la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste// rwa ni lnga po rnam dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun tu da ni khor yug/ 
14b7(rgyud): de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dge dang chu gter rnams te logs rnams kun tu ma dang rlung // chu gter drug po thams cad kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste// gling rnams dang na
14b8(rgyud): rgyud mi chog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi yangs po dag dang lan tshwa'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag pad kyi tshad yin te// srid pa gsum pi 'dzin pa yi ni
15a1(rgyud): / mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no// tshangs pa'i gnas dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste// lhun pa la ni tshig mda'i
15a2(rgyud): tshegs dang sa bzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o// dpal ldan lhun po'i pags rnams kun tu sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas// zhi dang 'dun pa
15a3(rgyud): ngag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni mi dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar/ shar du brgya byin mer ni ma lha gshin rje bden dral nub phyogasu ni gshin rje srin po chu// rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byid pog
15a4(rgyud): su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang // tshangs dang kha ba 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bces rang rang legs ni srung zhing skyeng ba ste// de dbus dus kyi 'okhA
15a5(rgyud): lo rgyal ba mchog gi bskyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku// lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnamasu ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor// gang du chos
15a6(rgyud): ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang dar ni rab tu bgod par byed// kla klo rnams kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu// rdzogs ldan gsum
15a7(rgyud): ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur// dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can te rab tu zhugs pa dar ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod// rgyal po'i rgyab
15a8(rgyud): tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu gnyis kyi bar du gnyis lnga no// dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong drag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste// re re dag gi tshad ni
15b1(rgyud): dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o// pra dbugs d+hu dang chu tshod nyin zhag d+hu dang dus bzhi dag ni steng phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes
15b2(rgyud): pra dang mi dang 'byung ba lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtse bo'i nyin nag gcig gi tshad des gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug/ dum bu dam bu bani pa'i ge 'phangs 'khor lo can bgrod
15b3(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis// phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus 'grod pa rnam pa gnyis// rgyal po lo na mtha'i dag rjes nyin nag dus sbyor chu tshed dag dang mu yi
15b4(rgyud): sang rnams te// 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes pra dang mi dang 'byung po lho dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo'i zhag rare la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas kyi gnas dang lus kyi dengs
15b5(rgyud): su de bzhin no// le 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis pa/ sel bar mi bdag grags pa sham b+ha la zhes pa per 'byung // de na sa klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par mkha'i yul du kla kle'i
15b6(rgyud): chos dag rab tu 'jug/ de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par 'o// mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la
15b7(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur// me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i dbang po'i le ni rab tu grub// kla klo dbang de'i la ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag mo dag kyang
15b8(rgyud): nyi mas bsgyur// nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha'i ma zla bas rnam par dpe// rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// zla ba
16a1(rgyud): / gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag parje mo can gyis bsgyur// rtsa ba dag la drug gi chas rnyed yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya// steng 'og
16a2(rgyud): dag las mig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya ste drug cu'i cha dag gis// rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur// gnas gnyis nyi
16a3(rgyud): zla ba sres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni// de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshegs// gnas gsum
16a4(rgyud): dbus ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yin te/ na rnams kyis mthob par// gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshe dra dag gis thob pa nor to snying gi phung por gnyis kyis ni/ 
16a5(rgyud): bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur// gza' la gza' ni rang / sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur rje ched rnams te 'og tu chog
16a6(rgyud): dag la yang gnyis// skar mar gnyis dang chu tshod dag po nor du rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin// 'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs
16a7(rgyud): tshes rnams sbyin dang dor dang slar yang sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshed rkang pa rnams te// tshogs kyi chal chu ga ter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin dor rkang pa'i don// stong la stong pa
16a8(rgyud): rnam dag btsu ga sum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyim dag lo phyogs// bcu gcig me la ches shes bya ste bdu dang zhug ter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o// lnga dang dag pa nyi shu
16b1(rgyud): rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// de la nyi ma'i rab tu dade bas gsal bas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// 'thung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rig ded ma lag ri ngong
16b2(rgyud): can ni snga mi'i cha dang gzhan la yang // tshogs kyi chal chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam tho bo la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang der// rgyu zhing yod pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas ma tho ba dag
16b3(rgyud): kyang de bzhin no// de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// gang zhig rig pang rnams kyis tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o// 
16b4(rgyud): dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu len dag ste nyi ma'i lod des spyod dbus nas sbyang bar ba// bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji bzhin ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste/ 
16b5(rgyud): spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur nas mda' dang yon tan zla bas mthong / longs spyod dang bcas pa// bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin// nyi ma la
16b6(rgyud): ni dus ro sbrul dang bcu dang 'brog byed 'breg byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drag/ ma dang na mkha' dag kyang bgrod pa'i mthar ta bang dang lho ru nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur// zla ba 'pho ba'i dab pa dag
16b7(rgyud): las phyogs kyi dpe bas zla ba dag ni nyin mor bad pas spyod// nyi ma la byin tshes grangs dag kyang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la gza' yi longs spyod bsres pa dag/ dman par gyur pa'i bong mtshan ma
16b8(rgyud): 'gyur te mi yi 'dog po nyi zla ba sres pa sbyor ba'o// byed pa dag ni chos la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma'o// dag pa'i lo la klu bsresras mkha' dang namakha' chug te
17a1(rgyud): / gyis bsgyur klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs pa dga'i zla me yis rab tu phye ste namakha' res bsgyur ri la sogs pas bges pa chu chod te// gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang mu chod nges pa
17a2(rgyud): 'dir ldan zla ba dag la le yi 'pho ba'o// lug sogs rnams kyis sten byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste// zla ba ri 'thung rig byed dag dang yon tan mda' ste
17a3(rgyud): ri bong can dang ri zla gsum pa la'o// rig byed me 'thung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la'o// drug dang zla ba mda' dang zla ba'i dus me dang drug zla rig byed ri dang 'jig rten dang / 
17a4(rgyud): drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste steng 'i mog mda'i nya ma'i go 'phang nya yi khyim la'o// zla drug 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgyu ba so// mu gter srog dang mu
17a5(rgyud): srang me ni nyin zhag sa so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i ya na lag gi/ lho phogasu ni mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi bang du nyin mo'o// zla ba dag la mig
17a6(rgyud): dang nyi ma bsres pa mig gis rnam sgyur zla ba'i tshigs la gcig besras te// mkha' dus chu yis rab phye thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o// lhag ma drug cus bsgyur
17a7(rgyud): ba gang yin de las chu tshed slar yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste// thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur te mun can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o// zla ba sum cus bsgyur ba nyin zhig
17a8(rgyud): so so dag dang bcas pa las ni ri mkha' ris thob pa// gnas gsum dbus rnam par bsres pa las kyang chu ga ter ros thob dman pa mi gsal nyon zhig/ ri dus gcig gis bsres pa dag kyang gsapa/ 
17b1(rgyud): ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri kA dus kyis bgrod pa yi// lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thob slar yang na mkha' ro yis bsgyur las ri la sogs pas chu tshe do// mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang gal te bu lon lhag
17b2(rgyud): na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyangs// phyed pas lhag par gyur na 'khor lo pad ni dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim min 'gyur// skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla
17b3(rgyud): bas pa'o// gang thob dal ba'i las dag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so// de nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste/ longs spyod kyis ni chu chod
17b4(rgyud): bsgyur las mnga' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo pad las cha thob pa// snga ma phyed la bzung ba 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur// zos pa tshogs gcig byas
17b5(rgyud): nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o// de nas nyi maras skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes da ga kyang myur ba'i las la'o// zla skyes dkar po la yang
17b6(rgyud): nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur// sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshad bsgyur// drug cu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu
17b7(rgyud): rkang pa dag las bzung ba dang ni dbrog pa de bzhin nyid// zos pa dang na tshogs gcig bas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste// sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab
17b8(rgyud): sa mdzu ga ma ga pa sgragapa ma ma ca ma ma la ga pargya pas la pa 'tho mnam phyi pa sa
18a1(rgyud): / skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur// steng dang na mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yis dman// ri nas bug pa'iri dang klu yis bge ste slar yang lnga
18a2(rgyud): ma skar ma la sogs dpe bas bsgyur// rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu ched rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur// zla skyes der te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma pe
18a3(rgyud): kyang yang dag spang // lhag ma'i bye ba nor dang bu lon dal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmar ji lta bzhin du 'gyur// zla skyes rkang pa ngal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogaso// 
18a4(rgyud): nyin zhag tshegs ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman pa bas nas so ma chu gter dag gis bge// lhag ma skar mas bsnun las skar mi slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang dal ba'i las
18a5(rgyud): la'o// rgyu skar nyim sbyang ste 'breg byed dgu dang rtse meHno no dal ba'i las 'i rkang pa'o// slar yang myur ba dag la rkang pa r-ib gsal ma nu'i gnas la phyogs rkang la sogs de dag go/ 
18a6(rgyud): nyin zhag mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas chu gter nor gyis dman pa'iri dang rgyal ba mig gis ba'o// skar mas bsgyur ba las kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshed myur ba'i las la pa sangs kyi// rgyu
18a7(rgyud): skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang zla dus ri bong can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste// myur la de nyid la sogs dab pas rab gsal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin dor mig dmar bzhin// mkha' mig klu dang
18a8(rgyud): rig ded kyis dman gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshegs ni drug re ri mkha' zla ba yas// bgo zhing skar mas bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te spen pa yi ni dor ba dag kyang bco brgya do// rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ 
18b1(rgyud): tshes dus rab gsal ro yi gnas la'o myur ba'i las la ro la sogs// myur ngal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis// byed snga ma dang bed bi mar yang nyi ma 'gro
18b2(rgyud): ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyi ni 'byung ba yang // sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur po'i zla ba rnams kyis mjug rings dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur// gang dag su zhig nyi mo'i longs spyod la ni rab
18b3(rgyud): zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur// nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bso// g.yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i
18b4(rgyud): dbang gis g.yon nas 'gro ba ste// g.yas la gnas ba dag ni g.yas kyis slar yang gsal bar 'dir ni phan tshun 'thab ste dgra yin pi sa gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams
18b5(rgyud): gal te de la ngagra dag gyur na nges par 'thab pa'o// skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thab pa min par nges shing 'dir ni phan na mtshungs pa dag tu ldan// gal te nyi ma yi ni g.yon du zla ba
18b6(rgyud): rab zhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g.yon pa yis// byang gi rwa ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig du ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g.yas pa yang // tshigs mtsham su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par
18b7(rgyud): 'gro ba mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o// g.yon du rgyu ba dag la g.yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod dbang gis g.yas la g.yas pa'i char// de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtsham su 'dzin
18b8(rgyud): ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu yang // tha skar la sogs nag pa byed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su 'go la'i ri me'o// rgyu skar g.yas dang g.yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i
19a1(rgyud): gnas khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas// gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la 'go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste
19a2(rgyud): pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o// ma nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang na mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri'o// dbusu 'khor lo pad kyi ri bo nyi ma'i
19a3(rgyud): bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mi gcig ni mnyam pa la'o// phyi nas g.yas dang g.yas min dag tu rgyu ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis// lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan
19a4(rgyud): mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mthar// nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshad drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug cha so// gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par
19a5(rgyud): 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o// de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par gling la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin// dug pa zhes pa me grangs dag la 'khrig pa gzhur gnas
19a6(rgyud): phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni// nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang // seng+ge'i bum par rab zhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o// 
19a7(rgyud): 'dir ni g.yon bgod du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la// nya la dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi pa'o// 'byung ba zhes pa ra nyi
19a8(rgyud): ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni dag pa bdun par yang // nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng+ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad pa'o// bu mos bug par srang gi nyams bcu par 'gyur
19b1(rgyud): te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o// gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams 'grod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi sa la'o// de bzhin lhor bgro 'gyur nyi ma 'grod pa'i dbang gis
19b2(rgyud): karka Ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o// steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du 'grod pa dag gi mthar// de nas g.yas phyog su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag
19b3(rgyud): dag ni drag po'i grangs// steng phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas 'go la'i ri mo ste// de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda'
19b4(rgyud): ni byang dang lhor yang // lan tshwa'i rgya mche 'gongs nas nyin mor bye/ da padag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed// kai la sha yi byad du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o// mang
19b5(rgyud): rnams chos kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni bregs kyis bgred pa dag la 'gro bar bye'o// phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin la 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag
19b6(rgyud): dag laso// khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs rnams zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed// dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas
19b7(rgyud): chad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o// lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o// ri yi rgyal po dag ni
19b8(rgyud): skye ba thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyuraro ma yi bdag/ nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur ti dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang da ni nub pa ni'o// dus dang thun mtshams bzhi dang thun tshod nyin dang mtshan/ 
20a1(rgyud): / mo dus kun du ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams// dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa lhun po'i phyogs rnams ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor// chu tshed dus la dpag chad stong phrag drug ni dang
20a2(rgyud): pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste// drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ro bo'i stong phrag nyan dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor// nyin dang mtshan mor 'go la phyed la mkha' ma mchod bgrod 'go la dag
20a3(rgyud): la g.yas dang ni// g.yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de na dbugs zung chu srang gsum// lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni
20a4(rgyud): glang la 'gyur// zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' 'o'i chu tshod du 'gyur ku lI ra dang sing+ge la'o// bu mo la ni byed pa cas drug ste ngas par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams
20a5(rgyud): cad 'gyur// dus sbyor dag gis de nub gang phyir 'char bdag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar bye bas so// stong phrag nyishu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan pa dag las so yi cha yis nges par
20a6(rgyud): phyung gyur pa// lu sau la dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams dag gi grangs// stong phrag sum cu rtsa dag dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshad rab tu grags
20a7(rgyud): ba ste// stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu ched du 'gyur drug cu'i tshi yas nyin zhag kyang // zla ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gi mtshan mo'o// bla ma'i lo drug du
20a8(rgyud): 'byung bas sa kyi yang 'gro por 'gyur sgras kyi yang srid pa'o// chos zhes bya ba'i lan gi skyes kyis te pa su na gyi dgu rgyal ba mi gsas dpa / de dag thams cadag / 
20b1(rgyud): / bsdus pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo dang byed bcas zla ba gsum// byed dang bcas pa'i nyi ma nag grangs dag las kyang lo brgyar 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor los dam no 'dir// srog ni snying stobs la
20b2(rgyud): 'ba'i rdul gyi bar dang mun pa la yang lus ngag sems kyi dbye ba so// lha mi lag 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur zla ba pad bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang // grangs ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag dus kyi
20b3(rgyud): 'khor lor rab grags pa yin no mi yi dbang // ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo'i bgrod pa dag la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams// bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis
20b4(rgyud): myur ba'i las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu ched te/ sa skyes la ni rig byed dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis// snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lan
20b5(rgyud): nor gyi bgod pa dag las gnas kyi dbye bas nges par sbyar// dang por rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag du 'gyur// gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang
20b6(rgyud): mig ste bco brgyad tshes dang drag po mi dang rtsa bar dag po dang // sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu'o// de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu
20b7(rgyud): lon dag dang nor yang rim pa min dang rim paso// rig byed dag dang dug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshed dag tu 'gyur// gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshas dang / 
20b8(rgyud): mnu myos byed drag po ri dang dbang po mkha'// rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsal nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste// nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bzhi dag kyang ma nu'i gnas/ 
21a1(rgyud): la rgyu ba'i dbye bas yang dag gnas// chu gter na mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod tshegasu 'gyur// gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang dgu/ 
21a2(rgyud): nor ngas drag lag pa zla ba dag dang rtsa bar ni// me drug bug pa dang ni drag po mi bdag thub pa dang te rgyu ba thams cad rim pa so// myur dal 'khyog po la yang gza' yi tshegs ni nges por nyi ma'i dpe ba dag
21a3(rgyud): gis rgyu bar byed // drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshod dag ni ba sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur// gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang de bzhin lag migo rnam pa
21a4(rgyud): gnyis// skyon dang chos dang brgyad de rtsa bar drug dang ni mkha' yon tan dag dang gcig gis dman pa'i brgya// mtha raDa ni me dang ra yi grangs te brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la ba sangs rgyu
21a5(rgyud): ba rim paso// nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshegs pa 'di dag du 'gyur mi yi dbang // drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung bar rig byed chug ter mig dang zung dang stong pa
21a6(rgyud): rtsa bar ni// bregs dang rog pad dag dang 'byung ba ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas bzhag par ba// de ltar gza' rnams kyis ni rgya ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur/ 
21a7(rgyud): sum cu rtsa dag phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa// gza' rnams dag gi dal ba'i las la rkang par 'gyur te mig dug mig gi grangs kyi chu tshe do// de nyid
21a8(rgyud): bco brgyad ri dregs brtan pa sa yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i chal ste// phyogs rim ni gza' lag gi'o dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan la yang // dkar po'i mda' dang chu ga ter zla ba
21b1(rgyud): spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur// zla ba la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshod dgu bcu dag ste lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs// pa sangs kyi ste de bzhin gza' lag gi yang
21b2(rgyud): gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro sreg za dag tu 'gyur// 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi'o// zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu tshod
21b3(rgyud): drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te// chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyad do// gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces pa gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba
21b4(rgyud): phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas// gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnams kyi nyin bzhin du lon gza' drug gi yang lo das spyod de// zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal po'i las la khyab
21b5(rgyud): bdag rjesu gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyad// de la sa rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod// sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas
21b6(rgyud): zla ba'i rkang pa cha ched med kyis rnam par dman// nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos 'di nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga// gang zhig ma spyad byed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus
21b7(rgyud): la cha man zla 'o ste// do na nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur tinges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyon nag de'o// sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyad dag
21b8(rgyud): gis bgos pa lags// thob pa dag ni mjug rings chu tshad nyin zhag so so'i dus sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las// chu srang bdun dang byed dregs nges por yon tan gyis bsgyur nyam
22a1(rgyud): // longs spyod dag la sbyang bar bya// mjug rings nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgyab nas// rgyu bar chu srang bad bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi la'i
22a2(rgyud): longs spyod dag las rim pa ste// rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyu chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur// phyed bcas zla ba'i chu tshe de gnyis ni nyin nag so sor 'char te myur 'khog
22a3(rgyud): dag la mdun rgya ba du'o// phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag du ni de yi 'cha ra ba mo yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur// slar yang dpal du 'khor lo rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la
22a4(rgyud): mthong mi 'gyur// de yi 'chor ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur// lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mangs bsnun bgrod pa'i
22a5(rgyud): nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman// bug pa bsres pa rnams ni rang gis bgrod pa'i yon tan dbang gis gza' rnams dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// sa skyes la ni ri klu drug gi nyin zhag
22a6(rgyud): tshogasu 'gyur te ri bug ri klu zla skyes la'o// lha yi bla ma dag la so ma rig byed du 'gyur ba sangs la ni ri dang rgyal ba mig/ nyi ma'i bu la drug dag ri dang na mkha' gcig gi nyin zhag tshegs ni dkyil
22a7(rgyud): 'khor du 'gyur ro// sa skyes la na raM dris gcig kyang nges par nor du 'gyur to zla ba'i bu la brgyas bsnun pa// me dang nyi ma ri yis dman zhing pa sangs dag la nyin zhag bcus bsgyur chu gtar brgyad kyis
22a8(rgyud): dman// stong mkha' dus mig dag dang mkha' lag gdengs can dus rnams blon po nyi skyes dag la bu lon 'gyur// sa skyes la ni byed bcas dgu ste lag la byed lhag mi bdag rgyu skar nyi ma bla ma
22b1(rgyud): la'o// pa sangs la drug nyi skyes la skyon bu lon du 'gyur mtha' dag longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya// phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las// dma' ba rang
22b2(rgyud): gi yan lag dag las dag 'gyur bgrod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnaso// zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis// cha thob dag kyang bu
22b3(rgyud): lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri bong can gyis rjesu ma spyad chu tshed byed// slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhag lhag pa nyin zhag so so'i dus zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur// drug cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i
22b4(rgyud): dusu myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang / zla skyes blon pa myur ba dag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur tes skyes mjug rings 'khog pa la// dman paM pa sangs dal ba la
22b5(rgyud): ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med// myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'a khyog por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan du mngon par phyogs// dal la
22b6(rgyud): lho ru bzhin phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon+tan dbang gis 'byung ba la yang bang du gdong // zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur mkha'i mig zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste// khyim ni bcis
22b7(rgyud): po rnams dus kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang nyi ma'i rkang pa'o// de yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis rim min rim pa ste// 'khor lo pad byed dag la
22b8(rgyud): mtha' dag ni dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang // tshigs mtsham su ni'i bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dge la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang / rnam dag gyur na bkra
23a1(rgyud): cad 'dzin ta ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshed drug cu'o// phred dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste// gnag dang dkar ba'i
23a2(rgyud): tshigs mtshams dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin// mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi le yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya// gnas gnyis pags kyi
23a3(rgyud): chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya'o// 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyis phe la'o// slar yang phung po gnyis kyis
23a4(rgyud): nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs dag du ni rab tu 'gyur/ steng ba steng ba na mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa'i bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyis tshid// gsum ldan la ni na mkha' mkhwa
23a5(rgyud): stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangasu rab tu grags// steng pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag ste// stong pa na mkha' mkha'
23a6(rgyud): mig yon+tan tshwa gter rnams kyi lo yo grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur// lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyub khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas// slar yang ba skar laso/ 
23a7(rgyud): ngag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhin nag pa'i zla ba la sogs dang // gza' dang sbyor ba tshes dang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste da ya dus ni// lha rnams dag dang lha min rnams kyis 'khrug
23a8(rgyud): pa drag po sa gzhi'i gnas rnamasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sde pa drug ni nyi ma'i dbangs bcas nges par yon+tan gyis bsgyur le gsum nyi ma dge ste// a sogs thung nyin zhag ces pasum
23b1(rgyud): 'gyur ri beng can ma byed bcas zla ba zla ba la// chu tshed ha sogs dbyangs bcas sum 'gyur gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum// dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs
23b2(rgyud): sum 'gyur gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni dus sbyor gsum// 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni mi yi bdag po byed bcas zla ba dag dang le gsumo// phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas thub
23b3(rgyud): mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur// zla bar bsreg pa gza' gcig dang ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod tshe gas la gnyis dang rkang pa mda'// 'khor lo dag lA
23b4(rgyud): nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis rnam par phye ba dag ni ga zar 'gyuraro// sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshod thub pa nir gyi bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las tshegs la gnyis// 
23b5(rgyud): sbyin dor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang be lnga ste/ 'dir ni drug gis// zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni sum 'gyur dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags/ 
23b6(rgyud): drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang por spyod ldan dbang phyug chu chad do// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag phyi dang lus la dpe
23b7(rgyud): med par// bsdu ba dang ni spro ba'i sladadu srid pa gsum gyi gnas nyi ma dus kyi gzugs dang ni// shes rab thabs kyi rab dab dang ni mnyam dang ni mnyam rigs dang myur 'khyog la sogs
23b8(rgyud): rgyu ba ste// chags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang drag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni shes ma yin// oM sogs lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i chos grangs dbang gis
24a1(rgyud): dga' ba la sogs lnga dang ldan gyur pa// de dag 'dir ni 'char byed mi bdag gal te de las skyes la segs gza' dag ma gyur na'o// sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing gas/ 
24a2(rgyud): te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid gyur pa// de la gal te g.yul dang nad du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o// bzang po zla skyes dag gis gza' 'di la ni gal te mchu/ 
24a3(rgyud): nyid ldan na gnyis pa 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyal ba bla ma dag la gal te skrag tu gyur ni gsum pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// stong pa'i chos dang pa sangs dag la gal te mon grur gyur na bzhi pa
24a4(rgyud): ngag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rdzogs pa spen pa dag dang lha na cig du ni bra nye gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// nyi ma dag la/ dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi rmar yang 'gyur te gzir ba rnams
24a5(rgyud): ni nyon mongs nyid// zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rna sa kyi nges par g.yul dang nang dag la yid de bzhin 'gyur/ den par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras bu mang por 'chi
24a6(rgyud): sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur// nad dang g.yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag ma dag la dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes par bya// de ltar rgyu skar gza' ste dbangs tshegs tshes rnams dag ni de
24a7(rgyud): nyid lnga yi rab tu dbe ba yis// phyogs dang zla ba dgrod pa dag dang lo dang drug cu'i lo rnams la yang 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur// nag pa sogs la 'dir ni yan log bcu gnyis dag gis 'char 'gyur
24a8(rgyud): phyogs kyi dpe bo de nyid do// nyin zhag dbyangs rnams bdun surtsa gnyis dag gis 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te zla ba'i dbye ba la'o// zla ba drug gis bgrod pa'i yan lag dag ste ra 'byung la sogs
24b1(rgyud): bcu gnyis lo rnams dag gi'o// de ltar dngangs ni lnga po rnams dag 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te de ni pi nas nub pa'o// dang po la ni dbangs rnams bris pa rang tshes yon tan dbang gis dpal ldan gzhon nu
24b2(rgyud): gnyis pa la// dar bab rgan po rim pas mo dang chu gter nyin zhag la ste lnga pa la ni nub par 'gyur// oM sogs dbangs lnga gang dag nges par yon+taM gyis bsgyur de dag rnams ni rnam gnyis sum cu nyid// 
24b3(rgyud): sogs sde pa'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon+ta ni dbang gis mtha' dag sbyar bar baM ba ste// thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang dkar po'i pogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dpe bso// ring po rnams ni
24b4(rgyud): nag po'i phyogs la shin tu nges par 'gyur te spro dang / bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so// nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyuskar de la gsal bar ma drang yi chu tshod nyi ma'i dus sbyor cha dgu pa// lug gi dus sbyor la so
24b5(rgyud): 'di dag rnams kyang 'di ni rang bzhin gsum ste brtan g.yo shin tu mnya// lug dang kaN Ta sreng chu srin 'dir ni gso bdage ste de las gnyis pa brtan pa'o// lhag ma gzhan ni gnyis
24b6(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su rtag pa nyid 'char// de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang nyin zhag dus la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho na ste// dang por sum cu'i dbangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar
24b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba nyid yung tsam dag la'o// sde pa'i yo ga sum su chi tshid rnams la rab tu 'gyur te nga dang ring ngo'ab dpebs/ zla ba'i dbus su ches kyi chal 'char bar brjed de dag nub pa dag kyang de nyid la'o// 
24b8(rgyud): stong pa rlung me chu dngas rnams kyang a la sogs par dbang sa ni lnga po rnams kyi 'gra/ sgra gcan me dang zla nyi zla skyes mig dmar pa sangs bla ma mjug rings spen pa 'di rlag lci// slar brjod dus sbyor ri de
25a1(rgyud): / la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshod rnams ni bsgrub par bya// de yi dbus su dngangs gang zung ba'i gza' zhes bya ba stobs ldan de yis dkyil 'khor bsgrub par ba// g.yon pa dag
25a2(rgyud): nas thung ngu'i dngangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te g.yas pa nas kyang gzhan dag go// g.yon la stong pa la sogs de nyid dag dang gza' tshogs rgyu ba sgra gcan la sogs mtho' dag ste// g.yas la
25a3(rgyud): de nyid 'dzin mo sogs dang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid// phyi rol du yang dus kyi chu tshod gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa dbyangs bcas dag ni bsgrub par bya// des na g.yul
25a4(rgyud): gyi smad 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni dus dag shar bar gyur pa na'o// rlung du nyi ma dog la 'bam zhing me las skyes shar ba dag la rma ru 'a gyur pa yin// chu dang bla ma la ni 'bum par 'gyur tes
25a5(rgyud): la spen pa shar la 'khrug par mi 'gyuraro// 'chi dang nyon mongs rmar 'gyur bde ba dag dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'dri byed nad pa rnams kyi'o// g.yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur
25a6(rgyud): te sgra gcan stong pa dag la shar na yang // rlung dang zla ba dag la 'jam dang g.yul du rma yang zla skyes ma la shar ba dag la'o// tshul pa sangs la ni don rnyed sa la mjug rings shar ba dag la ngag yang
25a7(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin bgrod pa bag ma dag la g.yon gyi lam la gza' rnams kyis ni dge ba'i 'bras bu 'gyur// lo nyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dgangs par bcu yis bsgyur te khyim gyi
25a8(rgyud): 'khor lo dini gas kri/ gli mang de dag 'byung bas brdzun nyi ma'i skye dang ldan dun gyim mi lhags ni mi mad pa'i mim nyom gan su gyur na rnams 'di da pa sad mi man
25b1(rgyud): dang rag bde ro ste shin tu mnyam pa'i gnasu gyur na bya ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur// le dang zla ba bogs dang nyin dang mtshan me'i dus ni dus sbyor dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste// dus sbyor gcig ni lha yi da
25b2(rgyud): ba gza'i tshegs dang ldan dpangs dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad do// de nyid gcig ni dbugs rnams drug cu mngon lhag yon+tan brgya yaM dus kyi chu tshad dag la gnas// chu tshod cha shas chu srang dag cad yi
25b3(rgyud): shas zhes pa dbugs dag rnams sa mi yi dbang // dbugs 'byung 'jug pa'i dbus su mi dag dge ba'i 'bras bu dag kyang rnal 'khor ldan pas shes par byed// lha shes rnams kyis nyon zhag 'angs pa'i
25b4(rgyud): dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrub nas dus kyi chu tshed do// da ltar byung ba shes pa min par dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa// de ni long ba yis kyang long ba bzung nas glang chen sang+gas gtam
25b5(rgyud): pa'i thibs por rab tu 'jug/ dri me'i rnal 'khor mi shes pa la ga/ za' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor sbyor ba sbyin pa ni// skye da/ nga bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la ngas me nyi mas skye
25b6(rgyud): nyin mor byed pa'i bu rnams kyis// de la 'chi dang nad dang rma dang nges par mtha' dag nor ni rnam par nyams pa dag kyang bad// de phyir spang bar bya ste nges par bdag gis ngas sbyor gzhan ni rab tu sbyin par bya// sku
25b7(rgyud): dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la sgra gcan zla ba zla skyes bla ma pa sangs dang bcas pas// dag nyams rang nyid rgyas shing g.yul du rnam par rgyal te dga' ma dang btsas nor dag 'thob par 'gyur// yang
25b8(rgyud): ngag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te slar yang gal te rang lus g.yon gyi rtsa las gyur pa na/ nges par don ni thams cad 'grub ste mtha'i dag sa yi steng du dag pa'i gza' dang ches la'o// rgyu skar rnams
26a1(rgyud): ni dgu dang dgu dang dgu yis cha gsum pas te skyes pa'i rgyu skar dang po las// gdugs pa rnams ni zla ba dag dang ldan cig mi mnyam gnas myur nad pa rnams ni 'chi ba nying // bskar la sogs/ 
26a2(rgyud): rnams kyis rtsa gsum sbrul yang spras par gyur pa na mo gnyid kyi bar du ste// sdig zla skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig dag la gyur na mi rnams dag ni rnam par nyams// drug dang tshes dang brgyad dang mi
26a3(rgyud): zla bcu dang bcu dgu nyi shu gcig gi lo bzang rnams// nyi zla mig dmar gzi' lcag nyi skyes bla ma lag 'gro dkar po rnams kyis de dag rim pas spyod// de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde pa
26a4(rgyud): brgyad po rnams kyi yi ge dag la ni// drag po rnams kyi das zhi ba min pa byed cing mchog tu bde byed zhi ba'i rang bzhin gzar gang dag/ rgyal gyi zla bar nyi ma chu srin la son ma rig pa ste
26a5(rgyud): bum par nyi ma mgul yang // 'du bad du 'gyur mi yi bdag po nyi ru nyi ma dbo dag la ni rnam par shes pa ste// lu ga tu nyi ma nag pa la ni ming dang gzugs so glang 'khrig la som
26a6(rgyud): sa gra snron dag la// mig sogs dang ni reg pa dag ste nyi ma karka Tar gnas chu zla la ni tsher bar 'gyur// seng+ger nyi ma gro zhin la yang sred pa bu mo dang ni srang du son pa khrums dang ni// tha skar zla ba dag
26a7(rgyud): la len pa nyid dang srid par 'gyur te smin drag sdig par nya ma la// skye ba dang ni gzhu la nyi ma gnas pa mgo dag la yang de bzhin rga/ shi rim pa ste// de ltar nyi zla'i dpe ba dag las gnyis ka bgod
26a8(rgyud): pa'i dbang gis rgyal po yan lag bcu ga to'o// rgyal dang mthu mo mtsham su mu srin dag la nyi ma gnas pa gaba'i de la ni ma rig pa// de nas gnyis pa la ni sho bar 'gyur te mi ying dag pade
26b1(rgyud): skye sna /  shi pa gas pas nga sa pa tshus padanathams su rgyal sa mes sa ma sa chud pa sa sa
26b2(rgyud): hU~M la g-i chis shes bya ba thapa mas rlog sa rgyu 'i da gas sa 'gi yan lag 'ju ga gis/ 'du byed ma sum mtshams dag du sangs pa 'im yin pa de la 'du bya
26b3(rgyud): na'o// de nas gnyis pa la ni rnam par shes par 'gyur te nyin nag gsum pa la ni ming dang gzugs// de ltar zla ba gnyis la yan lag du gyur nyi ma'i dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bso// de la ma rig la
26b4(rgyud): sogs yan lag mi mnyam pa yang bya ba kun la dge bar 'gyur ba ste// gang zhig 'du byed la sogs mnyam pa dag kyang rtag tu dbang bgrod bag ma dag la dge ba min// de bzhin phyogs kyi dbye ba
26b5(rgyud): dag la ri bong can gyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis yan la ga bcu gnyis gang // dkar dang nag po'i phyogs la dang po'i tshe/ sa grangs dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba dag giso// nyi mo mog
26b6(rgyud): dmar mjug rings spen pa g.yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas dag ni 'chi bar byed// g.yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs mtha' dag g.yul gyis sar ni de bzhin kho na'o// rna lhor
26b7(rgyud): ma dang biSh+Ti drag po rlung dang bcas pa g.yas dang rgyab tu bde ba sbyin pa ste// g.yon dang mdun du 'chi ba'i rang bzhin mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pas gnyis ki'i dpung ni 'joms par 'gyur// tshangs ma
26b8(rgyud): drag mo gzhon nu ma dang mkha 'gro'i bdag gis 'gro ba'i bdag gis 'gro ma pag mo rdo rje lig ma dang / tsa mur+N+Na nyid dpal mo dag ni nor gyi tshes la 'gyur te dang po'i chos dang dgu pa la// brgya byin
27a1(rgyud): du ste gnod sbyin me zu lngaminag shin ul+lA d+hA dang dbang ldan sa la'o//  na 'char bdag rngu byed ska yang rjes rnams la ni brgyad gnyis dbebs pa dang de/ baMd+hi rnams na
27a2(rgyud): dkar ba'i phyogs la bor+g+ha byin gshin rje chu dang gnod sbyin du yang 'dir 'char 'gyur// slar yang nag be'i phyogs le rtse mo can dang lha min rlung dang dbang ldan zur du rim paso// drag po shar nas gzhan
27a3(rgyud): be 'gro nyon nag dbang gis byang du yang ste bang gi nyi ma la'o// chu nas me ldan dag tu de ni nges par 'gro ste g+ho ru lho yi nyi ma dag la'o// shar nas thun phyed dag la rlung du rab tu 'jug ste de bzhin du ni
27a4(rgyud): lho ru 'gro bar byed// dbang ldan chu dang me dang gnod sbyin lha min gling khar du 'gro rlung du nyi ma nub par 'gyur// dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung dag las kyang rnam par rgyal 'gyur
27a5(rgyud): mtshan ma'i 'thob mo dang // 'khrug pa dag la rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyi/ sa ni dge yi stobs 'joms de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod/ min// dbyangs dman 'thab mo pa ni mnyam dang mi
27a6(rgyud): mnyam g.yul la lhag pa dag gis 'joms par byed pa ste// dbugs la gnyis kyi min gang snying la rab tu 'jug na ni 'khrug pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i ming de rnam
27a7(rgyud): par rgyal bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming de pham par 'gyur// 'du ba kha dog dbyangs la sogs pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pa rnams kyi 'bras med ston pa nyid// dus ni 'bab mo'i sa la mi bdag rnams kyi
27a8(rgyud): g.yas dang gal te g.yos min dag la mun can 'gyur// g.yul du lho yi mgon po dag ni 'phrog byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur// de pyir dpal ldan rtsa pa'i sgra
27b1(rgyud): gcan 'khyog po drag po lha min rnams las srid gsum rnam rgyal ba// g.yul gyi dusu sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par ba ste gzhan du dgra ni nyams pa med// sa la rgyu skar byas nas thub pa ngas
27b2(rgyud): kyis bsgyur ba dbang po gnod sbyin chu dang gshin rjer ni// de yi 'khor lo 'khor bar byed de nyin nag bgrod pa'i dbang gis mtha' dag rnams ni rig par bya// rgyu skar gang la dus dang mun can du yang rab gyur lte ba
27b3(rgyud): lhung na gnyis po dag la yang // g.yul du dag yi sde rnams dag ni 'bral la nges par ltung ste lto yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur// sgra gcan dus la gnas pa rnams ni 'chi dang bcas par 'gyur zhing
27b4(rgyud): dpung rnams mnyam du ltung ba ni// lta ba'i tshal nges song rnams te brang 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis der ni sde rnams bcom par 'gyur// lta ba'i cha ni spangs pa rnams dag rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te/ 
27b5(rgyud): lto bar zhugs la gnyis po yang // de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan bla ma'i gsungs la gnas pa dus kyi 'khor lor shes bar bya// rnal 'bor ma dang biSh+Ti drag po gzu tshigs
27b6(rgyud): dang bcas dbyangs ni 'char ba dag dang bcas gyur pa// de dag thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyis srid gsum rnam rgyal gcig pu gzung bar ba bste// gang gis zla ba nyi ma za zhing
27b7(rgyud): skabs gsum pa dag 'jigs byed drag po'i gzugs can mig sman mdogs la gang zhig nyin dang mtshan mor shar dang nub dang lho dang byang du yang ni 'khor ba'o// g.yul du 'jam pa'i
27b8(rgyud): dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la sdong gi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na/ phyi rol du ni 'khrul 'khor bya ste rgyun chad med par rngo dang mi mda' rab tu 'bab pa dang / ral gri la sogs gcod pa'i khrul/ 
28a1(rgyud): // 'khor dag dang sa gzhi'i gnas la gur dang cog ni dbye ba yis// de yi rdzong ni bye mar byas te nyin nag nyung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni bsgrub par bya// ka ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru
28a2(rgyud): ldan mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas nas gnas brgyad du ni phug gyur pa// tha dod rnams ni sdang bu chu gtor dus dang dus rnams kyis te rgyab tu yang ni gcig gis// rtsa bar 'khrul 'khor chad ni lag pa bcu
28a3(rgyud): ru 'gyur te steng gi cha dag la ni de yi phed// rgyogs mda' khru gnyis dag gis dman par 'gyur te o log bcu yi steng gi cha ni lhag pa'o// zlum por phyed bcas khru gnyis dag ste sor mo thub pa
28a4(rgyud): ma nur ngas pa'i bug pa gcig tu ni// khru gang dor na sa rgyags mda' rab tu gzhug ste a log bcu yi rgyab kyi chal gzer gyis gdang// mgo bor oM long dag la thag pa lnga bcu
28a5(rgyud): bdagos par bya ste steng gi tshad ni zlum po byed// rgyo gas mda'i mthur ni mdzub mo dang bcas rab tu 'jug ste ga12 non zlum po dag ni mthe gang ngo // phyogs mda'i mdzub mo lan
28a6(rgyud): 'ur mthil log par bcas pa dag la nges par khru gsum dag tu 'gyur// de yi nang du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis 'then par gyur pa dag/ btang ba myur du na mkhar 'gro
28a7(rgyud): ste 'phral la nges par ltung zhing khang steng sogs dang lam srang du// mtha' dag phye mar byas nas si yi 'og tu 'gro ste rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin// de yi mdzub mo zla ba phrede pas bzhi 'i gnas
28a8(rgyud): tshangs pa'i ri mo ngos gnyis dag tu ni// brgyad gnyis btang ba'i gnas rnams dag ste log pa gnyis ka'i khu tshur bcings las btang bar bya// gtong bas la reg pa nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam
28b1(rgyud): rkang pa 'khrul 'khor nang du gnas pas ni// rang 'dod rdo ba ltung ste rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis rdzong ni rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o// gang zhig bsnan pas glang chen 'phral la nges par ltung ba de la
28b2(rgyud): srog chags phra mo dag ni ci// rdzong gi steng khang la gnas bgra dpung ma lus gang dag phyi rol gnas par ltung bar byed pa ste// sa stengs gnas rdzong gi 'thab mo la ni gzhu 'dzin rnams kyis de dang lhan
28b3(rgyud): cig su zhig 'grus// gang du 'khrul 'khor rab bsnun rdzong der dgra bo su zhig zhugs pa dag ni gshin rje'i kha ru'o// ka pra dpung pa drug drug dag gis gnyi ka'i nang ni mnyam pa khruni zung gi bar dag
28b4(rgyud): la/ snying po ro'i nyi mi'i khru ru 'gyur te gnyi ga na no mnyam pa lhag chad med pa nyid/ sa so'i rimag kun la spang le ba dog dang lpag pa sgra tshil gos rnams kyis kyang g.yog pa ste/ 
28b5(rgyud): snying po dus dang brgyad dang skyon dang sum 'gyur nyin byed kyis kyang 'khrul 'khor gcig ni rab tu bya// gnyis gnyis snying po'i bar du 'khrul pa dag kyang dpung pa rnams kyis rgya yis
28b6(rgyud): ba pa'i maku nas rgyu ba rdurgyu ba 'dzin pa ga skye du nas byung pa gnyis kas nyam pa 'khrul 'khor dzin pa 'am/ ka ba'i khung burab tu drugs pa'i gam pa'i drung gi da mas kyi
28b7(rgyud): gis bskyod pa ste/ de la zhon pa rong gi sde ni chu yi rdzing dag nyims pa'i don du chu yi gter la 'gro/ chu gter zur ldan stegs bu gcig la g.yo ba'i rlung gis ngar dang rgyal mtshan bcas pa ka bar
28b8(rgyud): byams ma khrim mas napas na tshun tshum ma myong gyu sa khrigs
29a1(rgyud): de nas mi yi 'bru mar 'phangs pas dgra yi dpung dang sdong ni thams cad kun nas sreg par byed// 'khor lo'i rtsa bar gnam gdan rtse gcig pa ni bzhug cing steng du yang ni 'khor lo
29a2(rgyud): dag la ni// sor mo gnyis gnyis bar dri rtsibasu 'gyur te/ zlum po'i mtha' ma ma lus par ni bgrod par ba// 'khor lo khA ni pang dang gsum par 'gyur zhing gnam gdan steng du gzhan yang der ni
29a3(rgyud): srog shing ste// sog shing steng du ral gri rnon po myur bar 'khor te 'khal 'khor gyi ni rtsa ba 'khor bas so// thag pa yis ni rlung gis 'khrul 'khor na mkha' dag la 'gro ste rang gi bogs nas
