53b6(rgyud): lus kyi tshad dag yin na gal te lag pa rkang pa bcad pas nyams par 'gyur ram ci// rtag pa dag ni lus kyi mthu las phra mor 'gyur zhing sbom por yang ni rab tu 'gyur ram ci// 'khor ba'i
53b7(rgyud): las las gol ba gang zhig 'jig rten steng na gnas pa bde ba dag gi gnas 'gro/ 'jig rten gsum yang phra rab dag gis gang zhig bkod pa de ni dus kyis rtag tu rtag pa min// zhes pa la
53b8(rgyud): sogs ye shes slad ngas kyi 'khor los sa la bstan pa rab tu gsal mdzad pa// 'jam dang sra dang gzhan pa'i bag chags stobs kyis skyes bu rnams kyi sems kyi rjes 'brang ba ste/ sasra
54a1(rgyud): ni nges par dngos po'i tshen gyis nye bar bzhag pa dag las shel bzhin tshon ldan nyid 'gyur ba// gang yin de phyir rang gzhan rigs gyur pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang rnal
54a2(rgyud): 'byor pa yis sun mi dbyung // chos ni sems can pa yul dang rnam par bral ba dag ste chos min dag kyang gdon pa'o// 'tshe ba rig byed chad ma can ni bde ba'i 'bras bu mi ster dus kun du ni sdug
54a3(rgyud): bsngal ster// dam pa'i khams ldan rmongs pa'i tshig las mchog gi bde ba byed cing sems can bde la rjes chags// de phyir sems can don ni gcig pu dag deng mi bdag yid kyis ring bzhin
54a4(rgyud): med pa sgom par gyis// lha mi bla ma nga ni mtho 'is 'jig rte/ na dag tu dbang pos steng du ni 'khor los bsgyur// sa 'og ngag tu klu yi rgyal po gdengs can rigs kyis
54a5(rgyud): btud dang kun tu 'gro dang mchog nga ste// ye shes sangs rgyas thub dbang 'gyur med mchog dang khab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor dang // rig byed oM gyi yi ge gtsang
54a6(rgyud): ma dag ste rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la skyangasu song // khod ni ma dang khod ni pa ste 'od ni 'gro ba'i bla ma khyod ni gnyen dang grogs bzang yang // khyod ni mgon po khyod ni byed po phan dang sdig
54a7(rgyud): 'phrog khyad ni go 'phang phun sum tshogs pa yang // da ni 'ba'i zhig gnas dang khyod ni yan+tan mchog gi gnas te skyon rnams bcom po khyod nyid do// khyod ni dman pa rnams kyi mgon dang yid
54a8(rgyud): bzhin nor bu rgyal ba'i dang po khyod la bdag skyabs mchi// dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las byung ba dang la dus kyi 'khor lo chen po las na ngos pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'o// 
54b1(rgyud): lus la sna tshogs tshad dang nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams dang ni// rtsa rnams kyi ni phra mo'i grangs dang rang bzhin dag la skyes bu mu stegs rnams kyi 'dod pa dang // rig byed
54b2(rgyud): dang ni byed po la sogs dbye pa bdag gis thos pas dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan du gsol// zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas bde bar gshegs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor
54b3(rgyud): rab tu gsungs// dang por yang dag bsten pa bla ma dag kyang dam tshig ldan zhing rdo rje theg par lhag par gnas// de nyid bsgoms shing ma chags dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing bzod pa'i ngang tshul
54b4(rgyud): lam la zhugs// slob ma rnams la la moni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog cing de nyid las na tshangs spyod ldan/ dred rnams la ni rdo rje byug pa de yang 'dzin ma'i
54b5(rgyud): gzhi la rdo rje sems dpar rab grags pa'o// nga rgyal dang lnga na khro bas zil mnan dam tshig rnams bral rdzas la byarkam zhing thos pa dag kyang med// slob ma rnams ni slu ba don
54b6(rgyud): du gnyer zhing mchog gi bde ba'i gnas las sems nyams dbang ma bskur// longs spyod dag la kun chags bag med rtsub me'i tshig dang bcas shing dbang po'i don du 'dod ldan pa// de
54b7(rgyud): nyid dmyal ba bzhin du slob ma mkhas pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni spang bar bya// zab cing rgya che la sems bla ma'i nges pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan mon+ten shes
54b8(rgyud): bar po don gnyer rgyud la gus shing g.yo ba min pa'i sems ljon de nyid thob pa shin rje sbrid// gdug pa rnams kyi grogs nyams slob ma de nyid bla ma shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis bsdu
55a1(rgyud): bya ba/ shes rab dbang la sogs pa'i rgyur te gzhan zhes bya ba slar yang 'bring po bsod nams dag gi rgyur// nag pa'i mthar ni dkar po'i tshogs la gzhan la phan pa'i bla mas
55a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs byas nas// sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bdun rnams ni bsod nams don du bu rnams dag la sbyin par bya// yang na mtha' dag yon+ta na gter ni bstan pa'i slad rnal
55a3(rgyud): 'bor ma rnams dag la mchod par bya// mchod pa med na lo gcig du ni rgyud kyi rgyal po dag las bla mas bstan par mi bya'o// dbang gi don dus ni yongs brtags nags dang gong khar gong rdal grong
55a4(rgyud): gau phyogs kyi cha dag dang // thab khung rnams kyi mtsha na nyid dang ni bum pa dang bcas rdul tshon sbyin sreg phur bro la dasogs dang // slob ma rnams ni bsdu ba dag dong gang yang rgyal
55a5(rgyud): ba'i bdag po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dag/ shes nas slob dpon gyis ni dge dang mi dge'i 'bras slad zhi ba la sogs mtha' dag rab tu bya// sa yi rigs ni yon tan
55a6(rgyud): dbang gis rnam bzhir 'gyur ba dmangs rigs rje'u rgyal po bram ze ste// gnag dang ser dang dmar ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa dkar ba'i kha dog rnams kyis rig par bya// rul pa cha skyes pad+ma'i
55a7(rgyud): dri dang mchog gi dri rnams rim pas nor gyi blo gros dag tu 'gyur// skyur dang lan tshwa dmangs rigs mngar dang tsha ba rje dang mi bdag gzhan pa dag ni gnyis skye so// dkor po dag ni zhi dang rgyas pa la
55a8(rgyud): ste sprin nag dang mtshungs bsad dang bskrad pa dag la yang // dmar po dbang dang dgug pa la ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa rengs dang rmongs pa la yang 'gyur// las kyi tshani thams cad
55b1(rgyud): dag la ljang kur gyur te lnga pa dang ni mtha' ma dag gi rigs/  dang dri rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag yon tan gte ni rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya// dbang ldan dang ni byang gis gzhi dag la
55b2(rgyud): zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dag tu 'gyur ba ste// me yi mtshams dang shar gyi char ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par bsad pa dag dang bskrad pa'o// bden bral dang ni lho phyogs yang gsal bar rtag tu dbang
55b3(rgyud): du bya dang dgugs pa dag kyang // rlung gi mtshams dang nub kyi phyogasu nges par mchog gi mi bdag rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa'o// theb khung grong gi phyogs brgyad dag tu nges par rab tu 'gyur te zlum
55b4(rgyud): po dang ni chu gtir zur// zla lam zur lnga pa dang rang na yon tan dbang gis zur bdun pa dang zur ni gsum pa dang // zla ra drug po dang zur brgyad par 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis
55b5(rgyud): dag rnams kyi snying po'i mtshan ma ni// pad+ma 'khor tshwa gri gug ral gri mda' zhes bye dang rdo rje lcags kyu lcags sgro ga dag dang sbrel// gcig ginyis phyed dang gcig ni khru sa
55b6(rgyud): mkha' dus mkha' mig mkha' me mkha' dus dag ni sor du 'gyur// phyed kyi yan lag dag gi cha shas nyi ma nyi ma'i cha shes dag gis zabs dang kha khyer dang // mchu dang mtshan ma'i phreng ba
55b7(rgyud): 'gyur te kha khyer dag gi steng du rigs kyi dbang gis kun nas so// kha khyer phyi rol du yang chu skyes mdab ma rnams mdzod mi bdag ni rgyas la ste gzhan la min// yang na las ni thams cad
55b8(rgyud): la yang rdo rjer 'gyur te sa la phur ba dag gi dbye ba brgyad// n+ya gro d+ha dang oM shwad thi ka ra sa lcags seng ldeng las skyes tsU ta bil ba arma/ skyes/ de bzhin shel gyi bum pa dang ni nga
56a1(rgyud): mchog rang bzhin dpal ldan thod pa dag dang lcags kyi dang // zangs zhes pa dang gser gyi bum pa rab gsal nges par shing las skyes dang sa yi rang bzhin no// zlum po brgyad gnyis
56a2(rgyud): sor du brjod de gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis dpangs dang sor gnyis dag gi mchu// drug gi mgrin pa sor brgyad kha ste ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar ni rgyas dag la'o gzhan la min// snga dro
56a3(rgyud): nas ni thun brgyad po rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus zhi dang rgyas pa sogs la 'gyur// de bzhin de yi thun phyed dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dusu las brgyad dag ni rab tu ba// nyi ma gung dang mtshan
56a4(rgyud): phyed dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dusu zhi ba dag la spang bar bya// dus sbyor gdug pa'i gza' rnams gnas pa da ga ni 'tsho ba'i 'jigs byed de bzhin nyid du rab tu grags/ 
56a5(rgyud): 'o ma dang bcas yam shing mdara' brgya zhi dang rgyas ba dag laM bsad pa la ni mi rus so// dbye ba la ni bya rog mthu/ ga ma seng ldeng las skyes king shu ka ni dgug dang dbang la
56a6(rgyud): bil pa smyo byed dag ni khru phyed mda' brgya'i grangs rnams rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa dag la ste// 'o ma mar dang khrag dang zhag drang rdul dang rdo rje chu dang mchil ma chang rnams bsreg bya ste// durab 'bru
56a7(rgyud): dang sha dang dug dang bcas pa dag dang de bzhin skye tshe me tog dmar po dang // bil ba brnyings pa'i phreng ba dang ni gser bzang me tog rnams nyid zhi ba la sogs rnams la'o gshin rje bde ni bral
56a8(rgyud): zur dang chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po dbang po dag dang mi ru ni// slob dpon dag gi gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag la'o// tshan ni las gnyis
56b1(rgyud): dag la 'gyur te gtso bo'i pad+ma la yang dkar nag nyi ma ser po'o// phyi rol du ni sangs rgyas dbye bas lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang rnams dag tu tshon gyiso// thab khung dag gam dkyil 'khor la
56b2(rgyud): ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyogs rnamasu yang tshen ni gdab par 'gyuraro// dgod pa la sogs bsong gtor la sogs rang gi snying kha'i rdo rje dag las lha rnams spro ba'o// shel la sogs pa'i
56b3(rgyud): mchod yon snod pa pad+ma nor gyi mdab ma mthe bong dag ni bcu gnyis kyang // yu ba'i rtse mor snyim pa'i snod de khyor ba dag kyang sreg bya dag la'o// zhi dang dag po chags dang bcas par 'gyur te rigs
56b4(rgyud): kyi dbang gis lha ni rangs bdag gi sku// de bzhin las gnyis dag la rab tu gsal zhing nges par dkyil 'khor la yang lhag pa'i lhar 'gyuraro// rnam pa lnga ni rgyal ba'i dbang
56b5(rgyud): po gang phyir rnam gsum srid pa la ge nas phung po kha mas sogs kyi// dbye ba yi te de las kyang ni lha rnams dkyil 'khor dag la rdul tshon rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// thig skud khru
56b6(rgyud): ni brgyad par 'gyur te sum sgal slob dpon gyi ni lag pa'i mthe bo'i nas gcig gis// sbomasu 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gyi lam na gnas pa thig skad gcig ste gzhan pa ma yin no// zhi ba la
56b7(rgyud): sogs dag la rim pa yongasu bkod pa skyil krung rdo rje lha min tsog pu dang // skyil kang phyed pa dbye ba gnyis dang bshang lam rkang par gnas pa dag kyang las kyi dpe bas gdan/ shel dang
56b8(rgyud): mu tig dang ni mi dang bong bu'i so 'am rus pa dag dang po de tse dang ni// pad+ma zhes bya da bong mig lung tang bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis sngags bzlas pa la 'phreng bar 'gyur// dri zhim ma
57a1(rgyud): teg dkar po dang ni tsha ba dang bcas nag po dag dang dmar dang ser bas mchod// bsil dang bshang ba sha yi spos ni sbrang rtsi khrag ldan dag dang drag po'i spos dang ska ba'o// 'khrul
57a2(rgyud): 'khor n+ya gro d+ha mdab dur khrod ro yi ras dang go ga'i mdab dang arka'i mdab ma la/ shi rI khaN+Da sA li btags pa dag dang dur khrod sar gnas sol ba khrag dang drag dang ni// kha che tsan+dan dmar dang
57a3(rgyud): 'bras bu gsum gyi khro ba yung brab blas bri bar 'gyur ba ste// dur ba bsil rus mjug sgro gser dang seng ldeng las skyes bil ba skyes dang arka smu gu'o// kham por dpal ldan zod par mngar
57a4(rgyud): gsum khrag dang spra tshil gong bu so phag dag gi dbus ni/ brlan dang bcas pa'i gnas ni gtsang ba dag dang r-i khang sa ga gzhi me yi saM gdung dang sa dag la// 'khrul 'khor
57a5(rgyud): bzhag par bya bar 'gyur te dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis snga gas pa yis ni rig par bya// zla ba glang chen yi dwags rnga mo dwags rta dang phyugs dang ru sbal lus li rim paso// 
57a6(rgyud): dang ldan rdo rje rnams kyis phyogs kun tu gnas mtha' dag bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg pa ste// pi nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dag la phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro ba'i tshogs
57a7(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya// 'khor lo dbus gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i byig dang dus kyi zhal ldan khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs// de nas bla ma'i nges po dang ldan gong zhigazung bde 'dod bsgrub pa po sI/ 
57a8(rgyud): bsgrub par byo/ rdo rje gsum gyis so yi dkyil 'khal la gnos rab gsum ni ring du mthing ba'i mtha' ru ste/ ba~M rangs nas ni grib ma'i mtha' rus gzhi'i gnas las namakha'i dgal rje/ 
57b1(rgyud): rje brtsegs pa'o// dbasu chu skyes nyi ma'i khru ste lte ba gdan dang bcas pa dag kyang dus kyi khrur 'gyur// de yi steng du bdag nyid nyes pa dag dang rnam par bral ba rnal 'byor ba yis bsgom par bya// sa yi
57b2(rgyud): phyogs rnamasu 'dir dang bai rdo rje gsum gyis zhing skyong rnams la gter ma sbyin pa ste/ phyi nas rdo rje bzhi yis pags dang phyogs bral du gnas bad kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg par ba// sau yaM lha mo
57b3(rgyud): spyan dras chu dang bcas pa'i me tog dag gis 'di la mchod yon rab tu sbyin// de la gsal ba btab ste phyi nas sa ya~M gnas la dge pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod// rgyal bas lho yi bdag po dang
57b4(rgyud): bcas bdud ni bcom pa dag la lha mo khod ni dbang du gyur/ de phyir khod ni mchod par bya zhing lha mchog gis btung ba zhes cig bdag gi mched yon no// ji ltar rgyal bas byang
57b5(rgyud): chub slad bdud kyi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu btsem gyu ra ba// de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang bsku ra slad bdud rnams nyams pa dag tu ba// gang dag
57b6(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun me dang bcas pa// de dag rnams kyi mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor de ni dbang bskur slad bdag la bskyang du
57b7(rgyud): gsol// de dag kun la gsel ba btab nas seng ljang rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab// phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi cha ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// 
57b8(rgyud): zug rngu sol ba dang bcas rwa ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs bede sa yi snying pir nges par zhugs gyur na// gnas de dag tu yon+dan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yis phyir na sgying bar gas
58a1(rgyud): la rin chen dung dang 'ching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste/ khang bzang don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyid la sogs slang
58a2(rgyud): du'o// rdzogs pa dag la sa ni sbrang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu// bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la dpal ldan rdal tshon dgye ba nyid// dbang la
58a3(rgyud): sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mos sbyin te 'dud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang // de yi me chen mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rib gnas min// dag pa'i dus
58a4(rgyud): sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po me chen mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur// srog dang ba sangs nub par gyur na de tsha nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyuro// slob
58a5(rgyud): dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas 'jig rten 'jig rten la ngas pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni// bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par
58a6(rgyud): 'gyur// slob ma'i mgo bo snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i pad+mar ni// rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigasu gyur pa sku gsung thigs kyis phe ba dag gis
58a7(rgyud): byas shing // de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad che gau bdag kyang
58a8(rgyud): gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid// dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod pa ru sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag/ khru tshad gcig la sogs pa/ 
58b1(rgyud): dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la ni// thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang gshin rje chu bdag du ste byang du rdo rje dal bu dag/ bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i
58b2(rgyud): phyogasu dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par ba// thig skad chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms 'gro nges par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang ngo // gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs
58b3(rgyud): pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang // mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyis bzlas pa rab tu bya// slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam
58b4(rgyud): dang mi mnyanyim rkang pa dag gis thig na gdab pa bsgrub parabya// shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbusu yongs 'joms rasu 'gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya/ 
58b5(rgyud): sa la g.yul gyi dus rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yau dbus gdengs can bzhin// g.yul du sngon nyams par 'a gyur te sa bzhi dag tu mtshan mo'i thab mo la ni
58b6(rgyud): bsnun pa'o// de phyir giyul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya// a sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying kha'i
58b7(rgyud): pad+mar zla nyi ma steng du// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g.yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgomaso byas shing // shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i pad+ma nyi zla sbyar ldan
58b8(rgyud): la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la 'o mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya// thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa
59a1(rgyud): thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams ngag tu rangab sbyin pa// sor pad brjod pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbas snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// snying po las ni phyi
59a2(rgyud): rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po sgo yi mtshams// ra ba rta bas laM sogs rtse mo can de g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor pi rel sa la blta bar ba// gtso bo'i 'khor la
59a3(rgyud): chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas ni// nyi ma'i ri mig dag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur// bzhi yis sangs rgyas
59a4(rgyud): le sogs pad+mar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyi phyi rol rdo rje phreng bar yang // lha me sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur// gnas
59a5(rgyud): de nas 'dir ji srid re khi'i bar du nyin mer bad pa dag gi/ sa chen gyi sar 'gyur te// phyogs zur rnams chu ga ta ra re mI ga dag gis dri la sogs pa rnams kyi zla nyi pad+ma nyid// pang
59a6(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re khI gsumo sta dus dang re rnams kyis kyang sgo dang sgo khyud dang // de bzhin la dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba byed// denas
59a7(rgyud): phyed dang gnyi dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do shal sa ru 'gyur// ri mig drug gi rta babs 'og tu nor gyi pad+ma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams rnam bu'o// de nas ro yaus bsgyur ba'i
59a8(rgyud): dus kyis dpal ldan chen gyi sa ste re khA lnga yi bar du'o// phyogs zur rnamasu nyinya ma'i pad+ma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i mdab ldan nyi ma'i ri mig dag gos pa// snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum
59b1(rgyud): gyis yon+d+ran dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang // rab sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tra ba// de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha la'i zlal
59b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang ni pi rol rdo rje'i 'phreng ba yang // de phyed ri mig dag gis ba ste'i khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'kho'i la/ ka ba'i 'og tu gdangs can rnams kyi
59b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni// nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang // rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang mar
59b4(rgyud): ka byi ru mu tig la sogs dang // dpe ba lnga yi 'bra 'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dgagis// phyogs kyi chal tshon gyis sar ni mi yi bdag po
59b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul chen gdab par 'gyur// se ra dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rims pas so// shar du dpal ldan
59b6(rgyud): nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs pa ste nub tu yang // gser mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bso// dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par
59b7(rgyud): yongasu bkod pa'i rnam bu dang ni do shal dag gi ste// pad+ma zla nyi'i kha dog gis tid med ri bong can mtshungs dmar dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum// de bas pad+ma 'dab brgyad ljang ka dag ste bung ba
59b8(rgyud): dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur// dbang ldan lha min ma rlung dag tu zla ba nyi me'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yis// dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dgi deng ljon pa zhes pa de bzhin dum pi
60a1(rgyud): dkar po mtshams brgyad// zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed pad+ma dkar po'i steng du yang // cha skyes dmar po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin
60a2(rgyud): pa dag gis gdan du 'gyur// chu skyes dkar ba'i lci ba dgo la lha rnams kyi yang nyin mor bad par 'gyur te phogasu'o// pha rol dri ni gtso bo'i pad+ma'i dbang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer
60a3(rgyud): kha dog dkar// ka ba ser po bA ku lI ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshog so// dkar po'i mngag ste rnal 'byor mi rnams dag gi nor gyi pad+ma'i snam bu dag kyang bregs kun tA/ 
60a4(rgyud): phyogs kyi char ni pad+ma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i da bang gis pad ma dkar po zur du yang // zla ba nyi mas rnam dmau na de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur me nu'i
60a5(rgyud): mdab lngano// mkha' sogs re khA lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum chi bar du gnas// ka bi'i 'og gi sgo'i mtshams gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs
60a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur dus yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang // phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dregs dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo
60a7(rgyud): sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur// g.yas bum pa dmar por 'gyur te ne re sbyin bcas chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing // dil bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phang ba gyur
60a8(rgyud): pa dang / do shal phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbu su'o// 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi pha rol du/ 
60b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po pi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur// sbom pas nad dag byed cing phra dang ra khA ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed// chad pas 'chi ba dnga'i
60b2(rgyud): 'khog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin nyid du spyod// mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med// rnam par 'dres pas ri
60b3(rgyud): rgyud 'chang de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul chen dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya// gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur// dkyil 'khor
60b4(rgyud): dag la dgod par mi bye de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba ba skyed mdzad ri gos la ni// de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas
60b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la'o// de shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi la pad+ma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya// nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul
60b6(rgyud): tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang // ra ba rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa'i bong can dang chu skyes re khA nyis 'gyur ro// snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag
60b7(rgyud): bo dkyil 'khor 'di la ste// do shal byed pa'i mthar ni nas gcigs chu srag za rlung dang rdo rje phreng ba rnams la'o// dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar gyur 'jig rten khams
60b8(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor la// sgra nas tsa rtsi kau mthar sum 'gyur gdengs can ri mig dag gis lan tshwa'i rin chen gnas 'gyur// de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i ri mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor
61a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur// de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu srag za rlung rnams blta bar bya// gtsug to zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can rimig
61a2(rgyud): dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang par ba// de nas lhun po mtho' dag sum 'gyur gdangs can ra migo dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid ste// re mig dag dag dag gis rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa
61a3(rgyud): dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid// de ltar sa lo sogs pa thams cad slar yang de bzhin rang gi lus dag la ni sbyang bar bya// gnyis dang chu gtar gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can sa #
61a4(rgyud): ma sa 'im rgya ba rnams rim pa yis// snying por lte brtsibs sam pad+ma'i mdab ma dag dang de nas ka bi rdo rje'i phreng ba dang // pad+ma rdo rje'i 'phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag dang ni de nas skra/ 
61a5(rgyud): dang sgo khyud la sogs dang // ka ba ra ba kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shal sa dag dang // me long sa yi snam bur 'gyur ro mo yi bdag po rta babs rab
61a6(rgyud): tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis// phyi rol du ni sgo sogs thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis 'gyu ro// phyi rol du ni pad+ma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor
61a7(rgyud): rnams ni nyin byed dag giso// oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba nyi ma dag gi gdan steng du// a sogs ka sogs stong par bcas pa dag dang srid gsum bskyed
61a8(rgyud): par byed pa'i yum ni bzhag par bya// stong pa a yi ga rnam par bcad pa dbyangs dang bral ba mchog las sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// yang dag 'byung bsngags kyi skye gnas mchog
61b1(rgyud): gi bde byed ye shes rdo rje dag ni bzhi pa'o// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma sna tshogs mdog la zla ba nyi ma ma yi stang du hUM yig ste// phyogs mdab rnams la a sogs stong pa phyogs dral mngab
61b2(rgyud): ma la yang ha sogs steng pa rnam pa bzhi// dbang ldan bden bral zur dang rtse mo can dang rlung du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang chags pa ste// hI yig la sogs bum pa rnams kyi bcu ru 'gyur te/ 
61b3(rgyud): haM haHzhes pa dag gi mtha' 'dir ro// shar gyi chu skyes steng du i yig rtse mo can du pad+ma la gnas A yig ring po nyid// ge shin rje lha min du ni ri yig dag ste nor sbyin 'phrog
61b4(rgyud): byed du gnas thung ring u yig dag/ chu dang rlung gi/ zur dag du yang pad+ma la gnas thung ngu ring po dag gi li yig ste// nag po dmar po dag dang dkar ba gsor mchog
61b5(rgyud): dang mtshungs zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis dgod par ga/ shar gyi sgra yaM lci dang po yi pad+ma la gnas drung dang ring bdag ni de ba bzhin nyid// de bzhin ar yigazung ni gshin rje lnga min dag tu
61b6(rgyud): gnas te nub tu a l-i yig zung dag go/ oM oM gnod sbyin drag bai ru ste lha chu ga shin rje gnod sbyin dang bcas sgo yi byang du ni// aM a sogs te rim pa yis ni slar yang ya ra wa la
61b7(rgyud): lha sogs sgo yi pad+ma la'o// shar dang byang gi sgor ni ri bong 'dzin pa dag kyang khro bo dag gi gdan du 'gyur ba ste// lho dang nub tu pad+ma ri nya ma dag ni gnyis pa dag gi gdan du nges par rab tu 'gyur// shes
61b8(rgyud): rab thabs kyi rab tu dab pa dag gis pad+mar zla ba nyi ma dag kyang gdan du 'gyur// g.yas dang rgyab du nyi mar 'gyur te lha yi bdag po nor sbyin du yang zla ba'i gdan du 'gyur// thig le'i rnam pa dag gis/ 
62a1(rgyud): rnam pa nges par bad+mal gnas ka sogs sde yaM yi ge yang / rtsa ba stong bu ma dbu ma dang ni ges lte bdag la rim pas yo su bkod pa ste/ sa sogs rnam kha'i mtha' ji ga
62a2(rgyud): kA g+h+ra da zhes phung dzung po 'dogs lal/ khrig la grwa brnam par bcad pa nyin byed du 'gyur gdon meng lte ba dag gi steng ngur// sde drug bung da maung rnams rang bzhin man+tan dang gi kha khye dgal kA
62a3(rgyud): thamadun/ dri la sags rnams rim pas dang rigs sa la gnas te shar gyi ma ni sa ming gi phyogs rnams//  la buMn bag l-i la sogs kyis phye sus 'gyur gyims la gas can/ 
62a4(rgyud): nyidang 'dod mi thams cad kun nas rang rigs phyog sugs te rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dag dbye bas so// nga da shing ba'i tha mi gA dag ni rma nga ni sbyin du dang wI gyi gsol
62a5(rgyud): kyi khyab 'jug ma sogs dag gi k+Sha yig oM sogs sa byi me dang 'brog byed rlung dang lnga min du// haM la sogs dang k+ShiM la sogs pa gangos brgyad pad+ma'i mdang ma la
62a6(rgyud): gnas mdun rgyab rang phyogasu// ya sogs zung dang ring ba drug rnams lha yi pad mdab me ya~M pad+ma dag la rim pa yis// de bzhin gshin rje lha min pad+ma'i mdab mar thung dri ring po'i rab tu dbepe bas
62a7(rgyud): rasogs te// gan sbyin dag por zhwa la sogs da chu gtir dang bcas rlung gi pad mad rnams le la la sogs/ shar gyi sgra sa lha dag du yang bad+ma'i mdapa ma la gnas dgas kyis
62a8(rgyud): tsa la sde/ zung du lho mon gyi stong rnams kya mo mi thu na gnas pa hU~M gi yin par 'gyur/ de bzhin ga shin rje me dpe ma gdong 'i dag gi rje sde zung dming 'i rgya ma sa/ gos/ 
62b1(rgyud): dang dbang ldan du yang ba sder 'gyur te chu gter dang ni ring po'i dbye bas tshogs kyi'o// brgya byin dang ni tshangs pa dag gi chubacas rlung du thang du ring po ta yi sde pa'o// shar gyi sgo yi bang da pad+mar mang ba
62b2(rgyud): mdab mar lha min dag ya ka snga thung ngur 'gyur ba ste// lho ru gau shin rje dag gi ring por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po byang dag dang ni nub tu yang // phyugs kyi bdag po dzam b+ha la yi thung dang ring ba saM ster 'gyur
62b3(rgyud): ba nyid do rgyal po kye// lha min la sogs rnams kyi rang gi sa bon du 'gyur mdab ma la ni rang rang sde mtha' dbus// mdab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la yang nyin zhag dbang gis rang rang sde pa dag gi yi ge rnams
62b4(rgyud): yA rA wA lA haM haHdrug kyang nges par shing rta dag la steng dang / rtsa ba lha sogasu// sgo las g.yas dang g.yon du gdengs can rnams kyi ya sogs la gnas ha yig dag tu rab
62b5(rgyud): du 'gyur// sde drug brtsigs pa'i gzugs dang slar yang ha la ra wa la drang k+Sha sogs ldan pa'i ya sogs ni// phyogs kyi 'khor lor ka sogs sde rnams g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
62b6(rgyud): tsa sogs gzhan la lugs 'thun te/ shar dang gshin rje bang dang chu dang ma dang lha min dang ni dbang ldan rlung gi zur du'o// a aHzla ba nyi ma dag gi dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshe/ 
62b7(rgyud): kyi sngags rnam so// hUM gaM yi ge chos kyi 'khor lo dang ni de bzhon aHyig bum pa'i sa bon drag tu 'gyur// oM yi ge rje bo che yir 'gyur te chu ru ho yang byang chub shing dag gir ni rab tu 'gyur/ 
62b8(rgyud): zhes pa da ltar dbyangs ldan rnams ni rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag la sngags kyi dbye bar 'gyur// phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyi kha dog mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba dag
63a1(rgyud): gis 'gyur// thab tu sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug ngogs pa rnams spyan drang ba dang // dpal ldan sa la bsang ba dang ni mchod yon cho ga de bzhin bdud
63a2(rgyud): ni gzhom pa dag kyang // sgo rnams sang ba'i don tu brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag pa'i slob ma rnams ni rab dgod pa// dpal ldan bum pa dag gi rnal 'bor ma rnams me dang lha min rlung dbang zur
63a3(rgyud): du rim paso// slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje can dag rab bas nas// slob ma med na tshegs kyi dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin sreg las la sogs pa dag kyang
63a4(rgyud): byad zlum po 'am ni rig byed zur dag rigs kyi dbang gis zhi dang / rgyas pa dag gi thab tu 'gyur// dang ngam drag po'i zur dang ga zhan yang dkar po'i sa la rtsa ba'i pad+ma dag ni nyis
63a5(rgyud): 'gyur// zabs ni pad+ma'i chung du 'gyur te de yi nang du rtsa ba'i pad+ma mtshan mar bcas pa'o// pad+ma pad la pad+ma'i pi ru bum pa dang ba cas ral gri rin chen sogs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur// 
63a6(rgyud): yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste de les nyes 'gyur dag kyang kha khor dag gi rgyu yi cha// steng du rdo rje phreng ba dag kyang mchu yi pad kyis dpangs dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur// pi rol 'og tu pad+ma'i mdab ma
63a7(rgyud): rnams dang ku sha'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bo// de yi mthar ni nub phyogs dag tu nges par ra khA gsum gyi sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur// slob dpon dag gi gdan ni nges par mnyam par
63a8(rgyud): 'gyur te snying po'i pad+ma dag los nyis 'gyur// g.yon du mchod yon gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sbyin sreg snod dag gi yang g.ya su 'gyur// kun gyi rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i
63b1(rgyud): bdag po'i yang na mkha' yi pad+ma yum gyi'o// zhal dang gsang ba dag kyang thab khung rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te rgyal po pi dang lus la'o// thab kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro ba rgyal po
63b2(rgyud): lha mor bcas pas srung ba bas nas ni// dpal ldan rdo rje dag gis bsang ba sogs dang tshur bcas me tig rnams kyis me la mchod yon nyid// de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par byas te rang snang pad+ma
63b3(rgyud): zla ba'i steng du bsgoms nas// zhal gcig kha dog dkar po dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma g.yon ni ril pa chu skyes dag dang ni// g.yas na dbyug pa bgrang breng ral pa shin tu ser skya dmar ser mig ldan gas
63b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa ste// me yi snying khar zla ba'i steng du dri med 'phro baM da dza las lcags kyu nges por bsgom par bya// de yis bkug pa 'i kun 'gro ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la
63b5(rgyud): shin tu ro mnyam dag tu mdzod// de ltar thabs la yang ni yang dag 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin mo ni spyan drang ngo // mtsha ga sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe bo yis kyang ma yi zhal
63b6(rgyud): du sbyin bsreg dag ni rab tu bya// gtso bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kyang mda' brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang dur bA mar dang 'o ma yis// skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g.yo ba med pa'i sems ldan
63b7(rgyud): gsong sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku// sleb dpon las kyi rdo rje can gyis slar yang me la bsreg blugs dag ni nges par sbyin par bya// rim pa yis ni sbyin sreg byas nas 'thor 'thung dag kyang de
63b8(rgyud): bzhin me dang bdag nyid dag la yang // dri la sogs dang sdes dag phul nas rang snying pad+mar ye shes ma ni gshegasu gsol bar bya// byi nas slob ma la ni dbang bskur dpal ldan bla ma ma hA/ 
64a1(rgyud): dag yon+dan gter gyis nges par sbyin// dang por bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i sla'o// rang gis sngags kyis sbyin sreg grub cing rdal
64a2(rgyud): tshen btab ste sngags kyi mtshan ma rab tu bkod pa na// zur dro shel gyi bum po dkar po skad pa lnga yis bkris pa rnams ni yang dag bzhag par bya// slob dpon shar gyi zhal du rdo rje pad+ma las skyes rang
64a3(rgyud): bgrang khra ba'i rgyal po rnams drag gis// spyan bya sa nas ni ye shes 'a khor le rdul chen dag 'a 'o nyam du bya dbang gi dod duro// lha dang lho rnams ni thams cad bdag gi mang ge snga na ma
64a4(rgyud): zhes pa bar 'gyur ba ste// sbyin sreg la ni snrohA'i ma tha' sngags snying po de bzhin nyid de mchod padag la namaHmtha'// dzaHhUM baM soHlcags kyu la sogs rim pas
64a5(rgyud): yongs bkod rnams spyan drangs gzhug dang bcing ba dang // mnyes la'i mchod yod sbyin pa la yang i da gr-ih+Na grih+Na ar+m+ma ka/ me zhes par 'gyur// rgyas pa la ni swAhA'i mtha'i sngags
64a6(rgyud): 'gyur te mi bdag zhi po 'di na marta'i mnga'// dgug pa la ni bau Sha Ta mtha' ru 'gyur tra ba Sha Ta mtha' yang dbang la de bzhin nyid ni// hUM yig mtha' can mngon spyod la ste rang bzhin yon+dan dab
64a7(rgyud): phaT mtha' bur bus gdab sogs la'o// dkar dang dmar dang nag po mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa dag ste las kyi dpe ba dag gis sngags/ shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje dag ni
64a8(rgyud): sprin nag dang mtshungs byang du sku yi rdo rje dang / lho ru gsung gi rdo rje nung du yang ni rang rigs phyog su gnas pa ye shes rdo rje ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser po dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis sa ma
64b1(rgyud): chal khab par byed par 'gyur// rlung me chu dang sa yi lha rnams dag gi skye ba'i gnas ni mi bdag i ri u li'o// oM AHhUM ni phyag rgya gsum ste swAhA'i tshig dang bcas pa ring po'i dpe ba las
64b2(rgyud): kyang lnga// hUM AMHoM he rang gi zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang de bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga par 'gyur// a sogs dang btsos hr-i yig drug ste'i rkang na maHsogs kyi dpal ldan yan lag
64b3(rgyud): drug tu 'gyur// brim gi yi ge sna tshogs yum gyir 'gyur te rnam bcu brtsegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o// hUM yig ye shes sa bon snying po dag kyang brtsegs pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal
64b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa ste// hUM yig la sogs yan drug po sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo // lha dang lha mo rnams kyi phreng / ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dab ba du ma yis/ 
64b5(rgyud): rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor da la 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang giso// rin chen ga/ ser zla me tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gos dang dri dang spos dang
64b6(rgyud): mar ma dang // dril bu me long bla ra dang ni rnam mang 'bras bu ba dan sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis// rnam bkra mchod pa bas te gzhan pa rnam bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin
64b7(rgyud): slob dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar mchog gi bu yis yon ni dag pa'i slad dbul bar bya// dag pa gsum gyi rdzas dang bdag nyid pa dang bu mo dang bcas rigs las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma// 
64b8(rgyud): di ring nyid nas mi bzang 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabasu lhag par mchi// khyed kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog dag la lus ngag sems ni
65a1(rgyud): dag pas so// zhes pa gser bcas me tog dag gis maN+Dal bas nas bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma dag kyang spyi bos
65a2(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi// rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// ral gri la ni mchod pa bgyi ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs la sdom pa dag ni bskyang
65a3(rgyud): bar bgyi// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// slob ma khrus pas dri yis rjes byugs brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi
65a4(rgyud): sar ni bzhag byas te// dngos grub don du so shing rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gi mngon par bsngags pa rab sbyin bya// lci de la'ang bdud rtsi nges par rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig dag
65a5(rgyud): gis spos ni dbab pa'i don du'o// sngags ni hUM gi yi ge gcig ste a ra la dang bcas pa khro bo'i gtso bo bskul ba'o// khro bo'i rgyal po phebs na mtshon chas mdzes pa'i lag
65a6(rgyud): pa dag gis bdud kyi tshegs la sngags byed cing // g.yon brkyang la sogs stabs rnams dang ni rnam mang bcing ba dag gis rdo rje'i gar gyi gar byed de// bzhad dang hUM gi yi ge 'dres pa dag la
65a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa ster ba dang ni rdo rje'i glu yang byed// ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur te yon+tan dbang gis lha gzhan dag kyang ni ba'o// sku phebs pos ni rnal 'byor ldan pa rang bzhin yon+tan dbang gi
65a8(rgyud): sku yi bya ba byed pa ste// gsung phebs pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam par rgyal ba'i smra ba po ru 'gyur// thugs phebs pas ni gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung
65b1(rgyud): ba thams cad shes par 'gyur// ye shes phebs pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig pur 'gyur// sa phebs pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag ri dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 
65b2(rgyud): chus kyang bsal bar rab tu 'gyur// mi phabs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni de bzhin skam pa dag tu 'gyur// stong pa phebs pas mi snang bar 'gyur sa stengs du ni mkha' la spyod pa nyid rab tu
65b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon+tan dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya// dbab pa la ni nges par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sngags pa rnams kyis sgom pa'i stobs
65b4(rgyud): dang no// bsnyen pa'i dbye ba dang ni rnam mang dam tshig sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis 'ga' zhig dag gi tshe// sangs rgya sa ro mang byed pas bdud rtsi'i dbang las dkyil 'khor 'gal
65b5(rgyud): zhig du ni mchog gi bu la'o// rang byin rlabs pas dman ba rnams mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa yin// phebs pa btang ste phyi nas mgo bo dang
65b6(rgyud): ni snying kha spyi gtsug lte ba dag dang mgon pa dang // gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya// lus la ser po'i gos dag byin te mig ni bsgrib
65b7(rgyud): par gyur pa'i slob ma 'dir ni gzhug par bya// kun rdzob don du brtul zhugs rab mchog bgod pa dag la bgod pa de dag nyid ni sbyin par ba// 'o tshe dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud mod spang ba gzhan gyi
65b8(rgyud): nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid// 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa dag ste rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag gi// gang zhig gang gi dusu byung ba lha dang mi yi bla mdo yi mtshan
66a1(rgyud): // gyis rab sbyir bya// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag sde khyod kyis kyang ni bskung bar bya// che le kha na mtho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog
66a2(rgyud): dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos// ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o// grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu
66a3(rgyud): ba yang // dbang po rnams ni chags pa dag dang de ltar sri dpa'i bdag po dag gi brtul zhugs nyi shu lnga// dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar bar me tog gcig
66a4(rgyud): ni rab sbyin bya// dang por lan gsum bskor te lag po'i pad+ma sbyar ba dag las dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor// gang gi gnas me tog bzang po lhung ba de ni mi yi bdag po de yi
66a5(rgyud): rigasu nges// phyi nas dbang ni bdun po dag dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin bla med yang dag rab sbyin bya// klu dang bzhi yi nor bu ga/ sar gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen
66a6(rgyud): bcas// sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum ngag gis lha mo rnams kyi khrus bya'o// sangs rgyas rab tu dbye bas cod pan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyi dar dbyangs nyid
66a7(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu nyi zla lales te brtul zhugs dag kyang dbang por bcas pa'i yul gyis sbyar bar bya// khro ba rnams kyis bam so sogs ming ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i bdag pos rjes gnang 'dogs bcas
66a8(rgyud): rab tu sbyin// rdo rje dril bu rab tu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dag gis dag pa'i chos ni bstan par bya// nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni srog gcod bya ste ral gi la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig/ 
66b1(rgyud): rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog pa mchog gi pad+ma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi bud med dbrog/ chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni bstan par bya// 
66b2(rgyud): gdol pa mo sogs mtha'i dag bud med rnams ni gri gug la yang mkha' yi pad+mar smad mi bye// sems can don gyi slad nor dang bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya// rigs kyi
66b3(rgyud): bu kya sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min par rgyal bas gsungs// chu ni sgrol ma la sogs lha mo cod pan zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' ba'i dar dpyangs nas ma rnams// rdo rje dril
66b4(rgyud): bu'i zla dag dang brtul zhugs dag kyang yul slob ma ga zhugs par bya ste// khro bo'i phyag skyeg cha byas pa sngags 'di sa dbab par bya'o// oM bi sh+ya krod+ha hUM hUM a dz+wa la// ma la e
66b5(rgyud): ku la/ b+hI Sha Na badz+ra aM/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyi/ rol gyi dbab pa dang // dgug pa dang ltung bar bya ba rnams nus par 'gyuraro// de nas 'byung po 'dal ba'i rgyud chen
66b6(rgyud): bau las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rab shad pa/ oM b+hU shrI sing ha d+h+wa dza d+hi ri hrIHkhro ba'i mdun du'o// oM hUM b+h+rUM/ ma hA pad+ma ba ti d+ha nur bin d+ha ri hUM/ rgyab tu'o// oM hUM bi hU~M ti/ oM kr-i sho d+ha
66b7(rgyud): ri Ni hU dza/ lho ru'o// hUM ba su ra hA ri Ni tsin+ta ma Ni d+h+wa dza d+ha ra Ni suM/ g.yon du'o// oM shri ba ra ha ri Ni pu ShA hi ra hUM/ me tog dbang ldan gyi grwa rI'o// oM shr-I raMt+na shwa rid+ha pa hasta hA/ spos ma'i grwa ru
66b8(rgyud): ma shr-i d+hA'i Na gan d+ha tsi sti hU~M/ dri bden dril du'i// oM shr-i dza~M gang bA li ni A dI pa tits+tsha/ mar mi m+mu ru'o// de nas 'byung mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i tshi ga rgyas pa 'i bshad gi// 'tshur la
67a1(rgyud): bcangs te/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni sing+ge'i rgyal mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung po brkyang ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o// 
67a2(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid skyed pa'i phyogasu bzhag pa ni gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang ba nas dkyil ba ni// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo mnyam par byas te/ mdzub
67a3(rgyud): mo gnyis bkug pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// sor me rnams phan tshun mkhyud de/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang bi ni spos kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa so sor brkyang ste/ dbub pa'i rtsa ba gnyisu bzhag pa ni dri'i phag rgya'o// 
67a4(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i so ra mo rab tu brkyang ba ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khro ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig rgyas
67a5(rgyud): pa'i le'u'o// de nas 'byung po brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM shrI dzeHgzhan gyis mi thub pa'i'o// oM hUM dzaHrgyal ba'i'o// oM hrI dzaHrdzog
67a6(rgyud): byed kyi'o// oM sru dzaHdur khrod kyi bdage po'i'o// oM ru dzaHrigs sngags kyi dbang phyug gi'o// oM hrIHhUM dzaH'byung po'i dbang gi'o// oM aM dzaHmngag gzhug mchog gi'o// 'byung
67a7(rgyud): po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i skyob pa'i thabs bshad pa rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste/ sngon du 'bum bzlas te sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te
67a8(rgyud): ltar gsungs pa'i 'bras tshon dkar po dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zho dang / bu'am dang / 'o ma dang / shi rnams kyis mched cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas mtshan thog bag bzlas na tho ras ngas/ 
67b1(rgyud): bar 'ong ngo // gal te nges par ma 'ongs na skad cig de la mchi'o// 'ongs na bsgre ba don med par mi byed do// sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgon de phan chad mngag gzhug gi las bang la
67b2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid ster bar byed cing dag thams cad tshar gcod par byed do// zla ba'i lha mo blangs nas ster zhing rgyab tu zhon na// lha'i 'jig rten du yang khyer bar byed do// brgya byin nyid kyang
67b3(rgyud): ster bar byed cing bskal pa bdun 'tsho'o// de nas rgyal ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa// mtshan me sbyin byed ma'i mdun du song ste/ nyi ma re re stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa te ming
67b4(rgyud): ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o// rjes gnang rdzogs pa 'i byang chub dpal mo srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dus kyi'aM khor lo rjes rig pa ste// sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur
67b5(rgyud): bdun po 'di dag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab sgra na bya// dbang bdun dag gis mngon par dbang gis sa bdun gyi ni dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// bum pa gsang bas mngon par dbang bskur
67b6(rgyud): slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogs nges par rab tu 'jug/ shes rab ye shes dag gis mngon par dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbangs nyid 'gyur// gal te g.yo
67b7(rgyud): sgra'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngalo// rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par dge bar 'gyur te yon+d+ran ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o// bum pa gsang / 
67b8(rgyud): ba'i la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gis gong ma la ni dag pa med// rtsa bi'i ltung ba gang zhig dag pa'i slad slar yang dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug pa ste// rjesu gnang ba thob/ 
68a1(rgyud): nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid 'gyur// dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi no rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bang 'dzin par 'gyur// 
68a2(rgyud): yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum pa'o// byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang mad
68a3(rgyud): ru 'gyur// dag pa grub pa'i mtha' la smad pa'i bo dag kyang ma smin ma la gsang ba bin la so// phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i ches la ma dad gang // sgra yi
68a4(rgyud): byams pa dang ni mong sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o// dge ba'i sems can dag le sbyin brjod pa las nyi ma dem tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyi
68a5(rgyud): gzhan// bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyuraterdo rje'i theg par gnas pa rnams la'o// klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa
68a6(rgyud): yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas// sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis gdan gyi dbus khrus pa ste// klu dag gis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcings ste nor mdab pad+mar
68a7(rgyud): bzhi yis dar dbyangs bcing bar bya// phyag rgya la ni dpal ldan bum pa yis te 'dir ni pad+ma dang bral re khri lnga po spangs// dang po chu la ni dge bsnyen nyid 'gyur te bum pa la yang dag tshul
68a8(rgyud): dag tu 'gyur// gsang ba'i dbong la dge slong dang ni gong ma'i byed pa la yang gnas bstan zhes par 'gyur ba ste// phyag rgya der dbyangs cod pan dag dang rdo rje mchod phyir thogs ni
68b1(rgyud): bla ma mchog gis sbyin par bya// de dge slob dpon slad rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par dag pa nyid// steng du bla re bkod cing sa yi mthil gyi gnas dag du yang ri mo
68b2(rgyud): gsum ni kun naso// de rnams zur du nor bu gser gyi bum par chur bcas skud pa dang ldan pad+ma'i kha rnam so// dung sogs gsar gyi snod dang yang na dngul gyi rang bzhin dag tu dri yi che ni bsgrub par
68b3(rgyud): ba/ snying por gser gyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i gdan dag rab tu bkod de de la khrus ni brtsam par bya// me tog sogs dang dri yi til mar nyi ma me yis smin pa dag gis lha la byug par bya// pe
68b4(rgyud): mi rnams kyis dil pis byas nas sbrang rtsi mar dang zho dang 'o ma/ chu yis bkru bar bya// don grub rnams dang mar me dag dang rna ma mang 'bras pa mchog gis 'di la nges par
68b5(rgyud): babs nas ni// de yi gnas nas bskyed par bya ste sku yang dam ra po'i gos dag gis ni yang dag g.yogs pa'o// dpal ldan dkyil 'khor mthar ni mnyam pa'i sa yi gnas la rgyal
68b6(rgyud): bo'i cha yis re khA lnga byas te// dbus pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogasu gnas pa'i mtshan ma lnga yis rgyan pa'o// de yi dbusu bzhag par bya ba zhal gyi pad+ma nub tu phyogs pa'i lha dang
68b7(rgyud): lha mo 'am// mchod rten sogs dang glegs bam dag gam thang sku zhes pa'ang de bzhin de la mngon phyogs bsngags pa'o// rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje stong pa'i
68b8(rgyud): rang bzhin dag tu byas nas ni/ phyi nas sngar brjod sbyor ba dag gis zla nyi rdo rje las skyes dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rig pa'i lha mo sogs dang sangs rgyas a li ka li'i rigs skyes
69a1(rgyud): / rang rang sa bon gyis bskyed rnams// snying mgrin lte ba gsang ba mgo dang gtsug ter 'khor lo dag la rigs kyi dbang gis bsgom par bya// de ltar nges pa nyid bsgom par
69a2(rgyud): ba ste slar yang mtha' dag lha rnams ngag gi lus la yang // khro bo'i rgyal po dag gis srid med srid mnyam ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste gzhug pa dag dang ni// bcing dang minyes pa dang
69a3(rgyud): ni'i mnyam byed pa dag kyang lha rnams kyi ni rang gi lus la bya// de nas slob dpon nyid kyis zhal ni rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i lha la phag dag 'tshal bar ba// a sogs ka sogs dag
69a4(rgyud): las lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs yon tan la gnas sa bon gang // rang gi sa bon de ni snying gi dbus zla nyi kho sbyor la gnas sku gsung thugs ldan par// mtha'
69a5(rgyud): dag lus la gnas pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis mtsha na gyi yan lag dpe pad mkha' dang brgyad kyis te// yi ge rnam sa kyis phe ba de nyid rab gsal mdab ma mdab mar glegs
69a6(rgyud): bam rnams la bsgom par bya// mechod rten snying por dpal ldan 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu pad ma dag dang byang du ral gri nyid// bgrang phreng l-i ni hUM gi yi ge nor bu yongs bgrang ba rnams ni mtshan
69a7(rgyud): dang dpe byad rnams// dril bu'i sku la dbyangs ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu rnams dag dang ka sogs sde rnams rdo rje la// de dag kho na mchod phyir thogs la bcu yis bsgyur ba nor gyi dpe bad rnams
69a8(rgyud): ni stong gi lags la// kasogs sngo ba dbyangs dang bcas pa mkha' ro yin tan rnams ni pus mkhyud dag la bsgom par bya/ ha ha/ dpal ldan chal ste oM aHzhes pa gzungs ni mgul
69b1(rgyud): rgyan ska rags dag la'o// de bzhin du yang a yig zung ni gdub bu dag la 'gyur te rkang gdub dag la ha hA yang // mtha' dag lus la gnas pa stong pa'i rnam pa lnga po dag ni thal ba dag la bsgom
69b2(rgyud): par bya/ rang lus ye shes rnam par dag las rdo rje gsum dang bcas pa'i phung po khams la sogs pa kun// lha rnams kyi ni rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rang rang sa bon dag gi rim pas dgod par bya/ 
69b3(rgyud): 'odi dang dang par yang ramar bas pa' thangs/ sa bon bkod na rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mchod rten sku gzugs sogs la'o// nye bar bsdu ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dag gis ring
69b4(rgyud): gi lus las sa bon gzhug par bya// 'di dang dang po ru yang ri mor bris pa'i thang sku rnams kyi me long la ni khru su 'gyur// / phyi nas dri dang spos deng shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams dang grwa
69b5(rgyud): dang rol mo dag dang ni// ga re dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga yab dang ni gdugs rnams dag gis lha la mchod par bya// de ltar rab gnas pas nas rnam mang mchog gi
69b6(rgyud): rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchod ston rab tu sbyin// blon brdzing dang mtshe'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal po nor rnams dgod par bya// chu gter bdun po rang gi sa bon gyis te sbrang rtsi chu
69b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i dri lnga gzhug par bya// sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lha dkar po phyag na zhigs pa bsgom par bya// skyed mos tshol du shing gcig dpag bsam ljon pa mtha' dag
69b8(rgyud): shing la gnas par dbang ni bskor nas so// cod pan dar dbyings dag dang do sha lo gdub bu dang na bzhin rnam ska rags lo sogs pa/ slob dpon la ni rab tu sbyin byar 'gyur temi yi bdag
70a1(rgyud): po san sa ga nyid nus pa'i// sbyin bdag gas sas blang papa' tshogs kyi rigs la gas na du gnye ste/ ma rnams 'di mis rnam gsum nga
70a2(rgyud): ba la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub thob par shog/ ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni gcig pu rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang ni reg par bya// de nas 'khyud par ba ste ro dang bcas pa'o/ 
70a3(rgyud): cha gter g.yo ba la sogs rnams ni bstan par bya// lo ni nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha// dbang gi don du drug dang bzhi sto bang mnyam 'bras bu
70a4(rgyud): ster ba gzhan ni sgom pa'i don du'o// dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yong dang por reg pa gang yin bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid do// gsang ba dag las ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag
70a5(rgyud): gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur// shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha 'dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyis sbyang ba byas na sa ni// rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas dbang
70a6(rgyud): por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo lon mdzes pa'i bu mo ni/ khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi
70a7(rgyud): bdag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'did spyad nas// sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang ba byas nas ni// phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas slar yang gzhan ni
70a8(rgyud): du ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o// sgrag dang rnam par 'khrul po'i sems ldan g.yo sgyu gzhan bang 'gro mi nid dang ljon dang 'i skyes la// khro 'ongs nari la srod pa mi 'din rtsod pal
70b1(rgyud): dga' rang gi yan lag dman dang rnam dag min// shes rab 'di dag dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar bya'o mi yi dbang // sngar brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig
70b2(rgyud): 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya// 'dod pa bskyod par byed pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la'o gang ba dag ni gang ba nyid 'gyur// gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin
70b3(rgyud): pa khu bar byas nas thig le bzang po 'dzag/ oM T+Tas bkug pa mchog gi 'deb rang bzhin gyis ster thig le grol ba dag ni gsum gyi mthar// blta dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde
70b4(rgyud): ba 'di dag dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs dag giso// 'dod pa dag 'a bar byed de dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis blta ba dag la'o// phyi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la
70b5(rgyud): ste slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid do rang lus la// 'bar ba thig le 'jog pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba rdo rje pad+ma la/ in+d+ra thig
70b6(rgyud): le gsum gyi mtha' ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed// 'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyor ba de gcig ste// gang ba dang ni
70b7(rgyud): nus dang skyi bdag dang mchog gi dga' ba nyi drin gnyis par nges par 'gyur// 'bar ba dang ni thig le brgyal ba dag dang slar yang khyad par dga' ba nyid ni gsum pa'o// oMn+d+ra dang ni rlung dag
70b8(rgyud): dang gi nyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur// sems kyi bsam pa yis nim nu 'gyur te reg pa dang ni ba lta po dag gis sring po'o//  tsa zhugs pas bum byed pa nga
71a1(rgyud): shin tu dga' bas tsha mo dag ni de bzhin nyid// thig le lhung na chung ma gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni 'dod chags nyams la so// 'di dag rnal 'bor phyag rgya
71a2(rgyud): drug ste sa chu sreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnam so// chu skyes la ni rdo rje rab zhugs rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le me lhung gsum pa'o// 'di dag rnal 'bor gsum gyis rab tu gsal
71a3(rgyud): zhing nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya ste// chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog bde'i gtar ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya rnams las de
71a4(rgyud): ni legs bi'i ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o// shes rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gi sum bskyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni sring mo'o// 
71a5(rgyud): rdo rje dag ni tsha mo rnams ste phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsu rtsi kA sogs yang cha mo// 'khor lo lan gnas dus kun du ni rang rigs sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis
71a6(rgyud): bsten par bya// zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas tha~Md ming po'o/ 
71a7(rgyud): spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnam mang yang cha rnams dang yang cha'i bu rnam so// 'khor lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gis bstedan
71a8(rgyud): par bya// zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang ut+pal mig can mchog gi dri yis rjesu byugs pa gang su dag
71b1(rgyud): / bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje mchod pa 'dul byed na/ sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta ma rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang / bsod nams de dag thams
71b2(rgyud): cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtsham su'o// sgrol ma rmangs mo rnam pa bzhi rus yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar me na rgyal rigs ma// sa ni rje'u rigs ma rnams rnam gsam mA ma kI mi
71b3(rgyud): gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnams bdun 'gyur// sgra zhes bya ba mkhar ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang 'i tsheng gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// yang dag nges par gser mkhan mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po
71b4(rgyud): 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni// phreng ba mkhan du rab tu grags te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg pa rdo rje thags mkhan ma// rdo rje'i mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkha
71b5(rgyud): mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags/ tsA mudz+nyA na sha'atshong mar 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma/ phag mo khu bo gzhan du nges
71b6(rgyud): 'gyur gdong dag ma ni smad 'tshang ma ste dbang mo che me bu ma// tshangs ma nyab mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i gnas dag du yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan maru 'gyur// dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad
71b7(rgyud): pa chos mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skye gan so// rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor 'gyur te mi bdag rings byed ma ni srin ngal mkhan mo'o// khengs ma zhes bya til mar 'chir ma rab
71b8(rgyud): pe shin tu stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi pa'o// 'od zer can ni kau lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid// dpal ldan num+b+ho 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi sri
72a1(rgyud): pa gnas lcags sgrog ma ni smug ma mkhan// dag spyan ma ni khron pa bed mar 'gyur te bcu pa 'od ma'i gar ma shin tu sngon mo'o// khro bo'i cha shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu po
72a2(rgyud): rnams ni rnal 'bor pa yis mchod par bya// dpal ldan khri gdong ma ni kla klo mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po phag gdong ma ni 'bag pa mo// lce sbrang gdong ma gtum mo dag dang sa yi gzhi yi stag gdong me'i
72a3(rgyud): stag gzig mo// ba rog gdong ma bsnyon thabs ma ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par ba rgod gdong ma ro sreg ma// mkha' lding gdong ma dpal ldan b+him+b+hir 'gyur te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri
72a4(rgyud): khrod ma// sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas rnal 'bor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te// zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan
72a5(rgyud): nag su yang dag gnas pa ni// rmongs rnams 'ching bar byed cang rab mchog sa yi stang du rnal 'bor ba rnams dag la dngos grub ster// bzhi dang ngag dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i
72a6(rgyud): nor dang gcig pu gcig ni rim pa so// bzhi ni sangs rgyas dpe ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams/ khro bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rab dpe sa steng gnas yi dwags dpe
72a7(rgyud): pa rnams ni de bzhin brgyad// lha min dag kyang brgyad kyi dbye bo gdeng can srid par gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis rig par 'o// gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo sid gsum gnas dpal ldan
72a8(rgyud): rigs rnams dag gi khab pado// sa 'og rnamasu gtu mo brgyad ste mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes gnas// yi dwags zhes bya yi dwags 'jig rten du sti lha mchog
72b1(rgyud): gnas sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drag/ tshangs pa'i yul sar dang ldan bzhi ste rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi yum gcig ma// rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams spro ba yang dag sdud byed
72b2(rgyud): dgyes pa rnams ni skyong bar byed pa nyid// bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas dam ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo// rje'u mo rmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sam mig dang lag pa dang bral rna mtshan
72b3(rgyud): sna ni chad ma rnams// mtha' dag byang chub rgyu ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod par bya ste rgyal po slob dpon snying rje dang // bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri mo dag dang rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes
72b4(rgyud): zhen pas// dang por bud med gsang ba'i phag rgyar 'gyur te dam tshig la ni dpal ldan skyes pa mchog phag rgya// rtsed mo'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam
72b5(rgyud): dag gis chos phyag rgya// pe nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga/ lus dang pad+ma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste/ rang ba zhin yon tan dbang gis gla rtsi dang ni pad+ma gcin dang sha dang
72b6(rgyud): rus pa'i dri rnam so// dpal ldan bzang mo pad+ma can du nges 'gyur tshul rgyu ma sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma// dpal ldan sbrel ma gos dkar zhes par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis mA ma kI dang
72b7(rgyud): spyan ma yang // rnal 'bor pa ni sing+ge ri dwags rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las// mi bskyod pa dang den yid grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na pad+ma 'khor lo can// yan lag
72b8(rgyud): pri ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam la mnyes gshin dpal shin tu bzang mo'o// cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la skra ni 'khog pa pad+ma can// ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa dag
73a1(rgyud): la rtsod mang la dga' sgra ni shin tu chung bdud can ma// ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma// sbom zhing thung la yan lag
73a2(rgyud): shin thus pa'i yul dang skra ni sdom pa glang chen ma// pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag du 'dir 'gyur dus kun du ni 'dres pa'i rigs// sing+ge dag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam
73a3(rgyud): bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can// ri dwags mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang bi'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o// rta ni nges par 'dod la sred par 'gyur te
73a4(rgyud): gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gnyir ba'o// khyu ma garengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan d+hA na po nya yi dri ru 'gyur// glang chen 'dod ldan ngas par
73a5(rgyud): bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul pa'i dri dang shin tu rmongs pa'o// sum cu rtsa dag dbye bas pa bas yi steng gi gnas rigs kyi de yi rang bzhin no// mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan
73a6(rgyud): bcos yon+tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'bor pa yis rig par bya// shin tu dga' ba bas kyang rnal 'bor ba la rnal 'ber ma yis mchi ma dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur// mdzes ma lha ma dang ni sha za mo dang
73a7(rgyud): mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur// mdzes ma dpal ldan chos kyi dbying su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma/ sha za me ni dri yi rdo rjer 'gyur te ma mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma yi
73a8(rgyud): dbang gdugs pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje klu mo reg po rdo rje mi// mdzes ma sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa li dga' sdom dang bsam gtan ngang tshul can// lha mo longs
73b1(rgyud): spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur tedri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo// mi mo 'dod la rjes chags ma srin me mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsed pa'i sems ma ste/ klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can
73b2(rgyud): rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'bar ba yis mchod par bya// de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rnal 'bor pa yis rig par bya// sa yi stang gi gnas mkha' spyongs
73b3(rgyud): spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa dag dbye bas pa bas pa ba'o// chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes 'bras las skyes som shing skyes te// pog rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de ni
73b4(rgyud): yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// de phyir/ shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dam 'breg cing sngags pa rnams la dngos gru'i sbyin par 'gyur// phyag rgya geng su rung
73b5(rgyud): ba 'dir ni dmi tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i slad rab tu ba// rgyal por bong mtshan ma gcig pu thams cad dus bstan pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na/ shes rab ches
73b6(rgyud): 'byung la gnas nyin mer byed pa dang bcas rnal 'bar ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos// mi bskyed don yod grub pa rgyal po michog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa// nyon mongs rnams
73b7(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs sbyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag/ khyi rta ba lang glang po lug dang ra dang ri dwags bang bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs// ku b+hi ra dang 'gron bu ku li
73b8(rgyud): ra dang nya dang ma ke ra dang sbal pa ru sbal dung // bse ru stag dang dom dang nai'u la bcas 'bri dang lce spyang dang ni sram dang byi la dang // 'breg dgen khyi dang seng+ge dang bcas no dang bcu ste 'di ri'i
74a1(rgyud): / pe skyes dang khro ba skyes// ged+hA byi ba shA la dzI ta spre'u dang ni ri bong gzung mo i shu rtsangs pa brgyad// khengs ldan mdab chags dang ni ne co khu byug dag dang ri skyegs rab
74a2(rgyud): tu gsal bar chu yi gter// lA pa phug ron gzhan ni bya dkar zhes ba tsa Ta ka dang ngur pa dang ni ngang ba dang // dpal ldan khrung khrung khu byug mig dang ra dza ka dang b+ha ga ba tI taM taM raM dang bzhad// tshul
74a3(rgyud): la 'jug pa dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i nor rnams rim pa yis ni rig par bya/ ba rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dwags dgra dang gtsug brod can dang bya gag b+he dra g+ha ra dang // he ri pa ljon shing dag ni
74a4(rgyud): gzhan te bcu po khro bo las skyes khro ba yi ni rigasu 'gyur// mig sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang a ni la dang gu da mu kha bug gi rkang steng nya la// b+he ru NA dang e ba ri ka brgyad
74a5(rgyud): pa mchog gi medab chagasu 'gyur mi yi bdag po kyi// sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnasas spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyis// rigasu gyur pa'i dam tshig
74a6(rgyud): mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya// rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur// so dang skra dang lpags pa la
74a7(rgyud): sogs sha bcas chu rgyus dang btsos rus po snying dang pad+ma dang // shog dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdag po glo bsgyu mtshus dang // bad kan mkhris pa chu dang rnag dang sna tshogs lus la
74a8(rgyud): gnas pa khrag dang rdul dang tshil bu dang / mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chusar zhag dang kha dog dri dang bshang ba dang / lce dang mig dang rnab sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed pa rnams kyi
74b1(rgyud): lha rnams mchod par bya// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin yon+tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang // sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dpe ba mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshan
74b2(rgyud): ma phyag rgya dang // sum surtsa dag rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnams 'dir mi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang me tog dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang // lha ba shes
74b3(rgyud): dag dang 'dir ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang // khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshang ba dag dang sha dang mchin pa dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni// sgyu ma lpags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam
74b4(rgyud): pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang // rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad+ma mdab ma brgya pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste// rgyud mangs dang ni me long snod 'gyur ti ma yi bdag po me tog phreng ba
74b5(rgyud): dag dang gos// drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i ma zil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'o// de bzhin gyi grwa/ ga la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos ni se
74b6(rgyud): po dang / khab bam yang na tho ba rab tu gsal zhing nges pa dag tu nya yi rgya dang rtse gsum ste// dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad pa rdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o// rmugs bad la so/ 
74b7(rgyud): rnams kyi dmar sbed nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang / chu gri dang ni mthil lham dag dang spu gri zhes pa de bzhin shing lham dag dang gdugs dang ni// rtog rtse dang ni 'od mi'i da byug pa khro skyes
74b8(rgyud): rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur// ba lang ra dang kham por rgyud ldan 'phangs dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste// rgyud mangs nye ba'i yan lag dang ni mnga' dang gtsug/ 
75a1(rgyud): bud can gyi 'jug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur// sum sucu drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'ber ba yis mchod par ba// slar yang dasangs rigs la
75a2(rgyud): sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te yon+tan dbang gis ut+pa la 'am thong gsholo// rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpangasu 'gyur mi yi bdag po smyug gu rin chen phreng ba ni// rje rig ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin
75a3(rgyud): chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i// yum gyi mtshan ma rnams pa bzhi sde Da ma ru dang rnga chen cod pani nyid deng bgang bre // ba sha nga ba gci ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni
75a4(rgyud): bzhi por 'gyur ba ste// rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang ba shang lam dang ni b+ha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs dag/ rnag dang bad kon dang ni shi ga dang srin bu che ser zhag dang ba spu skra dang brgyad po yang
75a5(rgyud): sgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gan sa pa mtshon pa dang ni glo ba dang // rtsa dang lpags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur mi yi dbang
75a6(rgyud): rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshang lam dbus dang b+ha ga dag dang mtshan khung sogs// lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur// sen mo
75a7(rgyud): dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur// bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dge ba dag la bzhi// rna ba
75a8(rgyud): sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dag dang b+ha gi'i zhing gi dpe ba la yang dag/ rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnasu tshan do ha yi dbye ba brgyad// sgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni
75b1(rgyud): phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'das pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams// rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab pa rnams// dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing
75b2(rgyud): nges par gnas kyi dpe ba dag la bzhi// sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa ba sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang dag/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes chu skyes rlung las skyes
75b3(rgyud): ba dag/ brgyad ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro dag dri dang kha dog dang // reg pa sgra ni de bzhin nyid rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung na
75b4(rgyud): zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g.yon dang g.yas dang rgyab tu ste// kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams// gnas ni sgrol ma la
75b5(rgyud): sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod// tshan do ha ni tsartsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te mi bdag 'das pa rmugs byed sogs// dur khrod khyi gdong
75b6(rgyud): ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni// yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis tid dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma// gnas ni bad med
75b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i pad+mar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas/ zhing dang chen do ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrongs gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go// gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dag da
75b8(rgyud): mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g.yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas// de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas ser mo'i mtha' yi mtsham su'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha
76a1(rgyud): me mug ter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags// shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan pa dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug chu gter yang dag spong ba rdam
76a2(rgyud): dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgya du 'gyur// khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid// yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag
76a3(rgyud): po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te// de dag mtha' dag rnal 'bor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas
76a4(rgyud): su rnal 'bor ba yis rig par bya// de ltar gnas la sogs ba thams cad mi yi bdag po pho dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa dang zhi ba 'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang
76a5(rgyud): de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze 'am// thod pa can dang skra 'bal/ dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang // smon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems
76a6(rgyud): ldan mkhas pa dang ni gro ba nyid 'gyur te// rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon+tan gtar te de nyid thob pa mi yi dbang // mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ni gung mo
76a7(rgyud): dang ni ming med dang // de yi mthar ni ngas par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// phyag rgya'i don da ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te mon+tan dbang gis sir mi
76a8(rgyud): rnams kyi rim paso// bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba lo yang de bzhin no// khu tshur baR+Ya yaM steng du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i
76b1(rgyud): phyag rgyar 'gyur// skyil krung la ni lag pa g.yon par 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa// sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin
76b2(rgyud): phag na rin chen gyi// g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan rgyal mnyam par gnas po phyag na pad+ma dag gir 'gyur// g.yon pa skyil krung du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa pag
76b3(rgyud): ni ral gri yi// g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yis min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la// gsal bar snying khar sen po rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor
76b4(rgyud): lo'i phyag rgya ni// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdub bu bzhin du gyur pa dang ni gung mo la sogs brkyang ba'o// lag pa g.yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri mde'i bong 'dzin pa g.yas le
76b5(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma ste// nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khri baM las skyes rtse mo lnga pa ni// bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bcod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha nyid 'o// 
76b6(rgyud): 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog po'o// gang zhig cung zad bzung bar bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes dong gsher skyes sogs
76b7(rgyud): dang bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang minabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya// gang gang bya ba 'a khor sbyor bar 'gyur ba yan+ta na dbang gis de la don sbyar bar bya// sa la so
76b8(rgyud): la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya// lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// mdzub mo thog
77a1(rgyud): mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo sring pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi// mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo
77a2(rgyud): rnams kyi'o// lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur// mthe bong dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba pad+ma'i mdab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag
77a3(rgyud): ni brkyang ba dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba phyed pa ming med 'og du bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa// phag rgya 'din rdo rje rtsem lnga par 'gyur te bsten par bya'o// rtsibs kyi rnam pa ser mo rims te
77a4(rgyud): lag pa gnyis gi'i mthil du mthe bo la sogs mtha' dag rnam sa// lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings po rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dri bo bur bcas// khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang
77a5(rgyud): ni gung mo mdar dang mtshungs pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur/ mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshu ra phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum lo// dpal ldan gyi
77a6(rgyud): gug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthe chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur// rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mda' yi mchog la'o// khu tshuri
77a7(rgyud): bcings shing mdzub mo shin tu 'khyog por 'gyur mo bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o// rtsa bar mi dzu bi mo ming med 'gyur mngar dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni mdang la ste// thaM kar
77a8(rgyud): khu tshur dbyug pa la'o lag mthil shin tu mnyam la mthe bong brkyang po dgra sta la// steng du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mir 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen lpags pa dag la'o// ma
77b1(rgyud): ba la ni lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa'o// khe Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur// kha T+wAM ga la khu
77b2(rgyud): tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyi du phrag par mtha'u chung brkyang ba'o// sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad mad pa lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la// gzhu la lag pa gan rgyal khu tshur
77b3(rgyud): du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang ba'o// gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun tu brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhag pa la// rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdag/ 
77b4(rgyud): de dag rnam par phye ba pad+ma la// chun rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bongasbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro// me long la ni shi na tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang
77b5(rgyud): bcas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur// mthe bong la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog po rim par yong su bkod pa lcags sgrog la'o// mgo bo la ni mthe bong la sogs bzhi
77b6(rgyud): bo gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o// cod pan la ni lag pa dag gos dung gi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyor ba nyid 'gyur/ lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor ma ldan
77b7(rgyud): rnams ni gcig tu sbyar ba dag kyang na rgyan la// lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongasu bkod cing bcings pa mgul ba'i rgyan pa ste/ lag pa gnyis ka'i sor ma gsum ni par cha
77b8(rgyud): sbyar cing thog mtho'i bskum pa dag na ska rags la// khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lte bur byas pa rkang gdug la// de bzhin du ni dadung rgyan zung dang gdung bul
78a1(rgyud): yang mdzub mo pham tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur// mthe bong mkha' gro ma rnams dag gis mchog gi rigasu 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang ba pa rnams kyi// dri za rnams dang gdangs can rnams
78a2(rgyud): kyi gung mo ming med dag ni rim par yongs bkod pa'o// 'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil ni srin po rnams kyi rig su 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur bcis pa
78a3(rgyud): mchog gi rigs te tshigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams dag gi'o// lag pa gnyis ka'i mtha'i du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi// khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis
78a4(rgyud): po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bson pa rA can rnams kyi'o// mi mnyam lag pa'i mthil la mthe tshong phan tshun bcings shing / bshog pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste// sor mo
78a5(rgyud): lnga po rtse mo 'khyog pa gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab bskyang gzhan la 'og
78a6(rgyud): tu sbyar byas po// 'bar ba dag la mthe bong sbyar te mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o// mdzub mo bstan na legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur
