78a7(rgyud): ternal 'byor ba la yang // gnyis kyis shin tu legs par 'ongs dang skal bzang dge ba mthe bong bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur// sor me'i sa gol rdebs pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog
78a8(rgyud): ces par brjod par 'gyur ba ste// mthe bong dang ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim par byed pa'o// sor mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang pas bskal bzang lags par
78b1(rgyud): 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'bor pa la yang // g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed// skye gnas dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang du
78b2(rgyud): ma zung dang nges par sen mo 'debs pas kyang // sor mo sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bong brkyang bas dam tshig brjod par byed pa yin// mchu dang sprin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo
78b3(rgyud): la 'khrug par byed na shin tu rmongs pa brjod par byed// mche ba'i dbus mthe chung dang ni snying kha kha ru mdzub mo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang
78b4(rgyud): pa sa la rdebs ning yis bza' bar ba// lce le reg ni zos pa da rang ni lto dang si dang bsnan pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do// lag pa'i rgyob kyis song cig nges par rab tu brjod mngon du
78b5(rgyud): phyogs pas 'dug gcig 'dug gcig/ byin pa brlal nye na skal bzang khyed ni de ring kho na la so nges par brjod par byed// rkang pa rab tu skyong bas gnyid dang pus mo
78b6(rgyud): zung dag skong ba bdag la bdag la shin tu dga' ba gyis// yan lag kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'das pa med pa'o// phan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag gi
78b7(rgyud): khyim du de rang 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni brjod par byed// mthe bong ming medo rtse mo dag gis rnam mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya// rkang pa la ni 'khrug par byed na de bzhin
78b8(rgyud): drini phyi rol 'dus pa dag le 'gro ba yang // mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni de ring 'jigs pa 'breg par byed pa'o// sgra ni rang gi so yis gcod ni ma yi phyogs khong
79a1(rgyud): 'dir ni lhung bar bya ba brjod par byed// so ni phan tshun 'da' bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis di ring bza' bar bya// lce mchu g.yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni
79a2(rgyud): btung bar bya'o nges par brjod par byed// mtshul so ni 'debs par byed na khyod kyi sgyu ma lo bor gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar ba// sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad
79a3(rgyud): pa'i sbyor bas band pa'o// gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o// glu yi sbyor ba yis ni glu ste mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dro yi sbyor ba dag gis dri// phreng
79a4(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te yon+dan dbang gis spros kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos// mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges pa d+ma mun pa bcom pa dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur
79a5(rgyud): zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi dbye ba sa rnam par phye ba ste// gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis rig
79a6(rgyud): par bya// gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams// pho nya mo ni phreng la blta bas khyod ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skal pa bzang la brjod par byed// mgo
79a7(rgyud): bor log bzhag de yi phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor ba yis lan ni smras par 'gyur// steng du blta bas khyod ni dge 'am sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so cog/ yon pa
79a8(rgyud): lta bas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas po nyam ni shin tu dga' ba brjod par byed// zhi ba'i lte bas bdag gi grogs pa khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// sku la lta
79b1(rgyud): bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal bzang la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyiso// mdzod spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sna la lta bas yon+tan rab tu gsal bar byed// mchu la lta bas
79b2(rgyud): skal pa bzang ste nu ma zung la lta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod// snying khar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lagau ba zung la lta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mor brjod phrag par lta bas bdag ni nus
79b3(rgyud): ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la lto na srin mo'o// rgyab tu ltan lag 'gro ma ste lta bar lta bas mi yi dbang po bdag ni dam tshig can// gsang bar lta bas bdag ni dag pa brlal blta bas
79b4(rgyud): bdag na shin tu dga' la 'dul bar dka'// pus mor lta bas bdag ni grub pa nges par brjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phru la sbyin pa mo// rkang pa'i mthe bong nges par ldan bdag
79b5(rgyud): ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu dang // sor mo ku/ na gyi rtse mor lta bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su kun tu 'gro ma sna tshogs yum// pho nya mo rnams lta
79b6(rgyud): stangs nyid ni sa yi stang gi gnas su rnal 'bor pa yis rig par bya// drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus dag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang sbyin pa ste// las kyi dbang po rnams
79b7(rgyud): kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dong bcas yid dag kyong // khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi tshogs kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan// mchog sa
79b8(rgyud): phyag rgya rjes su ldog pa sleb dbon la ni rab tu phul na bde pa'i gnas su 'gro/ sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jig can khams las ye shes rdo rje lpags
80a1(rgyud): kyu yis// bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying rje dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi// bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can
80a2(rgyud): lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa// dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi gnas su btang bar bya// rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i
80a3(rgyud): bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya// de bzhin du ba lo sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste// bsten pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang
80a4(rgyud): son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol// gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po yum gyi mchod po rnams dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya// dbang gi mtha' nga ni dpal
80a5(rgyud): ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde ster stodakor ges zung dag/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la sbyin bya gzhan yod de bzhin stod kor dang ni
80a6(rgyud): gos zung dag/ sgo na gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan// mthar ni sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma ra ya shes sems
80a7(rgyud): dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste// 'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul chen dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan dang bya// te bu la dang dri spros me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug
80a8(rgyud): dag ni gzhon nu me rnams la// byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod par mchode byas te// slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog
80b1(rgyud): tshogs kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol// dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang // chu gter 'khrugs pa dang
80b2(rgyud): ni sha za 'chi ba'i 'jigs pad nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang // dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrigs pa'i 'jigs po dang ni rdo rje ljang dang don nyams pa// gang zhig rnal 'bor ma
80b3(rgyud): rnams zhabs ni nyin nag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las byung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las// mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u
80b4(rgyud): ste gsum pa'o// / rgyal ba bskyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnamadas dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang / 
80b5(rgyud): rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms ba rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod pa bzhi pa thob// slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub
80b6(rgyud): thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o// zla ba bzang po'i tshigs gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs// zla ba'i sku dang zung gi zhabs te ma yi ma gim
80b7(rgyud): ba chu gter dpal ldan na la ni sna tshogs mdog/ phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung ba rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad ma stong ba drug dang mi yi tshigs// zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyis sreg za'i dkyil
80b8(rgyud): 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa// rol pas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu de ni bsgrub par bya// bskyed mos tshal lam ri bo dang ni rgyal ba
81a1(rgyud): mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni stong pa dang // grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa// gang du sems
81a2(rgyud): ni rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par bya'o mi yi bdag po ste// nges par 'jam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas sngar brjod srung ba byas nas ni// dang por snying khar zla ba'i
81a3(rgyud): dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya// kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang na mkha' dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la ni// mchod pa rnam pa sna
81a4(rgyud): tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po gsags pa dag ni bshags byas te// sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro
81a5(rgyud): ba bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa// de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam
81a6(rgyud): bral byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pa rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub par du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rdzogs sangs rgyas su
81a7(rgyud): bdag gyur cig ces 'dir ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do// stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman// de las
81a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan phan snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste// mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dpag med
81b1(rgyud): / yon tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya// chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbusu sdom brtson dag gis bya/ 
81b2(rgyud): phyi nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwa bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs// rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas na mkha' la ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// sems ni me dang mun pa'i
81b3(rgyud): mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyi sa l-i bzhag par bya// stang po rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am
81b4(rgyud): ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste/ oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog
81b5(rgyud): gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni nyi mo dag gi gdan// phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nor gyi pad ma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman// phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor
81b6(rgyud): byed pa'i pad+ma sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams// nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang // snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu
81b7(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yis// zla ba nyi ma la yang a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis// 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med
81b8(rgyud): ba'i zer 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma nyi ma'i dpung pa dus kyi zhal// mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas
82a1(rgyud): pa'i zhal yang mche ba yid ni gtsigs pa'o// dpal ldan oM yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad mar zla banyis me yi steng du ni// drag po lus med gnyis kyi
82a2(rgyud): snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang stabs// g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud sde dkar po g.yon par yang ni drag po'o// dbus dang g.yas dang
82a3(rgyud): g.yas min mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba nyi ma dang ma tshungs zla ba dag gi mdog/ phrag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar g.yas pa dang ni g.yon du yang // g.yas dang g.yas
82a4(rgyud): min dpung ba gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang ti ma'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te// de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyi ni rim
82a5(rgyud): bsod/ phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can la tshigs gsum srong ma lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'gro// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshan tshe'i tshogs
82a6(rgyud): ni yang dag gnas pa yang // rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me yi mda'// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nges por sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang tho
82a7(rgyud): 'khor lo nyid// mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi pad+mo g.ye si la'o// dril bu phub dang kha T+wAM ga ni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis gang ba'i
82a8(rgyud): thod pa dang // gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen pad+ma chu na rgyu ba dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang // tshangs pa'i mgo bo pi d+mas rgyan pa rig byed gdong gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi
82b1(rgyud): pag na'o// bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu bad// gser mdog rig bad zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gi pad mas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs
82b2(rgyud): yum yin te// g.yas na gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang bgrang phreng rim pas so// g.yon nathod pa zhags pa dang ni mdab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma mchog gi rin chen
82b3(rgyud): de bzhin nyid// g.yon brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgyu yis btab pa'o// mdab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi bag gi pad ma rig byang
82b4(rgyud): zhal dang nyi ma'i spyan// de dag rnams las bzhi ni sbrul gyi rnga yab 'dzin ta zur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye ba sa so// dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi zur nga
82b5(rgyud): chos kyi dang dang gaN+DI dang // de bzhin yid bzhi na nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni dpag bsam shi nga du rim pas 'gyur// nag mo yi ni dang po'i phag gi mthil
82b6(rgyud): na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag na bsil ba'i snod// dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na sde mos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phag bzhi na// g.yon na dril bu pad+ma lha yi shing gi me
82b7(rgyud): tog dang ni me tog phreng ba rim paso// dmar mo'i g.yas na mar mau do shal dag dang cod pani dang bcas gdub bu rnams te phag g.yon na// gos dang ska rags dang ni de ma med pa'i 'od zer
82b8(rgyud): 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub po// ser mo'i g.yas kyi phag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang bcas Da ma ru ni rim pas te// g.yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrogs pa'i
83a1(rgyud): mkhar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo // 'o mchu dang sman dang chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar mo yi// phyogs kyi pad+mar chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni
83a2(rgyud): nges par spyan dgu me yi zhal dang dus kyi phag/ zur du sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad// lha dang lha mo gnag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni
83a3(rgyud): bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste// na ge bo dkar po zla bi'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nyi ma'i steng // mkha 'a snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phogs
83a4(rgyud): bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs// shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi ni g.yas dang g.yas min pad ma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje ma
83a5(rgyud): dad chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so// rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong de ni shar du'o// shes rab pang bar thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma
83a6(rgyud): la ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o// gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan ma dag gis phan tshun 'khyud// mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag
83a7(rgyud): mthithal na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman/ shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa pad ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs// nag po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phag na ral
83a8(rgyud): gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste// g.yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha T+wAM ga ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur// mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcas
83b1(rgyud): Da ma ru ni g.yas kyi phag na rim pa yis// gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g.yon ni de bzhin nyid// ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo dbyug pa
83b2(rgyud): dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te// g.yon du dpal ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang ni nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur// ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g.yas na dpal
83b3(rgyud): ldan tho ba mdung dang rtsa gsum ste// g.yon na pad ma dkar ba mdab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me long dang ni bgrang phreng ngo // ljang ku rnams kyi g.yas rdo rje ga gug dang ni ngag star rim pas rab tu
83b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba ste// g.yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa mtha' dag yon te na gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do// lha mo sngon mo rnams ngag gi ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin du ni
83b5(rgyud): rig par bya// gnag dong dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gis ra dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dar nas rgyal ba'i
83b6(rgyud): bdag po'i pad ma dag la res 'ga' ni// dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su ma yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur// rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di
83b7(rgyud): yang rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya// dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis pi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu dman par 'gyur// phyi rol du ni brgyad pa brgyad kyis
83b8(rgyud): pad mdab brgyad po rnams la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni// tsartsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum mo// shar gyi pad+mar tsartsi ka ste mer
84a1(rgyud): ni mkha' go'i bdag pos 'gro ma phag mo gdong dag ma// gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chur bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o// drag mo dpal mo byung dang
84a2(rgyud): dbang ldan du ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la'i khyad pa'o// brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang bde mi'i mdab me le gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhol rnam so// shar la sogs par dang po'i pa
84a3(rgyud): gi mthil na ga gug dang ni rtsa gsum 'khor lo be con dang // da b+h+ya ga pa ral gri dang ni mdung mthung lcags kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phag gi pad+ma zung la'o// rdo rje mda' dang pad+ma dang ni dri med
84a4(rgyud): glog mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang // sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang pad+ma nyid dang bgang breng ste// g.yon na thong pa
84a5(rgyud): dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang pad+ma dung dang lcags sgrog dag dang phub dang ni/ nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrogs pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang // spyi blugs snod dang kha T+wAM ga dang sbrul
84a6(rgyud): dang de nas chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid de// pad+ma nor mdab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no// 'jigs ma dag mo dus kyi mche ba me 'bar gdong ma rlung gi
84a7(rgyud): shugs ma dang ni rab gtum ma// dag spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsartsi ka yi pad ma nor mdab la ni phyogs rnams// g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan
84a8(rgyud): rgyal byed ma// brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor mdab pad+ma la ni khab 'jug ma yi phyogs kyi char// keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi lce dang gcig
84b1(rgyud): ma dang // nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ngan ma rnams nor ma ba pad ma la sde pag mo'i mdab ma'i lha mo la'o// pad+ma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ri dwags bdag pos 'go ma ri mchen dreng ba mig
84b2(rgyud): bzang ma// rul ma bzang mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma bas 'gro ma'i chu skyes mdab la rgyal po kye// rdo rje 'dod dang rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan ur ba sI dang beka bi'i ri mo dang // ra b+hA
84b3(rgyud): zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad ma nor mdab rdo rje lag ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o// sA bi tri dang pad ma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can ma blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma// gA ya tI dang glog nyid dran ma
84b4(rgyud): dag kyang pad ma rig byed gdong ni lhag pa'i lha can la// gau rA gang gA dang ni rtag ma shin tu mchog tu myur me tau ta lA dang mtshon byed ma// dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de bzhin gang
84b5(rgyud): na dag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi mdab ma la'o// dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma drang pa'i ma dog dang 'dzin ma dang // pad+ma'i dbang mo skar mig
84b6(rgyud): dri med ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas// de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i pad+ma la ni lha min g.yo dang gshin rje ma du nga gdong drug dang // gnod sbyin brgya bin chu gter
84b7(rgyud): gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug/ ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi me tog dbyug pa ral gri shag tI dang // dbyug pa shig tu
84b8(rgyud): dag dang mdung dang nor bu dang ni be con rdo rje nyid dang me yi mnga'// khab dang bgrang dreng dag ni phyag gi mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mdar dang zhags pa dang // rin chen dag sta rdo rje dang
85a1(rgyud): / 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byeng dag gi g.yas kyi phyag tu 'gyur/ g.yon du bun dang zod pa dkar po mon pa'i nor bud ni ut+pal dang lcags sgrog dang / zhags pa chu skyes
85a2(rgyud): spyi blugs dag ni nges par g.yon gyi phyag du rim pas 'gyur mi yi bdag/ rin chen ma long dang ni de bzhin ne'u le dang bcas chu skyes rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni// pad+ma dang ni spyi blugs sbrul dang gzhu dang nga
85a3(rgyud): bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang // zhags ba rin po che dang pad+ma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha min dgra bo dag gi ra 'gyur// pad+ma'i mda' mi dag la nag pa sogs kyi nor lag chos
85a4(rgyud): rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis// mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad steng dus 'jig rten dag tu la yi/ sbyor bas rig par bya// sgor ni lha mo shing rta la gnas ral gri rdo rje
85a5(rgyud): 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas mda' yi phyag// dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug par phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang mdung gi phyag// dpal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phag na dgra
85a6(rgyud): sta phyag na rtse gsum g.yas na ste// g.yon gyi phyag na phub dang sprul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhags pa dang ni gzhu yi phyag// dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang pad+ma ri bong 'dzin po me long
85a7(rgyud): dag kyang de bzhi no// dang ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag na lag 'gro nyid dang kha T+wAM ga yi phyag/ 'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams ni rim pas rig par
85a8(rgyud): bya/ ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag pad+ma nor bu dag gi phyag/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni pad+ma karko Ta sogs dris kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams// khyi gdong pag
85b1(rgyud): gdong ma dang lce spyang gdong ma nges par g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni logs rnamasu// stag gdong ma ni dang du gnas te dur khrongs gzhi la gnas gi gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag/ bya rog gdong dang bya rgod
85b2(rgyud): gdod dang mkha 'gro bdag po'i gdong dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du// rdo rje mig dang shin tu sngon mo sa 'ogon mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye gnas gas pa'i mthar// yi dwagos dmar dang mkha' ga'ang
85b3(rgyud): bo ma harma bya glang po dang rna ba glang dang gdong lnga pa// rim pas tsA mum+b+ha la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnam su'o// lha min la sogs rnams kyang bzhin nor bdag rtse mo can
85b4(rgyud): dang chu ga ter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni// glang po'i dbang po dang lug dang na chu srin zhes dang ri dwags dang ni bye ba rim paso// b+he ru NA dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang lam gdong ni ba rog gdong la so/ 
85b5(rgyud): pa'i zur du ste// bse dang dom dang seng+ge g.yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogasu rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje mi gau gi rkang pa brgyad pa sa yi shing rta la gnas mkha' la sngon
85b6(rgyud): mo'i shing rta yi/ mkhar bgrod khro ba dang bcas khaM dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa a ni la zhes pa// 'od zar can dang tsaN+Da lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rtarnams la
85b7(rgyud): phag dang ni// rta dang glang po seng+ge bdun gyi gangs 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du'o// shar du dri dang phreng ba ma ste gshin rje chu la gnas pa spos ma mar me sgeg mo dang // bzhad ma'o gar ma rol mo
85b8(rgyud): ma ni nor sbyin sa gzhi la ste mkha'i la ge ma 'dod ma'o// snying por brgya de ni kha~M khyer la ste mkha'i dang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar// gzung ma rnams ni snam bu la ste gdengs can
86a1(rgyud): rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams kha khyer la// dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas par rengs 'dod ma// lha mo sgrol ma la sogs
86a2(rgyud): dag pa yis te srid gsum skyed ma gsod pa dang ni skyed 'dong ma// rol mo 'dod ma dang ni rgyan 'dod mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid// dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'did par 'gyur te/ 
86a3(rgyud): nges par 'khrig pa 'dod mo dag ni drug pa'o// lus la 'khrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor dang lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang // gar 'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal
86a4(rgyud): stan dag la rgyal dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang // tsa muN+Da sa / brgyad kyi ba ba rnams te de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod ma yang // kun tu gdung dnga'i tshing 'dod ma
86a5(rgyud): dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang skrod 'dod ma// reg dang dgug po dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po phur bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur// yan lag thams
86a6(rgyud): cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang // sems can rnams la slu 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga pa lhag ma za ba dang // g.yul 'dod ma dang
86a7(rgyud): sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gis kha khyer la// nyin nag so'i dus
86a8(rgyud): gang zhig cung zad san bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir// zhes pa de ltar rdo rje can gyis srid po gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs// phyi dang lus dang gzhan la/ 
86b1(rgyud): yang ni spro dang sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas// de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid 'gyur ma yin// 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par
86b2(rgyud): 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mig 'khrul ji bzhin nyid du'o// rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag pa'i den slad// sgrib thab dag ni brjed par ba ste snying por gyur pa 'ga'
86b3(rgyud): yang 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba med// gang zhig bsgrub pa sgrub pa po de 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang // de phyir rgyal po rang sems dam rnam par bral ba dag
86b4(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor dbang por rab tu ba// dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thA gas kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdoH'o// lha rnams 'khor lo a li ka la'i rigs
86b5(rgyud): skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o// rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni i yig mdang ma dag ni de bzhin gsar rnams kyang u yigo// dbus dpal ldan lta ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnams gnyis rkang pa'i
86b6(rgyud): gnas dag ma yigo/ ho yig thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas
86b7(rgyud): na/ lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po// bdag cag bsrangs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod
86b8(rgyud): rdo rje can des glu dag gisan nas srid pa gsum po mtha' rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni// gzigs nas bskyed pa mdzad dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rangag mtshan ma spros byas nas// rje
87a1(rgyud): rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang // shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba
87a2(rgyud): bdag kyang // 'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang // sgra dag sgrogs byed nyi ma'i spyan dang gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste rig byed zhal dang zhabs
87a3(rgyud): gnyis pa// shes rab thabs la rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang po brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas// rgyal ba'i dgon 'joms par byed po rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'a
87a4(rgyud): lo'i slad bskul bar bya// dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar lcags kyus bsnan byas shing // phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdangs can dag gis
87a5(rgyud): de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te// mtha' dag bsgrub par byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'di ni slar yang 'gro ba ste// gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes pa dang
87a6(rgyud): ni ro mnyam byed pa dag ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis byed// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni na mkha' dang bcas snying po'i pad+ma me yi steng du 'gyur// shar du dpal ldan nag mo 'ab
87a7(rgyud): ma mchog gi pad+ma la ni lho ru dmor mo 'bar ma ste/ byang du dbul ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o// mar ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogasu smig sgyu ma dang
87a8(rgyud): dbang ldan phogasu mkha' snang ma// rlung du dpal ljon ma ri me ma ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi gaN+DI dag dang dung // me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'phrog byed phyogasu de bzhin par gyi zur gyi
87b1(rgyud): cha la'o// shar du 'du byed dang nis bdag nges par pad+ma la gnas lho ru tshor ba chud go// byang du 'du shes dang ni me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid// me yi phogasu rlung
87b2(rgyud): dang gzugs 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes gnyis pa'o// dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshe re be dag ste rlung du 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o// lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams ni la che brgyad
87b3(rgyud): kyi gan su bdud rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams// slar yang 'bar ma phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang dri ste lho ru mig dang gzugs dag go// byeng du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni de bzhin nyid lus dang reg pa dag tu
87b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lho yi sgra yi g.yon du'o// na mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyingasu 'gyur te shar gyi sgo yi g.yon du'o// 8
87b5(rgyud): bor thabs ni drag po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyir gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur// phyi nas shes rab la sogs dag ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po rang rang pad+ma'i gang
87b6(rgyud): la'o// shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stabs te de yi phyag rgya rengs pad ma'o// g.ya su rmugs byed dang ni nga rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs bed dang ni rmu
87b7(rgyud): byed ma/ chu zungs pad dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur sgro yi dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la'o// dbyug sngan 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyar can ma brtson 'grus mtha
87b8(rgyud): yas lcags sgrogs ma// 'dod pa tsun+da shing rta la gnas lha dang nor sprin gzhan dang lho yi sgo yaM dbus ste// gnod mdzes dag spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor dang ni
88a1(rgyud): shin tu sngon mo nyid// shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang // gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi bogasu 'bru
88a2(rgyud): po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur// shar du tsA mu N+ya dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong // gshin rje phag mo dag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong dag ma
88a3(rgyud): bgags kyi mgon po'o// nub tu dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung dranges par ngas kyi gdong ma dag ni khab 'jug nyid// gnod sbyin du ni dag mo ga shin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por
88a4(rgyud): dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa/ phyi rol gyi ni dbang po'i sgo ma gas su lci min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur/ ri ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste ma dang chu lha mo ya
88a5(rgyud): yi g.ya sul// lha min bdag par dang ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mar 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha mo// rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te na sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang nongag ma'i/ dbang ldan du
88a6(rgyud): ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon ma ste nor spyan gshin rje'i sgo yi g.yon gyi char// drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub gyi sgo yi g.yon du'o// de dag rnams kyis phyag rgyar ra
88a7(rgyud): grags ri sras gshin rje maM dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mar 'gyur// phyi rol du ni lha dang gi shin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste/ pad+ma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g.yo ba'i
88a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni// me la gnas pa dog ste chu yo steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas kau ni rab tu grags par 'gyur// de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas
88b1(rgyud): rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni pad+ma chen por 'gyur// de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrongs la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste// de rnams thabs ni pad+ma la sogs gzhan
88b2(rgyud): gyi rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur// shar gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong ma// gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni swa/ 
88b3(rgyud): par phag gi gdong ma byang dbul pa dang bcas par// stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi dir ni de bzhini nyid du lce spyang dag gi gdong mar 'gyur// me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g.yul
88b4(rgyud): du bya reg gdong ma ba rgod bcas// rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkho 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar ni// 'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khru
88b5(rgyud): la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya// g.yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni mdab mo dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o// bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni
88b6(rgyud): g.yon rkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum po'o// g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g.yas brkyang stab su nges par 'gyur ba ste// sa ga la ni sa ga nyid ces bya
88b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o// dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste// rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang
88b8(rgyud): rang pad+ma'i gdan gyis gnas// gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs kyi gzhon par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas/ lha rnams mdab mar lha mo rnams ni rol pa'i stabs
89a1(rgyud): / te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid// g.yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi la ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon pa chung bdag/ byed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis bste
89a2(rgyud): mi yi bdag po de ni g.yon pa brkyang ba'i stabasu 'gyur// g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa bdag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs// yon tan dbang gis dbus me zung
89a3(rgyud): ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum pora' gyur// cung zad dbus mo dad ni 'khyog pa ril par 'gyur te lha ga ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid// slar yang rnal 'ber ba yis
89a4(rgyud): b+ha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slanga'o// cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnam sa re 'ga' na// gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal ba
89a5(rgyud): pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid 'gyur// rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchag nar bu'i phyag dug gi cod pan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yo n+tan dbang
89a6(rgyud): gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan// sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las pad+ma dang ni me las nor bu'o// rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni
89a7(rgyud): gri gugo// gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mongs dang // dag pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha' zhi ba dag laso// pub dang
89a8(rgyud): mdung dang mda' dang sgra sta dang ni Da mi ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du// da byug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges par de bzhin tho ba dang ni rtsa gsum dag tu 'gyur// gzhu dang ut+pal dang slar
89b1(rgyud): yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang dril bu dang // de bzhini lcags sgrog la sogs chun rgyu bzod pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i lpags pa ste// 'dir ni lhag mnye ba'i mtshan mas dang zhu dang sreg
89b2(rgyud): za rlung dang na mkha' las skyes pa// de dag rang bzhin yon+tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// gang zhig l-i la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu sreg za rlung dang na mkha'i
89b3(rgyud): las skyes pa// thung ngu ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyis rim pas yongs bkod nges por pad+ma la gnas zla ba dang // nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa de dag 'khor lo l-i sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi snga Da
89b4(rgyud): gang zhag kho nar mtshan ma dag par gyur pa der ni yo rnyan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur// nA da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje a
89b5(rgyud): yi go/ i yig thung ral gri ldan par 'gyur te/ slar yang raM yig dag ni phyag na rin chen no// u yig thung snang ba mtha' yasu 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni li yig
89b6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad// bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pa so// dpal ldan yum ni gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin a
89b7(rgyud): yig las skyes na mkha'i khams// rlung dang mi dang chu dngo sa rnams la ni I r-I u l-I thams cad rim pas gnas par 'gyur// mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po smoT yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang
89b8(rgyud): bsam pa ste// mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam pa'o// rin chen dbang po mA ma kI dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste// de
90a1(rgyud): bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis drung ba ring ba'i dbyangs kyis/ aM yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon+dan dbang gis a yig dag kyang phyag na
90a2(rgyud): rje'o// e yig thung na mkha'i snying po ar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying por 'gyur// oM yig 'jig rten mgon po a yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus
90a3(rgyud): la'o// a yi ga chos kyi dring su 'gyur nyenges par de bzhin AHyig las skyes sgra yi rdo rje ma/ e yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi dbye bas Ar yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma/ e yig
90a4(rgyud): gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin a la yig las skyes de ya rdo rje ma// dpal ldan bzang po che sa kyi dbang sa dang pag na rdo rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dag zung // na mkha'i
90a5(rgyud): snying po dra yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon poram rdo rje ma dag zung // sa yo snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg pa/ rnam par sel ba dag ni zung du 'gyur// de ltar rigs ni drag po rnams
90a6(rgyud): dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya// haM yig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni haHyig shin tu sngon mo'o// ha yig thung gnod mdzes
90a7(rgyud): 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig ma'o// ya lAHrim pas rab tu gsal bar shin tu stobs dang rengs pad ma ste gnyis po dag kyang zung // ra wA rmu gas byed nga rgyal ma
90a8(rgyud): ste waM dang rAHzhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur// la yaHrengs byed shin tu brtson 'grus mar 'gyur ya wa ril dbyug pa sngon po mi g.yo ba// 'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas
90b1(rgyud): brtson 'grus su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring po ste// yA wA rA lA de bzhin glang po rta dang sang+ga dang ni bag gi shing rta dag la 'gyur// dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.ye zhes
90b2(rgyud): dang khre gnyer can me brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma// 'dod pa tsan+d+ra zung du 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o// a yig dag dang aM dang rnam par ba
90b3(rgyud): ba ha dang haHdang ha hA las skyes nus ma brgyad// bum pa rnams la de bzhin haM yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur// oM hu ha A dud dang dri
90b4(rgyud): med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi gaN+DI'o// ha yig tsA mur+N+Na ste ha dang zhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o// hA dang k+Sha k+Sha kAM kAdabang
90b5(rgyud): mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma tshangs ma dpal mo gzhon nu ma// hrI hrI hU~M d+hA rgyab tu pad+ma mchog gi mdab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun de'o// k+Shi k+ShI k+Sha
90b6(rgyud): k+ShuM de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin no// shir dang g.yas dang g.yas min chung me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi pad ma la// mang
90b7(rgyud): me drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung ngu ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod pa// hi kI la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams
90b8(rgyud): kyi mda' ma la// rigs kyi dbang gos ming ni phyogs nA muN+Da la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so// tan brgya byin mu ga ter gding skye pa maHzhes
91a1(rgyud): brgya ma ro dang ni dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang // tsa NAHme dang gzhan nu dag ste tsam dpa naHzhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rdung // keng/ khya
91a2(rgyud): 'jug dus te 'breg byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang sa dang 'dir ni rnaHnyid de// tsa sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lba yi pad+ma'i yang ba mar lha me rnams kyir 'gyur/ dag pa'i
91a3(rgyud): ba sogs kyi tshes rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs// de nyid la zhon ha yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi// sde bdud
91a4(rgyud): brtsegs pa la gnas kla ya ra wa lar ldan dur khro dang du ni lha min po rnams kyi/ shes rab thabs kyi lus dang dbasam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbusu mngon
91a5(rgyud): phyogs 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzang gas kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag ra rdo rjer 'gyur// don yod grub dang na mkha'i snying po dri med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi
91a6(rgyud): snying po yang dag go// phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon// dpal ldan yum dang chos kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang
91a7(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje ma/ mA ma ki dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan
91a8(rgyud): ma dri yi rdo rje ma// khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po de nyid do// gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs dang don yod grub par
91b1(rgyud): rab tu grags rmugs byed dang ni phyag ra rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med// rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyagar rdo rje
91b2(rgyud): ngag dang gnod mdzes so// mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon+dan dbang gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o// rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grusu 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis
91b3(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba// yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid// stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chu dang sa la
91b4(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang // rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing ra nges par rab tu grags// drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje mar 'gyur rigs
91b5(rgyud): kyi dbang gis lcags sgeg pa dang reg bya rdo rje ma// 2 da zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsun+dar rab grags pa// rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yi rdo rje
91b6(rgyud): ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya// 'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar yang shin tu stobs dang bgegs dgrar rab tu grags// rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag
91b7(rgyud): tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni pad+ma'i dgra// rlung me chu sa tsA muN+DA dang phag mo dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa ste// dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrog byed
91b8(rgyud): lha min mer ni gnas pa yang // tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag med// me dang dpal ldan phyag ni rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don yang
92a1(rgyud): grub pa dang ni de bzhin nyid// mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu grags// rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin du 'gyur
92a2(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid// sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying da nu'i bdag por rab tu grags pa yin// dpal ldan pag na rdo rje dusu 'gyur
92a3(rgyud): te drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o// rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon+dan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams
92a4(rgyud): dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o// de dag rnams kyi pad mad ba la ni nor lag tshes te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams// zla ba drug ni sgra ma drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams
92a5(rgyud): kyi phyi ma yang / klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab pang ga pad+ma'i mdab ma nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma// dpal lnga na du ba bya rog gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi
92a6(rgyud): dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig sgyu ma// mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags// nag mo 'bar ma khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo
92a7(rgyud): 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan pag gdong ma// dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma lce spyang ma// de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams
92a8(rgyud): cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o// lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku// khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sems
92b1(rgyud): dpa' nges par ro yi rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid // rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa// klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum ma
92b2(rgyud): rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku// de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyi su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nang na yang // mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de
92b3(rgyud): bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur// ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbu su'o// sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku
92b4(rgyud): ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon+dan dbang gis dkyil 'khoragyi ni snying por yang dag gnas// phyi rol du ni tsA mu/ 
92b5(rgyud): la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku/ lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can ri gas can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa
92b6(rgyud): sku// gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o// sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o// 
92b7(rgyud): gsung gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o// thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni byed pa po// ye shes
92b8(rgyud): dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar pa ster ba nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla a sogs ka sogs dang // rnam
93a1(rgyud): gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pra yis rig par bya// rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte ba gsang ba/ 
93a2(rgyud): spyi bor te// 'di dag gis ni byin rlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lnga mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya// stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjesu chags pa
93a3(rgyud): laSha skyabasu 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa po yis tang swa b+ha ba at+ma ko ha brjod par bya// bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying khar chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur// rigs
93a4(rgyud): ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs
93a5(rgyud): spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// 'jigs ma la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyi sa lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// lag pa rkang pa
93a6(rgyud): tshogs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste// klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur// dus
93a7(rgyud): kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so// thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag/ rlung gi dag
93a8(rgyud): pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams/ nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud/ dung
93b1(rgyud): / dang gad+d+hi ma Ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis// bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis// 'du byed doran yang
93b2(rgyud): grub pa tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te/ gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang stobs khrag bshad pa gci ba rnam par dag pa'o// lha mo drug ni khams rnams
93b3(rgyud): kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag brgyar bcas// khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams kyis te nges par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis// tsA mud+d+ha segs
93b4(rgyud): thun brgyad kyis te pad+ma'i mdab mar gnas rnams nyi ma 'i dus sbyor chu tshod kyis// lha min la sogs nyi ma'i zla bas pad+ma'i rangab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbus kyi grangs kyiso// 
93b5(rgyud): gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyi sa klu rnams dang ni gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag/ de ba zhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang bzhin yon+tan dbang gis
93b6(rgyud): lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag/ skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag pa spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs// de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin
93b7(rgyud): yon+dan dbang gis khams kyis phye yi phyag rgya'o// rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o// dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam
93b8(rgyud): gsum sring gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las// dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o// longs spyod las
94a1(rgyud): ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus
94a2(rgyud): kyi dbye bas sad pa ste// de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas// sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so// 
94a3(rgyud): long spyod rnoT la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon+dan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kya // dag pa la ni bde bar rab 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dusu thig le grol pa gsum gyi mthar// de pir de ni nyid ma can
94a4(rgyud): dusu rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur med don du'o// g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin duni g.yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa/ de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i
94a5(rgyud): stangs dang gzhan pa g.yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las// sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mdog rol pa'i stabs dang pad+ma dang ni rdo'i gdan// namakha' sor la rab tu rgyu ba panyam dang ri
94a6(rgyud): dgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga// gtum me lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsartsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan// ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri mang glog dang mtshungs pa'i
94a7(rgyud): ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa// lte bar rnar snang mdzad la sor sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sor pa rnams// theng bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni mdzag pa gang
94a8(rgyud): de can/ shes rab chos 'thung dag la gnas pa mtha' dag sar yang spro ba byas cings par thog la yos/  tshogs can nga zhing me long dag la gnas pa la bu'i las 'khor lo rang byung ba/ 'a
94b1(rgyud): pa dang ni gzung dang gzugs reng srid pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te/ phyi nas yis me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig du ni dgug par nga // zla ba'i ma a
94b2(rgyud): slob rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gar sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa// sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te/ dga' ba la son rnams kyis rdo rje
94b3(rgyud): skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum// shes rab pad+mar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga la soT dang du gter rdo rje
94b4(rgyud): dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste// sor sdud pa soT dang rdo pad+ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur// dga' ba la so Ta rnams kyis rdo gsum dang chu skyes ro ra
94b5(rgyud): gyur pa sgom pa sgrub par 'gyur/ shes rab ste ro la gang che 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par smai/ ba pa tshan por 'gyur// dang por stong zhing byang chub nges par slar yang
94b6(rgyud): nas zla ba thig le dge ni yang dag 'dzin// de nas gzung dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnam dag gis yi ge dgod pa nyid yin te/ 'di ni spyi yi bsren pa chu yi gter gyi rdo da kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring
94b7(rgyud): po yang // 'di la tha ba ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa sgrub pa'i yan lag drag la de bzhin nyid// sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang po 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid// srog stsol
94b8(rgyud): rag kyang khri spangs rnang bcu ste dzin pa ga ni rig/ gad ba pa me la tresu ngan pa d+ma 'dzin par 'gyur dang ldan ting 'dzin khor la cin/  dbye ba lnga rnams kyis slar yang gang las maso gas rnams kyis phye ba/ sa sa sdung
95a1(rgyud): ba lus la yul dang yul car bskye rnams rirab tu 'jug pa red pa'o// bas gtan dag kyang shes rab rteg dang dbed pa dag 'a dang g.ye rang bad bcu gcig sems dpa'o// sreg gi cel
95a2(rgyud): bdag kyang lam ni gnyis po bskyal zhing dbu mar sreg ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur// thig ler sreg ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa btsem ste rtsa gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o// gtum
95a3(rgyud): me'i snga bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang na mkha' la yang rjesu dran par 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis yang shes gzugs la ting 'dzin// 
95a4(rgyud): 'di dag dpan pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gratso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum 'gred pa'i dbang gis
95a5(rgyud): las dang kun rtog mchog rnams// so ser sdud pas/ rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral bsngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis cheg// mngon par shes pa lnga 'ini thob par 'gyur
95a6(rgyud): mi yi bdag po bsam gtar sbyor bas dag pa'o// sreg gi rtsol bas dag pa ri beng can dang nyi ma dang bral bang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mched// bdud dang nyon rengs la sogs nyams shing
95a7(rgyud): stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi so// rje su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las// de nas ting 'dzin gyis dag
95a8(rgyud): pa nyin nang 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur// so ser sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na// nA da goms
95b1(rgyud): bas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje ner bur thig la bzhag nas bsgrub par ba// bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'ber rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i lta bas// bgegs mthar bad
95b2(rgyud): pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du ston pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug/ shes rab la spes zla ba thig la rdo rje ner bu gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la// ba ngon
95b3(rgyud): nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byer 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la// sreg gi rtsel ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu sbyar ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste// de las steng du
95b4(rgyud): 'ded pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa bad pa dud pa dngas par 'jig pa'i rgyu// gtsug ter sgo ni phug nas 'gren ma tshig gi bde ba'i go 'phangs dag la nges par sbyar bar ba// ru
95b5(rgyud): de med kyang rnal 'ber pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste len kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min// dngasu sreg ni rab tu zhug sa pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa
95b6(rgyud): sta pad+mar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus rab zhugs pa// bde bas ben ma ldud pa la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'bar rnams kyi rnal 'ber 'di// phag rgya'i dngos
95b7(rgyud): gru ded srid 'ang dag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o// gtsug ter du ni rdo rje rtse re lnga par 'gyur te'i ril rtse me dag ni nyos 'gyur gyi// rdo rje chos kyi 'khor le
95b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni da yi nyes 'gyur dag kyang gzhan// de yi yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te ldan skyes ling skyed rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro// de yi snying per
96a1(rgyud): de gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad+ma'i khongasu gnas pa'o// rnal 'byer pa yis nyin dang mtshan mer sreg gcod pa dag pa pa de ni sreg nyams par gsungs
96a2(rgyud): ta sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// gang zhig thams cad mkhar ba'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yi sku bar gsungs// thig le
96a3(rgyud): lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud rang bstan pa'o// sreg gi rtsol ba'i mau yi ri bang can ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o// mthe bo'i tshogs nas
96a4(rgyud): gtsug ter dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ste chos kyi da ngang gis// gtsug tor nas ni ser me rnams slar yang 'di nyid 8'gre ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ra'o// rnal 'dor
96a5(rgyud): pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dusu 'dod pa'i dngos grub ra/ bster ba// bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog pad+ma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang // 'dar dang spo dang rab
96a6(rgyud): tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu nga rgyal ba dag / rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du// rab tu gsal zhing nges pa de rnams yid
96a7(rgyud): bsrubs gnas skabasu zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su// nyin dang mtshan mor thig la dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA ma kI ta chang ma yin// go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro snga
96a8(rgyud): sha gzhan ras 'ga' dag kyang min// rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bstan pa ste// stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas re mnyam dad pa 'khrig pa
96b1(rgyud): de ni skye gnas la ma yin// ner ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang dud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'be ba med pa tshul khrims te// bzed pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus
96b2(rgyud): nyid/ bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang ldan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad// de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar dad mi skye 'theng sde gzhan pa ba'i rnams/ 
96b3(rgyud): gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa// bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig ngag gis yang dag 'gyur// ngas
96b4(rgyud): pa dang nini dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye pa rnams kyis bang // 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro/ dri rigs 'di ma ma ma su// dkar po yis ni ni ngang
96b5(rgyud): rgyas pa bad da rang gi yid la dbar po yis ni dgug dang dbang // sar/ pos rangs dang rmongs pa dang ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas/ bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o// skem dang bzlas par
96b6(rgyud): bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la 'dang sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dpe bas bsgrub par ba// phyogs ni lhag pa las byung
96b7(rgyud): dung ba dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa g.yas dang gcig shes dag ni// phung de'i bdud lha glang chen lpags pa dag kyang ma lus pa shus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin// lham ni dbang po'i khrag
96b8(rgyud): mamed pa ba mcheg phyag 'phel chi dag 'dud kyi gad gi ga/ zhon chos tsu ni ngas kyis dmyal pa gnyis lngag rgyal ba'i mgan gzhan gyi ngon du skem pa ga/ la
97a1(rgyud): zhal gcig zung gi phag gi pad ma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste// nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu 'grod pa'i dbang gis// de phyir
97a2(rgyud): lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so// gcig
97a3(rgyud): la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam sbyar ta rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las// sa
97a4(rgyud): la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs bed dri me da no re bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig pu ste// thog ma med cing mtha 'a med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni bsgrubs pa dus kyi
97a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'o// khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phag dang rig pang zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa// dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar sir rgyal po'i bdag
97a6(rgyud): po'i cod pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste// sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phag/ spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi
97a7(rgyud): thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gis phreng ba nges par bcings// dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni// zhabs gnyis dag gis 'byung / 
97a8(rgyud): po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas// 'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa'
97b1(rgyud): gcig gyur pa// bsgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// klu rnams chu skyes mdab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du
97b2(rgyud): bsgyel bas nas// zhabs dag gis gdengs can bdag po zung dang pad+ma'i mdab mar gnas pa rnams kyi 'jug ma ya~M/ rtse mi thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byeng
97b3(rgyud): pa de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru// dkyil 'khor
97b4(rgyud): 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur// rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'brog dang bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dag la
97b5(rgyud): yangs sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur/ te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis// zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi
97b6(rgyud): ba'i gzugs// dag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sprin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs// dbang du bya la bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste
97b7(rgyud): lha ni chags pa'i gzugs// rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs// zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal
97b8(rgyud): pa'i tshogs dang rgyal ba lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ dbye dang bslang ba dag kyang rang bzhin yan tan dbang gis khro ba las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ dbang sogs 'thung
98a1(rgyud): skyes rnams kyis rapa gsal lha min rigs la phur bus gdapapa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis// yum dag gis ni las rnams bdag nyi ga rdo rje'i rigs la bsad pa dan
98a2(rgyud): rnam pa yang /  seM mi ldan du ni seM gsu skyed pa da pa mas mi sgru bdug/ denams gzhi'i gnas dag du gzhi ga lagags las rnams dag sang bsgyu
98a3(rgyud): byung ba dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun tu ni 'jig rten grags// de phyir bde mnyam 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrib par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa yin/ 
98a4(rgyud): gtso bo'i thugs khar pad+ma'i dbus ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi stang du rdo rje ni// hUM yig ye shis las skyes 'jig sa dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rtsa lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya// 
98a5(rgyud): de yi dbus dzaHyig lcags kyu'i 'od zer/ mas kyis srid pa gsum pa mtha' dag bkang bas nas// rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas
98a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug bya ste// thams cad zla ba zhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi pad+mar spro bar bya// de ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs
98a7(rgyud): rab ldan pa// de yi dbu su na pa la sogs las kyi ye shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang giso// de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo 'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu steng ba nyid 'gyur/ 
98a8(rgyud): sgrub he rim pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rdzo ni do rdzo gags pa dri la bri s+t+wa~M/ oM AHhUM s+yA bzhin dugasungs zla bzhi sa rdo rje bzhin nyi du 'gyu mod do// A rI yA ponan nyid du
98b1(rgyud): gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dngas rnam so// haHhuM he pr-i nyi ma dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug du yang de bzhin gsungs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbusu A li kA li dang bcas chu yi sa bon bdag nyid chu skyes
98b2(rgyud): tedang de las rdzogs pa'i lce mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma ste zung gi phyag gi pad+ma can// glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag na chu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos ni dkar po dang // dkar ba'i rgyun
98b3(rgyud): dang ldam ning rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgom nas bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// de nas bsgrub bya bzung nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o// gtso bo'i
98b4(rgyud): bka' ni rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs rab gyes rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa yi so// bsgrub bya de ni bkru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi nus ma rnams kyis mchod par
98b5(rgyud): byed/ gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rabi gsal sgeg mo la sogs bcu yis tshim par byed// 'byung por grags pa rnams kyi 'jigs pa med
98b6(rgyud): byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed// klu rnams kyis 'dog byed cing 'chi med na chung bcu gnyis rnams kyis mkhyud pa dag tu byed// gtu mo rnams kyis srung ba bede mthu
98b7(rgyud): dog sa gzhi dag la zhi rgyas don gyi slad du'o// de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal 'bor pa yis bsgom par bya// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hrIHste u t+pa l-i kha ma bye
98b8(rgyud): bi'i mda' nyid dang ni ik+Sha'i gzhu// de las rdzogs pa nyi mo lhor gsal phyag ni gnyis gos gzhu dang mda' ni rna bi'i bar du bkang // pad+ma dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa g.yon rkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub
99a1(rgyud): bdon kyang dgrol 'khor du khro pa byud pa ste/  ma gyis kyis pas dang bral bags shing blas rnams kyis kya ni sa pa gro pas/ lham rnams kyis skye ba rgya rnams kyi
99a2(rgyud): gtsun dang pa la sa bdag gso smra/ 'byung ba rnams kyis 'jigs pa skye 'i skas mi la sogs rnams kyis kya ni se non pa 'angs/  rnams kyiman bugras nyams thams
99a3(rgyud): dang chu dang sreg za rlung rnams dag gis bcings// nus ma rnams kyis gos bral rgyags pa mtha' dag bcom zhing gtso dbo yi mi nabs la ltung bar byas// de ltar dbang du byas nas slar yang
99a4(rgyud): khyab bdag dag gis tshim par byas te de ni bsgre ba par bya// de bzhin zhags pa lcags kyu dag gis khams pa/ rasum po nas dgugs pa'i las ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur// nyi ma zla
99a5(rgyud): ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs hA yig ring po las skyes rol gri bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba bung ba'i mdog can phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa'i pag/ rnga mo'i steng
99a6(rgyud): du g.yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khres pa'i zhal ni bsgrub pa'i kham du bskul bar bya// bsgrub pa zhags pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byos te// ya
99a7(rgyud): yig las skyes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar 'grod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis bsgrub bya ni// non pa rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyi du rang bzhin gyis ni bskul bar bya// 
99b1(rgyud): ltar lha mi bdag po dag kya nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni smos ci dgos// dbye ba las yang rnga mos dam mni brtsod mang byas pa dag ni g.yas dang g.yon du bkri bar bya/ nyi zla'i
99b2(rgyud): dbus su laHzhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba'i zhal gcig pa ste mchogag gser dang mtshungs pa phag na lcags sgrog 'khor lo tsan
99b3(rgyud): ru sbrul la ni lha min gdan gyis gnas shing shin tu dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskal bar bya// bsgrub pa 'khor los 'jigs par byas nas sa la rab tu bskyil te lcags sgrog gis ni rkang
99b4(rgyud): pa bcings// dkyil 'khor du ni kun lnga khri ci rgyal po'i bdag po bka' yis 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas nas// de yi steng du bsgrub pa'i lus la lhun po mchog gi gser
99b5(rgyud): rang bzhin dgod bye rengs la ste// phur bus gang ba pa'i don du tshigs drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur bu rnams kyis gdab par bya// rmongs pa la yang sprul rnams kyis ni kun tu
99b6(rgyud): za bar byed cings lo 'gyel bar bsgrim par bya// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus dri ming glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug phram gi rang bzhin bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba'i rab tu gtu mo 'jigs dus sna
99b7(rgyud): dang mtshungs pa phyag na gri gug thod pa can// rta yi dgra yi steng du g.yon pas brkyang zhing gos dang bral bar bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya sgra rnams dag las myur du bzung zhing
99b8(rgyud): yis dkyil 'khor du ni gis kyis dman pa yang / kun du khrid dpal ldan dur khrod dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bkor yis byi rgod byo rog da'i lho spyang rnams kyis bsgrib byi'i yan lag
100a1(rgyud): kun las khrag 'thungs sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos// de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchog sa yi ga ni la bsgom par bsta bsad pa dag la'o// bsam gtan 'di yis
100a2(rgyud): brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dges// zhi dang rgyas pa la yang rigs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur// dbang dang dag
100a3(rgyud): ba liM yang dmar po lus ni sreg par bad ba mi yi sa bon bdag nyid do// dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs bai rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid// rengs pa dang ni bur bus gdab pa so/ 
100a4(rgyud): la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang ba zhin no// stong pa'i sa bon la ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang kur 'gyur te bsad dang gso ba dag la'o// sa yi zad par kun nas chu
100a5(rgyud): yi gtar du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni// nyams pa'i don to me yi zad par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don ta ma dag kyang // nyams pa'i don du tshwa yi zang
100a6(rgyud): bar du 'gyur stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min pa// glang po'i bdag po gzhom pa la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur// klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la nam
100a7(rgyud): mkha'i lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur// bse dang sang+ge dag la rkang brgyad 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can// rta yi dag la bas zhes grags pa sa yi ri/ 
100a8(rgyud): kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes// khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sdug dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya// phyi nis nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gardza/ 
100b1(rgyud): pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gan su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// de phyir rgyal po rang sems drim
100b2(rgyud): rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya// dpa' bo g.yul gyi ngasu ltung bar gyur pa zhes pa 'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dpangs pa dag/ brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo mi yi bdag po
100b3(rgyud): re sregs ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar ba// dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas// mgo dang snying kha dang ni spyi bo sta ba la sogasu yang rdo rje dgod
100b4(rgyud): pa rab byas te// thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshe nad par pos snying po'i pad+ma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang // ma dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogasu phyogs bral du ni de bzhin
100b5(rgyud): lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma// phyi rol l-i khA gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro ba 'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas// de yi g.yas min du ni yi dwags
100b6(rgyud): lag pa da ral gri dkyil 'khor las ni g.yas rkang pa'o// sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid srang bar rab bas nas// sngags pas thab kyi g.yas su
100b7(rgyud): khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa// de yi sngags ni oM hriM praM hUM phaT kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyin bsreg pa// rdo rje skyil kangs bcas nas
100b8(rgyud): 'tsho med ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo byed/ sbyin sreg rdzogs na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum po// gang zhig sgra sgrogs sa ya
101a1(rgyud): pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa pe ni 'jigs par byed pa de// bar kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka rgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed// de mabong nas ni 'jin
101a2(rgyud): pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i gong khor 'gro bar 'gyur// re sreg gnas sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste// g.yo ba med
101a3(rgyud): ba'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pa'i 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur// dpa' bo bzang po khod kyis bdag ni grub po mtha' dag smos shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi// 
101a4(rgyud): skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya// ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i da'abras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang // rkang
101a5(rgyud): ba byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyed kyis bdag la stsol// dbye dang bskyed pa dang ni sring bi gan ma pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang / 
101a6(rgyud): bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o sgra// 'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag drang bar snang
101a7(rgyud): dang lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste// de la zhon pa bag na ral gi thogs pas sa yi steng gi gnas 'jig rten bya ba byed// de phyir
101a8(rgyud): sen don gyi sla mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya// ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha ma rnams kyi'o// gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yo ga pa
101b1(rgyud): de las lhag pa dag kyang sku sa rdo ste/ de las yan lags so yan lags so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te daklags pas grub pa brgya laman// bsgom pa mchod bya bzlas byar dag rgya
101b2(rgyud): ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dpe bso// so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par dbye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o// sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin ya
101b3(rgyud): dbang gis grub par 'gyur ba ji srid nyid// pi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur// bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul
101b4(rgyud): zhugs nges ldan rnams kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya/ 'o// grub pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha'i la 'gro ba'i dzinaya ril bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ste khyi dang
101b5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sar nad rnams 'phrog par byed// de dag rnams kyi mig dang me khris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig smanas
101b6(rgyud): ni rab 'byed dang / mi snang ba dang bang du byu ba na chung yid 'brog dang ldan dung khrid du ni bsgrubs pa'i// nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang nam mu nyin nag lan dkyil 'khor ba zhengs byas
101b7(rgyud): nas skyong bdas kyang ngas byas nyid yi dbu ga yi ril bu dag gam mig sma ni mi/ byis nas shin sa tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod sdigs kyi bdus pa 'jug/  srong pa ra pa
101b8(rgyud): nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te nas blangs la bzung bar bya// 'tsho bar po nyid ni 'tshal nam pa'i phyog su gnas na ses zin 'chi 'thob par 'gyur/ lo nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par
102a1(rgyud): bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod// pho nya sbrul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur// gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug
102a2(rgyud): la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung ba la ni dge min 'gyur// po nya'i rkang pa g.yon pa mngon na na chung mar brjod g.yas pa mngan du yin skyes pa'o// lag pas rang gi yan lag dag la gang de reg pa'i
102a3(rgyud): phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste// mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtse bar nag po yang ni 'chi bar brjed// gal te snying kha'i pad+ma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni rab tu
102a4(rgyud): bsdu bar bya// dang por srung ba'i cho ga so yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la yang bde ba byed par 'gyur// sa chu me rlung de bzhin namakha 'dag kyang mthe bong la sogs la ni ngas par
102a5(rgyud): sbyar bar ba// la la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying kha kha nang dpral ba pa la/ hU~M k+Sha h+ya h+ya la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam pa thung ring po'i rab tu dpe
102a6(rgyud): ba yis/ g.yon gyi lus la sa bon thu du rna ba mgrin pa la gnas mchan khung dku dang brla phyogs la// g.yas kyi lus la gdangs can rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bsdu ba'i dpe bas
102a7(rgyud): rgyal ba zhes grags sor mo shin tu mnyam pa'i mdam bu sbrul gyi sa bon ldan pas spang byas nas// hUM k+ShaM ldan pas snying kher shin tu bsnun na myur du so yis zin pa bskyod par byedade par 'gyur
102a8(rgyud): sa yi sa bon dad la ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas pas myur du rangs par byed par 'gyur// spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can ni lto bar rab tu bcug na dag ni med pa nyid du 'gyur// dpral bar rlu
102b1(rgyud): gis bon dang stong khar no mo can gyis nges par dug ni 'a ba ste/ sru bor spong bar ga zhugs shings ni dang par gnas nges par dag ni gcod pa byed/ bral bar thig le dgar pa mas na
102b2(rgyud): rnam pa gsum gyis drug kyang nges par drug ni med par byeng // dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas 'jug pa dag ni kha dog ser pos rengs par byed// tsha ba gsum po sbyar ba'i sdeng pa
102b3(rgyud): srog ni rab tu 'bab par dag med byed la sbyar byas to// yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni TaM ga Na sbyar bya// dzA ti badz+ri gzhon che ba gsum dang lan tshwa lang ga lI dang de ba da
102b4(rgyud): li dang // brah+ni k+Sha ro a shI gan+d+ha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas ban+d+ha kato/ Ta~M ka dang // bshang ba shA dang kha ba khrag ni mnyam pa dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ril bu byas pa ni// sA ru bkod
102b5(rgyud): pas 'byung po 'am ni 'byung po'i rims dang brtan dang ltos lagro'i dag ni nges par 'jims// nyi ma la sogs gza' bdu/ na dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi
102b6(rgyud): mtha' ri ni// spen pa nyi ma'i dbas steng pa rigs ldan ma dag 'chi gzugs chu tshod de phyed ni rab tu rgyu// de la klu dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste// de nyid la ni
102b7(rgyud): sbrul gyis sos zin 'byung pos btab dang mtshon gyis phug pa gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro// nyi ma gung dang mtshan me phyed la nyin mtshan dus rtag tu rgyu ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang // tho rangs dag dang
102b8(rgyud): nyi ma nub pa la yang de bzhin du ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi chu tshod// thun mtshams dbusu steng pa chu gter dag la rigs ldan dus kyis sos zin chu tshod gcig rab rgyu// 'di dag sgra gcan gdong pa
103a1(rgyud): rnams kyin nags pa 'dus yang dag pa na ga bad// nyi ma lanim pa 'ams yo spyo nyin pa mtshan mo'i sa tan ma ma ma la// nas lcags can te na
103a2(rgyud): lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur// mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mda' mkha' dus mkha'i nar mkha' ri mkha' med dag gi chu tshod rnams// nyi ma la
103a3(rgyud): sogs las kyang gdangs can nor rnams dag gi longs spyod langs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur// mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste nor rgyas bu dang du skyong rgyal rigs
103a4(rgyud): dmar// pad+ma chen po dang ni de bzhin nyid 'jog po rje rigs mchog go gser dang mtshungs pa'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad ma dmangs rigs sprin nag dang mtshungs mthar skyes dag ni kha
