103a5(rgyud): dog sna tshog so// de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dang / kyang chu dang rtse mo can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang na mkha'i khams/ mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dpyi mthar ser po de bzhin lta ba'i
103a6(rgyud): mtsham su kha ba'i mdog// mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin mi'i 'khri shing ji srid nyid du ste// de phyir nges par kha dog sna tshogs gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa de
103a7(rgyud): nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa// bsgom ni de yi phyag rgyas gdangs can dug dang 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang nges par 'phrog/ rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma dag la nyi ma'i steng du k+Shi gi yi ge mad
103a8(rgyud): chags mgan 'an// klu yi rgyan dang ldan ning mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya/ de nas 'dab chags mgon pa'i sngags ni dang por oM yig dag dang hrI
103b1(rgyud): swA hA'i mtha' can te// de ni bye ba khrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i mdab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya// mkha' lding gAb na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang gdengs can
103b2(rgyud): bdag po'i bu rnams mngag gzhag nyid 'gyur// rab mchog sa yi stang du 'byung po gnod sbyin gdon rnams dag dang mkha 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams// sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur de gdon
103b3(rgyud): gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin brjod par byed// de phyir sems can don gyi slad dang por ma rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par ba// rig byed dang ni 'dab brgyad nyid da
103b4(rgyud): mi yi bdag po so dang chu gter dag dang gnyis skyes la// snying por bsgrub pa rang gi phyogs dang por e a zung sta i la sogs pa mdab brgyad la// e ya la sogs bcu drug
103b5(rgyud): la ste ka sogs gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu/ dang ha k+Sha gnyis skyes lo// thun mtshoms mdab ma rnams la bsgrub bye ches kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbangs
103b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams// a sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin bum pa'i dbang las ring po thung dag kyang lnga// pha rol mdab ma sum cu gnyis la bdag gi bo badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na la sogs
103b7(rgyud): yi ge rnams// de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang ni sogs las la wa ya ral dkyil 'khor rnams nyid// snying por yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can dang g.yo bar rkang pa dbang
103b8(rgyud): dang dgug pa la/ zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang rlung du mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya/ zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid pa gnom pa dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang
104a1(rgyud): du thig le'i phreng ba bsgom pa so// nas ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnasu bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yis mthar 'gro ba// de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med
104a2(rgyud): glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang // 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dmani zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsi la bskyod// ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan
104a3(rgyud): thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni lpags pa dag la khab bzhin reg/ de yi ngasu thar du sel ba mchog gi bcin thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya// zung gi rlung dag 'gags pa na ni gtsug
104a4(rgyud): tor 'u gnas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// ltar yid la rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la snong ba nyid 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin
104a5(rgyud): du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tsho/ yum// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjesu 'thun pa yid dang na mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te// 'jig rten
104a6(rgyud): gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed// phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni na mkha' la gnas pa yis// sems dang sem
104a7(rgyud): byung ba ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs kyi de ni gcig pu'o// snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya btang bya ste// yang dag rdzogs pa'i
104a8(rgyud): byang chub slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med// rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas
104b1(rgyud): ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes rigs pa bsgom par bya// srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med// sangs
104b2(rgyud): rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur// gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa// de na gtso
104b3(rgyud): bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan// ba lang bas rta glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni// bde bar bzung bgyi gang
104b4(rgyud): de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'gro ga pa ste// bslab ldan rnams kyi ba glang lpags par som pa l+li'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang
104b5(rgyud): de ni spyi de'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha ga'i rdul lo gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs// tshangs pa srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed ngag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid
104b6(rgyud): dag rig byed gsum// i yig de dag yi ge gsum sde zla nyi sreg ze de dag rnams dang yon tan rtsa gsumo// rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas sring srung na nga'i
104b7(rgyud): gzugs can te// de yi dbus gzhom med gang de yul dang rnam par bral zhing yon tan med pa'i 'gyur med do// rigs byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams
104b8(rgyud): dag la sngon brjod// dus kyis shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis 'dir ni srog chags rnams la gsod pa dag kyang bstan// mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i
105a1(rgyud): rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang sid pa gsum gyi gnas 'khor lo 'di ni byed 'dir// sngar brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyis dang por badz+ra tik+Sh+Na la sogs sngags chen bsgrub/ 
105a2(rgyud): bar bya rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsibs la bar du yang // bsgrub bya zur rnamasu ste dbusu rab 'gyur ya ma rA dzA sa do ma~M ru Na la so// de nas snying pa'i
105a3(rgyud): rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni ra ya~M k+Sha ts+yai de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur// de yi phyi rol oM hrI Sh+Ti dang bi kri tAn na las rnams gnyis hUM dang phaT du 'gyur// ra mi gnas ni ri mig bar la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrur
105a4(rgyud): bya'i ming dang sngags 'di'o// dbye dang bsad dang dang dang la ya ma rA ni rab tu 'gyur te k+She da me dos tsa sogs/ rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni
105a5(rgyud): bskrad pa la// der ni snying po dag nas ya yig 'gro/ ste yon+ta dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin// yi ge rnam sa kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyis 'khyud pa dag ni
105a6(rgyud): ma ru rab tu 'gyur// yi ge rnams kyis sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa haM dang saM dang saM du gsungs// thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab
105a7(rgyud): yi ge uru 'gyur// maM muHhaM suHmany+dzuHnyid ni pad+ma nor mdapa la ste nyi ma'i mdab ma la// phyi rol du shrI badz+ra g+ho ShaHsa dang ldan pa'i man+ta b+ha dra hUM dang phaT du 'gyur// bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste
105a8(rgyud): che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul// de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnams dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin wa
105b1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i gan ga mas rnangs kyisani rlu par 'gru/  ni ga shig snying pa'i phyogs na mod pa mi mtshugarnams byin pa'i zugs pas gyur / de la mi mi sem ni cig tu
105b2(rgyud): sgyu ma dag sa conamanyam par 'gyur ba / ga tan kus rkye ga zhig sring par skyes pas brjed pa de da ni bzhin thos// khyab ga gin mi shes nyid dang ring du bas pa dag kyang
105b3(rgyud): 'ber ba yis bsgom par bya// skyil glengs bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis// phyi rol rlung dag bkug/ ste dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbusu rab tu
105b4(rgyud): bcug pa yis// kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gro/ ga/ dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongasu bskor ba
105b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang // kha yang ba ka ba ste sne yi bu gas pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa// srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i
105b6(rgyud): glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa// dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbusu ro na mnyam par 'gyur// lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom
105b7(rgyud): bi 'brog ste'i tshib med pa nyid kyang ser/ nyi mo las ni gzhin du phyogs te nyid 'od la gnas rang gi gribs brtan pa'i mig gis blta/ phyinas rnamakhar dag la mngon par brtags na mnyam
105b8(rgyud): skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur/ zla ba drug thu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong / yong na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te na mkha'i mthil/ 
106a1(rgyud): / 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur// sol ba'o ma'i rgyun gyis mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin// sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam tshig rnam par
106a2(rgyud): bral bdag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang // de rnams gnan gyi bu ni mi bskyed don du nyin mtshan dus rang gi bud med srang byas nas// bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dwags kyi ni 'jig rten du song ba yi
106a3(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur lo// des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas// gal te rigs kyi rta yos rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan du
106a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba na// dpal yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur/ te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin// gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dusu rang rang bud med dag gi
106a5(rgyud): srung bar byed/ shi bar gyur na khyod sum khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings// ba lang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin pa de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig
106a6(rgyud): rten du ni longs spyod ster// sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mthe 'dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog/ 'dod ba'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster
106a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dusu smos kyang ci zhig dgos// yid 'ong chung ma srin mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya// smad 'tshong dam pa las kyi phyag rgyar zhing gsang ba'i
106a8(rgyud): mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste// rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya'o// smad 'tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lon mchog gi bde ba la dga'
106b1(rgyud): gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo// rang dbang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu'i lo ru 'gyur// sngon tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dzin ma dang ni glang chen rta dang shing rta du ma gser
106b2(rgyud): gyi khur sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin// 'di rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas nyi du ma gyur de nas 'dod pa'i skyon pa rab tu
106b3(rgyud): byin// gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyed byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs// grangs ma mi sa ni gas ri dang mtshungs shing 'i tshing bu dum dus
106b4(rgyud): lha yi cod pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs// smad 'tshong dam pa/ 'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bu mo lpags pa dum bu gla rtsi ste// bong bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang
106b5(rgyud): ra yis rab mchog glang chen ga po gal te rnyed pa na// chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la lha mo de la 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma yin// byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam
106b6(rgyud): 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs pa'i mthu las te// ltos pa dang bcas gnas la de bzhin rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir// snying rje dga' dang bcwa
106b7(rgyud): pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams kyis// rab tu bin na dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde 'bras ster// gang la rig
106b8(rgyud): ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi bdag po rigs byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur// gang lo rig byed tshad mar gyur pa de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas mchod sbyin chad ma ste// gang la mchod sbyin chad
107a1(rgyud): chad me de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag la 'chi ba tshad mar 'gyur// gang la 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur pa de la dmal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o// gan+da
107a2(rgyud): ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi rab gnas bzhed par gsungs// de la sman dang kha zas sbyin pa nad ni ni bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin zer// sbyin pa med ni
107a3(rgyud): gtsug lag khang 'di sa yi steng gi gnas dud 'gro rnams kyi gnasu ste// gang du dge 'dun gcig ni 'dzin par gyur pa de ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang
107a4(rgyud): dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i slad skyabs nye bar 'gro ba ste// 'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'di dang yi ge bris pa'i glegs bam chos nyid dang // dge 'dun
107a5(rgyud): ngur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba 'ja ma phrag rnams kyis ster ba min// slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas nyid rab mchogs yo gzhi la chos ni
107a6(rgyud): yi bstan pa'o// de 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjesu brtse ba ste// de 'dir rnam bzhi rna ma pa gnyis gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos
107a7(rgyud): pa dang bla na med pa'o// dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma// rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnams lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dag
107a8(rgyud): bsnyen ma dang dge bsnyen yang // bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // nyan thos rnams la mchod sngon la sogs rnal 'byor pa la
107b1(rgyud): mchog gi bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa yang // sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun du ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa// de dag bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde
107b2(rgyud): ba'i gnasu skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur// slob dpon dang ni rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa mi ni po'i nyan thos gang dag gsal bar smod byed pa// de dag bgegs kyi mgon pos bsad mchog tu 'jigs
107b3(rgyud): pa byed pa'i mnar med ni myur du 'gro// gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i ba dag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad// mi rnams dag las dge slong su zhig
107b4(rgyud): brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa ma tshungs// mchog gi bde ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum ral pa can// thos
107b5(rgyud): dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa lam nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang // 'dir ni rtag tu rang bzhin bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang // rigs dang rig
107b6(rgyud): ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dka' ba byed pa'o// sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde ma nyi ma 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid dang chags pa ste// 'di dag kun
107b7(rgyud): tu bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshel byed// zhi dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgyad dang bsnyung gnas ri las mchong ba dang
107b8(rgyud): g.yul dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchod ba so// bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste
108a1(rgyud): 'jug ngogs bsnyungs gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g.yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyim ni// grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyis yul dang bram ze'i ba bdag la shi
108a2(rgyud): mtho ri so// de yi pir na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar ba pe yin// gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal ba las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa zos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang // slar
108a3(rgyud): yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyi du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te// gang na khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun tu rgyu bar byed// de pir mi
108a4(rgyud): rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du bang na hA nga bar bya bar mi 'gyuraro// rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la sbyin nga tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzo
108a5(rgyud): pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi// sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yis skye ba
108a6(rgyud): 'di la ste// gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjesu 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro/ sa dang dpal 'byor slad shin tu g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag/ 
108a7(rgyud): bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag pa ni ldan g.yul du rab tu zhugs pa na// glang chen tshogs pa mthing nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag na
108a8(rgyud): lhung gyur pa// de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji ltar de bzhin nyi du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o// sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la
108b1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// rang byin rlabs pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang // dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga'
108b2(rgyud): ba chen po'i sems kyiso// ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o// me ni dngul chu'i ngag nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral no nam yang dngul chu
108b3(rgyud): 'ching ba med// ma bcings na ni gser dang bral na smra po rnams la long skyod med pa nyid// de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag kurna la 'byor ba rnams dag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur/ btsas pa
108b4(rgyud): med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min// bskyed mos tshal lam ri bai ri dwags bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// dag po rnams
108b5(rgyud): ni dag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gan su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang // dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas ma cho ga gi sa la bde ba pag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la// 
108b6(rgyud): gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur// khyim dang gong du bgang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan me'i dus sngags kyi bzlas pa
108b7(rgyud): byas nas ni// ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa brjod par byed// gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes
108b8(rgyud): pa min pa nyid// rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin// bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams
109a1(rgyud): dang gdan rnams dang // sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang bskul ba med par yang // bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog
109a2(rgyud): khab bdag bde ba phag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed// de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dusu rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i slad bsgom par bya// rang gi sems ni rgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi
109a3(rgyud): yo bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur// sad la 'ango bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin// ngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa
109a4(rgyud): rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba min// gang zhig/ mkha' ye shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster/ oM AHhuM ho rim par gnas pas
109a5(rgyud): dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya// rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom pa byas nas ni// snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag
109a6(rgyud): bad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la// phyi rol du ni zur gsum byas nas de yi dbus nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o// de yi dbas 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo sid gsum
109a7(rgyud): gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas// mthe bong dang ni mang med dag gis nyin zhig so so'i dus tshim par byed pa la sogs bya// yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thigs mar
109a8(rgyud): 'dir ni gtor ma dang bi dbus mtha'i ming gos te/ 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang srar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o// pho nya ma rnams dag la zas kyi bud ni sa steng rnam
109b1(rgyud): su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin/ 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshogs bcad 'di bkla'o// mgo dang mgrin pa'i snying kha lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi
109b2(rgyud): rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dge de// gnyis ka'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la/ lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rje ste dpag
109b3(rgyud): pa rnam pa gnyisu 'gyur ba ste// mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mngon sum min na rjesu dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa
109b4(rgyud): yis ni brtags pa gang // de ni ri mo sogs la blta/ bya yongasu ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom pa'i don// ga/ zugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la
109b5(rgyud): ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya// na mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems mtshangs med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa// lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang
109b6(rgyud): gis ji srid nyid brtan par gyur gyi bar// de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid rab tu 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig
109b7(rgyud): 'di rnal 'byor po rnams dag la gsungs/ byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos sbas// de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dusu rnal
109b8(rgyud): 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// phyag rgya'i dngas grub don slang rgyal mchog gi bskyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o// pal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dang mo
110a1(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo las// sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa
110a2(rgyud): dag ni cung zad shes// slar ying bdag ni nyan par 'tsha lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag go rigs drug A li kA
110a3(rgyud): li dag la gnas pa nyid// zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dge bas dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs// ka bo rnams dang rdo rje drang ba sa yi dkyil 'khor
110a4(rgyud): rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod/ sha\u0f89\u0fa4gan dang ba shang ba rnams kyis lha dang ga shi na nor sbyin ga/ dan du rdul tshon gdang pa ste/ mkhris pa bdakan gyis ni nyi ma
110a5(rgyud): bong can yang de bzhin du skyes rnams kyi chu skyes rnams// rab lnga yi ra khA sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha' les skyes rnams kyiso// dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes
110a6(rgyud): g.yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs lpags pa la sogs kyis// nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng bas de bzhin nyid// dur khrod brgyad du 'al
110a7(rgyud): lo g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis// ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas// de ltang
110a8(rgyud): nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnams ma dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs// gsung gi rdo rje sa sogs gsogs lha yi rnam po nyid na mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnam
110b1(rgyud): kyis// stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyis srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid// de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no// sde
110b2(rgyud): ba ka la sogs pa drug po rim pas yongasu bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis// rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste// slar yang sde pa re ra
110b3(rgyud): la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis de bya// so sor yi ge'i dbye ba sa drang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha'i dngos po dag laso// dang por stob pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang ba
110b4(rgyud): nya Na ma na dang thA dang dang po'i dbyangs// rlung gi da ba i yaug g+ha dz+nyA D+ha b+ha d+ha sha rnams te me yi dbye bi ril sag/ sa// chu yi dbye ba u yig khA kha tsha tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye
110b5(rgyud): ba li la sogs// de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i ra~M/ ni rnam pa lnga yis ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye// ga/ tsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang
110b6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o// a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams// 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar
110b7(rgyud): ldan 'jig rten 'das pa'o// rigs sngags 'chang gis dbang po mtha' dag du 'gyur ga sogs sde pa 'irtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams// kau sagos yi ge sum cug yang wa la ldan
110b8(rgyud): k+Sha dang bcas pa sum sun drug nyid// dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ri yos bsgyur ba'i ri ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnam su 'gyur// sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor
111a1(rgyud): bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu dag nyid// dungangadra
111a2(rgyud): kyi grangs kyis bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa dag bdag nyid de// ya la sogs pa rnams kyi sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid
111a3(rgyud): kyiso// khro bo dag tu ha sags kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogasu gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis// so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i re ni rnal 'bor ma dang
111a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor rgyud// de bzhin yi ge so sor yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste// phung po 'byung ba dbang po la so/ gas dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni
111a5(rgyud): sbyang bar bya// stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams rgya yis gdab pa ste// gtsu ga te ri nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam pa yi rigs
111a6(rgyud): lo 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o// rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis// de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan
111a7(rgyud): yang de bzhin sku rdo rje la sogs kyis// sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can/ yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lngam
111a8(rgyud): dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o// sa bon gcig pu dpe' bo tsog pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams so// 
111b1(rgyud): rnams kyis byin gyis grangs pa dgu pa yang // bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'dzin nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid kyang // de bzhin so na rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams
111b2(rgyud): ngag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can// dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad+ma'i mtshon ma 'od dpag med// nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas
111b3(rgyud): 'gro ma mA ma kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// drag mo chu gtar tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas// 'di dag dang ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog
111b4(rgyud): gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyi spros pa'o// tshes la yang da ga dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad ma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol ma dang // mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang
111b5(rgyud): shin tu stobs bcas tsartsa ka dang lcags sgrog ma// bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyo gdong ma dang bya rog bcas// de dag nges par
111b6(rgyud): byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs rin chen 'dzin dang gos dka
111b7(rgyud): moHsa yi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong dag ma yi lha// gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang bag gdong ma dang ba
111b8(rgyud): rgod bcas// 'di dag dpal ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o// lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshung
112a1(rgyud): pa'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang // spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ma rab mchog mi yi bdag po rangs byed dri yi rdo rje ma// 'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi
112a2(rgyud): gdod pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun// gtso bo yos ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la pani rnams spros pa'o// gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag
112a3(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te na mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan// bsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag
112a4(rgyud): bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yis rdo rje la sogs pa yang // ste/ nga dang 'og du yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o// phyogs kyi
112a5(rgyud): mdab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral me la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste/ nyi ma'i steng du g.yon brkyang u ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnam zhing 'jigs pa'i dus kyi sprin
112a6(rgyud): dang mtshungs// thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yo gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka/ phag rgya sbrul dang stag gi lpags pa mi bzang glang po'i bdag po'i lpags pa bshus
112a7(rgyud): pa rlon pa 'dzin// gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyis phyi rol du ni 'khor lo gsum// rdo rje dag ni khro bo las skyes phag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes
112a8(rgyud): rnams kyis// sgor ni gtu mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro// dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed pag na rdo rje Da ma ru dang dril bu rdo rje kha TA ga/ dpal ldan dang
112b1(rgyud): pe'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te// zhing dang tshano da ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrodas ni me dang rlung gi dbusu yang // de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la
112b2(rgyud): ni bigs dang bogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste// shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas spras pa'o// snying por 'khor lo cha dag pa ste dkyil
112b3(rgyud): 'khor las ni byad kyi cha rigs zla nyi pad ma la// rdo rjeka pa'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po// phyi rol du ni ri ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba 'i/ 
112b4(rgyud): ma'i gdan la gnas// sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas pa/ zhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun naso// 'di las gas pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'bor rgyud kyang 'dus pa
112b5(rgyud): rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste// zur du khro bo rnams dang logs yul dang yul can dza b+ha la ni phyog na sa pa bsnams// ngagadang rkang lag bshang lam b+ha ga nyi ma'i bong cen
112b6(rgyud): rnams dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin te// sheshis rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// snying por 'khor lo chu gter zu du 'gyur te mi yi
112b7(rgyud): bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha// phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'bar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad// phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni po/ 
112b8(rgyud): bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te/ der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnan byang chub sems dpa' mtha'i' dag rnams// sgyu 'bral nga ba dbye ba gsu
113a1(rgyud): ste zhal gsum ro lo pag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las// rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gis g.yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// rnal 'bor rjesu
113a2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' go ma rnams kyis// 'khor lo drug dang rigs dag mi bdag dur khrodang sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// thig ni drug dang
113a3(rgyud): bug pa'i tshe shas g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas// snying po las ni drag dag cha rnams kyis ta pad+ma'i mdab ma pad kyis lte bar ldan pa yang / 
113a4(rgyud): gr-i gug 'khor lo cha skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i bre rab gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis// nyi ma rnams kyi sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni
113a5(rgyud): sha laM sa// gsum gyis kyang ni rab lnga yi ra khA rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu'o// nyi ma rnams kyis log dang 'gam ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka bo'i steng du/ 
113a6(rgyud): babasod phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu ske na brgyad rnams pa ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o// dbus chu skyes sna tshogs mdag ste lte ba la ni nyi ma'i bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan// 'kha
113a7(rgyud): lo dang ni phreng ba sngon po sa ni ljang ku dag dang sa gzhi nag po'akhor lo ser// sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser po sngon po
113a8(rgyud): dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang ku'i mdog tu 'gyur// cha dag gis ni tshon gyi sa ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhi no// phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams
113b1(rgyud): te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad// mdab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyud de mdab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams// phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du
113b2(rgyud): gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad// de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu me dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// ring po thu'u'i dngangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa Ta tsa ka saM sogs stong sogs yi
113b3(rgyud): ge rnams// rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring pos sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams// steng sogs rtsi bos la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis thung rung rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi
113b4(rgyud): steng du'o// sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha k+Sha dang ldan na mkha'i mthil na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams// mkha'agro ma rnams thung ba 'i dngos po ri bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag na gri guH
113b5(rgyud): thod pa can// g.yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni lha min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste// rkang pa rkedapa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag pa g.yer
113b6(rgyud): ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgyu// mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yis phreng ba'o// mkha' go zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang Da ma ru deng rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dril du
113b7(rgyud): mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dang dang nges dang ni nor bu'o// dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdung phyag la phyog gdub dang ni ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te/ rdzogs
113b8(rgyud): pa'i thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya// gtso bo'i dbul thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgon par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o// zla
114a1(rgyud): phyed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i lpags pa'o// zla nyi sreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la
114a2(rgyud): thal ba ste// phyag rgya kA yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' go ma la'i ngag byed// phyogs kyi mdab mar mkha' gro rnams kyi lag pa Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid/ bshang gci
114a3(rgyud): khrag dang mi sha rnams kyi phyogs dral mdab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang pag na'o// de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o// ser dang dkar po
114a4(rgyud): dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang ku'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang po gsu// rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtsha na ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs/ 
114a5(rgyud): phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang gzhin rigs kyi dbang gis rig/ par bya ste kun na so// sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung ba yul/ dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa
114a6(rgyud): dang phyogs sa bogs kyi stobs dang dang ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar ba// lhun po'i phyogasu dbye ba brgyad kyis phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang
114a7(rgyud): nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang tsha na da ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtsham su ste// 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nya ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang // nus
114a8(rgyud): dang gtso bo'i nyin cig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las// rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed tham pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te// rlung dang dbang ldar lha min
114b1(rgyud): me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod spyon nub tu yang // gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang sna
114b2(rgyud): du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nis ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis pa ri/ gtso bo'i tshe skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa// kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam
114b3(rgyud): pa'i gnas te ngas ni thams cad// zla ba zhub bla ma'i zhal de ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo nga nyid// bdud rnams kyi ni dusu gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag
114b4(rgyud): go shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha 'gro ma dang mkha' go'i mang // rdo rje gsum pa rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang mtha' mar
114b5(rgyud): phye ba bzlas pa ste// srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig ga/ nyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes 'thun pa'o// ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' gro ma dang rdo rje
114b6(rgyud): mkha' ge rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dusu dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mngar gyur pa// de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi
114b7(rgyud): dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams// rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid po gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can// bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas
114b8(rgyud): brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o// lnga gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las// gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bang can gyi
115a1(rgyud): gdan ni gzhan pa rnams// nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams te// 'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam
115a2(rgyud): gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnamaso// zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad+ma'i mdab mo sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te// slar yang rkang pa gnyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can
115a3(rgyud): gyi gdan rnams nyid// rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te// nyi ma 'am ni gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo
115a4(rgyud): yang na kha sbyor la// rlung la reg bya'i zhal gci ga dang ni yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyi sa pa'o// rtse mo can la gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis
115a5(rgyud): 'gyur te rgyas gdag zhal ni gsum pa'o// tshul zhal yang reg bya dang gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdang / zhal ni bzhi pa'o// sa la dri la sogs pa rig phyi'i mtha'
115a6(rgyud): yi yon tan zhal ta rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga po'o// na mkha' la ni zhal yang snang ba rnam pa lnga ste rgyu yis gdab pa'i zhal ni dag pa'o// de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan
115a7(rgyud): dbang las stong pa dag gi zhal rnam so// gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsreg pa lnga/ shes rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa
115a8(rgyud): gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi// thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum// dus sbyor byed pa phyag gi
115b1(rgyud): ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni// thun mtshams cha shas snga phyi las te zhal gsum yi bag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'i cha shas la// shes rab sbyor dang snyoms
115b2(rgyud): par zhugs pa dag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o// shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje can gyi g.yon
115b3(rgyud): mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o// mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye bo g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur// 
115b4(rgyud): dag po g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid// shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs
115b5(rgyud): ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tsho gas nyi de// g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku dag
115b6(rgyud): zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang // nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang ku dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas// dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar po dmar po rnams kyi ri bong
115b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid// ser po rnams kyi kha dog nag po dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gsar dang mtshungs pa'o// sngon po rnams kyi kha dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang ku
115b8(rgyud): rnams kyi sngon po rnams de bzhin gsungs// de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rig phyogasu gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya// shes rab brgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes rig
116a1(rgyud): pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal na so// g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi zhal nas bya ba la sogaso// shar nas rnal 'bor spyod pa nyid de slar yang
116a2(rgyud): nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dgo// mdo sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srung shar gyi zhal na so// shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de
116a3(rgyud): slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud// g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos// rgyab nas 'bral la ldeg
116a4(rgyud): pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang ra tu gnas pa ste// g.yas nas rigs pa dag po min dang slar yaM/ nga rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi bdag/ stong pa'i zhal/ 
116a5(rgyud): nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyi sa ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs
116a6(rgyud): ba'i dbye ba las// de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgod pa'i dbang gis thun mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang // kha zas dag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang
116a7(rgyud): rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste// mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid// rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs
116a8(rgyud): rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o// rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge
116b1(rgyud): 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi zhal naso// mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dad 'gro rnams ni nges par smros// g.yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i
116b2(rgyud): zhal nas dmal ba rnams dang lha min rnams// mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying kha'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgya ba zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas// g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas
116b3(rgyud): 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas// 'khor lo rnams kyis zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang
116b4(rgyud): rgyal ba bskyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang / dag go// dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu shel rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba// de bzhin 'jig rten du ni
116b5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la rten thams cad mkhan pa'i chos 'dzag ste// chu ni sa boni khams la kun tu brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni// sems
116b6(rgyud): can rnams kyi dag pa'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu laM so// srid gsum gnas ni sems can don gyi bad po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med// sems
116b7(rgyud): la gnas de mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste// yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mo dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thad rab tu sbyor/ 
116b8(rgyud): sems de dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig pa// gang gis myu gu 'di bskyed bskyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur
117a1(rgyud): nyams pa de yis skyes pa rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi bskyed pado// snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min// 
117a2(rgyud): gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde nas bde la rdzas chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes chags pa min// pung
117a3(rgyud): po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis bskyed par byed pa ste// dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o// dag pa'i sa
117a4(rgyud): la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin// sa dang chudang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste pra rab dag ni rnam pa drug/ dri la sogs pa re sa dman
117a5(rgyud): zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma ye shes lta bya na/ mas// 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong can te mtha' 'am chos kyi dbyings/ 
117a6(rgyud): rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o// slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas// phan
117a7(rgyud): chun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa// phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gis// rnam
117a8(rgyud): pa zad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi dga' ma phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas// de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku// rdo
117b1(rgyud): 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang // longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la
117b2(rgyud): chos sku yis// stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par ste// me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams
117b3(rgyud): kyis// 'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun// kun nas na mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa
117b4(rgyud): la ston par byed// de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig/ bu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyuro// de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams
117b5(rgyud): kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di// rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o// de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las
117b6(rgyud): gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min// 'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbangasu rab tu zhugs pa la'o// mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnam
117b7(rgyud): dang na mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang // gnas dang skyes dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba dag tu sems can kun// sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying
117b8(rgyud): rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te// 'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag bas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin// spu dang lpags
118a1(rgyud): pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang ni rkang dang rtsa// de dag rnams la srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus nyi ma zla ba'i bgod pa'o// zla ba'i dbusu dri med nor bu bzhin
118a2(rgyud): du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste// de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i gi 'phong khyab pa gzhi mi mdo// spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus
118a3(rgyud): la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa rnams// sde pa dag dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster// de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i
118a4(rgyud): rnal 'byer ba rnams kyis ni bar po'i slad btsal bar bya/ lus las ma gtogs gang zhig kheb bod thar ba ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min// sems can
118a5(rgyud): rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin// de rnams mnyes par/ byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod de rnam par mi rtog
118a6(rgyud): pa la so// rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba ngu 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'go bar 'gyur// de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhos dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o// / 
118a7(rgyud): sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs semasu 'gyur// mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drag po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs sem
118a8(rgyud): su 'gyur// dus kun du ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyisu 'gyur// thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni zad dusu bdud kyi sems// 
118b1(rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi gnasu bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed// bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog du 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan/ 
118b2(rgyud): bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gos gzhan gyi snying la 'jug/ de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' yas dus 'jug par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnam
118b3(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin// sangs rgyas rnams la lhun skyes lus kyi dbang gis khwa ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med// las kyi
118b4(rgyud): sar ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes 'thun chad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed// gal te tshad 'di dag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes
118b5(rgyud): brjod par 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung // skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing
118b6(rgyud): g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa// sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa// de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lha ni skyes
118b7(rgyud): bde ba dag kyang ring // nim pa'i shing las rgu ni 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang // stong pa las ni myang 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog cha Da
118b8(rgyud): gsod las grub pa rnams// mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min// rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med
119a1(rgyud): bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min// sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// bsod
119a2(rgyud): nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin rlabs pa'o// gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par
119a3(rgyud): 'gro byed pa// de phyir bdud rnams nyi mas sa'i dus de dag rnams la du ma yis ni bgegs rnams byed// rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slad dang por las kyi phyag rgya
119a4(rgyud): bsten par bya// de nas nyi me'i gzugs ni lus dngag/ deng dang rkang pa gi tsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste// glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes 'thun 'bo mang bde ba bskyad
119a5(rgyud): par pad ma mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs// rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus kyis dbyings ni de nas 'gyur 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras sngar phyug
119a6(rgyud): rgya bozhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang // mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang po thams cad ni dus kun tu// shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jog
119a7(rgyud): rten lam las rab gol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing // lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya// rlung ni yang dag phrang
119a8(rgyud): pa rnams kyis glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed// thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di las mgrin pa snying kha la son lte ba gsang ba dag la 'gog/ thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor
119b1(rgyud): bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'god pa gang // de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde na'o// de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos
119b2(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyis ster byed de// srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas// rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal
119b3(rgyud): 'byor rnams kyi skye bo 'di las te// gal te lam du rab zhugs 'chi bar 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o// gang zhig yon tan med cing dngas chung yul dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag
119b4(rgyud): rgya rnam pa gnyis// de nas chags pa rjes chags dang / ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis// gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon+dan la
119b5(rgyud): dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te/ brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' das dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi lo// rin chen dbang po mi 'byung
119b6(rgyud): bar du rgyal ba mchog bskyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya// rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dasu mtha' dag yon+tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas// sangs rgyas byin
119b7(rgyud): rlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste// gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya// de la gang
119b8(rgyud): zhig pu ru gyur pa rgyal ba bskyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig chen bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur// de nas gzhan
120a1(rgyud): ma me tog gsum gyis pad+ma dkar 'dzin dzaM b+ha la dang phag na rdo rje ste// me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul che ldan khro bo'i
120a2(rgyud): rgyal po rnams// zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu bskyed pa ste// lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste// de nas
120a3(rgyud): stong pa dang ni rig byed bar du cung zad snying stabs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur// slar yang lo nyu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'gas chung ba'o// de nas skye
120a4(rgyud): gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o// de nyams pa las dbang ma yin// 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa/ la ni shes rab dbang skur rgyal po'i bdag po'i gsung gis
120a5(rgyud): sbyin par bya// de dag rnams kyis sa chu me rlung namakha' yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya// byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sen don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras
120a6(rgyud): mang por 'gyur// gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste// skyugs pa snying kha gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs
120a7(rgyud): minas bshang ba gcig khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus rab tu zhugs pa ste// 'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan/ 
120a8(rgyud): shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsung bar bya// de yis sems can gang dag su zhig 'byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sede'i nyid// de phyir
120b1(rgyud): de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug/ shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar don du 'jug par byed// mchog gi bde ba la gnas
120b2(rgyud): rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar da chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya// gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlab pa rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje cha skyes dag nas gzhug pa rang gi rdo rje'i
120b3(rgyud): snying khar ye shes 'khor lo rib bcug ste// 'di yi 'od zer rnams kyi gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed// gal te 'od ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor ba la ni
120b4(rgyud): yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya// shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bas rang ba'i don du dgod par bya// shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas
120b5(rgyud): gcig pa la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs/ sangs rgyas sku// gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dag 'byed g.yon can gyis gsod par byed// srid pa gsum
120b6(rgyud): gyi bdag pos dag po'i las kyi rang bzhin da ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsung ba gang // de dag thams cad bad kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la na yang ma
120b7(rgyud): yino// gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhig gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa// de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsang ba'i
120b8(rgyud): don du de dag sbyar bar bya// mkha' gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yis gsol ba gdab mi bya// sems can rnams ni srung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi
121a1(rgyud): bla mas 'jig rten khamasu spros pa ste// dper de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dusu srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed// bsgrub pa dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar
121a2(rgyud): gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin// skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bran tshegs rig pa la rjes chags// rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha'
121a3(rgyud): dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o// zhes pa'i bsam pa rko ma chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmal bar rab tu 'jug/ rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab
121a4(rgyud): gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'a drug/ shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skye sa po'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa/ shes rab thabs kyi rang
121a5(rgyud): bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dpe ba las// 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can de mi'i don ni byed pa po// sen rnams
121a6(rgyud): ni smin pa'i slad slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di na dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru ka ni byung bar gyur// gdug pa rnams/ 
121a7(rgyud): ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don// rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad// bgegs
121a8(rgyud): rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gi don yod grub par byung bar gyur// zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' go mar byung gyur// gti mug
121b1(rgyud): dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgya la so// chags las de ni gos dkar zhes pa mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni drag dog las// sna tshogs gzugs can
121b2(rgyud): gnyis pa 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thaMd yang byung bar gyur// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa rtse ba yis// nges pa rnam par ma bsgrus
121b3(rgyud): bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnam sa ni smin pa'i don du deste// gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad // 
121b4(rgyud): gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog gi nges ba can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o// sems canarnams ni smin pa'i slad sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnam
121b5(rgyud): kyis dus kun tu// nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur// phyi rol sna tsha gas phyogasu 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung ni
121b6(rgyud): rab tu rgyu ba'i// khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag lo rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun me'i b+ha ga la// sgo la sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhan ni de bzhin
121b7(rgyud): kho na'o// gang zhig e waM yi ge las gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhags pa'o// gcig pu rdo rje can ni dpe ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams kyis kyang bsko
121b8(rgyud): ba'o / 'dus gsum gnas gsum du zhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slada'o// rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di
122a1(rgyud): ltar bdag gis shes pa ste// rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying kha'i chu skyes lte gsang dang // bud med rnams kyi b+ha ga rare de ni thig le gel ba gsum gyis
122a2(rgyud): mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa// de 'dir sangs rgyas zhang du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya// skye ba snga mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs
122a3(rgyud): dngos po rnams kyi ni// bag chags stabs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni da mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang giso// don gci gad ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyis sreg
122a4(rgyud): chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug/ gnas can rnams kyi ba sad nams sla 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam bair rgyur gshegs// dang 'gro yi drags lnga min
122a5(rgyud): rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnam sa la/ byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang / rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung byed cing // rang
122a6(rgyud): skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po mtshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa// 'di ni bad mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yi no// sangs rgyas
122a7(rgyud): rnams kyi'ang rtogs pa min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni// srid pa gsum gyi gnas bdag nyid ston par byed brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyida'o// sna tshogs dngos rnams
122a8(rgyud): kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa/ 'di ni ma skyes chos te tshul na mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o// rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul
122b1(rgyud): dang yul can rnams kyi bgod pa min pa rnam pa thams cad pa// gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o// rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can
122b2(rgyud): rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dgas la gnas// dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drag dang bzhi rnams
122b3(rgyud): nus ma bcu po de dag rnamasu gsungs// de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams// bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rje'i
122b4(rgyud): tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams// phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa dag ste srid gsum bskyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o// 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang / 
122b5(rgyud): bzhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni// pad+mAn+da/ nyin mongs zad pa ril gi rdo rje dag kyang ye shes skye chenan/ par mi phyed pa'o// mi shes gcod pa gri gug
122b6(rgyud): mchog gi rigs dag rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa// phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya// gang dri ngas
122b7(rgyud): par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugasu gsungs// gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid gyur pa de ni tsherab chen por gsungs pa ste// gang du 'khor
122b8(rgyud): ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid gyur pa rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o// gang du 'khor ba 'phel baM nyams pa nyid gyur pa dag ni rdo rje 'du shes kho na'o// gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skangs
123a1(rgyud): nyams nyid gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs// gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid// 'di dag rnam par
123a2(rgyud): snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams// gzhan ni khams drag dbye ba rnams te sa dang rga dang me dang rlung dang na mkha' zhi ba rnams// gang du gti mug mtha'
123a3(rgyud): ngag nyams pa nyid gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin pa'o// gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid gyur pa mA ma kI ste de ni na nyid do// gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid gyur pa gos
123a4(rgyud): dkar ma ste de ni me yin no// gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyamasapa nyid gyur pa sgrol ma yin nyid ni rlung yang // gang du zhe sdang maH'dag nyams pa nyid gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dang
123a5(rgyud): phyug ma ste mkha'// gang du ser sna thaMd nyams pa nyid gyur pa sna tshogis yum ste de ni 'gyur med do// mthong dang ma mthong ba/ zugs ni yid dang ni mkha' la yang lta bar byed
123a6(rgyud): pa gang yin de ni mig/ ring nis sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o// mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i di ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang ngo po// rang gi
123a7(rgyud): zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yi ni da ni lte// rdo rje'i rag bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste// thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs lnga
123a8(rgyud): bad mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos// dbye ba dag gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams// gzugs la gzugs la so// 
123b1(rgyud): pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni// dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs pa ste// khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis
123b2(rgyud): gzung ba dang ni mtha' dag 'go ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min// ye shes dgugs pa byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs bod kyis// rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par
123b3(rgyud): mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang // ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo na mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shug/ sa kyis byed pa ste// de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni
123b4(rgyud): rab gas lengs par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o// srid pa gsum gyi gnas bdad rnams ngag la bsnun pa nges paradabyug bsngan pos byed pa ste// bcing ba khro ba ma
123b5(rgyud): g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni pur bus gdab// 'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gan la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyiso// 
123b6(rgyud): gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phral nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams// yi dgas rnams ni smin pa'i don de de nas rtsartsi kA la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste// skye bo rnas
123b7(rgyud): ni srung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du// klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros// lha min rnams
123b8(rgyud): ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros// gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar// sems
124a1(rgyud): can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya// de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang / khyor
124a2(rgyud): dbye ba ste// 'dir ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o// gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin
124a3(rgyud): da // shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang // de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lom gyi rgyu ru bstan
124a4(rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang ging mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mtsho ga la rjes sbyor ba'o// sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan
124a5(rgyud): lta bu nyid// gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras pa/ nga sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bste/ na bya ste// ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs
124a6(rgyud): yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing // lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed// shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi
124a7(rgyud): snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid 'gyur// dbang ni de med 'i bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa// de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig
124a8(rgyud): skyes pa gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste// sangs rgyas zhil 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o// na mkha' ra kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzum rdo'i
124b1(rgyud): lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis// steng pa las ni du ba smig sgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur
124b2(rgyud): de yi dbus sangs rgyas gzugs na yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'bor pa yis bgad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste// re khAn
124b3(rgyud): po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsal mthong bar gyur gyi bar dri'o// de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni tshu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te// rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rna
124b4(rgyud): bral ba dag gi sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid// thugs ni mthing bar gyur na nyin nag so so'i dusu srog gi rlung ni 'gog pa rab bya ste// 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la
124b5(rgyud): yongasu bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o// zla ba dag gis sdom brtson rnams kyi reg pas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems 'gyur// chags dang chags bral
124b6(rgyud): mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi gangs 'ape'o// oMT+TA 'bar ba'i bar dang khad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes dag gi dbus// gnyid dang gnyid yur
124b7(rgyud): 'tshams rdo rje pad ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang // de yi 'phel ba rab tu ba ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med// nyon mongs bdad rnams bcom
124b8(rgyud): nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'bor bzang po'o// sa yi rnam pa srab min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gshor ba nyid min phyir// me yi rnam pa me min g.yo ba rlung
125a1(rgyud): lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba min pa rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha deg min// rnam pa zad pa yang blta ba min
125a2(rgyud): tarang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu la se// nA da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas son pa lug rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa// srog dang thar sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma
125a3(rgyud): / rdorje chu skyes ldan pa nyid// rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbusu yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste// du ba las gas rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang ga
125a4(rgyud): zhig 'di dag zad gsang bar bya// dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la ba cing // phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang
125a5(rgyud): mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang // pad+mar rdo rje'i sgra 'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad ste// sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chib
125a6(rgyud): 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal// sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o// rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru
125a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni// rnam pa zad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku// ye shes las ni rdzu 'phraphrul dngos ga du 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di
125a8(rgyud): nyid la'o// 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid// 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog go bod ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni oMn+d+ra
125b1(rgyud): nyid/ dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di ni// gsung dang thug so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer
125b2(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur// gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho
125b3(rgyud): na'o// yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig len da rim pa yis// bde'i byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o// sad pa dang ni
125b4(rgyud): rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gnan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni// lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhan pa yul rnams rnam par spyod cing g.yo med sems la zhen pa ste// ye shes
125b5(rgyud): la gnas bud med rab tu 'gogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur// sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par
125b6(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur// de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus te// rnal 'bor dbang po rna mas kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khab byed dag ni
125b7(rgyud): thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya// thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang // de phyir 'khor ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis tha~Md dusu do
125b8(rgyud): bar bya// gang phyir a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing // hUM yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongasu gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod
126a1(rgyud): de/ 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni// rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma
126a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'di la'o// l-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams// phan tshu ni dbye bas pe ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu mo'i dbu
126a3(rgyud): ni 'bab pa ste// dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams// slar yang than mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbu
126a4(rgyud): rnams 'bab// de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu mo yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs// ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dpe bas rab tu gsal
126a5(rgyud): bar dgu brgya nyid// dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i nyin
126a6(rgyud): mo'i ba grod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtse gsum la// slar yang dbyangs dag dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnam
126a7(rgyud): phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum la// nyin zhag so so'i dus dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha'i drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab// snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnya
126a8(rgyud): dang mi mnyam bgod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bya// phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas// de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par
126b1(rgyud): mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste// snga ma med ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o// de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'bar ldan pa gcig
126b2(rgyud): bu mun pa bral bar 'jug/ zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khab bdag mchog gi ched 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste// thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgod cing ngas sbyor phyed
126b3(rgyud): pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis// sum cu rtsa dag dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la// gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams da
126b4(rgyud): mtshigs kyi tshogs la'o// rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lha gam srid gsum skyed par mdzad pa mkha' go ma ni sna tshogs gzugs// zla ba'i dus dman pa gang de mchog gi
126b5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur// gang zhig/ nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dpe phyogs dang phyogs bral mdab ma ra thun tshod longs spyod mtha'// lhag ma 'khor lo'i
126b6(rgyud): lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o// spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yis bla ma'i phyed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs// byed bcas dag
126b7(rgyud): dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes// sa skyes stong pa sbrul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig/ 
126b8(rgyud): mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog ba'i dge ba'i gsung las byung // gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung // mtha' dgacig
127a1(rgyud): tu gyur pa ro drug sbrul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshad de bzhin nyid// mkha' gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni
127a2(rgyud): 'phrog byed ma// de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus rang gi lem ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya// ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs 'byung rgyu ba lnga
127a3(rgyud): de srid dus kyi pho nya khab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci// pa nya phra ma rab tu rgyu ba bla ba'i gsung la gan sa pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la// sgrib
127a4(rgyud): bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du'/ dod chags sems kyis ma yino// nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang parnams la gnyis ga'i bgod pa'i bang gis sred
127a5(rgyud): pas bsnun pa rnams// yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za// thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin nag so so'i ngas srog
127a6(rgyud): chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams// dus sbyor re ra la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab pa yan lag gsungs// yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams
127a7(rgyud): la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par// de phyir dus la sogs pas yani lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnam so// de ltar rnam pa lnga po
127a8(rgyud): rnams kyis dusu yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur// gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de kho na'o// zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par
127b1(rgyud): 'gyur te rten cing 'bral ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyis// dag pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus rab tu zhugs// reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni
127b2(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzino// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dusu sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster// sa skyis khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa
127b3(rgyud): skyes sngags pa nyi skye spen// sngags pa lug la sogs pa khyim la nyin nag so so'i dusu zhing can rnams te dus kun tu// zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim
127b4(rgyud): ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang bsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o// zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun
127b5(rgyud): ched lag pa la// re sa la ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la/ dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gti
127b6(rgyud): dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o// bsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mchin mo'i mthar// sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams
127b7(rgyud): srog ni longs spyod byed pa min// 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed// sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs
127b8(rgyud): ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed// gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yino// dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam
128a1(rgyud): gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur// de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni// 'byung ba chu gter
