128a2(rgyud): grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dab pa rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams// chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams ngag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tsho dbugs kyi grangs rnams// gnyis
128a3(rgyud): gsum chu gtar mda' ngas ri brgyad gza' dang bcud rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste// de nas snga yi rab dab rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum// kun
128a4(rgyud): nas gang bar byed do bdi mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma 'i rab tu rgyu ba las// ji srid rig byed sbru la dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thaMd pa can du rab tu 'gyur// 'khor
128a5(rgyud): lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gi/ sa sku gsung thugs kyi rab dpe yis// gtso bo srung bar byed ba/ de mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ma la sogs lha mo brgyad
128a6(rgyud): rnam so// de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs// lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra brnyani zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os
128a7(rgyud): pa'o// gtso mo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang // de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' gro ma
128a8(rgyud): rnam so// gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje
128b1(rgyud): mkha' go 'di rnam so// gzugs dang sgra dbor dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni// snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra can gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste/ 
128b2(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi dal rkang dag dang myur ba khog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di// brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa dag la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul// dang
128b3(rgyud): po'i dbugs ni dbu pa brgya dang yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa// mkha'agro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'kham ste 'gro bai dag tu
128b4(rgyud): gnas// de yi dbus dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i chayis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku// gang zhig dbugs ni ba cad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi
128b5(rgyud): 'khor lo'o// dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum pa grod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te// thig le ba/ ga par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mithal
128b6(rgyud): yas das 'jug par 'gyur// 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor
128b7(rgyud): ma rnams dgyes pa ma yi no// gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag ngas kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te// dbugs ni mkha' mkha' na mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gto
128b8(rgyud): song na thams cad stong par bskul bar byed// lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol tu ni mchog gi kha'i bdag rkang pa spro dang sdang po'i ngo bo la// rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi
129a1(rgyud): dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya// stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te// stong pa na mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter
129a2(rgyud): zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lcug ma rnams kyis nam grwa'o// rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' na mkha' mkha' mtsho mig gi der ni sgra gcan 'jug rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyan
129a3(rgyud): zhag mkha' mkha' na mkha' dus dus kyis lha yi blon po 'jug/ na mkha' mkha' dang stong ba mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bka shis 'jug pa ste// mkha'
129a4(rgyud): mkha' na mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug/ mkha' mkha' na mkha' mkha' mchi brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag
129a5(rgyud): rnams kyis zla ba der 'jug ste// de yi dusu rgyal po 'gro ba da ga ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur// de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu
129a6(rgyud): 'gyur// gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa// bug pa ces pa sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o// 
129a7(rgyud): de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur// gtsug tor snying kha'i pogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang
129a8(rgyud): lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams// zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyid rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad
129b1(rgyud): brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams// gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams
129b2(rgyud): brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gzo' rnams te// de dag rnams kyi thog mothi'acha ni khab bdag zhabs la gnas pa des kyi rtsa yis long spyod cing // 
129b3(rgyud): gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi bskyed mi rdo rje sku yi mkha' gro ma yos longs spyod// dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag du 'gyur// khams
129b4(rgyud): dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa 'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste/ sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang
129b5(rgyud): dag rang bzhugs pa// rig mi sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yin tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya// gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi
129b6(rgyud): mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur// de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur// shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum sring
129b7(rgyud): pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjesu dran par 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni
129b8(rgyud): gang zhig bde mnyam zangasu gzhom du med par 'gyur// lha yi spyan gyi mthus las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur// lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags
130a1(rgyud): kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur// de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur// rtsa ni gang zhig thur
130a2(rgyud): sel dbusu rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnam so// srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal// rna ba sna dang mig la rnam ga
130a3(rgyud): shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang // srog dang thur sel 'gags
130a4(rgyud): bar gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed// rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags
130a5(rgyud): bar gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyu // da ltar da ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad ma yin// zla ba nyi mo'i gzugs ni zos na mkha'
130a6(rgyud): la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid// thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbusu rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o// phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi
130a7(rgyud): gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar// srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos geb dusu de 'gago// zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog
130a8(rgyud): gi rlung ni chen po 'gags// chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs// dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa gnas gnom med legs par
130b1(rgyud): rab tu rtog gyur pa// de yi dus rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro// khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges pa ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs// rab tu
130b2(rgyud): dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor po la grub pa'i dusu nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur// de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan po byed la 'gyur// rin po che'am me tog
130b3(rgyud): char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bos sa yi steng du 'be'i par 'gyur// lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa na mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur// sna tshogs 'jig
130b4(rgyud): rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang // skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i snying gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste// sems ni dam pa
130b5(rgyud): bde bas gang zhig mi g.yo thams cad dus ldan cing skyes pas 'khyud pa'o// si las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phra na bye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed// chu las sa
130b6(rgyud): me rlung phye rtse mo can le rtse mo can las sa dong chu dang rlung bya ste// rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong ba la// rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi
130b7(rgyud): rlung gis bsnan pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'og// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum bskyed par mdzad pa rnam par gzigs nas ni// gnyi ga ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la
130b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste// so so ri re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor// sa la sogs pa'i rdul lam
131a1(rgyud): lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la ra bzhugs rnams/ de dag rnams dang thabs gcig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam pa
131a2(rgyud): bzhugs// yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdu la phran 'dzin// srab par byed pas tha dad rdal phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar dri srub par byed pa ste// slar
131a3(rgyud): yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnam so// dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thang dag gis sa ngas rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed
131a4(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug ri po chen po dag ni kun nas// de yi dbus las kyis ni chen po da ga gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams rab tu 'gyur/ 
131a5(rgyud): lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen gu na gyis rab tu gang po rnams// mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+d+ri nA la lho ni pad+ma rA ga ste// nub ni kar ke ta na se
131a6(rgyud): po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shi'o// dbus ni ljang ku de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur
131a7(rgyud): dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhi no// de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyu ri'i gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phra'o// de yi phyi rol dus rnams ngag gis 'khor la'i ngo bo de nas 'jig
131a8(rgyud): rten khams kyi rang bzhin// 'khor lo dag dang rigs dag gis te rigs byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor// brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis
131b1(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbusu phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur// de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying kha dang ni de nas
131b2(rgyud): lte gsang cha skyes de bzhin no// zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dbyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te// dang phod phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po
131b3(rgyud): ma'i tshad kyis// nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya dag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten chad// reg byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang cha gter cha gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig
131b4(rgyud): byed rig byed kyis// gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dang ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni// shangs kyi 'og tu kolka'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin bdag ste mgrin
131b5(rgyud): pa'i cha skyes dbus// de nas stong kha lte ba gsang ba rimi yi ba dag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur// sang ba'i cha skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa
131b6(rgyud): yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid// mdzod pa gsang ba'i cha skyes dbus khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang // dang ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di ginyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung
131b7(rgyud): thugs kyi 'khor l-i dag la'o// phyed bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste// thugs kyi phyed ni sor dag rkang pa dang bcas snying kha la gnas lhan
131b8(rgyud): skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o// gsum po dag las sgra rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o// 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu skra dang gsung dang
132a1(rgyud): thugs kyi 'khos de nyis 'gyuraro// lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo pad ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur// de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi tshad dang
132a2(rgyud): 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yino// de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni byed 'gyur// de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin pa chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o// pe
132a3(rgyud): bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur/ te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus// gsung gi 'khor lo skra yi 'a khor la rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu byed
132a4(rgyud): kyi mtshams// sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te/ mi bdag dbral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams/ byed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu ma rlung dkyil 'kho
132a5(rgyud): me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o// steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku'ad mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gi sung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// kun nas rlung gis bgod pa'i dbang gis bad ka'i tshad kyis
132a6(rgyud): gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis// rtsibs brgyad mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdage ba'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo dag gis 'khor lor 'gyur// sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing
132a7(rgyud): rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya// steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur
132a8(rgyud): pad+ma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas drang ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur/ 
132b1(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no// lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste// sha
132b2(rgyud): du ral grir 'gyur te re yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sma nor tsa na// lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o// dbus mchod phyir thog
132b3(rgyud): pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbangs ni de nyid// nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying kha'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni// gcig gnyis chu gter mdar dang klu yi dbang
132b4(rgyud): dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim paso// dbus dang stang 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyes bzhi dang drag po la/ dil bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng
132b5(rgyud): ni rdo rje dang mtshungs pa lang kha dang pad+ma'i gzugs// kho na ni da yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba mdab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las// rwa no khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phoH
132b6(rgyud): bral du ster rwa yi zlum po dag ni zhi cha'o// phyi rol rwa yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da ri yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o// dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin mngab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin
132b7(rgyud): nyidas gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod bu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dbangs kyi tshad// de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs
132b8(rgyud): cha rnams// byed dang gnyis mthar phyir byang chu skyes snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o// pad+ma'i mtha' las chad dman gzhi dang mnyam pa drang ste de yi phyogs cha yis
133a1(rgyud): kyang mgrin pa'o// gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams// gsang ba'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas
133a2(rgyud): dpangasu shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te// gangan nas pad+ma'i sngon mtshams snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o// de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin du
133a3(rgyud): gter dus dang pad bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum// gdan las rig byed dag gis pad+ma snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te// phyed bcas brgyad kyis gde
133a4(rgyud): pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur mo yi dbang // mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bos de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di
133a5(rgyud): 'di ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no// gsar ni sa yi kha masu 'gyur te dngu li ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me
133a6(rgyud): yi khams yin no// lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no// rin chen ser pos ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te/ 
133a7(rgyud): nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang kuM daM yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o// lan tshwas dang mngar ba chu rub tu 'gyur zhing chab me dang kha ba rlung yin te// sgur dang bska ba'i ro na 'dres
133a8(rgyud): pa dag gi slar yang zhing gi rdo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa dag gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams// sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang
133b1(rgyud): mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go// sa yis zug gzer 'phrog par byed cing dag kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de ma yis ni// 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa na mkha' yas
133b2(rgyud): kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed// ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog sto de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang // chu dang re dang ne re ba reg pa sngags dang sman rnam
133b3(rgyud): ngag gi mi bu rnams bde bsam mi khyab/ bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du 'jug 'gyur zhing / slar yang thams cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las
133b4(rgyud): 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnam sa kyis zla ba lhun pa rdzogs pa 'dir// mchod rten
133b5(rgyud): rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying por dkyil 'khora'o// phyi rol du ni sgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyis sa gzhi la gnas mi rnam so// lang spyod sa la gling
133b6(rgyud): dag bdud rtsi 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams// rA la rjesu gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po ma dang dus dang lha min cha gter rlung // gnod sbyin dang ni dge po 'og dang
133b7(rgyud): steng dang 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong // 'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung // nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa
133b8(rgyud): tshar ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni// gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur medo dag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka Ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams// 'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa Ta pa
134a1(rgyud): tas ring po zung ngu lhag pa'i lha// lug dang 'khrig pa karka Tar ni zla ba dkar po nyo ma seng+ge bu mo srang rnamasu// sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag sbed pa
134a2(rgyud): gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mtha ro// de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyar bar 'gyur mi yi bdag po kyi// 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen
134a3(rgyud): kun gyis rab tu gang // gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan// mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sen
134a4(rgyud): rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing da/ nga chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ ra// yi dwags rnams kyis chun me chen dmyal ba
134a5(rgyud): song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas bcod 'big so// 'di rnam sa sgrol ba'i slad sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te// mngal ni rab tu gzung ba mdzad cing
134a6(rgyud): mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni// nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnasu chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te// sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar
134a7(rgyud): yang bac+doMs ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o// de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skyes shing ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste// bcom ldan de yis thangasu seni don ni mi 'dor las
134a8(rgyud): kyis bcings pa ma yino// da ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnasu lus kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye// sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phros
134b1(rgyud): lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no// gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rje su chags// shi ba ru gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen
134b2(rgyud): gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te// mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug/ 'jug ngogs lus po lhung las mchog gi ge
134b3(rgyud): 'phang 'gro bde rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin// de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khod kye ma gang pha ni gang // mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla chung ma sring mo
134b4(rgyud): rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang // bdag gis bin gyis ba rlabs pa'i drang song 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar par 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis nyi ma khod kyis thub pa
134b5(rgyud): rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug/ pa mdzod// gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsnga la 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can// 
134b6(rgyud): dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi// 'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i ma yiso// da
134b7(rgyud): phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dag po bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsad par 'gyur// chags las sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang / 
134b8(rgyud): 'gogs laso// de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin// de phyir sbyin la rjesu chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshe/ 
135a1(rgyud): 'di ni// 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dusu skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog/ chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis
135a2(rgyud): skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste// sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dusu gang zhig srung byed ni skyob rnams ster bar byed// sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de
135a3(rgyud): ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad// des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lho klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar gyur// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang na mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin
135a4(rgyud): srog dang ni// gzugs la sogs dang mig la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te// phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khab byed 'di rnams
135a5(rgyud): dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhom nu gang // mi bdag dang bcus mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs/ ni thu bo yon// bsreg byas da dri mi med pa chu ru
135a6(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur te tut+ma ka ni me nyid// rlung dang na mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcis ri bong can dang mtshol ni 'dun pa yang // kA kI ka shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang
135a7(rgyud): chu ni ldong res pa bla ste// btsag ni sa 'o lan tshwa gang zhig ze tsha rgya mtsho skyes dang rgya mtshwa nag po thab kyi tshe// 'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni nA ba sA ra ya ba k+Sha ra sad dza dang
135a8(rgyud): tsha la kA tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung ma chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no// rdo yo chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me// rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag
135b1(rgyud): dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhi no// gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shag tu ka dang rA can nag po chu dang me dang rlung // nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes pa gzhan pa nye ba'i
135b2(rgyud): dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya// rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dug la sogs pa'i gzugs// de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de
135b3(rgyud): bzhin lha dang khab len rnam pa bzhi// ro ni grub dang gab pa ma yin/ rnam pa gnyis 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed mi na// gab pa lcags ni 'bugs par byid slar yang
135b4(rgyud): de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o// gang zhig 'a bugs byed min pa'i dngul chur de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur ba ra gyur pa dag gis kyang // lcags ni 'bags shi
135b5(rgyud): rjesu 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'phrog rul pa'i lcags ni rna ma par spangs na so// dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste me la gnas shing sgrol ba da ni rim pa yis// sgra dang rab
135b6(rgyud): tu 'pha ra ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid rab tu 'gyur// sgra ldan 'bar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang mdab ma 'bugs pa dngar dang bcas pa ste/ 'dar ba med pa mdung
135b7(rgyud): gis 'bugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sgyur byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o// mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhi
135b8(rgyud): ba'o// su zhig de rnams med nas yi steng gi gnasu 'di yi bcing ba dag ni gang zhig byed// bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na'i cha ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur
136a1(rgyud): ye shes med nas bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni dum glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang
136a2(rgyud): 'gog par 'gyur// gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul lam bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma ben// gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcing
136a3(rgyud): de phyir byang chub sems dpa' se ni dag gi don gyi sgrad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad// gang zhig thugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi mdab ma'i dri ma 'dog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te// mtha'
136a4(rgyud): dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal da ldan rnams kyis la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi btsong bar rab tu 'gyur gang de nges
136a5(rgyud): bar lo dus par dang ni// bdug dang dgad po'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig dbugs dag las lhag par/ mi 'gyuraro// sman rnams zad shin tu che ba'i ro rnams
136a6(rgyud): dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang sbyor ba'i sde rnams dang // bslang bar gyur pa'i rtsa ba mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang 'dug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste// dngul chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me
136a7(rgyud): tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o// gnyis sbyor tsha la 'ching bu byi brta sen dug rnams kyiso snum gyis dran pas 'jam pa nyid// glang po me yi chu ni lan bdun blugs pa dag
136a8(rgyud): gis chu shing rtsi tra la sogs thal ba dang // 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro ni skye ngas pa de rnams slu bar bya// yang nas yang du ma yi che bdag gis slar yang
136b1(rgyud): lan brgyar smra bar bya zhing bskam par bya// de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang // lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi Da 'di ni dngul chu dag
136b2(rgyud): gis brgyad kyi cha shis 'gyur// khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgya de ro yi snying khar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid// drag por bskol bas dri mi med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhugs pas
136b3(rgyud): stobs dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur// lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sbyar byed// khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye ga shi'i tshe sgra
136b4(rgyud): tshal bcas pas 'jug pa ste// de ltar gang zhig pa lu tshwa'i la sa ni 'chang par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin nag so sor byed pa ma/ dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lji na
136b5(rgyud): sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol// de yis ma chog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// khru phyed gser gyi pad+ma
136b6(rgyud): nor gyi mdab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste// lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la pad+ma rA ga chu she lo// nub tu rin chen kar ke ta ste mau dang lha min 'phrog byed du
136b7(rgyud): ni rnon po zangs dang dngulu// rlung gi mdab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag la skyes pa'i gdan ni lte ba la// snying por de steng gser las skyes pa'i dzaM b+ha la ni phag gnyis ne'u le
136b8(rgyud): dang bcas mchog sbyin pa// mdab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa 'am dngalu las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog spyan phyag/ cod pan sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog
137a1(rgyud): / sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid// ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral mdab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim paso// dri dang me tog rnams kyis
137a2(rgyud): nyin zhag so so'i dus thun gsum zla ba'i snod mchod byas nas// oM dze swA hA'i mtha' ste dbu su b+ha la dang bcas dza lon+d+rA ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis// rgyal po rab dga' yid kyis gser 'gyur mkhar
137a3(rgyud): rnams dag gi bsrang ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin pa// de ltar srung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyu ro// so phag 'gyur byed sbyar ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma
137a4(rgyud): bcu ru ro ni nye zhing bdag par bya// de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o// slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro na 'chi ste yang de la zhu
137a5(rgyud): bar bye/ ngul churang gi skye gnas zan de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu ba// zha nye rnon po gan zangs dang lhang tsher skyes ma gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa
137a6(rgyud): dag// mnyam pa gcig tu bsreg pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam// dang por dag cu'i cha sha sa zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pa
137a7(rgyud): 'phel bar bya// rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag pa rab tu sbyin mi ba// phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag/ 
137a8(rgyud): de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu ba 'di ni gir mchog rnams kyis// ma zhun ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dug su rab tu 'gyur// reg pa ma
137b1(rgyud): gi sman rnams dag gis ma la gnas pa lhung tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur// lhang tsher dag las lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang brgyad 'gyur ro// de yi sa bon la yang
137b2(rgyud): brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyuraro// de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dpor rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar// me yi nang du bskol bar bsnye de nas de ni
137b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur/ reg rdo sman dge med na mchog gi gir mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'a gyur// 'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed
137b4(rgyud): gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// slar yang gzhan ni nyi sa dang gsum 'gyur gser zhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chud ga la blugs pa so// rdzas kyi don du zha nyi brgyad
137b5(rgyud): cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bangad nas blugs par bya// ga/ ser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon sbrul zangs zhe nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang // gsha' tsho zla ba de bzhin
137b6(rgyud): lcang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg pa dag gis bsad byas nas// mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshwa nye ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcag dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni// mkhris pa bsgyur po dag
137b7(rgyud): gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni rdo ba'i dbus blugs byas te// sa yi nang du zla ba dag tu steng du me dang bcas pas thams cad dusu bdag gyur pa// dngul chu de ri bcu drug cha yis dbyangs kyis
137b8(rgyud): drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar// zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gse 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste// dngul ni brgyad kyi
138a1(rgyud): cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// 'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i
138a2(rgyud): gzugs// de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas dag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar ba// de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tsha la 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni// 
138a3(rgyud): lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya// nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ra mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni/ 
138a4(rgyud): sman gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag / dang bcas pa dal chu dang bcas dang // ba yi'i mags rab snying pa sa li lo ma sbyar pos dman zhing lan tsha dang // rnam
138a5(rgyud): bral nya dang 'bra mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gi sa phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o// stong phrag 'dug pa brgya/ yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid
138a6(rgyud): bar yang shes byas nas// nyin zhag so so'i dusu bza' bar bya ste nyungs kar cha las mtha' ma skye tshe cha shaso// khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang bgrang ba rlung dang tshad ba dag dang bral bar rab tu 'gyur
138a7(rgyud): 'bring po 'di ni zla ba dag gis lha yi lus po skaM dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed// karko TI dang de ba dA lI tsha gsum bri ha ti dang ni me pa ka rA ti tik+ta// bskol ba 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba
138a8(rgyud): la nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya// de bzhin zla ba'i tshul sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+ha wA te ye chu// ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rdo ba dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan nam
138b1(rgyud): la yang sngags paso// gang zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te// phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang ci dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de
138b2(rgyud): bzhin nyid// gsal ba mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gong zhig za bar byed pa de ni gab ster sman ma yin// de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs bde gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud
138b3(rgyud): rtsir 'gyur// daN+Dod pa la sA li bar+t+ti chu skyes sA ri dag gi rang lus mdab ma'i khu ba yis// ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len sno du lcags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag du yang mnyes
138b4(rgyud): byas nas// gang zhig zla ba dag tu nyin zhag so so'i dusu rba ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa// de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad la se gol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad dganyi
138b5(rgyud): li lon dbyibs// bok+ShA Na dang bar snang shak+Shu kI ra'i mechu yis rab g.yo dngul chu dag kyang bsad par bya// sman gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar reng lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab
138b6(rgyud): len mnyam pa dang // gcig tu byas nas sreg bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste// sngar brjod khab len snod chur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang
138b7(rgyud): ni skra dkar 'brog/ zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang // zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag las ni lus la dngos
138b8(rgyud): grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur// thun mong ba dang 'bring po 'jig pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste// mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig
139a1(rgyud): gi rjes 'bugs dag las min// gang na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus dud 'gro rnam par rtsod// ral gri dag la pad+ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum
139a2(rgyud): gyi ma rims gter ni gsal bar byed// dar ni nyin zhag so so'i dusu 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu byi// ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la
139a3(rgyud): rdzas kyi dngos grub bo// dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skyes gnas dag gi sngags rnams bsgrub par ba// gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la
139a4(rgyud): ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu mo rnams ni sgrub babyas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgra ba bar bya// mkha 'gro ma rnams sgrub pa byas nas
139a5(rgyud): mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lho min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnam sa rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya// dub la so/ 
139a6(rgyud): sgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya// srog la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i bdab
139a7(rgyud): bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams la 'che stir gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste// 'dod
139a8(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub zhig bgod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnasu bsam gtan bgrod bya'o// ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje pad+mar bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid// de ltar de
139b1(rgyud): ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dusu bde mnyam ster gyur cig/ sgra can ma dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod de sa cha sreg za rlung dang stong pa gang // lnga po dgo gza' yi tshogs pa gcig
139b2(rgyud): shos dag ni drag po lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams// gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga par pi'i le dag tu gsungs// snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum
139b3(rgyud): po gzhan pa 'di'i lus kyi dbus de bzhin nyid// pad+mar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni// gang zhig rus pa la sogs rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la
139b4(rgyud): sogs pa dag po ste// lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o// de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag
139b5(rgyud): rigs 'di la ni rig par bya// sa 'dzin de nyid rnam dpe rnam sa dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang // da bye ba dag cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus
139b6(rgyud): la gnas pa bug pa dag dang zla ba'i grangs// de dag thaMd bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur ta lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang // gza' rnams dag gis rgyu ba gang de slar yang gcig shos rnam
139b7(rgyud): kyis rnal 'byor mi yi rgyu ba brjod// ye shes na mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang // nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar
139b8(rgyud): yang nges par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dag dang // mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par// bsdu ba bezhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i
140a1(rgyud): bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang // de bzhin phung
140a2(rgyud): po dbang po dran pa zhes pa dag dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni// bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang // bug
140a3(rgyud): pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog stes rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcus rten 'brel dag/ 
140a4(rgyud): skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag gi de bzhin nyis 'gyur dag ni ma 'a// dris pa yis sangs rgyas chas// rab mchog rgyal ba'i ba dag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpa
140a5(rgyud): byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste// khyab bdag mchog gi go 'bang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin// zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig
140a6(rgyud): dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgod pa dag ni gnyis// 'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod// mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga
140a7(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni dge/ gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi gangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgya de yin no// rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu sde phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag
140a8(rgyud): ni bcu gcigo// nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshe sa dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel// nyes pa 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// 
140b1(rgyud): de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes ces pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste// dang po'i sangs rgyas su
140b2(rgyud): ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i skad ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs// de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste// dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i
140b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdage bo'i mngon par brjod pa zla ba bzang // gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang de dang ri dag dang // reg bya gzugs dang sems med
140b4(rgyud): rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang gol dang byed po med/ sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdugabasngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med// mya ngan 'das
140b5(rgyud): pa mtshan ma med cing byed pa rnams bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshalo// dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu da be zla med cing zad du 'gro spros pa med// rtsegs
140b6(rgyud): pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phag dang zhabs// 'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa// 
140b7(rgyud): rig pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go'i phangs dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal// spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcus dag gi gzi
140b8(rgyud): brjid can// ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phangs bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tsha'o// dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po bo 'dzin pa las 'jig 'jig rten spyi
141a1(rgyud): bor yang dag gnas// bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa'i 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshalo// sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha
141a2(rgyud): yis yongasu bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te// dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams la mi bzad// gang gis las gang rab byas
141a3(rgyud): rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de bskyed pa// 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshalo// gcig dang du ma dag
141a4(rgyud): kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyi ma mnyam pa g.yas dang / g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab// steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs
141a5(rgyud): te thung ngu ring po dang // shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yo na tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min// gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi zla
141a6(rgyud): ga khyod la 'dud khyod la 'dud// gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste// de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar
141a7(rgyud): 'gyur te 'di li nga mtshar med// de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o// de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa pad mnyam 'bras stor bu rnam
141a8(rgyud): dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so// sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus gsum pag mi byed// mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me
141b1(rgyud): tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni maN+Dal mi byed pa// myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig bde mnyam ster bed bla ma skyo ba skyod pa po// shes rab ye shes 'thob pa gang yin ma nyam
141b2(rgyud): gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'o zhabs ni mi spong ba// nyams pa gang zhig rtsa gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dusu bsad pa'o// dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi
141b3(rgyud): mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod bad pa'o// sbyin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs zad ster// ma rabs gang yin gang zhig sla
141b4(rgyud): byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g.yo sgyu can// dpal ldan dpal ni chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sno/ ba/ de la
141b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhugs pas zla ba'i nub rtogs pa na// sems can don gyi slad mi yi bdag po rgyu da kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs// 
141b6(rgyud): pa gang // de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams a li ka li ny+tsa du'i rgyu du bkod do nyi ma kye// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis breng 'dzin sde pa sbyor bcing
141b7(rgyud): pas brjed// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid mdzod// ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa 'di las byung gyur
141b8(rgyud): pa/ rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog/ nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i
142a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gcig las ni// tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni// dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar
142a2(rgyud): ni yon tan kur gter 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can// ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang bzhin la gnas srid pa thad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos// ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang bzhin la gnas
142a3(rgyud): srid pa thad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas// thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni// / rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras
142a4(rgyud): pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thags rje yis// thub pa'i da rigs ni 'jigs rlung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la bzhag par mdzod// khod ni rgan
142a5(rgyud): yang gzhan na mtha' dag rgyal po'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod// bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te
142a6(rgyud): gshin rje'i dag/ khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdab khong ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu
142a7(rgyud): 'jug/ tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btung bar gyur pa zhabs kyi rtse bar lhung // sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu ga
142a8(rgyud): bar byas// rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi mas bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA par/ khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag laM 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa
142b1(rgyud): dag ni skyabasu lhag par mchi// sa ga'i zla ba'i nyal mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la// thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlab pas
142b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos gab thob// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin// dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam
142b3(rgyud): gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig/ sems can kun don mdzad pa po rtse mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas// sras po pad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gte
142b4(rgyud): la gnang ba sprul pa nges par ni// dang por khod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshang med pa glebs bam dag la gan sa pa dang // de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad
142b5(rgyud): byas nas gzhan gyi gnas bgrod par bya'i 'jig rten gnye na// gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub seMder rnams// mi
142b6(rgyud): yoM 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang pogs bral du gnas khro bo'i rgyal po btsun mer bcas pa rnams// gang dag sa 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs mi dge tha~M ngas 'ching byed pa// 
142b7(rgyud): de dag thaMd nyin zhag so so'i dasu mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skye bar byed gyur cig/ rgyud ni dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha// thabs dang
142b8(rgyud): shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i sladadu rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa
143a1(rgyud): gangs bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig/ dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba
143a2(rgyud): ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las// ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung brgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs/ 
143a3(rgyud): kha che'i paN+Di ta se ma nA tha dang bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la ba'i pa las// dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras bI
143a4(rgyud): bla ma dam pa chas kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang // da bon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du// mkhas pa cheni ba zhang sten mdo sde dpal dang // dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul
143a5(rgyud): khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi tshal legs par dpyad cing bskul te// legs par sbyar gyis brda/ sbed pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slongab shong ston gyis/ 
143a6(rgyud): dpal si spyi'i gtsug lag khang chen por// yul dbus kyi rgya de ba gnyis la gtugs shing legs par btsas te gtan la bab pa'o// / gang gis thugs dgongs rnar dag pa
143a7(rgyud): yis// 'di la bskul zhing 'thun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang // bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gang thob ngas// kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog// rgya gar skad du
143a8(rgyud): shrI ka lA tsakra ut+ta ra tan+ta rA dzA tan+t+ra hr-i da ya nA ma// bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal
143b1(rgyud): 'di ltar chos byibyings dkyil 'khor dri med sku la 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha rnams dang ni dmyal ba nyid ces gang thob pa// rgyal mchog po
143b2(rgyud): brang shaM b+ha lar gags ka lA pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug seng+ga yi// gdan la bzhugs nas rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan// byung gyur zhes sogs bden
143b3(rgyud): ti lha mchog bla me khyab 'jug lha yi dbang phyug lha yi dbang po dang // zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan me lha saM stengs lha yul na mkhar bsod nams sdig las 'byung // mi rnams pha rol srid par yi
143b4(rgyud): dwags dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dmagacan// rigs byed pa dang bod pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de na brdzun pa ste// gang du gcan chen bdun la
143b5(rgyud): sogs pa dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang deng // skyes la sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzhan bsam pas nges par 'dzin par 'gyur ba
143b6(rgyud): ni/ thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur// sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las sa stengs 'dir lhung de ni bden pa
143b7(rgyud): ste bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rigs byed zhi chos khyab 'jug ches bla ma// sha yi kha zas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud
143b8(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bco lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub ni// sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi ba yis rtag tu bsrung
144a1(rgyud): mi bya/ srog chags rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'di nyams pa// yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi na mkha'
144a2(rgyud): tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po min// srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing // skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog
144a3(rgyud): chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur// seng+ge sbrul dang ne le stag dang bya rog skye gnas yan la ga lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni skye dag
144a4(rgyud): rnams ni byed dam byed du 'jug dang yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur// dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yi ro// myong ro la rjesu tshol byed cing // bdag nyid gsod pa
144a5(rgyud): la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro// dge slong nad pa la ni sman pas sha bstan ni yang ba khra rnams kyis bsad pa dang // pha yis ched bsad
144a6(rgyud): dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyi shi ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs pa rnams// dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni
144a7(rgyud): stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bslar min// sha la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnamasu sdug bsngal 'gyur// srog chags yi dregs la so
144a8(rgyud): skyes gnas dka' thub khyim pa rgyal po nges par rang khyim du// gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams// shi ba rnams kyi lus
144b1(rgyud): ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang // 'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta// mtho yor shes pa yod la rang gzhan rnam pa bral
144b2(rgyud): ba nyid las rdo ba'i mtho yar phung por 'gyur// sa stengs gnas srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid// srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang bzhin rnar
144b3(rgyud): bral bar legs par sad las shes// shaM b+ha la yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams// 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa phung po zad
144b4(rgyud): rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te// longs spyod byed pa rnams par rig pa tsam ste rang gzhan bral te rtog ma rnams kyis// longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang
144b5(rgyud): byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sad 'gyur ba/ zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus kyi me dang mun pa gcig pu snang bar bye da pa yang // sa sogs de sogs mig la sogs dang
144b6(rgyud): gzhu dang char pa glog dang rlung sogs dag pa gnyis/ de ni lus la phung po dag dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba dag pa gnyis// de rnams longs spyod byed po srog chags phung
144b7(rgyud): po gnyis log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis brlang ba// phyi yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rang byung // sbrul sku langs sku dang ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnam
144b8(rgyud): bzhi pa las ni rab tu byung // khang stong min zhing gcig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyis gsum sogs thim par 'gyur// de bzhin gsum la sogs pa gcig pu mchog gyur chos
145a1(rgyud): kyi dbying su nges par thim par 'gyur// phung po khams dang dbang po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog/ rnam par shes pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro
145a2(rgyud): bar gtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos// dri rnams na mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la gnas// gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs
145a3(rgyud): ba sangs rgyas sku gsum la sogs pa// yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa dang ni sred pa yang // las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung
145a4(rgyud): bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal ni// rnam shes la sor/ rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa/ yang yin// gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i
145a5(rgyud): srid par chos ba dun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams// shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nye na mongs pa las las// de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de
145a6(rgyud): las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung // chos rnams 'gag pa med pa na mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid pas de yi phyir// srog chags srog gi rdul phran phung
145a7(rgyud): por bcas shing 'go ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min// sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa gtong zhing byang chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid// gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchos
145a8(rgyud): sras bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris// de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang srid gzhan 'pho min phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni// ma re ma kha ton rgya dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma
145b1(rgyud): chu shel sa bon sbyar// gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i chos kyi tshogs las byung zhes pa bden// chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams
145b2(rgyud): phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde ba chos sku min zhing de yi phyir// gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yis gang gsungs pa// gang zhig gcig min du ma mi ma
145b3(rgyud): la rang dang bdag gzhan la phan tshun tshogs chen po'i rten gyur pa// dngos med dngos po med min na mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dbyed dka'i rang bzhin nyid// gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba
145b4(rgyud): mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab la spros pa med/ dpe med so sor rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal/ gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das pas
145b5(rgyud): mi khyab pa legs spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs// blo ldan chen por gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus smor gsung mdzad cing // 'jig rten kun la khyam
145b6(rgyud): ba rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen par gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smim
145b7(rgyud): ba'i rgyur gyur la lar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang // slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba// rnam pa du mor 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs kyis 'jug cing
145b8(rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms// phyogs bcu'i rjesu 'jug pa don chen cheni thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tsha'o// khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa
146a1(rgyud): dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dag cing ni la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'bor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba// rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par
146a2(rgyud): khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid// mi mnya ma bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten kham/ 
146a3(rgyud): rnams// zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa stengs na mkha' rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar// bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyingasu bde 'a gro ngan 'gro dus kun du ni rnam par bzhugs// rdzogs
146a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas srog chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan// pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus// khu ga khrag dag rig mi'i b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i
146a5(rgyud): rludang ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu gam yang dag ldan// yul gyi yon tan las byung de longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yi khams la rab brten pa// skyes pa
146a6(rgyud): bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung // gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'bang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi// zhal brgya rigs 'dzin dbang po zla ba
146a7(rgyud): sa sogs yul dang yul can bdag po chos kyi dbyings// zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshigs rnams la// de la tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par
146a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba sgra bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig lnga dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis/ 
146b1(rgyud): khams rnams rgyas btab des// gcig gi du ma'i khams las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa sor mo'i tshigs rnams gang zhig du// thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes
146b2(rgyud): pa dang ni bud med dag/ rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang na 'jig med rdul gyi phung po ste// srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin kyang ni 'jig pa med pa srog gi khams// 
146b3(rgyud): khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni las yin rdul ni srog chags phung po yi// de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bus gzhan du// rang gi las kyi phung po lngar
146b4(rgyud): longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du'ang slar yang sogs parabyed// de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis lus kyi phung po zad pa min// gcer bu la ni las kyi phung
146b5(rgyud): po rnam par 'jigs 'gyur sreg byed ma ni 'ba' zhig gis/ dkar po'i bsam gtan dag bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges/ pa brgya phrag sen lus ngag las// pad+ma khyab byed
146b6(rgyud): snying po'i ze'u 'bru'i dbang phyug brgya bcom thig le bzang po sgom par byed// de bus lus po sbas pa brtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsol bar byed pa can// lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod gyur
146b7(rgyud): mchog gi go 'phong 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa// bsam gau tan 'di ni sreg lugs za bas ma lus las kyi phung po sreg par 'gyur ba mthong // gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhum
146b8(rgyud): gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur// gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhug
147a1(rgyud): gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig dag po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa rnams// gang zhig chos kyi bas
147a2(rgyud): gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de ya sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan
147a3(rgyud): la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan
147a4(rgyud): du 'tshe ba la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar// 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur// pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel// de bzhin
147a5(rgyud): shaM dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log bar g.yem pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur
147a6(rgyud): gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur pa nyin dang mtshan du da yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin
147a7(rgyud): tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdo rje rnams// dngos dang dngos
147a8(rgyud): med byed po bsgribs dang na mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag/ na mkha' med na byed po gnas min 'dir na gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig/ sen rnams kyi byed por ma byas
147b1(rgyud): bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyad par 'jig pa min// so sor sdud la sogs pa dag po stobs bcu'i
147b2(rgyud): stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid sgom par gsungs// mtshan mo du ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo na mkha' 'bar ba la sogs pas// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngas
147b3(rgyud): bo na mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong // bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tu sems brtan byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong // srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi ma zla ba bral nas mun
147b4(rgyud): par rgyu bar byed// dbugs kyi dbyung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'a dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig lo 'dzin par byed// rje su dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du na mkhar 'ong ma
147b5(rgyud): 'phro bar byed// ting 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo/ bor dri med bde bas rab gang 'gyur// na mkha' ra bltas pa sa gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te smo/ 
147b6(rgyud): stong pa nyid mthong bas// nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag paso// yan lag med por bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba di med
147b7(rgyud): bde ba yis// sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jigs par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i gsung laso// srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil
147b8(rgyud): 'khor yang dag pa// gsang ba lte ba snying kha mgrin pa mgo ba rdo rje rnams rim bzhin sa zung re// khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las// sku gsung
148a1(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje drim gsum dang dral ba gang gis sten pa sangs rgyas nyid// khyi la sogs pa'i sha yi mig dang rang bzhin yodun dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi
148a2(rgyud): spyan/ rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngom bral ba rnams dag bzhi pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur
148a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan// rgyu 'thun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin// lus kyi sa bon khu ba phab
148a4(rgyud): ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang // mtshon bye de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying kha sgra bcas// bde ba mgon po 'khor ba 'jig/ gang gis mgrin pa de rig
148a5(rgyud): g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin// gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu badri bral bde ba shes pa ba 'dzin// gtsug tor tshangs pa'i bu gar 'gyur med mchog gi
148a6(rgyud): bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba// gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'// de ni dpag med gang gis rig pa mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas dag pa
148a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems// snang po ye shes khams 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bral so ya thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi ma mgrin par yang // sgra gcan me dang rnam
148a8(rgyud): smin snying kha sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lta ba mjug rings te// gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa can ni stong pa mun po'i khams// gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can
148b1(rgyud): drug po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang // gzugs ni phung po la sogs gang zhig yul dag rnams kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyi// dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can dag po gang
148b2(rgyud): zhig snod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa// de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul dag rnams kyang sngon mo la sogs de rnam so// gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom
148b3(rgyud): gyur pa// nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro bo pad+ma mthar byed// sgra gcan dang bcas sreg rlung rab tu bcom pa gang zhig khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ste// mjug rings dang bcas
148b4(rgyud): sreg rlung ngas par bcom pa gang zhig khro be shes rab mthar bde// srog rlung 'gogs pas ngag gnyis dgyes rjer zhi ba dir ning rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems// srog rlung bkag pas phag
148b5(rgyud): bzhi pa yis dgyes rdor byin za zhes sdang 'jom sa la byang chub sems// dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'dod chags 'jo mas pa zhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyug side'i chen por 'gyur
148b6(rgyud): zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mug 'joms pas tshangs pa bod pa dang bcas dam tshig sems// lta bar srog rlung bkang bas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje seMde'i de ni sangs rgyas nyid// snying khar
148b7(rgyud): bkag pas dri ma gsum dral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid// mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid 'gyur// dpral ba rlung gi dbang po
148b8(rgyud): 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras// lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan po
149a1(rgyud): yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum// lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dam bu brgyad dang lag mthil ser tshigs dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnam
149a2(rgyud): 'dir ni nyis 'gyur bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la// gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams 'pho ba rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lor brgyad// mgrin par sum cu rtsa gnyis rnamasu 'gyur
149a3(rgyud): tedag cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru// gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gong ba mgo bor dkar po de 'dir gsang bar dkar po'i cha// 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus
149a4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lha// dus ni dag cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum ste tshig mtsham rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku/ rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug na mkha' lag pa rgyal
149a5(rgyud): po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs// zla ba'i cha shas sum tsun mkha' gdangs can zla ba'i rtsa ni zla bzang po/ rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i ming can te// rdo rje cha
149a6(rgyud): dang bshang ba khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis ldog par 'gyur// byams pa'i tshems kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na dag po la// mngon shes lnga yi
149a7(rgyud): zhal chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas des na seng+ge ste// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum pa// dpal ldan 'dus par
149a8(rgyud): sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung // der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi rigs la gsal bar mdzad// rtsa dang sha dang rus pa
149b1(rgyud): khub khrag rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas// srog chags so so'i sangs rgyas lha yul bar snangs stengs rang rang gnas gtso bo'o gnas// mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pas
149b2(rgyud): 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrib byed rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin// rang byin rlabs pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod// 'dir ni lnga bzung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa
149b3(rgyud): dpal ldan gsang ba 'das par yang // bdud rnams yang dag bzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yi bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin
149b4(rgyud): ngang tshul khrims las skyes// skyes pa skye bar 'dong bar 'gyur/ gyi yid tsam min la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo // bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang
149b5(rgyud): bzhin gyis// bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lnga yul sa stengs bsod nams tshul khrims rnam par dman// / bas bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i lnga
149b6(rgyud): dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag gnas pa de// brtan par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mnga' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas sgrub pa min// bkug cing 'i dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs
149b7(rgyud): par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa bcing ba yi// bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral
149b8(rgyud): zhing sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa// de ni shin tu zhom me tog dri dang spos dang mer me dang ni lha ba shos dang // gseng sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bsten bya sgrub pa po la
150a1(rgyud): rab 'gyes nas// sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul sa stengs par snang rnamasu grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dusu srog gi gsang
150a2(rgyud): sngags gang zhig ni// zla ba gcig la na mkha' na mkha' stong pa brang 'gro dus ro mun par dper med bzlas// steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lan gsum bral nas srog rlung gang bas rlung dag khyer bzhin
150a3(rgyud): pas grub par 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur na mkha' 'gro bas rig po 'dzin pa de ba sod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong // ye
150a4(rgyud): shes den du dus gsum dngos po stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ga g.yo dri bral blo bad cing tshul khrims don du khu bo rdo rje mgo ber khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru// bsod
150a5(rgyud): nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par bral na sa rdo rje sa der 'gyur// shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal sring soms kyis ster ba len pas long mi spyod/ 
150a6(rgyud): yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig len pas longs spyod min/ sha dag sems kyis byin yang gang zhig sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min// 
150a7(rgyud): yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi 'gyur/ byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus chang gi don du chang 'tshong khyim du 'gro/ nyon phred sum
150a8(rgyud): mchog gi thugs rjes nya yi don du nyab rnams kyi tshong dusu// dgongs kyi dus bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro// chang nyi bud med rnams kyi dri ma gsum brel
150b1(rgyud): a ba d+hU ti dman rigs cis ma yin// gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya ba ni gcig pu nyid dam 'cha' la// gang gis bsgrub pa med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i gro ba yod pa nyid dam 'cha' ba/ 
150b2(rgyud): gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub pa dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min// gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshig sa kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bca' nyams// sgra rnams rtag
150b3(rgyud): par dam bca' na mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus med par ga ba de bzhin du// sgra rnams mi rtag dam bca' bum pa lta bur bas te shin tu stsol bas byung ba'i phyir// na mkha' las ni rtag par grub kyang
150b4(rgyud): khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rtag nges par grub// gzugs pagi byi dri dang ro yi yul rnams bzhin du lnga pa sgra ying cis ma yin/ de ni gang gis theg mar rtogs pas sa stengs par
150b5(rgyud): snang khamasu sgra des slar yang ni// rna bas ngan rnams rab tu rtog/ sa par 'gyur ba de ni sgra rnams rtag pa nyid yin lo// gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa stengs par snang
150b6(rgyud): khamasu slar yang de tshul gyis// rna bas don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas de ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam// rtag pa gsal bya gcig pu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i
150b7(rgyud): bu gar gnas// mgon pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs rnams slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la// gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar sgra yi ku cor 'gyur min nam/ 
150b8(rgyud): brtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min// dngos po'i byed po'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni// rtag pa mngon par
151a1(rgyud): gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pa ste/ byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// ches mi mthun
151a2(rgyud): par de phyir byas pa rnams ni yod par 'gyur la gcig shes de medo// gang zhig mngon par gsal ba'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin// mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag
151a3(rgyud): de yis mngon par gsal bas de yi 'bras bu cis ma yin// sgra dang don dag gal te gcig par gyur ni de tshe don nyams pa na sgra nyams 'gyur// spyi dang gsal ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur te na mkha'
151a4(rgyud): tsam dang gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nyid// stong pasgra dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum por rtag tu sgyu med 'gyur// gang gis na mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang g.yo
151a5(rgyud): ba'i 'gro banges na med pa nyid// gal te nam par dang na 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub gyur na/ de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges par sgrub pa po la nges par
151a6(rgyud): 'gyur// na mkha' sa steng dag tu gza' dang rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni me rnams dang // lha dang srin po dang ni ring gi rigs kyi dam tshig can gyi yi dwags lha min kA// sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi
151a7(rgyud): rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi// don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig du yang don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis// dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo
151a8(rgyud): ba'i dngas pa rgyu rnams las ni grib pas na// de pe ni namakha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der rang rang grug// mo gsham bu mo namakha' tsam las skyes pa namakhar 'gyur la bu ldan
151b1(rgyud): las skyes pa/ bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran phung po'i sa bon las// sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min// gal te lha cig rab tu
151b2(rgyud): 'jig par gyur na de tshe tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu// sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jigs pa min// srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i
151b3(rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te// sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang ni mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus// lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga der ni mthong
151b4(rgyud): min yod ces gag/ srog chags rnams ni sngon kyi lus po spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pas 'a rngon par 'gyur// gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi
151b5(rgyud): sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'jigs 'gyur/ srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi phreng ba chen po bzhin/ du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te/ sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag
151b6(rgyud): la pogs dang pogs mtshams rnamasu mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'gro/ srog chags srog dang lhan cig bems po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa// srid pa sum cu
151b7(rgyud): rtsa gcig rnams dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho nar 'gro/ gcig man rnam pa lnga po yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchig gi bdag nyid ni// na mkha' las 'das mi gsal
151b8(rgyud): min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min// sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min cing srog rlung med ni sems med la// srog chags sems dang lhan cig
152a1(rgyud): bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos par rig pa dang ni bems po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag/ phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung
152a2(rgyud): ba'i tshogs rnams yongasu gyur par rab tu 'byung bas na// ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i chos rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin// thams cad 'gyur meng rtag pa'i rang
152a3(rgyud): bzhin du 'gyur yang na gang zhig rtag pa nyi da ni 'gyur ba med// ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag gis ni srid sgrub la bshed// phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa
152a4(rgyud): dang ni rigs bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu// nyi dur gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pad/ ga kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phran tshun ltos phyir
152a5(rgyud): byas pa dag kyang bya ba yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid 'gyur// thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang chu dang ma dang rlung dang na mkha'i khams// gzugs dang reg bya sgra dang dra dang
152a6(rgyud): bcas pa'i bde bo rdul phran phung por gyur pa min// rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos po rab byung ba las min zhing me dang 'dren mas min// sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin la sogs par
152a7(rgyud): 'gyur gyi rang bzhin min zhing rgyu med man// rkang dang rus pa chub sha dang khu khrag tshil bu lpags pa rdul phran phung po min// rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan
152a8(rgyud): du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro// der ni lus len slar yang srid pa gzhan du de yang rnam rig tsam pa de nyid de// 'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par
152b1(rgyud): nyams/ gal te 'gro ba rnams rig tsam du 'gyur na 'dir ni don gzhan rnam par rig tsam du// de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnams rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir// gang zhig
152b2(rgyud): 'di yi ma rig blo bur ba ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig min// sngon du rnam par dag pa lhan skyes bams po yang ni rig pa rnams dag 'gyur// bems po ma lus rnam par rig pa tsam du
152b3(rgyud): 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas gag// de yi rnam rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur// bye brag par gyur yang na ser skye'i 'dod
152b4(rgyud): par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs// ga cog phyir 'bras bu yid par smra bar 'gyur te rgyal rtag pa cung \u0f7fda yod ma yin// thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha
152b5(rgyud): med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la// phra rabs rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba 'i srid pa rdul phran phung po min// rdul phran bral te namakhar
152b6(rgyud): gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rna ma par 'jig pa min// gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur na de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur// 'byung ba brtags
152b7(rgyud): pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang // sdud dang skyed pa bral bas na mkha'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas// pra rab rdul rnam
152b8(rgyud): cha shas drug la slar yid cha shis dag ste slar yang gang gi tshe shas dag/ de yi cha shas phra rab cha yis na mkha'i khams 'di gang bar cis mi 'grub// dngul chu nor bu'i rdul
153a1(rgyud): phran cha bcas cha med tshad ma dag gis bsgyur byar gyur pa min// cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs ma ni rdo yang min la rdul phran phung po cha med min// dngul chus zangs ma reg
