153a2(rgyud): cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher 'gyur la// rnam pare shes pa rnam rtog dag gi nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur min// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la gang zhig rdul
153a3(rgyud): phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa min// rnam par shes pa'i bag chags dag las na mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes gag/ gang phyir rmus long mig med yid kyi de ni mig deng
153a4(rgyud): ldan zhing ma yin de phyir min// mig gi rnam shes khams las mi ga dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yin gyi bag chags min// gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rnabs thos
153a5(rgyud): pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos pa min// sna nad bcas pa gzin ga dri yi rdul phran 'das pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin// lce yi nad can re mi myong la de nyid la yang nad med
153a6(rgyud): lce yis myong bar byed// rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tsha de mas bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phran 'das pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad
153a7(rgyud): ma yis// dag po dang ni tshangs pa'ang seng+ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas// rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyu
153a8(rgyud): skye ba med cing 'gag pa med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung // 'di ni thub pas namakha'i tshad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid // rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos
153b1(rgyud): lha dang lha min klu dang bdag lta bu yi rgyal sras rnams// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang namakha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams// khro ba rnams dang srin po sha yi dam tshig can gyi stag
153b2(rgyud): gzig byel sang dmyal ba rnams// gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid// rnam pa thams cad rdul phran gyis stong na mkha'i dkyil ltar son pa 'am
153b3(rgyud): rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin// gang zhig zad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog dam yin// gang gis de rtogs sems la dri mede dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas te// 
153b4(rgyud): gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs lam dang dge bcu la ma dang byang chub chos sogs chos rnams dang // byams pa la sogs gan sa dang rang bzhin bral ba stong ba la sogs rna
153b5(rgyud): thar pa dang // tshul khrims la sogs phung po gang zhig yul da 'bral ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa// de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams
153b6(rgyud): dang byang chub se de'i min// gang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug dang ni yul dag kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur// pha rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa
153b7(rgyud): dang de la sogs pa dag/ stong pa snang dang mun pas gsum gan su rnam pa kun nas rnam par mi rtag pa// snang bas rab tu sad pa rab ring rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags min/ 
153b8(rgyud): 'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa 'o// klu sgrub rdo rje can kyang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbang su lung bstan cing // nyams
154a1(rgyud): pa rnams kyi gos sngon can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste// ye shes mtha' can nag po'i mang can gzhan yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung / 
154a2(rgyud): ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag rngub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing // kha T+wAM ga dang rus pa'i rgyan cha chang snod cang te'u ster ba nag po'i ming cano// slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang ni kun tu
154a3(rgyud): rgyu ba ster ba na bza' sngon po can/ shaM yi dam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje'o// gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsnun
154a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon ra tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur// rab tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nus nag po'i khrag
154a5(rgyud): 'thung byed/ sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'ag la ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur// mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal
154a6(rgyud): po la 'odams// gang gi ming gis rnam rtog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min// de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sno Da sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni// 
154a7(rgyud): log par g.yem pa dge ba rnam par dral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur// skyes bus mtho ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi sha yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis/ 
154a8(rgyud): de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng+ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur
154b1(rgyud): gang yang rung ba blo gos dman pa dge ba rnam bral de ni bdud kyis bslus par 'gyur// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir
154b2(rgyud): gnyis skyes phyogs kyi sha dang khrag gis bgos pa'i mgo bo yis// nges par mnar med dmyal bar rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pa la ster bar 'go bar 'gyur// gang las bskal pa'i rgyal
154b3(rgyud): po stong brag sum cu rtsa dag rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur// bdud kyis sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dwags mkha' gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur// sems can bslu phyir kha cig du ni 'jigs
154b4(rgyud): pi man par bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par bye/ da // lha rnams sha yis dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed// sen rnams ni bskyang phyir kha cig du yang
154b5(rgyud): bdag nyid gzugs ni 'jigs byed ston paran da// long ba glags phyir 'jigs pa'i dus kyi me lha'i 'jig byed dus no mo lho rab tu byung bde byed kyis bsad lha ma yin
154b6(rgyud): khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis 'thungs par gyur// nya dang rus sbal phag rgod mau yi seng+ge lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes// nya dang de bzhin ri dwags la sogs 'o ma nags tshal
154b7(rgyud): dgon par khyab 'jug gis mi bza'// sa gsum bla mas yi dgas mkha' go rnams ni smin phyir he ru ka yaM gzugasu byas// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pis ra man yi chung ma dog phyir gnas
154b8(rgyud): 'jog gzugs byas// 'jigs sde med pas skyabs seng bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings// kir mi ri yis sha yi tsha du sum cu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs
155a1(rgyud): kyi chos byed cing // lha dang klu yi dbang po rnams kyi dam tshig 'di ni rgyal po chen rig par byos// lha ba shos 'bras chan khur bzho dang 'am mar dang bcas pa'i thug sha kha ra rnam
155a2(rgyud): khro bo rnams dang srin po rnams la phyugs kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang lnga/ sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu'am zhor bcas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka' thub la/ khrus bcas sbrang
155a3(rgyud): mar sar za zhing tsan dani me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod/ gang gis chang sogs mchod pa de dag lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min// srin po'i dbang po mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig
155a4(rgyud): dang ldan rgyal po zla ba seng+ges spyad// mdung can ma drang dro pa ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bud med min te kho mo lnga/ gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang snod nang gi chu yi gtsang sbra an+ta la
155a5(rgyud): sogs yul/ sin b+h+r-i yul na ba glang sha gang chen skyes rgyal po'i mi rnams tshong 'thung zhing // gAri sogs na ma he d+hu sha ma kha bar mi se re ni d+ha klung shide jing stag dang ma
155a6(rgyud): za la po kar yul na bing bu rnga mo khyi yi sha/ bram ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po kan+d+ha ra yi yul// nyin dang mtshan gyi dus dmangs rigs la sogs khyim du chang
155a7(rgyud): 'thung bkag la rigs skyes 'thung // bud med rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jib par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis bshad pa'i// khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i
155a8(rgyud): bi ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams// pha dag shin ma dag bu yi chung mar bag ma len pa nges par go kha'i yul// rug mar spun zla'i tsha mo len la mkhar yang ni spun zla'i bu mo rang gi bus/ 
155b1(rgyud): sor me dang tsam pa ka logs par cha mo'i bu mo dang ni tsha mo'ang yin// spun zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor bon po kaR+ShA ta la sogs pa'o// ma yi tsha mo chung mar len la ma la yang ste
155b2(rgyud): khol mo len pa ra ri'i yul// bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la ba ru lan te ra go stan rigs ngan yul// skyes pa'i bka' yas gdangs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dusu tshu yi char 'bebs byed
155b3(rgyud): gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rig byed ngag dag bden pa min// sha yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i yul can phru gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig rig byed byed pa
155b4(rgyud): pa drang srong mchog gi bka' thub can gyi rig bya da ngag de gnyis// mtho ris don du mi dang ba glang gsod cing b+ha gar bkrugs pa'i zhi ba'i btung // zhi ba'i rig byed ngag de dag
155b5(rgyud): gis sems can sun 'byin pa la rab tu mkha sa pa rnams// ba glang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba b+ha ga mtshag bkrugs rta yi pho rtags bcad pa la// khu bo khrag gis rnar
155b6(rgyud): bgos pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yis ldag par byed// de lta'i sha za'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed ngag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyis grub// nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems
155b7(rgyud): dang snying rje ldan pa'i daN+Di mtho ris rnam par nyams// pa la sogs pa'i don du 'tsho ba byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dusu phyugs dag gsod// dka' thub rnams ni 'tshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges
155b8(rgyud): par gdung zhing gong ma gom sor med// daN+DI dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur te de yang gang gi phyir// shes pas grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs dag
156a1(rgyud): gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni ngu 'bod 'gro/ lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid pas gal te sha zos pa la nyes pa mi skyed na// bcu gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi kA yi tshes dang nyi
156a2(rgyud): ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu// khyab 'jug la sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi ma bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'// pa la gnasu sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams
156a3(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i pha dang mi dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs brgyud rnam par spangs// bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho ris ngan song dag tu rab tu skye la lus bsregs nas// gnas dang gnasu
156a4(rgyud): rus pa'i dum bu 'jog cing chang bu dag kyang ster byed su zhag ni// ma yin su zhig pa yin de ni lus dang bral nas gang zhig skye gnas gzhan bzhugs pa// bram ze la sogs man
156a5(rgyud): pas gal te de yi pha ma mchod par rig byed las grub na/ bram ze la sogs ma zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur// gang gi pha dag dge dang mi dge'i dang
156a6(rgyud): gis yi dwags skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong // nges pa'i bu yis rab tu byin pa'i chang bu len par 'gyur la chu yang len par byed// tshangs pa la sogs gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag po nyi ma
156a7(rgyud): de ni ci yis bza'o// sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba 'chi ba'i 'jigs skyes lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur// zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo sems can dang bcas gtsob ci zhig blam
156a8(rgyud): bza' de ni// sen rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jigs 'joms ci yis lha ma yin rnams skrag/ gang zhig mtho ros lha rnams mi dang phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba/ 
156b1(rgyud): gang zhig yi dwags sa yi khor yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul min// sa la sogs pa lha yi de nyid nye bar zhig par gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min// tshangs gzugs s+ho// 
156b2(rgyud): nam mkha' tsam yang seng+ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid te// yi dwags la sogs rlung gi lus po rang bzhin yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman// sa dang chu dang me yi lus can sa dang ba
156b3(rgyud): snang dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan// rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis bzung bya'i kha dog gzugs// dri ni sna yis bzung bya 'dir ni lha yis ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams
156b4(rgyud): rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis// gzugs med de yi/ das sa dang bar snang dag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams bskyod pa
156b5(rgyud): min mo bsham bu dang mtshungs pa na mkha' / me la na mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang // gzhan dgag/ zugs can bzhi stes dang chu dang byin pa rlung rnamasar yi dbang po
156b6(rgyud): gnyis// bram ze sogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mi mar me med na yang // byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtsham su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur
156b7(rgyud): srin po dang ni yi dwags la sogs tshogs po mtshan mo'i dusu lha rnams ma lus kyang // bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar na skar ma ma lus kyang // bya rog srin bye lce spyang
156b8(rgyud): khyi rnams ma lus 'byung dang 'thung 'gyur byung ba ma lus ston// de bzhin lhag ma'i chang bus sgrub pa'i the brang dag gis skyes bu rnams la yang // byol song rnams ni gang du rang gi sems
157a1(rgyud): la bab pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'cha' la// de dag shes pa bram ze rnams la srid pa gang las mig gis bzung ba'i rgyu gzhan min// lha mo gzhan du ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung 'gyur
157a2(rgyud): 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed// bram ze shi nas yi dwags gyur pas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed// sbyin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so bag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par byed// blo
157a3(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i spyod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi dwags spyod pa ltos// mun pa bsal ba min par gyur la mun las khwa te de yi bre shang ba las byung ba// mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed
157a4(rgyud): skyed byed des na mes po khA ta mchod par 'os// ba glang rgya ba dang ra yi / kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med b+ha gar phyag bya// da cing // khams rnams gtong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir
157a5(rgyud): bcas pa ldag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams// sgra med yi ge med las na mkhar 'gyur te na mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las// rlung las ma la me las chu yin chu las se ste sa las 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams// zas
157a6(rgyud): dang zhud dag zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag/ bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gra'i srog chags phung po rab tu 'thung // mo ba shas bu yi zhu
157a7(rgyud): bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra// na mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa na mkha'i rtag/ rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung
157a8(rgyud): dang na mkha'i dngos po de rnam so// gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing na mkha'i sa stengs dag tu zhing ba'i grub mthar ldan// gang zhig de yis nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya rnams gsum lam ldan sgur mo 'dzin
157b1(rgyud): byed ma// de ni na mkha' las 'das na mkha'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsa bcings 'khyil pa can// na mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i phreng ba mgo nas bshang lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma// 'chu
157b2(rgyud): 'phang skar ma'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa skyed byed za byed rnams kyi za bad ma// gsal dang mi gsal cig ma rigs las rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma// rig ma'i 'khor
157b3(rgyud): lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur pa'i thar pa ster ba'i dbang giso 'bigs// mi gsal bya rog ra yi gzhu la 'dir ni rang gi yon tan ru sbal spu yi byas// nam mkha' me tog lcags mda'i mda'
157b4(rgyud): gzhus gang dag 'bigs pa des ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur// gal te skye dang 'jigs pa'i rgyu ru sgyu ma chen mo byed dam he ru kar 'gyur na// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pI
157b5(rgyud): sgyu mo ji ltar min// 'di ni thub pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni// rdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin
157b6(rgyud): 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur// gang zhig srin po yi dgas mkha' gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha yi dam tshig can gyis bsgrubs// grub pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan rnams kyis ni de rnams nges par 'bebs par byed pa
157b7(rgyud): steng stag la sogs pa 'gas la tshul me 'bar glang che ni rangs byed mtshon cha sogs kyis min// sngags kyis thi brang la sogs rnams kyis sa yi 'khor yug rtogs par rje bo'i bya ba byed// byang chub
157b8(rgyud): seMda' 'jig rten dbang phyug lha mI Sh+yakr-I rnams ni sangs rgyas paso bsgrubs nas// gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster// skal po ngan dang no
158a1(rgyud): kyis sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed// seng+ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi bal sogs byed par 'gyur/ byang chub
158a2(rgyud): don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan las gzhan ma gsungs// dbu ma'i dga'o ba gcig pu b+ha gar bklags pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis mi yin// bde gshegs
158a3(rgyud): dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo'i sa gni byang chub shing lnga gzhan du min/ sha ya~M dam tshig can gyi grub pa yi dwags sa gzhir shing cig las ni gzhan du min// bde gshegs dam tshig can
158a4(rgyud): gyis byang chub lha las gshegs nas chos kyi'akhor lo bskor ba 'jug/ sha yi dam tshig can gyis grub pa'i yi drags 'jug pas phran chags las la rab tu 'jug/ 
158a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas lhas 'jug pa na bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston// grub pa'idwags 'jug pa sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo la/ 
158a6(rgyud): ston byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyed par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la min// grub pa rnams kyis ri dwages rigs bskyed ston pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan lam
158a7(rgyud): yinas dang ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan// gang zhig dag po dur khrod dag tu phyogs kyi skye bo stobs can thod pa can rgyud ston
158a8(rgyud): rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khangs stengs las 'byung po de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do// gsal bar mgon pa'i 'khor li legs par bzhag par gyur pas thar pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// 
158b1(rgyud): rgyal po srog gcod pa las dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin/ sha
158b2(rgyud): yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang srid pa gzhan du lha mi ni rigs skyes// sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi rigasu 'di skye'o// migo zlum dang ni yugs sa
158b3(rgyud): mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong ba nyid du rab tu 'gro// mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang srid gzhan 'jigs byed nyid 'ogro// sems can phan pa byis pas bsod nams
158b4(rgyud): nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par na mkha' tsam pos ston// sangs rgyas rnam
158b5(rgyud): dang 'jig byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnam/ sa kyis bstan pa lha rten gang // g.yul du zhugs pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jig
158b6(rgyud): par byed// de rnams rigs bzhi gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden par smra dang gtsang sbra rab tu 'jug/ gzhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bstan// 
158b7(rgyud): khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan mtshan mo so so'i dusu nyin gung phyed yol dang // srod dang thun gsum dag dang nyi ma ri la shar bar gyur nas ldan lngar phyag byed cing // sa stengs
158b8(rgyud): lha yul dag tu stag gzig/ mu stegs dag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob// dge bo'i g.yul ngor pha ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal po ni// rgyal po
159a1(rgyud): zab mo yin pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs byed la sogs mchod nas// sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdang brgyang
159a2(rgyud): 'chad par 'byung // grub pa bya Di dbang po sbyin pa mi phyugs zhabs dang dum bu zhes bya thod pa can// dge slong klu sgrub zhes bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs paM/ slob
159a3(rgyud): dpon 'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams// gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kye ma de lta dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod// dge bcu lam gyis grub
159a4(rgyud): par gyur pa 'phags pa'i lha dang la ba'i na bzer/ dbyangs dang // phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam/ pa btsun pa pad+ma'i myu gu zhes// pang go sa la rtog pa'i rgyal
159a5(rgyud): po ma lus nag po rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi dang // de bzhin gzhon dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phrog byed sogs kyis byin gyis rlabs// sa dang chu dang byin za rlung
159a6(rgyud): dang na mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yang yan lag dag/ de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung bas 'gyur gyi gzhan lo dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// nyi ma gang du tshangs pa'i sa bon nye bar
159a7(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur ba des na dus phyi mar// sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g.yul ngor kla klo dang na muM stegs 'jig par 'gyur// thung dang ring ba lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs
159a8(rgyud): yig yon tan la sogs min// e sogs ma nong dbyangs yig stobs bcu mnga' bas gsung ste nyi ma 'thab mo zad phyir// ring dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du a ko ka ni ring po phyugs bdag
159b1(rgyud): tshigs las 'gyur// de phyir ma ning yod la i ko ya na tsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod// zag ma'i lo nas na mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang zla ba cin ci ni yi dbang phyug 'byung // de yi ba/ 
159b2(rgyud): yis yi dwags dbang bsgyur dus la ka sogs grogs ldan sgur mor byin rlabs pa// phyi nas so stengs son pa'i gnas dang zhing gi lha gang drug cu rtsa brgyad kra klo yi// mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu
159b3(rgyud): mo spun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jigs par byed// der ni bco brgyad la la brgya yis brgyal bsgyur bas ma kha la sogs 'phags pa'i yul kli klo rnams kyi lha khang mun can nyi mar rtogs pa
159b4(rgyud): gang de nga yis brlag par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum tshogs skye dgu rnams ni der bzhag nas// bde la bkad ka lA pa nas lha gnas dga'
159b5(rgyud): ldan mchog tu nyi ma 'gro bar bya// na mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dbang po mog gis dus kyi dasu son bi'i lo yi tshad// slar yang skye bo rnams ni kla klor 'jug ste ji srid bco brgyad
159b6(rgyud): lo la bsgyur ba'o bar// yang nas yang du nga yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par ba bi nyid// ji srid sa dang chu dang me rlung na mkha'i yon tan na mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams// phyogs
159b7(rgyud): skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lha na mkha' sa gzhir yi dwags bram ze ba glang sogs// sa 'og klu dang lha min rnams ni saM yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod// don kun grub
159b8(rgyud): phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa nyid mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod// slob dpon mchog la gzho
160a1(rgyud): bas srung ba lnga po rab tu bri nim me tog rnams kyis mchod// sngon du khrus pas gos sngon snga dri gso sbyong blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon// klog mkhan bzhi dang
160a2(rgyud): lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyon dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur// slar yang de la bsrung ba ba zhing nyi ma bcu ru na dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya// zho dang 'bras cha ni nyi mar rta dang glang po'i gtor ma 'bras
160a3(rgyud): chan 'o ma zla ba la// 'bras chan la sogs mig dmor gza' la me tog bcud dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan gza' lag la// 'bras tshon ser po bu rim sogs kyi gtor ma lha yi gtor ma lba
160a4(rgyud): yi bla ma'o thug sha khar gyis// ba ba sangs la zan don mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de skyon la// nyi ma slar yang phyogasu glang po rnams kyi gtor ma byazhing khu
160a5(rgyud): ba 'bras chan gyi// glang po rta mchog rnams kyis zhi dang rgyas pa'i don du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs gzar// 'bru dang mar sar ma dur ba mda' yi yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i
160a6(rgyud): mchod yon btung // sbyin sreg rjes la dung phor gang ba'i zhi ba'i zhu yis rta dang glang po khrus bya'o// yi dwags la sogs gtor ma sran chan sha dang chang rnams nyin mtshan dusu sbyin par 'gyur
160a7(rgyud): srin po la sogs yur kar dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs mtshams rtogs par phur bus gdag// slob dpon gyis ni srung ba lnga yi tshogs rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya// gang dang ga
160a8(rgyud): gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye dgu nyin dang mtshan du zhi dang rgyas 'gyur ba// thog mar dbus bsgrub pa'i ming dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las pad+ma lnga yis bskor// gang zhig rang bzhin yon
160b1(rgyud): tan dbang las sa dag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol du// gang zhig zur rnams dang dbyangs bcings pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de las rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur// rgyal chen phyogs kyi
160b2(rgyud): zur lam lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs mtshams rnams// de nad zlum po'i rnam bu phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu de la snod dang rtse mo'i phreng du 'gyur// pad+ma'i ge sar
160b3(rgyud): chal 'dir ni dag ste lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid// chu skyes mdab mar srung 'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis pa gsum par de// de ltar pad+ma gnyis la gyur te/ 
160b4(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma rnam gnyis de// klu rnams zla dang gi bar du phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar de bzhin lha dang lha min dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang
160b5(rgyud): gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams// srung 'khor 'dis ni thams cad srung ra 'gyur te khrag dang gi wang la sogs
160b6(rgyud): rnams kyis bris// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyis srung ba lnga sogs ma lus srung 'khor gsungs// bud med bu 'dod pa las bu dang rgyal po dag dang g.yul
160b7(rgyud): 'gyed pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur// nad pa nad las grol bar 'gyur te sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nirare rnyed 'gyur// skyes pa bud med rnams kyis 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ba sngon
160b8(rgyud): gyi bsod nams mthu yi so// bsod nams sems can rnams la phan btags dge bzhi'i lam gyi mchod las na mkha' sogs la min// bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung gyur dang gcer bu
161a1(rgyud): pa 'am ral pa can nam dbyug can// dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral bas grub mtha'i spyod pa nyams// sum cu'i dam tshig can gyi mi dbang blo
161a2(rgyud): de rnams yul nas bsnyad par bya// gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang mi dge'i las bas drug cu'i cha shas rgyal po yin// yug sa mo rnams gang zhig 'khrig pa spyad nas ngan pa dmal ba
161a3(rgyud): 'bras ster mnga' rtsor byed// gang du yul na bdud ris da yod mi bdag dpung bcas dar ni nam yang grub ma yin// rgyal po sa yi steng du rgyal srid dang ni ngag dag 'joms dang nor rnyed bsod nams
161a4(rgyud): kyisang skal pa bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lha yul sa steng gab pa'i rig pa 'dzin// sa stengs ma lus mi yi rgyal po sbyin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas
161a5(rgyud): lha rgyal po// bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang / mtshan du rtsod pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur// skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral
161a6(rgyud): ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel// shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stong nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// chos kyi dbyingasu gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gal te
161a7(rgyud): 'khor bar byon pa ma yin na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yul dang yul can lhan cig na mkha'i khams rnams// da ni brdzun gyi tshig las de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun
161a8(rgyud): mo'o b+ha gar bzhugs zhes pa// 'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo rje sems las gzhan du min// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams sa stang dmyal ba'i dmyal ba
161b1(rgyud): sa 'dir zhi ba la sogs kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha'i cho su gsal bar byas// tshangs pa la sogs bsod nams longs spyod mthar ni lha yul sa steng
161b2(rgyud): dag nas ltung bar 'gyur// srin mos byin rlabs rnams kyis de las thar pa 'dod pa de ni na mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin// byis pa rnams la rang rang ma yis brdzun tshig 'jam pos bdag nyid drung du
161b3(rgyud): khrid par byed// chang pa stong pa ston cing bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa long zhig pu zhes brjod// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyis lag nas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag nyid drung du
161b4(rgyud): khrid// na mkha' tsam zhig ston zhing bdag gi rigs/ kyi mya ngan las 'das pa long zhig bu zhes gsungs// sems/ can rnams kyis bsam pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin pa rna
161b5(rgyud): la gso sbyong gsal bar mdzad// de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyid ni thub pa'i bka' yi gsang sngags theg pa bden pa yin/ gang zhig bskal pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang
161b6(rgyud): sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan to// mo ga sham bu ni lus med ma lus yon tan
161b7(rgyud): rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'das pa rnams// srog ni namakha'i me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas glog cing dgod// srog chags bya rog rA min bsod nams sdig pa'i
161b8(rgyud): dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnamasu 'khor// srog chags gang zhig rdul phran phung po'i lus ni sa steng 'chi ba'i tshe na mi ltung med// rgyud kyi rgyal po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas sang+yas
162a1(rgyud): pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pas// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang sangs rgyas pa dang lha klu dri za lha min dang // khro bo srin po sha yi dam tshig can dang stag gzig
162a2(rgyud): rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams// da kun shaM b+ha la zhes bya bar rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas dor ni nyi ma bdag gis bstan// dpal ldan 'bras bung chos kyi dbyingasu stabs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig
162a3(rgyud): bdud rnams btul mdzad pa// de kun shaM b+hu la yi dpal ldan ka lA pa yi skyed mis tshal gyis dus 'khor gyi// don chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas
162a4(rgyud): dris dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rini chan sang+ga'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs// dpal dang por sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor la
162a5(rgyud): rgyud phyi ma// rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba rdzogs// lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong mnyan chung dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
162a6(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga nA ki nI dza la saM bar nam ut+ta ra tan+ta/ bid skad/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro rgyu ma bde ba'i
162a7(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// zad
162a8(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog chags med chags dang bral
162b1(rgyud): ba min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin
162b2(rgyud): gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'gab par 'gyur// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur
162b3(rgyud): na bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub/ ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyog rgya 'od// mkha'ag ma zhes 'ardar bstan te// nA ni na mkha' 'gro ba zhes// khoms las mngon du brtags pa ste/ nam kha
162b4(rgyud): kun tu spyod 'grub pa// mkha' ga ma zhes rab tu gra// / thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yis// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkhA
162b5(rgyud): 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// de ni na mkha' 'gro ba zhes// sangs rgyas khams las rnam par btags// kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' gro ma'o// sha zhes bya
162b6(rgyud): ba bde bar bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad ni bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs
162b7(rgyud): rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems pa'i ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// dzi na byang
162b8(rgyud): chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // de bzhin pad+mo pad+mo 'chang // nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang // de dag gi yang rigs yin// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol
163a1(rgyud): ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang // rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// gnas pa thams cad de nyid// 'gro ba
163a2(rgyud): dag ni ma lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyuro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin te// 
163a3(rgyud): namakha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchogo// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sang+yas zad ma thob
163a4(rgyud): ba/ phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba// de ni bdag gi brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag gi dede ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las// sangs
163a5(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag bde mchog/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma/ yin sems// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzu gas brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor
163a6(rgyud): skye// yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa/ lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa las
163a7(rgyud): rnol 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de pas thams cad bdag skye
163a8(rgyud): pas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin// de bas bdag nyid ltar sbyar bas/ bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub bar bya// 
163b1(rgyud): de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad de// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de
163b2(rgyud): skad gsung so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya brtags pa ste dang po'o// 
163b3(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyar ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas// 
163b4(rgyud): dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thad mnyam sbyar ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// bde bas pa de ba nyid kyi ni// sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo// sangs rgyas
163b5(rgyud): pad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug pa chen po// 'di la khrus dang sdom mi dgos// dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos//  ka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dka' bas 'gru
163b6(rgyud): de bas ci ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun za de bzhin thams cad sbyor// spyad pa ji ltar 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dang ni 'dug pa 'am// 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang
163b7(rgyud): rung dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung // gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'gru
163b8(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// zad sgrub par byed pa na// ngan zos ngani spyod thams cad kyis// nyes pa dag tu yong mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi 'thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa
164a1(rgyud): thams cad// phyag rgya'i cho ga dag gis ni// bsgrubs na kun du 'thob 'gyur ba// bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad
164a2(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba// cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis// thad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag/ bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur
164a3(rgyud): rgya 'di bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ shin tu byin gyis brlabs ni ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas
164a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgya/ sa kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'gru/ ba bar 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing / rnam pa
164a5(rgyud): pa kun du mchod byed na// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag
164a6(rgyud): tu ma zhugs pa'ang // bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas dngos gab thams cad grub// 
164a7(rgyud): 'di dang sang+yas thad la// rnal 'byor thad mnyam sbyor bas// bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rnam pa thadu
164a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par// de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas// mchod pa'i sprin chen tha~Md kyis// bkod pa rab 'byams chog dag gis
164b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// 
164b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas// dpal ni gzhir 'gyur gab par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma lus
164b3(rgyud): thams cad// rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis// ji ltar bde bar bstan byed cing // rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjesu sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rnal 'byor kun gyi
164b4(rgyud): bde ba dag/ bdag nyid kun tu myang byed na// shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis//  sa ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang // lang
164b5(rgyud): nad med bde mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro/ sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
164b6(rgyud): 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsung so// / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las dpal rdo rje sems dpar// kun tu sbyor
164b7(rgyud): bar brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro sgyu ma bde ba'i
164b8(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje se de'i rnal 'byor pa// dang ldan rang gi dam tshig bde// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni
164b9(rgyud): phyag rgya chen dun mas na su kru 'ashul rje me myo ba yi mthu ga kyis na
165a1(rgyud): thams cad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi dam tshig de byung ba// sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes drang // shin tu sbyor dang
165a2(rgyud): sbyor chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa/ lhan cig spyod pas rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyar ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar
165a3(rgyud): thang dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che// rtag pa dam pa lha mo yis// rgyal mos mchad pa thams cad mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang // thams cad lha mo 'dres pas ni// ma lus
165a4(rgyud): skal pa bzang po kun// bde ba so so rjesu 'gab// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo bde ba chen mo kun// thams
165a5(rgyud): cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig med stobs kyis/ ngo 'thun du// phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun nas byung ba yi// mchod
165a6(rgyud): pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis// bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyis// thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba// ri
165a7(rgyud): chen tshogs rnams thaMd kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis rab tu mtsho
165a8(rgyud): rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis// rjesu sbyor ba mchod byed cing // rtag tu myang bar byed pa na/ shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas zad bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba des// rdo rje
165b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i dpal me dang / lang mon med bde mchog 'gug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi skye chen dang / sangs rgyas kun gyis gsung snyan pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mam
165b2(rgyud): ba che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po/ rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' spyod na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // 
165b3(rgyud): lha mo thams cad ga'i chen po// 'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam pa'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// dngos grub kun gyi bdems pas// de lnga
165b4(rgyud): rgya chen mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub
165b5(rgyud): kun gyis bde mos pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dbang phyug kun gyi bde mos pa// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam skyer
165b6(rgyud): // mkha'agro sgyu ma bde mchog des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungaso// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
165b7(rgyud): par sbyor ba me khe 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las// lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba bskal pa mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// // 'di ni rnal
165b8(rgyud): 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ skal pa ba'ang ma chag
166a1(rgyud): 'dod pa ste/ yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myed pa/ 'dod chags ther zug bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs che dang // dbangs dang dri dang ro dag dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi reg
166a2(rgyud): bde mchog/ rang gi spyod par de spyod do// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa// gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i// skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos// lha yi dngos gab
166a3(rgyud): dga' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// skal pa bzang po bde myong bas// so sor rjesu rang 'grub 'gyur// dengos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ 
166a4(rgyud): bskal pa bzang po longs spyod kun/ rang gis spyad par de spyo da do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang // 'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa/ 
166a5(rgyud): phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// khams gsum dag na ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed/ 
166a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs nas de spyod na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan// phrogs las gang
166a7(rgyud): dang dran las dga'// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang cheni gyi// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na// ling
166a8(rgyud): spyod gzhan ci zhig smos// de yis mi sbyin cing yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun/ mi bya ba ni gang yang med// sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // phrogs
166b1(rgyud): nas kyang ni sbyin byed na/ las mchog dag ni rab 'byam dang // dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za// sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gab chen po/ 
166b2(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba rab gab pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' go sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug/ la lar byang chub sems
166b3(rgyud): chen po// la la ra spyod pa 'thun par 'gro/ la lar dga' ldan lha dag las// dam pa shin tu 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba rnam par dag/ la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub tshon por ga sh+ye
166b4(rgyud): la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal// la lar byang chub mngon 'ang rgya// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar pha rol mu ste gas rnams// chos dang 'thun par char gcedado// la
166b5(rgyud): lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// gab pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog/ grub pa'i dbang phyag bla na med// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
166b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// 'dul ba'i thabasu nges pa'i gar// rnam par sprul pa dgyes shing rol// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag// gzu
166b7(rgyud): dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'
166b8(rgyud): rab tu 'grub// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'dabs// lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams// brtan par sems can dag la smin// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde
167a1(rgyud): / mchog gis// sems can kun gyi den byed cing // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'as de skad gsung so// 
167a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ mkha'ogro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste// dpal dam tshig gi brtag pa ste
167a3(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bac+doMs/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhini gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'i glo sgyu ma bde pa'i mchog/ yang dag grub pa gcig
167a4(rgyud): bu nyid// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// rtog pa'i chag thams cad la/ grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ smon/ las kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems
167a5(rgyud): can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pas// sems can kun don rnams sprul na// myur da shin
167a6(rgyud): tu 'grub par 'gyur// nyin re'am yang na zla ra 'am// yang na de bzhin lo re ni// ci bzhon byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o// khams kyi ngo bo zad dang // de bzhin srog
167a7(rgyud): dang rtsa las 'byung // rang gi lha yi cha lug su// bsgrub pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor gang dag ma bsten pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der/ 
167a8(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas des sgrub po// de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpal
167b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa dam pa brtan
167b2(rgyud): pa ste/ rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni 'dar bar dka'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// 'dul ba'i phyir ni bas
167b3(rgyud): pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ kun gyi dngos por 'di 'byung // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam pa
167b4(rgyud): sno kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mag rnams// sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub// dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon
167b5(rgyud): byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung // de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu ston pa nyid la
167b6(rgyud): brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gags shing yongasu mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// grol ba thad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs
167b7(rgyud): rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmags te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyis snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// 
167b8(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin par gsal// rtag pa med pa'i chos rnams la// sems can don du yongs brtags pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya// brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra
168a1(rgyud): 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus// dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa
168a2(rgyud): bstod// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yin tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// 
168a3(rgyud): dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// / yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med// depe ni na mkha' dang yang snyun du yod pa'ang min// dngos grub mtha' med dpa dang
168a4(rgyud): dral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par rtsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thug/ sa rdza shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med
168a5(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don gab rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshod dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar
168a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog rtsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu
168a7(rgyud): bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang ni go 'phang dam pa brnyes// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa
168a8(rgyud): med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgya chen te// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sang+yas
168b1(rgyud): thams cad grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis// dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun// dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sku ni lta bas mi
168b2(rgyud): ngoms pa// thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang // legs zhes nas dngos grub min// mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang // bsam pa thams cad yongs
168b3(rgyud): su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad// de nas de yis sgrub pa dang // shin tu brtag pa'i dngos gab dag/ gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos
168b4(rgyud): grub shin tu rtag thob bshad// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo lan gsum rnam par sbyar ba yi// thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdag// 
168b5(rgyud): dbang po gang dag gang lam gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyar ba yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing // ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang / 
168b6(rgyud): Da ba la sogs pa yi// ci nas yongasu ma skyo bar// gau tu tshad med bzlas par bya// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa// rab
168b7(rgyud): tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o// 'di yis sangs rgyas zad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon
168b8(rgyud): tan bsngags pa rgya che ba// bsted pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan gcig glur blangs pas// kun tu 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa rtag pa'i mchog/ dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid chos
169a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun grub ste// de bas
169a2(rgyud): dam tshig gsum la sogs// rtog pa bla med thad kyis// na mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par bkrol// dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbyugs phyung ba'o// 
169a3(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de mi sems can thams cad na/ shin tu
169a4(rgyud): khro gtum gdug par gyur/ shin tu gdugs par khro ba yi/ sa// 'o dad 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos nas sim sa can de// bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyar bas/ 
169a5(rgyud): shin tu gdug po chen por gyur// zlo ni bdud kyis byin rlabs nas// rims dang drag dang dbyig dug nad// phra men ma dang gnod byed gdon// bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid/ shin tu gdug
169a6(rgyud): pa chen por gyur// gsum pa ni 'jigs byed cing // sgrub pa po rnams la yang za// lha la sogs pa'ang 'phro bar byed// bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed// de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha// tshangs
169a7(rgyud): pa drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// 'jug sel la yang skyabasu dang // tshangs dang 'jug sel lha rnams kyang // lce chen drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa 'jug sel
169a8(rgyud): dbang chen dang / rdo rje can la skyab su dang / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyar ba yis/ rdo rjes gol phyag rgyas ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad/ rdo rje sems das
169b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings// rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na// de yi bka' tsam gyis bsgrags nas// 'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcings pa
169b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thad gshegs 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pra// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis
169b3(rgyud): til 'bru bzhin tu rgyas// shin tu gdug par gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas
169b4(rgyud): kyang / 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas tha da khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// de nas sna yi rtse mo la// yid ni brtan par yang dag
169b5(rgyud): gzung // sna yi dbugs ring dro ba lnga// rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bas
169b6(rgyud): thal bas rab tu 'jig/ sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i ngang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar por 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod kyi ni ma dang 'dra// 'bar ba
169b7(rgyud): chen po sgra 'bar ba// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jigs pa chen po dus ltar dag/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur
169b8(rgyud): ba dang // sprin ma khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas// gu ling dbang chen nyi dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar
170a1(rgyud): byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig/ rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni bsil ba yis// thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de yi 'bar
170a2(rgyud): ba nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa// bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs// bdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus// rgyal ba de ni de dag dang // lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol// thams cad rdo rje
170a3(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' go dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis// shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnamasu// sangs byang chub dag
170a4(rgyud): la bkod// rdo rje gdong khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas ba'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal he ru
170a5(rgyud): kas dbugs byung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung
170a6(rgyud): ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// log par lta la gnas par 'gyur// shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis// 'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam
170a7(rgyud): sbyang phyir// pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yi// rdo rje cho su gnas par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pa mi gos pas// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par
170a8(rgyud): dag/ 'dis ni kun tu gzigs pas na// rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid 'gyur// dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na// mchag
170b1(rgyud): sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// sna tshogs pa ni 'dul ba s+ho// kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal// pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ pad+mo'i rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba
170b2(rgyud): mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// pad+mo gar dbang la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal pad+mo gar gyi
170b3(rgyud): dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de ba zhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung
170b4(rgyud): bad de che sems can thad ni/ shin tu gdug cing ba rkam par gyur/ shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa y+r-i/ yi dwags rnams dang dmyal bar ltung // de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni/ 
170b5(rgyud): shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur// bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun gsod par byed/ shin tu gdug basbyang ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i
170b6(rgyud): don gyi nor chen po// rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur// na mkha'i snying pos thams cad phyogs// kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' la rin chen thad 'bebs/ 
170b7(rgyud): shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dadog pas kyang ni khad par du// rgyal bar byas
170b8(rgyud): nas gnas gsum gyi// nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klasau pa'i// sems can khoms
171a1(rgyud): ni rab tu bkol// dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
171a2(rgyud): rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar 'gyur// shin tu brtson 'grus chung ba yis// man re med pa yi dumal bar lhung // rnal
171a3(rgyud): 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal ni byung bar gyur// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med
171a4(rgyud): stabs kyis ngo 'thon du// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// shin tu gdug cing khre gtum pa'i// sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ byi ba
171a5(rgyud): rkun po chom po yis// thams cad rnam par spyod bar byed// brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang // ngo mthon stobs kyis dang zhin du// dag cha lnga yis bskal nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten
171a6(rgyud): gsum las rgyal// skye 'gre gnas pa 'gro ba rnam sa// mtha' dag brtul nas 'grub par 'gyur// 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu skyong // g.yem pa
171a7(rgyud): rnams la g.yem par gyur// khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog/ zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la dag pos gnon// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam pa rab
171a8(rgyud): mnan nas// lha me b+hi mo phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// mthu bo che yang rab mnan nas// rug mi ni yang phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang
171b1(rgyud): gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// skye dgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas// lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrog/ de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni rab
171b2(rgyud): mnan nas// dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma// phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par
171b3(rgyud): rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// thabs dang rtsal gyis grub pa yi// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs na ni// kham+ba
171b4(rgyud): gsum rgyal srid ma lus par// rdo rje 'dzin pa de sa thob nas// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog/  ga shul sbyor bas grub par byed// thams cad dag par
171b5(rgyud): mos pa yi// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu'i grel// lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub
171b6(rgyud): bde chen po// go 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag/ ring gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing // 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag/ seMn
171b7(rgyud): rnams la brtan par sbyin// rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// sems can kun gyi don kyang byed// da ltar rta mchog dpal la
171b8(rgyud): sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// namakha'i dbyings kyi mthar klas pa'i// sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs// dpal rta mchog gi dbugs phyung ba'o// 
172a1(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags// na mkha'
172a2(rgyud): kun gyi skabs ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba mkha' go sgyu ma bde
172a3(rgyud): ba'i mchog las gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang thams cad du/ rnam pa sna tshogs mchog byung ba'i// sang+yas thod mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha'
172a4(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gas ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thaMd bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs
172a5(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mtshog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pa spras// dril bu rgyal mtshan
172a6(rgyud): mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bres pa na/ rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me de dang sogs ldan pa// sangs
172a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub// yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam// skyed mos tshal la sogs pa sgrub// der ni dang por gden bshams te// 'jam
172a8(rgyud): zhing reg na bde gyur pa// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogaso// de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje/ 
172b1(rgyud): sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de na rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// stan de dag ni thams cad la// ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rdo rje rin chen
172b2(rgyud): pad+ma sogs// sgo srang dang ni ldan par byas// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// mi yi
172b3(rgyud): tshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya bar ba shed// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni dgrub pa'o// rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rjer bcas// mtshal chen po dag sgrub pa ni// mthu yis rang/ 
172b4(rgyud): thugrub pa ste// pad+mo'i snod kyi nang du banago// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshig 'a
172b5(rgyud): ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen po ni bsgrubs pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen dang ni ga pur bcas
172b6(rgyud): tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbusu bzhag pa ni// ra sa ya na kun slong ba// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs nas// rtag pa yi// 
172b7(rgyud): ni dngos grub thog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ras ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub/ sangs rgyas thad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' ga
172b8(rgyud): sgyum pade mchog gis// 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ sangs rgyas la sogs brtan
173a1(rgyud): g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyuraro// 'dis ni srung ba byas pas dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkha'agro bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams
173a2(rgyud): cad bdag nyid 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus// ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs gos bzang bgos dang ni// me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang pos// smed
173a3(rgyud): pas dal gyi dal gyis// gos dgob pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar ba dag ni mthong ba yi// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur
173a4(rgyud): zhing / bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas rnam par rgyan// brtan zhing grub pa slob byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bang
173a5(rgyud): ba ni/ stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus// na mkha' nyid dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshe gas pas bzheng su gsal// rdo rje sems dpa'i skal bzang dpal
173a6(rgyud): khyod bdag/ 'di dag nyid kyis glur blangs na/ shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i// shi ba'ang slar ni slongs 'gyur na/ yang srid kha lta ci zhig smos// lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa// rnam par
173a7(rgyud): 'das pas mdzes par byas// sna tshogs 'brang ba rab tu 'grub// 'jig rten gsum ni rab sgrub pa// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o// 'jig rten gsum la
173a8(rgyud): sgyid sbyin pa// 'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// a ra li ni kun 'gab 'gyur// 
173b1(rgyud): namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo kun dang bdems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs// nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor// mkha 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog
173b2(rgyud): 'byung // lan cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba// brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// sna tshogs 'brang bas de bzhin du// gan+d+har ba dang sha da bil// glu dbyangs sna tshogs
173b3(rgyud): glus sgrub bo// de nas de nyid dam pa yis// thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid la// glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya// rje suM chags pa'i rnam mang dga' bo'i pad+mo rnam dag pa'i
173b4(rgyud): mchod pas gsal bar rje su mchod byas nas// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod// kye ma 'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba shin
173b5(rgyud): tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa/ ngagi dam tshig skyon med dag la rol cig rol cig ho// ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i
173b6(rgyud): phyir/ rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnamaso// gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba
173b7(rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'bor bde ba mkha'ag sgyu ma ho// kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i ris grub chen po rab tu bsgrub lo ston/ dzaHhUM baM ho// e ma'o bde mchog bde bar dengs// rnam par sprul hUM
173b8(rgyud): snang bar mdzod// a la l-i ho// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mkha' gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis// slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsal// glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la na
174a1(rgyud): na// kun gyi sgyus 'a pa'i mchogs lus lus pa med par 'jug lnga 'di dag ni len pa// dkyil la ba rdzogs thams du/ sas rgyas sa cad ma
174a2(rgyud): ga/ ma lus lus pa med par snang / rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgram ba mchog sgyums thang
174a3(rgyud): spu gtan te te ts+tsha/ rnam mang rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thad rab sprul rnam par
174a4(rgyud): sbrul hUM hAhUM/ rnam pa mang po khro ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par dul mkhas pa/ de zhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyums thams
174a5(rgyud): cad rab spru bo rnam par sprul// ru lu ru lu hUM dz+yo ts+tsha/ rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma
174a6(rgyud): bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ hUM shi Sh+ya bi Shan+d+he/ de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mo mnyam pa'i// namakha'i dbyings kyi mthi' klos
174a7(rgyud): pa'i sa rang byung rnams kyi glu yi rgya// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blas
174a8(rgyud): pa dang // lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mtshad sprin rnam bkod pa// rab 'byam tsho/ 
174b1(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyis// kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus// ma lus lus pa med par
174b2(rgyud): 'grub// ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis// bud med dag kyang bsgrubs nas ni// rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams dang // 'dra bar byin gyis
174b3(rgyud): brlabs bsgrubs nas// sngon med rol mo'i sil snya ni dang // rnam par 'phrul pas 'gab par 'gyur// lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa'i bde mos pas// bdag nyid rang gi lhar
174b4(rgyud): mthong zhing // mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can/ rnam pa kun tu skal bzang po'i// bde ba lnga
174b5(rgyud): dag grub par byed// sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin rlabs pas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor ba'i// dngos grub kun gyi ba de ba rnams// dkyil 'khor mthong dka' myong bar 'gyur/ 
174b6(rgyud): rdo rje sa dar mnyam sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang
174b7(rgyud): ro bde bas// rdo rjes de'i bdag nyid du// de yis rab mthong mchod par byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid kyi// ngos
174b8(rgyud): grub ma lus lus med 'gab// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar// rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang // de nas yang / 
175a1(rgyud): // dag rab bsang bas// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gar gyi phyag rgya mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin ga she/ 
175a2(rgyud): nga'i dam par grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzadadu gsol// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ oM hUM/ mtshad pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod/ 
175a3(rgyud): glu yi phyag rgya 'od ni dpal/ rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mchod pa maM lus lus med phyir// rang 'byam las la'ang sbyar du rung /  sa rgyas pa nas kyis phyag rgya 'di yis ma
175a4(rgyud): byinan no// mchad pa thams cad stur du 'grugs tshad pa'i/ blang ba 'di dag dang / rlom zin po dag nas na/ sa tog sogs mchod byas dang/ slong mthams cad
175a5(rgyud): par bya// ngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par/ snyim pa'i gzhi kun bskyod nas// de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi/ ras kyis g.yogs te gzung bar bya// ngas grub ji ltar 'thob 'dod pas
175a6(rgyud): slob me me tog 'thor du gzhug/ lha mo gang la lhung ba ni// lha ded la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // yon gyi mchog ni blang bar ba// sangs rgyas rini chen dbang bskur bas// 
175a7(rgyud): ji lta bar ni dbang bskur// dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba'i rnams// tshogs kyi dbus bzhag pa la// g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje bcas// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan/ 
175a8(rgyud): srin lag dang ni mu 'i bong ces// zhi ba btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis kyang / rgyas
175b1(rgyud): ma'i thebs shing mi rmongs te// de la gnod par mi 'gyuraro// de nas mna' ni bsgag byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'thun pa yis// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa byin
175b2(rgyud): par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyad byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang // de bzhin
175b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor grub pa po// de dag la ni snyings rings nas// snying las khrag tsho na 'thungs pa bzhin// sems can khams ni ma lus don// srid pal shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba
175b4(rgyud): yis de rtag pa nyid du grub pa po// bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyod/ 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs
175b5(rgyud): spyod thad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod/ lhan cig spyod
175b6(rgyud): dang rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin// yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu rton// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i
175b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed par// slob ma rnams la bde bar
175b8(rgyud): sbyin// slob ma dam pas de phyin cad// phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung nas// rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid grub// de nas re dang zas dang gnas// gla dang sil
176a1(rgyud): snyan la sogs pa// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgus mchod// 'ded don 'bras bu phun tshogs 'grub// de nas bdag
176a2(rgyud): nyid rab bsgrubs nas// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ji lta'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa yis// bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bri// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrum
176a3(rgyud): shing // rtog pa kun rab sbyor ba yi// ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'dul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// de las
176a4(rgyud): gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa tham/ sa cad rnam sbyang phyir// grol ba'i mkha' gro byung
176a5(rgyud): bar gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlabs sgrub pa'i rgyas// phyag rgya ji bzhin rjes 'thun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom
176a6(rgyud): ldan 'das// dam tshig la sdeng rnam sbyang phyir// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje mkha' go byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sem sa kyi sa su rgya sum @
176a7(rgyud): 'i nga gyi ma kun gyi bdag po ma ma dpal 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// drag shul sbyor ba sbyang ba'i phyir// rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa// rta mchog rab
176a8(rgyud): tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlab bsgrub pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan por sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gor bya'o// dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de ltam
176b1(rgyud): rnam par spyad na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rtag tu
176b2(rgyud): rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rnam par 'phrul pa
176b3(rgyud): ston// lha mo kun dang 'das pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas sprul pa grub par byed// sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ston// sangs rgyas thams
176b4(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' gro sgyu ma gar byed pas// kham sa gsum dag ni ma lus par// dngos po kun tud 'gyur ro// pa d+mo sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin
176b5(rgyud): la sogs// sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yi// 'gro ba thams cad mgu bar byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid // 'jal dum g.yul 'byed grub pa dag/ rgyal
176b6(rgyud): srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas/ bya ba thams cad ston par byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// bdag rtul phod pas mnan nas ni// 'gro ba thad rab 'joms par// rta yi gar gyis ston par
176b7(rgyud): byed/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis// na mkha' kun gyi skabs
176b8(rgyud): na dpal/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul pa// sna tshogs kyis ni rnam par rol// rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchogs
177a1(rgyud): 'dul ba rnam pa snod kyis// sems can khams ni rab tu sgrub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas
177a2(rgyud): pa'iHsangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog/ na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par
177a3(rgyud): byed// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsung so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i mchog las sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor
177a4(rgyud): ba mkha' gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor brtag pa ste dag pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 
177a5(rgyud): 'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// gsang ba mchog dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rjesu sgrug// dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam/ rang gi bskyed mos cha la sogs par/ kun
177a6(rgyud): tu sna tshogs bskal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa'i rnams// ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri yi rtse rnams thad
177a7(rgyud): du// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gos pa dag/ rnam pa du mar 'gab par// 
177a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i bskyed mis tshal dga' dang / zhu bo dag gi mdo dag tu// pad+ma 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams// yang dag par ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i pho brang dga' ba dang / rgyal po'i bskyed
177b1(rgyud): mos tshal dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi// rgyal po'i dgongs pa bsgrub par bya// mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/ rgyal khams gzhan las grub
177b2(rgyud): bar ru// rdo rje rtani bsgrub par bya// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sgrub pa rnam po sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la// dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu sgrub// sangs rgyas rnams
177b3(rgyud): kyi pad+mo dmar// phyag nirdo rdo rje sna tshogs la// 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar// rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser/ kha dog kun dang ci 'byor pa// bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyis rnams// thams cad rab tu sgrub
177b4(rgyud): pa dpal// rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnam sa ci 'dra dang // bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad// 
177b5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon/ sum mthong ba las// bsod nams brtags pa ci 'dra ba/ kyi sa bris pa yang de bzhin// dkyil 'khor thig pa
177b6(rgyud): shes rab can// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid sgrub cing // shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ dkyil 'khor yang dag ci 'dra bar// rab tu brtag par
177b7(rgyud): su zhig nus// rang gi lha yi rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang / 
177b8(rgyud): nyes pa med 'grub par 'gyur// kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can// kun tu sna tshogs 'grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o// dkyil
178a1(rgyud): 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin// pad+mo'i dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs// rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs// ji ltar 'dod pa ci 'byor pa// ji lta'i dus
178a2(rgyud): dang ci bde bar// dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas par dpal// rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'o// dkyil 'khor du ni mi zhugs shing // dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dag/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bsku
178a3(rgyud): kyang myi 'grub po// srog chags bsad par mi bya zhing // dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // byang chub sems ni mi btang ste// slob dpon skal bzang yong mi btang // kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang
