178a4(rgyud): por/ bdag rang bsgrubs pas skal pa bzang // bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa// dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan// srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bac+doMs
178a5(rgyud): skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na/ shin tu yongasu mya ngan 'ang/ sa// rtog pa thams cad bsgrubs pa'i phyir// skal bzang bya// ga ni rdo rje dpal// stong nyid la rab sbyor bas// rang
178a6(rgyud): rgyal rnams ni skal pa ngan// 'dod chags thams cad rnams dag pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzags kyi dbang // log pa lta dang ldan pas na// skal ngan 'jig rten mu steg na// dam pa'i nor
178a7(rgyud): mchog sdud pa'i phyir// skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal// bdag gi bu yang ma chags pas// skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun// rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas// rta mchog dpal ni skal/ 
178a8(rgyud): pa bzang // bdag med yongasu 'dzin med pas// thugs pa thams cad skal pa ngan// bde ba thams cad bdag sgrub phyir// kun gyi slob dpon skal pa bzang // lta ngan dam tshig la sdang ba'i// 
178b1(rgyud): slob ma thams cad skal ba ngan// gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// kun gyi
178b2(rgyud): slob dpon la gnas pas// 'khor lor 'jug par byed pa na// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/ thog ma nyi du gsang brjod pas// kye khyod ci la
178b3(rgyud): dga' zhes dri// skal ba bzang la bdag dga' zhes// 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya// gsang ba'i yan lag 'di shes na// ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes te// 
178b4(rgyud): g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas// de bzhin shin tu yon 'bul te// gsang ba'i/ cho ga nyid shes pas// mi 'gyur ba yi mchog
178b5(rgyud): 'grub bo// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// yon mchog dag ni dadul bar ngas// gang la yongasu btang dka' gang // don mchog tu bshad pa yon// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin tu
178b6(rgyud): khyad par can// de dang de ni bla ma la// de nyid mi zad 'dod pas dbul// yang na de ni 'dod 'gyur ba 'am// 'on te sems la dgos pa dag/ de sbyin yang na dgos pa ba// de ni chung yang mchog yino// 
178b7(rgyud): de la gal te mchog bdog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na// kun gyi slob dpon brnyas bra na// de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob// bu mo shin tu rgyan pa 'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ pul
178b8(rgyud): nas rin gyis slu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon// ma chen dag ni phul nasu// slar yang rin gyis slu ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi// 'on te mchog gi yon yon// mu ti
179a1(rgyud): / bzang dang nor bu dang // shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung dang // de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad+mo can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi
179a2(rgyud): tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin/ shin tu rgyan pa'i rta dag dang // glang po shin tu rgyan pa dang / shing rta rin chen gang bdag/ rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin/ 
179a3(rgyud): khams kyi rang bzhin thad ma// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba// mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag/ spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru/ 
179a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur da/ ba'o// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsabade bzhin te/ bod pa na chen dgu rgyan nam/ sa
179a5(rgyud): rgyas gtsug gi nar bu dag/ kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni// na gyi slob dpon kun la bya// rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen po
179a6(rgyud): mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras// sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dbang bskur bas// slob ma thams cad dbang bskur// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed/ rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin/ sgyu
179a7(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku// nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la// rang gi dbang bsdus pa'o// blugs pa dang ni byas
179a8(rgyud): pa'am/ rdungs bgranga'am yang na dris pa'ang rung / sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab kyi brtag/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ rang byu rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/ rnam
179b1(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi mapa' krus pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde pa'i mchog// gzhug mdang dang de bzhin du// skal ldan de bzhin skad pa bang / zod pa dang ni laT+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin// 'o rgya gram dpag med
179b2(rgyud): tshe'i/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin// mdar dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo// de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shul phyag
179b3(rgyud): rgya'i mchog/ dpag bsams shing dang lcug ma dang // pad+mo rta mgrin 'phang mtho ba// rta mgrin ljang ku de bzhi no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhino// rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du// sangs
179b4(rgyud): rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa ya/ thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// gling bu dang na pi wang kun// ku mun da dang mu ra dza// me tog bdug
179b5(rgyud): pa mar me dang // snon dri rnams de bzhi no// de la sogs pa mtha'ayas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam/ kha'i dbangs kyi mtha' klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i
179b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab gab pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang
179b7(rgyud): ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni 'khar sil dang // dam pa'i chos ni glegs bam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang // rdo rje dang
179b8(rgyud): ni rin chen snad/ mtshan mi'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan// de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang // me long dang ni rlung yab dang / rdo rje sor po'i sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya
180a1(rgyud): / dang rdo rje 'bar ba kha T+wAM gzod pa khams por de bzhin no// dmar chen dang ni snying rje dang // sha chen dang ni de bzhin te// non pa mdang dang de bzhin 'dren/ chang dang chu dang de bzhin te/ 
180a2(rgyud): lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang // rangs dang de bzhin ma dang ni// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa thams cad za ba yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal 'bor dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o// 
180a3(rgyud): pad+mo sna tshogs dmar po dang // ljang ku de bzhin dkar po dang // mthing ka ser po leb rgan dag/ pad+mo mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun/ pad+ma sgrung po bud med rgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'kho lo dang // gsal
180a4(rgyud): shing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag/ pad+mo mtshan ma'i tsho gas gzhon gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'ber ba'i me// dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag/ mchod
180a5(rgyud): ba'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang / rdo rje rtse gam de bzhin te/ mtshan ma'i bag rgya grub pa yis// la srid thams cad 'joms pa ste/ sangs rgyas
180a6(rgyud): thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po brtan g.yo ma lus kun/ rang 'byung rnams kyi mtshan mi'i rgya// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje sadar
180a7(rgyud): dpal gyis gsungs// sangs rgyas thad dang mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha'agro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// 
180a8(rgyud): de nas gzhan dag bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mjug
180b1(rgyud): mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum du bya// srid zhur bcas pa'i steg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sedang dpal// 'dzum dang
180b2(rgyud): bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas// skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na// khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smras/ 
180b3(rgyud): drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// btud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa gasngo
180b4(rgyud): pas phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis/ ru lu ru lung bcas bgad na// tshangs pa nye
180b5(rgyud): dbang dag par bcas// khams gsum pa rnams byug byed 'gyur// thal mo pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin// rang gi sbyor ldan snying kar bcing // mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhin
180b6(rgyud): rgyas pa btud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus pa'i yan lag thams cad ni// sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba// snying ka kha dang spyi gtsug tu// thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje'i gying ba'i thabs/ 
180b7(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas nas// khams gsum pa yang phyag byas nas// mthu bsnyems gzhan lta ci zhig smos// phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// gar gyi rgyun rnams ji snyed
180b8(rgyud): dang / de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya// rang ga don rnams grub par byed pa'o// 'gyang dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor/ 
181a1(rgyud): ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo
181a2(rgyud): khu tshur bcang // g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang // dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi// dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur// 
181a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thaMd dang 'gegs pa// dpal skal pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yi// sbyor ba de nyid bteg na su// 'gram pa'i phyog suM yongs bsgyur nas
181a4(rgyud): spyi bo'i mtsham su bzhag par bya// zad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pa sa// gar byas de nas phab nas// skal bzang hU~M zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thad dbul bar bya// sang+yas zad dang
181a5(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba skal bzang po bde ba chen pos bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i// rdo rje thal mo sbyar na su// de bzhin
181a6(rgyud): g.yon du bsgyur bar bya// de ni sbyor bas bteg gan su// spyi bo'i mtsham su bzhag par bya/ skal bzang oM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba sangs
181a7(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// / mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// dur khrod ma
181a8(rgyud): lugs gar byed pas// phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing // skal bzang rdo rje dag por dgod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal ma ste// mchod pa'i gtor ma
181b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi cho ga'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal
181b2(rgyud): pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi thal mo'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas// mchod pa thad dbul bar bya// re bo zad yosu
181b3(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang // me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ de yi mchod pa 'byung
181b4(rgyud): ba'o// gang ba'ang 'on te stong pa'ang rung // yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par sgrub pa yi// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas
181b5(rgyud): ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// ngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang // kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur// chas dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ 
181b6(rgyud): namakha'i dbyings kyi mthar klas pa'i// rab byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag de yis ma byas shing // spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'o// rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas
181b7(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang // dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// mchod pa rab 'byam gab pa rnams// ma lus lus med 'gru
181b8(rgyud): chen dpal// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las mchod pa thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor
182a1(rgyud): / dpal skal pa bzang po dam tshig gis rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// kun tu sna tshogs
182a2(rgyud): mchog rnams kyi// phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu
182a3(rgyud): bzhugs// bde ba thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po bac+doMs
182a4(rgyud): dpel rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// khams gsum dag ni na chen gnan/ des rgyas rin chen lto bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi
182a5(rgyud): rin chen che// dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mo 'phrogs pa// lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
182a6(rgyud): rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can/ kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang // mi mjed la sogs de 'gro'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyar ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu smo
182a7(rgyud): skal bzang po// mkha'agro mo ni thams cad 'gag// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs pas bslangs nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag/ 
182a8(rgyud): rgya 'di yis btab pa ni// 'dod pa bzhin du gro 'ong lding // lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog du dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal pa bzang ba dpal / 
182b1(rgyud): rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba mchog gi phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yi// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dpung rnams
182b2(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje se de'i skyil mo krung // zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos gab thams cad dag pa dang // pad+ma'i 'dod chags rnam dog phyir// brla yi dbus ni dmar la dka
182b3(rgyud): phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang // bde bar rig pa'i dbang phyug pas// dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khri
182b4(rgyud): pa'i 'od// pad+mo sna tshogs la gnas pa// thams cad dag par ba tu gnas// sangs rgyas pad+mo la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// sangs rgyas thad 'dus pa yin// mi mdze
182b5(rgyud): la sogs rgyan pa bzhin/ bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / 'phrogabadag kyang lhag par mdzad/ bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya/ yis// yan lag zad 'phrog par 'grug/ phyag rgya
182b6(rgyud): 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'gru'o// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba bskal pa bzang po dpal rnga
182b7(rgyud): rje mda' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags// bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog
182b8(rgyud): chen po yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor po// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba// skal
183a1(rgyud): kha bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga bzung ste// bdag la 'khyud pa'i
183a2(rgyud): phyag ni// bad bcas rdo rje rgyagam mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug rgya la// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la
183a3(rgyud): rob tu sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham por 'grug/ bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yi// rdo rje sems
183a4(rgyud): dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan tshe dang gzhom 'grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa'
183a5(rgyud): rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba/ bzang po dpal rdo rje tshe bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i/ phyag rgya'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
183a6(rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha'o klas pa'i// rang 'byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub
183a7(rgyud): ba'i dbang phyug rab grug pas// thams cad bdag nyid rabab 'gab 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tsheg so// gtsug/ 
183a8(rgyud): lag ji lto'i rjes 'thun pa'i// dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis// mdar bzhi yo su 'phangs na ni// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dpal rdo rje mdang zhes
183b1(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa 'dag cing phab pa dang // gshibs te chongs pa'i stabs dag gis// 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bstod nas ni// khams gsum dag las chongs par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje
183b2(rgyud): mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya la// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / phrogs pa dag gi khang par du// sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang
183b3(rgyud): phyug zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas// / bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// bud med thams cad rtsed nas ni// dpag bsam shing ltar rtag tu 'grub
183b4(rgyud): dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// myang ba btungs pa ltar byas pas// dag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten gsu
183b5(rgyud): dag bskams par byed// dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sna yi myang ba'i rngub pa yis// dag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// khams gsum yang ni
183b6(rgyud): sdud par byed// dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mig tshugs zhen por lta ba yis// dag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum yang za ba
183b7(rgyud): byed// dpal rdo rje spyan nyi zla zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thad bdag nyid myangs pa yis// dgas nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ dpal
183b8(rgyud): rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas// tshangs dang nye dbang drag par bcas
184a1(rgyud): 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gling bu'i dbang byed zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar bab pa'i gar byed pas/ las rnams
184a2(rgyud): grub par rab 'bam dang // dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor ba// ji ltar babs pi'i gar
184a3(rgyud): byed pas// rims dang gdon dang dug zhen pa'o// sdug bsngal thams cad myur du sel// dpal rdo rje cing te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sa la bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdza
184a4(rgyud): tshul ston rnal 'byor pa/ ji ltar babs pa'i ga byung ba// nas gsum dag ni ma lus pa// gdi cig cam gyis 'phe sa par byed// dpal rdo rje rdzas myos pa
184a5(rgyud): byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad byas nas ni/ rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'gag// rims
184a6(rgyud): dang ngag dang dbyig dug byed// 'phro man gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur// dag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla
184a7(rgyud): gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag/ skad cig tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i
184a8(rgyud): namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// rang byung lhamo phyag rgya rnams// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pas// thad
184b1(rgyud): bdag nyid babs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams kyis// bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob// de nas phyag rgya ye
184b2(rgyud): ye shes 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu/ las rnams thad rab grub cing // srid pa shin tu sgrub pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod la bdag la bsgrubs la rtogs
184b3(rgyud): par mdzad gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' go sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa bdag
184b4(rgyud): la grub par mdzad gsol// a la la la ho// de bzhin gtse gas pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM ba ho// kye bde mchog bde bas zung la
184b5(rgyud): rnam par sprul// hUM snang bar mdzad gsol/ a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha'og sgyu mas sla bi ma gzung du gsol// sangs rgyas zad
184b6(rgyud): mnyam sbyar ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad// 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha' gro ma
184b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya
184b8(rgyud): dpal du gnas// 'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin/ chags med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar zhing smo gsal ba'i mangs// chos kyi rgyal
185a1(rgyud): / srid rab bsgrubs pas// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal brdo rje rin chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i/ 
185a2(rgyud): khu tshur bcangs pa yi// sor mo kun la reg pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin// byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi
185a3(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub sems chen bskyed pa
185a4(rgyud): dngang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// sangs rgyas nyid rig par bya// mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyaso// gang gis ldan pa 'de mthong zhing // rnam pa kun tu mchod byed pa// 
185a5(rgyud): yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor// dpal dam tshig ces bya
185a6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje
185a7(rgyud): se de'i skyil mthong / rdo rje khu chur bcangs na bu// lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun blo ngas grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grug/ de bzhin dpal ldan te ru ka'i// 
185a8(rgyud): dang khu nu ba na ba dgag / depa'i bablad pa'i das gru rnams/ sa lus lus pa med par gug 'i ng+ge'i ba ma khu du ni/  zhini yan pas pagayon yang/ byang chub skyed pa 'phrul
185b1(rgyud): rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bka' na ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khur
185b2(rgyud): tshur bcangs nasu// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nasu// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub
185b3(rgyud): thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rtagadang dpal gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa mdapa
185b4(rgyud): 'grub// dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon bas bkab na ni// snang ba thams cad rab grub pa/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun
185b5(rgyud): blod po// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' ba yin// gsum pa kun tu ba zang po'i'o// bzhi pa mi zang snod yin no// sangs rgyas yan la gakun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzang gzungs
185b6(rgyud): ma yin// sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa na mkha'i spyan yin no// gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni// 'grub par 'gyur
185b7(rgyud): ba byed pa'i mchog las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// slong bar byed pa bstan sgrub pa// de banan sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/ sha rdza'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// de ba tso yi glu blang / 'jig rten kham
185b8(rgyud): mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phos pa yi// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phri ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa/ sprul pa'i sku rnams phro ba'i rdub gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa bod chen de'i nan gshe
186a1(rgyud): kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa mdzod do// dpal rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba a la la la ho// de ring grug
186a2(rgyud): bar mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yi// na mkha' thad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang // rang gi yang dag gsang
186a3(rgyud): ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
186a4(rgyud): dam tshig la sngang rnam sbyang phyi// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bar pano pa mi 'gyur te/ shes rab thabs kyis rnal 'gyur rgya
186a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khros byung khro ba ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
186a6(rgyud): dmar po snang // gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste// 'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos chen po dang blugs pa che// sha chen po dang / 
186a7(rgyud): sbrang rtsi che/ dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khro gdug gtum pa yi// sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir// 'di ni dang ldan he ru ka'i// 
186a8(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal chen dang phyug mchog/ yod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang/ sangs rgyas gtsug gan bu dag rgyal srid thams cad bsgrub pa/ ma lu sa lus pa med pa 'grug rdo rje shAH/ 
186b1(rgyud): rjer bcas// dril bu dkol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab
186b2(rgyud): rmo sred de zos nas// zil bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ra la kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga pa
186b3(rgyud): rgyab rten byas// lag pa g.yon na thod pa thogs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas// na mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa/ nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bude med la sogs rin chen mchog
186b4(rgyud): dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin// phyag rgya 'di yis ya ngas btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// namakha'i las ni kun lhags te// bdag gi spyod par de spyod/ 
186b5(rgyud): drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla mkha' gro mi bzad tshogs// / mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas// lus pa med par de za'o// na mkha' thad mnyam sbyor ba// skal ba
186b6(rgyud): bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la// rkang pa
186b7(rgyud): rang gi brlabasdams na// drag po dbang po nyi dang bcas// nyi zla go shin rje tshangs bcas pa/ rgyas btab rmongs byas brlangs na su// gar dag byed cing deza'o// denyid kyi ni sbyor ba yi// de nas
186b8(rgyud): bde bar brla bsdams pas// legs par bsdams te phyer btags nas/ rab tu bkram ste btung bar bya/ sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni// de nas bla phrag bskyod pa waM/ skal bzang lha dang mi rnams
187a1(rgyud): kyi// bud med kun la de spyod// bde bar reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba bzang po dpal rdo rje dag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas gzhan
187a2(rgyud): yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas mkha' gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o// zhi dang drag pa rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' ba'i gar
187a3(rgyud): byed 'gyur bar bcas/ shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// de rje phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ zhi dang drog pa rmongs byed dang / gyen duthugs 'byin gar byed lus lta ba'i phyag
187a4(rgyud): rgyu grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang mi gtong grub pa yis// khyad par
187a5(rgyud): du ni rgyas 'deb so// rtsa gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sbyar ba'i gnyer ba bde ba sbyin// mngon par gtor zhing se gal rdog// dal bus gyen du 'bugs 'byin pas// g.yon du lta
187a6(rgyud): zhing lag pas drangs// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhon te// gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang / za dang gsong ba'i lus rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las
187a7(rgyud): rgal// de bzhin gzhan las 'dun pa dang // rang ga phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang // dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / rab tu 'jigs par sreg de'i ma/ las
187a8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'debs ma ya~M rgya/ snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum po shin tu rmongs byed pa'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'dag byed ma'o// lnga pa gang byed pa yi rgya
187b1(rgyud): drug pa gsod ma'i yin par bshad// bdun pa zab mo yi rgya// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi// phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid
187b2(rgyud): kun 'joms pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slong // gar dag byed cing byas na ni// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de
187b3(rgyud): nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub bo// khad par du ni bshad par po// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyal thob la/ 
187b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas
187b5(rgyud): btab rmongs byas mnam su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar ba de bzhugs// hUM a la la la ho snang bar mdzod// rnal 'a byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig
187b6(rgyud): dag la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa dag bsnams du gsol// nyon mongs thams cad gsal bar mdzad// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa
187b7(rgyud): yis// rdo rje thaMd minyam sbyar ba// mkha' ga sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bac+doMs// rdo rje se
187b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thod rnam dag phyir// pad+mo phyag rgya dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags zad gsal
188a1(rgyud): pa phyi/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'a khrigs pa'i 'ang// sa sa rgyas chen nasmras// gos pa sa tshogs rgyun gyis rgyun/ sas rgyas bams rdu pa yis/ ng+ge na
188a2(rgyud): bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yong su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas// pad+mor mtshan mchog bad+mor bcas// phyag ni brgya rnams 'khor lor bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje badz+ra
188a3(rgyud): 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// pad+mo sgyu mas rnam sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o// bskal pa bzang po dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya/ 
188a4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ skyil mo krung ni phye mar gnas// rgyal po'i skyil mo krung bcas na// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// dpal pad+ma rgyal po goH
188a5(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pag/ yon pa yis// pad+mo dmar po tso bder 'azung // rang gi snying/ kar 'dren pa'i tshul// pad+ma 'ad ma kha 'byed pa'o// snyoms pa
188a6(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo sngon po ci bder bzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// bud med phyag rgya bcing bar bya// snyoms pa'i lag pa g.yon po yis// pad+mo dkar po tso 'der bzung // 'khor lon
188a7(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// snyoms pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo mthing kha tsi bder bzung // g.yas pas rab tu gar byed pa/ dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// 
188a8(rgyud): sems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo ser po ci bder bzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo leb rgan mchog
188b1(rgyud): bzung ste// rang gi snying kar 'dren tshul gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol mi'i byang chub mchog yino// rgya chen ma yi 'khor lo bskor// khro gnyer ma ni phyag
188b2(rgyud): rgyal lan// pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// 'dod po'i dbang mo'i 'gro ba gsum// dpal pad+mo'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i lha mo chen mo rnaMm so// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// pad+mo rgyal po dpal gyi glu lnga

188b4(rgyud): kye sems dpa' pad+mo dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dga' babastan du gsol// a la la la ho/ kye gar dbang thar dga' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa
188b5(rgyud): 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag nyi zla dag lags al le la ha~M/ bad+me sgras sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis ger mdzad pa/ bad mtshig dbang thugasangs rgyas gar rnams mdzadadu gsol
188b6(rgyud): 'dod chags rnam par snang ba thams cad da dung rnam par spyos// pad+ma 'dzin pa de yi spyan sna ga rim khan gar mdzod cig/ glu 'di dag ni smras pa yis/ sna tshogs po mnyam skyol ba/ ma kha gro sgyu ma med
188b7(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nor mchag rnam par sbyong ba'i
188b8(rgyud): phyis dang ldan nyim phyag rgyar gnas/ namakha'i snying po thams cad phyogs/ rab thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkha' las 'bebs/ shin/ 
189a1(rgyud): tu gdug cing gtu mo la/ zhi bas pan par mi 'gyur te// shes ba thabs kyi nyim ni/ dam pa'i don du drag por gyur/ drag pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag can
189a2(rgyud): sgrub par byed// nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang // tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos ston// rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag/ shin tu lags par 'gengs pa ste// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang brtsa
189a3(rgyud): ba'i spyanan g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'dag/ drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pas// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar
189a4(rgyud): mdzadas dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bya/ dag rgya'o// rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te// rdo rje skyil mo krung / bcas nas// bdag ni stan la 'dug nas ni/ 
189a5(rgyud): bgegs rnams thad gzhag par bya// dpal rdo rje skyil mo kru //  bang bskur ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan mchog ldan ma chod pa che// ji lta'i tshul dag ston pa drug/ rang
189a6(rgyud): gi don rnams 'grub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ rgyal po'i sgyu ma mcho ga glu/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ khyad par du ni bshad par bya// khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid smo/ 
189a7(rgyud): mchog gi nor ldan pas// mjal dus g.yul 'gyed rnam mang khyad par sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba// rnam pa sna tshogs mjal dus rnam par rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan can// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal
189a8(rgyud): bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'i bebs pa// bdag gi re ba kun sgrub myur du ston// a la la la ho// mi zad gter gyi dbang bsku
189b1(rgyud): rgyad par bdag la stsal dugs la// khyad pa na 'di dag thams cad du med chen rnams kyi phyir/ rin ci ma tshogs kunan na bud med na chen gcig sumachog 'a ma na chen dag pa
189b2(rgyud): dam pa'i don du thams cad 'gro/ glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha'agro sgyum bde ba'i mtshig gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ dpal rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya
189b3(rgyud): zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal// rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// thams cad dag par mos pa yi// 
189b4(rgyud): sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal dag gi sa// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags ca na la g.yem par ston// gdug pa rnams la
189b5(rgyud): gdug par ston// zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur// dag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs pa zhi ba la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen
189b6(rgyud): bo staM/ dbang phyug dam pa grub par 'gyur// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyis// dpal ldan pad+mo sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje bcas shing slong ba sgrub// g.yas pa bdan gsum par bya// phyag rgya'ing
189b7(rgyud): yis btab ni ne/ shin tu ltung bar gyur pa yang / de ma thag tu kun ba slong nas// ldang ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/ thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje spong ba zhes
189b8(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang gson pa'i sbyor ba yis// brkyang bkum pa yi tshul byas nas// khro ba'i skyil mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tub shig/ dpal rdo rje khro ba gas
190a1(rgyud): pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i// rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// mos byed stong pas lhag par bde ba
190a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jig/ zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin
190a3(rgyud): gshags kun 'grub par mdzad// thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis gnon pas gan ni// hi he he he he/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i
190a4(rgyud): stobs kyis ngo 'dzin dbang phyug non// sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum gab drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen no// mnyam sbyor ru
190a5(rgyud): Ti ma rnga snying las dpal mo drangs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshangs pa non/ sbyor chen tshangs las gol ma drongs shig sma ra Ta/ rab kyi
190a6(rgyud): rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon dga' dbang non// mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag la dga' dongs a la la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// sgrub
190a7(rgyud): zhugs a la la la ho/ oM suM b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT phaT// mdza' bo mi la bya ba'am mi bya yongs rtogs de dag med kyang bla// de 'di'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' ba shesu zhig zer
190a8(rgyud): rgol ba la yang bya 'am mi bya yongasu rtog pa med kyang bla/ de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhesu zhig zer// gla 'di blangs pa tsam gyis no// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mkha'
190b1(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'grub// thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni// rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan// dpal grub spyan gyi phyag
190b2(rgyud): rgyu ste/  mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur byas// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// rdo rje spyan ni gnyis dag tu// khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya// dpal gab rdo rje'i spyan yi no// 'di ni sangs rgyas thad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo tha dad
190b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dngas grub rab 'byam rnams// ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grus
190b4(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug// mthe bo'i rtse ma'i mnyam par gzhag// khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o// spyi bo'i mtsham su rab bzhag nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas ni ni/ 
190b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dngos grupom lus pa// lus pa med par grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug// mthe
190b6(rgyud): gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// 'grub pa bdud la sogs pa za// de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrub/ 
190b7(rgyud): gter rnams 'byin par byed pa dang // de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed// ngal so bo ni dpal mnan te// dpal mo dag kyang phrogs nas ni// mngag zhugs mar ni byed pa dang // gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba
190b8(rgyud): spyod/ gnod sbyin dag gi sde dpon du// 'dis ni myar da 'gab pa ro 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub// mthe bong mthe'u
191a1(rgyud): rlung sa ma dzan/ dz+ha dag tu rgyas/ 'a ni snga rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzog 'byu tu blugs sa sa ma nganas su rgyas/  mas
191a2(rgyud): nyidu 'gyur// dpal ldan po ng+ge'i phyag rgyal// rdo rdzibal mo mnyim sbyar la// mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste/ mtho tha rdzogs rigs pa ni/ dzadz+ra dpa la gyi na du ste// phyag rgya'adi mas btabs
191a3(rgyud): nis nam mkha' thams cad rab 'gab ste// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ nam mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang
191a4(rgyud): mdzub mo rtsa bsnyams bkug pa ni// dpal mchog rte zhes grags pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab brel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal
191a5(rgyud): lha yo skal bzang smos kyi dgos/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa // lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// mtshan mo'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba
191a6(rgyud): yaus// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thad dpal// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas bdag dngas
191a7(rgyud): grub ni/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyangs kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'dis// mi 'grub 'byor par mi
191a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyig su ldan// bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag / kun
191b1(rgyud): gyi bdag la zhugs par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
191b2(rgyud): sbyor ba skal pa bzang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phag rgya'o// tshogs pa med cing ma chags med// dbu mar yang ni dmig su med// bud med kun gyi sgyu sbyor 'di// gnyisu med pa'i theg pa'i
191b3(rgyud): mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sgyu ma thams cad kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// yod pa ma
191b4(rgyud): yin med pa'ang min// dbu mar yang ni dmigasu med/ shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'o// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mchu
191b5(rgyud): nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta/ bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad de// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur/ dmig su yod pa'ang ma yin te// de
191b6(rgyud): bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bud med la sogs rin chen mchog mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// dngos po med par
191b7(rgyud): bdas sbyar bas/ nas khri'i zho ma nyam sbyar ba// sol ngas snyam 'deba'i mchog/ shin ga par 'grub pa gyur/  pad+ma pa ba 'ang / chags pa'i nyes pamam gos pa/ 
191b8(rgyud): 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin du// gnas kyi nyes pas yong migs/ shin tu gdug cing drag pa la// zhibs pan par mi 'gyur te/ shes 'i thabs kyi sbyor bani// ma par rgyal phyi rab tu drag pa
192a1(rgyud): / dag par mes pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du/ drag shug skyer bas mnyam sbyor ba/ 'jig rten thams cad gnos parab/ sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sbyar ba ji snyed yod ku
192a2(rgyud): dang byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // tshogs pa chen po dbang
192a3(rgyud): phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// kun tu sna tshogs skal pa bzang po dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang na ji zlog pa dang // khyad par du ni 'phrogs
192a4(rgyud): ba dang yan lag kun tu byed pa yis// de ni nor rnams kun kyang phrogs// 'o byad 'khyud la sogs pa yis// khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'dab so// thar par byed cing gsod par byed// 
192a5(rgyud): shi ba'ang mod la sos par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod tham sa cad kyis// gnas gsum po ni ma lus par// rgyas btang / rmongs byas bslangs nas// gar byas nas ni za bar
192a6(rgyud): byed/ sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/ rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya she so// lha mo kun
192a7(rgyud): gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing // / bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma kha
192a8(rgyud): gsum pa/ rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma che// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam sbyar ba// rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/ 
192b1(rgyud): mdzes par ltabs ga byas pa/ sa sa rgyas pad+ma rda rje 'dzin/ de rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ rgyas bta rmongs byas bslang nas ni/ zas nas sngar yang 'tsho bar byed/ sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam
192b2(rgyud): sbyor ba/ rab tu dga' ba ra sti zhing 'jum/ shin tu sri pa yang dag sgrub/ gsang bar lta la gnas nani// drag po dngo bo nyi dbang bcas/ nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srod pa kun tu kun ba
192b3(rgyud): nas// gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// stegs la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i gzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing / rim gror bcas shing sgeg pa'i mchog stegs pa'i lte bas ga
192b4(rgyud): byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis// drag po da bang po nyi dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'ji garten gsum dag sgrub par byed// mcheb chung zad
192b5(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i kha// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa bzhin// khro la 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum// gsal bar lta zhing leg sa par gnas// dag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// 
192b6(rgyud): nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// 'dod chags mos pas g.yem spyod// mdzes pa'i gzhan ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di na
192b7(rgyud): gzhan gyi phyag rgya mchog / khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ drag po mche ba rnon pa gtsigs// gdug pa zla ba 'jigs 'jigs s+ho// g.yas pa'i gzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams
192b8(rgyud): gsum do/ mang ba bar byed/ pam gru kun gyi pa'i ma chog ra'i tudag bar lta zhing 'jug na yin pa'i gzhan mi phyag rgyam pa/ khams gsum ga/ kyang bar babyed/ 
193a1(rgyud): rta mgrin gsang mtho ba// rta gdong ljang ser kha dog gsal// so gtsigs pas ni mchu mnan nas// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo
193a2(rgyud): kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes ma'i mchu smos mnan te// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// 'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyi ba/ steg pa'i ma mtsha sos
193a3(rgyud): mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams
193a4(rgyud): gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha chen gyi ni ro myong zhing // ma mchu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ma cho ga 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// bde ba kun gyi ro
193a5(rgyud): myong zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor
193a6(rgyud): ba/ zam zim lta ba rnam bsgyur bas// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yi// khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i chog/ mdzes par lta ba'i gar byas pas// rgyas btab rmong
193a7(rgyud): byas bslangs nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ bud med thams cad dbang du byed
193a8(rgyud): smin mtshams khrog nyar 'gyur bar bcas// lte ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur/ lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas par 'dzum/ 
193b1(rgyud): lta ba gsal la bde ba gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// steg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan// steg bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// kham
193b2(rgyud): gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// na mestu sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yaHzhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa/ lus pa med par thams cad 'gab// rang byung rnams
193b3(rgyud): kyi mchod pa kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// lan cig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis// gang dag byis par ma gyur cing
193b4(rgyud): spel ba dag tum gyur pa'o// dam pa rgya che me dag ma dra/ oM ru ro s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarba aR+tha s+yA d+hA ni swAhU~M/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di na// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa
193b5(rgyud): stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug/ su b+ha gA s+t+waM ma hA na de bi hi ri// mi ri ri ti ni ri/ ye swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba kun snu
193b6(rgyud): pa'o// oM tAr tut+tA ra tu ra swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgyal gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs na// bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smras/ hUM b+ha ba rdo Ta/ traT traT thang rab kun rdzogs// chos
193b7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya dam pa dang // / re ba thang rdzogs byed pa'o// shrI badz+ra pad+ma ba Da ba mu kha yau gI shA ra hi hi hi hi hi// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes
193b8(rgyud): pa'o// skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman dang // gro sbyar bcos shing bzlas pa dang // dusu ri'i zhi mchog rnams kyi// hUM lo sogs pa'i gla blang zhing // tshig rnams kun gyis ci 'dod par// ci ltar spro bar glu
194a1(rgyud): / kun gyis/ hUM gi glu yi phyag rgya dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o// lha mo kun gyi lha mo mchog cha lugs bzhin du ga bya zhing // ka ka la sha ba la sogs// glu
194a2(rgyud): rnams thaMd rje su blangs// oM gyi glo yi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar blang // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// sems can thams cad thar par byed// rdo rje drag po gad mo che// mkhur ba'i
194a3(rgyud): dbugs kyis rlung 'byin cing // 'brug gi sku ltar zab pa yi// ru l-i ru lu'i sgra byung na// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// khams gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing // thar par byed cig gsod
194a4(rgyud): par byed// shi ba mod la 'tsho bar byed// rdo rje drag tu bzhad pa zhes bya po'i phyag rgya'o// / rje zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// thams cad dag par rab bsgrubs pa'o// ha~M zhes bya ba glu ya
194a5(rgyud): rgya khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed// ka ka la lce dang tsor 'i dbyings// de bzhin rab tu gdangs snyan dang // ka he sha yi glu yi rgya// 'joms pa thad grub pa'o// glu la
194a6(rgyud): phyag rgya shes pa'o// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud mangs rgyud stug dang // sil snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// cha lug bzhin du gar byed pas/ 
194a7(rgyud): ma brdungs par yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la mchog tu ni// brdungs na dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang // bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par sel la so/ 
194a8(rgyud): pa'i thabs/ ngos grub pa da 'i sgrub pa'o// dzaHhUM baM ho/ rur+tha A rA kro/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sid+d+ha/ TiHhUMHki no dz+nyAn ts+tshi d+hI/ Taki hUMHgu lu hu lu/ a la la la hi/ shud+d+ha sid+d+ha
194b1(rgyud): Sha ya sar+b+ban Ta g+he b+he/ TuTA g+he g+he g+he/ Ta b+hai Te ke gai ge/ Ta ta ke/ rda te// rnga ga/ ho rboN/ Tak+ki hU dza/ ge ta ga d+hon/ wik+kid+hUt+ma/ a la la so// ru T+Ta maT+Ta/ bal mo brdab brtag pa'o//  g+he g+he/ dza b+he d+he/ 
194b2(rgyud): d+haM/ d+hadz+dzaHSh+Ta/ k+Shak+ShAk+Sha~M d+h+r-ika ko pa la mye 'i rje'i phyag rgyal/ pad+hA / d+ma Sh+ra/ ba NA)/ Adz+haiM ga~M/ la d+mo sa pa rnaM / b+h+yab+h+ya
194b3(rgyud): myur ba'o// ta Ta b+ha te/ btAM/ ta thA ge ta/ bits+tshi/ ta nA b+ha tat+tadz+dzan/ dpal rta mchog rnam par rol pa'i// tatwA b+ha Ta Ta~M b+ha tAtA/ shi na tu myur ba'i rnga'i phyag rgya ste/ sil snyan gyis
194b4(rgyud): phyag rgya shes pa'o// nga rje sems dpa' bdagi sbyar bas// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa yi// rnga rdzas gom brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// de ma bka' tsam gyis skrag nas
194b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'du 'gyur na// gzhan lta smras kyang ci zhig smos// g.yon pa'i sa gol brnabs pa dang / thol ma dam bus brdabs pas 'gru
194b6(rgyud): g.yas pa'i bral mo yin par gsung / gnyis ga kun klud pa yin// khal mo'i sbya sa sbyor bas// las kyi tshul bzhin 'dra ba dang / khal ma dal bus bsdub dang / sgra mam na/ 
195a1(rgyud): gar byed pas// steg dang pa' dang snying rje dang // dgod dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang / mi sdug ngo mtshar zhi ba yis// nyams kyi phyag rgya ra don sdug/ stegs la sogs pa'i nya
195a2(rgyud): dang ldan// sna tshogs phyag rgya gar byas pas// khams cad bdag nyid nAr sbyar bas// dpa pa thams cad rab tu 'grug/ rdo rje sems dpa' steg pa la// dpal la dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs/ 
195a3(rgyud): rje 'dzin pa snying rje la// dgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyim khro ba la// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa laM/ shAkya thub pa mi sdug la/ ngo mtshar la ni a ma li// rab tu ni la sangs rgyas
195a4(rgyud): dag/ sdug bsngal thams cad ni pa'i phyir/ rdo/ sa po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ nye bar gnas shing byin gyisarlob/ lcibs mi ngoms pa yi gzugs// 'ad bdag nyid ston par
195a5(rgyud): mdzad/ leg so zhes bya 'grub pa yi// mchog tu gyur pa'ab tu stsol// thams cad bdag nyid gun pa'i mchog/ ra zad mongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog
195a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur/ phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis/ rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// sbyor ba thams cad rnam 'phrul dang // phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan
195a7(rgyud): rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sprul pas// yid la bsams pa kun rdzogs phyir// mchod pa dam par sbyar bar bya// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyu
195a8(rgyud): kun 'byung li sogs sbyar ba yis// rgol ba bdag dang gar byas te// de nis rgol bar ci rigs par// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas slar ni rgol ba yang / rdo rje 'dzin 'chin
195b1(rgyud): por bsgyur// rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du// pad+mo gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur// de nas slar du rgol ba yang // rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur// de nas phyir yang rgol ba ni// rta mchog 'byung bar bsgyur
195b2(rgyud): bar bya// de nas slar ni rgol ba yang // bdag nyid 'byung bar rab tu 'grub// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// sdom pa thams cad rab ston pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu/ khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ 
195b3(rgyud): lo la ri da med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugasu rnam par snang // la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs// la lar mdangs bzang
195b4(rgyud): gzi che bde dang zhi bar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugs su snang // la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje sems dpa'
195b5(rgyud): 'grub phyir 'dul la mkhas pa ma lus bde/ ba'i mchog rnams las/ a ra li thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod ru tam te a la la la he// rnam pa mang po 'dul
195b6(rgyud): bar mdzod pa'i tshul la gar mkhan mchog gis gar mdzad pa// dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mdzad a la la ho// rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde
195b7(rgyud): ba'ang thob par mdzod// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de ltar rab tu gar byas te// de las gang zhig pham gyur pa/ 
195b8(rgyud): tshogs la de yis tshogs kyi zla// yon dang bcas par dbul bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin
196a1(rgyud): rtag par bsrungs par 'gyur// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang // mkha' gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang // bdud dang sems can dmyal ba'i rnams// 'di yis rab tu zhi bar
196a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ dngos grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs// dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang // sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang / phyag rgya'i mchog rnams 'grub por 'gyur// gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// 
196a3(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba rje su rab chags dga' ba'i mnga' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la gab par mdzod// rab tu
196a4(rgyud): bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba/ 'i rgyal mtshan sbreng ba'i longs spyod dang / rab tu dga' ba'ang // bang phyug che mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs bzhugs
196a5(rgyud): ho rta mchog ho// rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig ho// bde bas slong la rnam por rol cig hUM snang mdzod/ a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' gro sgyu ma
196a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis// slob mi rab tu gzung du gsol// kye ma'o bde ba grub par mdzad// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba stsol// dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu dgyes par gyur// a
196a7(rgyud): la la ho// e ma'o shi shi zhugs shig zhugs shig/ mkha' gro bde ba cho ga yongs bskor kun tu zhugs// 'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'
196a8(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang // rdo rje rin chen bla med pa/ rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang // rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// hUM rdo rje
196b1(rgyud): yu tshu tsha ma rgyal ya sum gsus rgyal rgyas gyis sa chen phrul
196b2(rgyud): las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tsha'o// dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshalo// dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrel ba la phyag
196b3(rgyud): 'chalo// la lar rab tu drag cing skye bor drag la drag pa'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang // 'gro ba mtha'i yas 'dul phyir la lar rab turno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar
196b4(rgyud): rab tus zhing ni pami'i gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad/ la li rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa bong rgyal ba'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod// la li rig khas pa
196b5(rgyud): gzugs kyang 'dzin// la lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du ni// la lar/ mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa sgrub// rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i byaH/ 
196b6(rgyud): rgya shes pa'o// me tog dkar dang dmar bde // mthing kha ser po kun bsdus pa/ me tog phyag rgya mtsha/ ga 'di no// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skyegs
196b7(rgyud): mthing kha ljang ku'i mdog/ mtshon sna bzhi yis bcos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub/ khams las byung ba thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba'i
196b8(rgyud): de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub/ tsan dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang // ga bur nig sha la ki/ bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las rnams zad
196b9(rgyud): rab sgrub pa'o// gan dar dri dang gu gul dang // sa rdza ga bur gla rtsi dang // rdzas 'di dag las bcos pa'i mar// me mar byas na snang ba skye// tsan den gur gum s+tha ka dang // ga pur dang ni gla
197a1(rgyud): rtsi dang // bcas pa bdug pa grub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog 'gyur// ka ko la dang sug smel dang // gla sgang ga bur gla rtsi dang // 'di rnams zhib tu btags
197a2(rgyud): nga ni seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar// shing tshwa pa trai lo drA dang // na la sham dang ga bur sbyar// sa ha ka re shing mar gyis// smras pa kha yi spos yin// dpal rdo rje sada'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o// me
197a3(rgyud): tog dmar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la smoT pa/ 'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar// ser po kha las byung ba la// tsan dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la du rus ka/ spyan ras
197a4(rgyud): gzigs dbang ka pi ta// ce pog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar ma phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// sgra/ na ras gzigs la mar me brgya// stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la/ 
197a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams la can dan smos// rdo rje can la gur gum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar// ga bur rdo rje nyim la// me tog kun dang 'dug pa kun/ de bzhin mar me thad dang / 
197a6(rgyud): spos rnams thad ci snyed pa// rdo rje rta la 'dul du rung // mchod pa tha~Md kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang // myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig tu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra
197a7(rgyud): g.yon can bra mo de bzhin te// lan tshwa la sogs ro kun dang // kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin// bdag nyid kun gyi ri sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ sha dang chang du ldan pa yi// bza' ba
197a8(rgyud): sna tshogs grub pa ni// dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub// a 'bra sprin dang dgun 'bru dang // pa na sa dang na le ker// a ru ga la sogs 'bras bu'i// phyag rgya'i
197b1(rgyud): mchog ni 'di rnams te// dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob// khar sbrang rtsi byugs pa yi// a 'bra la sogs tshig gus byug/ sa ha ra yi mar la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar bya// yungs
197b2(rgyud): dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis 'thun par kha bsgyur nas// shun pa go ba la sogs pas// mchod pa'i tshe na 'bul bar ba// 'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams
197b3(rgyud): la bshos 'bu'o// sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs// glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / sha dang chang du bcas pa ni// gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o// bdag
197b4(rgyud): gi phyug tshan skal bzang po// rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang // pad+ma'i meta gaM ldan pa ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul
197b5(rgyud): na dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po'i kha za/ sa sna tshogs pa/ sha dang chang du ldan pa dang // gla dang sil snyan skal bzang dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dngul// kha
197b6(rgyud): zas kun gyi ro rnams dang / sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang / sha yi sbyor dang sha skam dang // bshos dag rdo rje rta la dbul// mchod pa dang gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o// mthe
197b7(rgyud): bong se de'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgag/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba// 
197b8(rgyud): rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa/ lus pa med pa myur de 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang rtag par ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog/ dbu rgyan kun tu brgyan par
198a1(rgyud): byang dbu rgyun bcing bas bcings nas ni// 'gyi ba ning mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma sbyangs da ltar/ bas nas thal mo brdab par bya// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin/ 
198a2(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// de yis dag med sdig med par// bdag gi longs spyod nyid spyod// 'di yos srung ba bas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gab che// 'a
198a3(rgyud): los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bselas su rje tshom @#
198a4(rgyud): mthe bong rdo rje mnan pa naM/ sna dang mig phugs lta bu ste// pad+ma'i rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa// / lus pa
198a5(rgyud): par myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / lnga na pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// bod pa'i thong ba'i dbu rgyan te// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar// dbu rgyan bcing bas
198a6(rgyud): bcings nas ni// 'gying ba'i mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma sbyangs pa ltar// byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// 'di yis srung ba byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'angadra // bam
198a7(rgyud): gsum dag ni rgyal srid che// 'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad+mo'i nor ba rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag
198a8(rgyud): rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du// ji ltar rigs par mnyam sbyar nas/ mdzub ma mthe bo'i rtse ma ba'i// yong su bsgyur te bteg gnas// dpral bar legs
198b1(rgyud): par bzhag nas ni// khams gsum bdag po rgyal bar bdag ma lus lus pa med par 'gug dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyar// lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yi// mdzub mo gnyis pa'i mdu par
198b2(rgyud): bcings// gung mo mthe bo'i rtse ma can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bsgyur te bteg nas kyang // khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na// rgyal srid thams cad legs 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grugaM// 'di
198b3(rgyud): yis srung ba byas na ni// rdo rje las kyi dpal dang 'dra/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grug ma mo dang ni byad ma dang // mkha' gro ma yang lhag par 'grub// dur khrod dos
198b4(rgyud): grub thaM de dang las rnams thams cad byed para'agyur// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dpa' bo skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung ma gnyis
198b5(rgyud): ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od/ rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grul
198b6(rgyud): 'di yis srung ba byas na ni// rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'gag// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i
198b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// mdzub mo snyam to phyi rol dgug// mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// dpral bar myur du 'azhag pa ni// bsam pa thad yongs rdzogs
198b8(rgyud): shing nga rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa/ ma lus lus pa med par 'greg// dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // yid bzhi
199a1(rgyud): nor bu'in chen mchog ta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ byang rgyas rab tu dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// ma mo pan rkun bsnol 'a ni// de rje thal mo yin par ba
199a2(rgyud): sor mo thams cad bsdams pa ni// rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// mdzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu// g.yas pa'i mtho ba'i mtshan ma 'di// rtse mo bcug la ba
199a3(rgyud): bar bya// dga' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya thams cad rang byung ba// rab 'byam las rnams dngos grub ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'a grub// dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni// gung mo bcings
199a4(rgyud): pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i bya// ga rgya yongasu bsgyur/ 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de/ bzhin dpa' bo tha~Md dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad
199a5(rgyud): ni tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal bde ba chen po'i rdza rje'i phyag rgya'o// de las gung mo lcags kyu ni// bdag gi snying kar sbyar bar bya// 'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya// dam
199a6(rgyud): thag tu phyag rgya 'dis// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// dpal bde ba che ni po rdo rje lcags kyu zhe
199a7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe'u chung mthe bong rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur na/ sangs rgyas byang chub sa dang yang / 
199a8(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na// dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog/ rab 'byams gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya
199b1(rgyud): bcings pa las// sbyar ldan thal mo khong stong sbyar// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// gang mo
199b2(rgyud): de bzhin bkug nas ni// rdo rje rdorje zhes brjod do// gung mo na mkha'i rdo rje mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab noni// 'dod pa 'ozhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dang ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu
199b3(rgyud): 'grub// dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas te// mthe bo'i rtse mo de bzhin snyam// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor
199b4(rgyud): par dag pa kun la rab tu gnas// byang chub sems ni mtha' sa mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub/ dpal rdo rje rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i bad+mor byas pa
199b5(rgyud): las ngang gung mo bcings pa'i dbus na gnas// mthe'u chung snyam pa'i rtse mo mda'u// rdo rje mda' ni yongasu 'phang // phyag rgya/ 'di yis btab na no// tshangs pa nye dbang dga' byed
199b6(rgyud): bcas// mthu yis myur du brgyal byas nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// dpal rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings na// gung mo bcings pa'i phyi rol bzhag/ rdo rje sgo/ 
199b7(rgyud): dpal gyi rgya// ldang ba thams cad rab grub pa'o// rdo rje phag rgya thams cad shes pa'o// a li ka li mnyam byas nas// mkha' yi thad kar bsdu bar bya// de yi 'og tu ri mo rnams// yi ge bad
199b8(rgyud): dgod par bya// gug skyed dag gi lcug mar bya// yi ge ra ni myu gur bya// glad skor zla ba khams pa dang // chog gnyis zla ba gnyis bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa
200a1(rgyud): ste/ sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mor bshad// yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// bsted dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar
200a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// bsod nams thad rab tu 'grag/ rdo rje sems dpa' bal spyod nas/ rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris na// sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grib// chags
200a3(rgyud): chen grol ba dpal zhes pa'i// chags pa'i mtshan drag bris na no// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// 'ag ba kun la rab tu gnas// snying rje dri med khrod dpal zhes// bstad dang bcas pa'i mtshan
200a4(rgyud): bris na// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// ngos/ grub kun gyi mchog kyang 'gag// pad+mo chags pa dpal dag/ ces// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las
200a5(rgyud): bar bar 'gyur// dag pa mas cad rnam par dag/  ma da la mangs zhes/ bstod deng bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ sI ga bkun las par bar 'gyur/ longs spyad kun la ba byuganas
200a6(rgyud): rta mchog pha rol gnon dpal zhes// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub// brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te// las kyi dngos
200a7(rgyud): grab rab 'bum dag/ ma lus par ni myur du 'gab// lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gis// slob dpon gang dang gang yin pas// de dang de yi mtshan dag ni// dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod// slob ma dkyil
200a8(rgyud): 'khor btsud nas kyang // yon gyi mchog dag blangs nas ni// rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ 
200b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas// de nas sangs rgyasu yang 'gyur// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya zhes pa'o// spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa// phyag 'tshal bar ni ston pa yin// dpral bar reg par
200b2(rgyud): byed pa ni// phyag lan yin par shes par bya// smin ma bskul ba gang yin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda// g.yas pas na mkha' 'gro ba 'grub// g.yon pa rnam par rgyal ba yi// rang byung
200b3(rgyud): rnams kyi brda yi rgya// mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste// g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yin// g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po'o// rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda// g.yas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin te// g.yon/ 
200b4(rgyud): pa legs par blangs pa'i// g.yas pa legs par smras pa'o// sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda// sangs rgyas thams gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa slong // g.yon pa
200b5(rgyud): bdag la dri slong ba'o// lce ni ldag pa ltar byed pa// ba/ rnga yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa sha yi phyag rgya yi/ na/ g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya yin// mche ba g.yas dang g.yon
200b6(rgyud): pa yi// bar du ma mchu mnan pa ni// g.yon pa bud mede dag na bde// g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o// lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin te// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// rtog
200b7(rgyud): pa thad smra ba'i mchog/ snying khar gyen du 'dren pa yin// rang byung phyag rgya'i brda grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa ste// 'khor ba shin tu sdud pa'o// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas
200b8(rgyud): ba steng dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa yI/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil// rang gi dbang po sgreng ba ni// rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// de las de bzhin bde ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad tha
201a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// brag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa slad gtong ba'o// dpung pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka/ 
201a2(rgyud): yis/ bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa zad 'grub pa yin// g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// khu tshur g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// khu tshu ra bcing dang dgrol ba dag/ g.yas brgyas
201a3(rgyud): 'debs phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mi rnams thong shig pa'i// brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu brtson// g.yas pa chos la brtson pa'o// dbus
201a4(rgyud): mo lha nga brda dag kyang // g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa rab tu phyag 'tshal// pus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// rda yi phyag/ 
201a5(rgyud): rgyar rab tu gnas// g.yas pa bcing ba'i phyagargya ste/ g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dag la// rkang pa gnyis kyis sa gnon pa// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa tho
201a6(rgyud): gnod par byed// g.yas pa thad rab tu 'joms// ngos grub las dang bde ba dang // 'di yis mi grub gang yang med// rang don las rnams rab grub pa// ma lus lus par grub// brda mi phyag rgya shes
201a7(rgyud): pa'o// oM a ti b+hu zhes bya ba'i brda/ 'di ni phyag 'tshal ba zhes pa'o// pra ti oM d+hi b+hu zhes pa/ phyag lan yin par shes par bya'o// sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' ba
201a8(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad// e ma'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshan// rdo rje sems dpa' gang brjod pa// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// bde ba
201b1(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'gab// bde mchog e ma'o bad ba dang // sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag/ rgyas 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang // zab mo dang tshe 'phel ma// sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor lo// de bzhin khams
201b2(rgyud): gsum rnam par rgya'o// 'dod pa'i lcug ma zad kyang // phyag rgya brda' yi phyag rgya'o// rta dang rdo rje snang ba dang // thal bar rnyog pa'i ro langs ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yi no// gling bu dang ni rgyud rnams dang // de
201b3(rgyud): bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang / stug po dang ni rdza rnga dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// me tog mchod dang bdug pa'i mchod// de bzhin mar me'i mchod pa dang // spos kyi mchod pa glang rtsi dag/ longs spyod
201b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i brda yin no// de la sogs pa mtha'/ yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam kha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// lha mo kun gyi brda yin// smin ma
201b5(rgyud): bskyod pa mda' ba zhi yin// b+ha ga ling ga e ma bde// thod pa pad+ma yin par bshad// kha nA ga yang rgyal mtshan // sangs rgyas phyag rgya bad+mor gnas// bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin/ 
201b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// shi shi sangs rgyas kun tu bshad// dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad// de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na// skye
201b7(rgyud): bo dam pa kun tshogs pa// tshogs kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// de bzhin mdza' ba 'dus par gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal
201b8(rgyud): sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor zad yin par bshad// lha mo thams cad kun 'dus pas// thams cad sna tshogs skal pa bzang // rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sang+yas kun tu bdag sbyor bas/ 
202a1(rgyud): rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir/ kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa/ lha mo thams cad 'das pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog dag gis
202a2(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba'o// de'i slob ma grub pa ni// grub pa'i rjesu grub pas na// sangs rgyas brda yi gsang ba yis// rgyal mtshan yin par rnam por bshad// de las gzhan pa'i sleb ma kun/ 
202a3(rgyud): mchog dang 'bring dam ma'i rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog// dab rgyan mi 'gyur
202a4(rgyud): dam pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid ma / yin par rang byung rnams kyis gsungs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ sangs rgyas brdal
202a5(rgyud): phyag rgya yi// dpal gyi pad+mo'i tshul du bshad// sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub cig dang // de bzhin pad+mo'i rang bzhin gcig/ thams cad dbang bskur dbang bskur che// yin par den kun
202a6(rgyud): grub pas gsungs// yon gyi dam pa grib pa ni// nor gyi dbyig du bshad pa ste// snying yang nor gyi mchog yin par// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad// ga bur tsan dan dmar po dang // sbyar
202a7(rgyud): ba brag chen yin par bshad// tshogs kyi dbusu bzhag pa dpal// thams cad ldang ba'i ras yin// bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs// tsan dan dmar pos bskus pa dang // bag phye'i zan las
202a8(rgyud): byas pa'i sha/ rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o// de nas grub pa'i mna' bsgrags pa// dam tshig ces par gnas pa'o// bde mchog bde mchog ces gsungs pa// sangs rgyas bde mchog
202b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis// phyag rgya bde ba mchog tu gsungs// de bzhin e ma'o bde ba dang // snang ba shes pa'ang rab tu gnas/ shi shi srid pa'ang srid pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // 'da'
202b2(rgyud): bar bya ba'ang ma yin pas// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad/ phyag rgya 'ang sbyor ba yin par bshad// sbyor ba'ang phyug rgya yin par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'
202b3(rgyud): dpal sbyor ba// sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad// nga ni sna tshogs dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi// sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad// de yi nye
202b4(rgyud): ba'i longs spyod no// khams gsum thad ma lus pa'o// de yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa bde mos pa'o// gzugs ni ri ma yin par gsungs// sgra ni glu yin zhes
202b5(rgyud): bshadod dri ni rab tu tshim par gsungs// ro nir sa ya na yin// reg pa bde ba yin par bshad// rab tu reg pa dga' ba'i bde// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi// chos ni sbyor ba
202b6(rgyud): yin par bshad// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// ji ltar bde bar bsten byed cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyar ba// rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin// rjesu sbyor bas mchod na ni// sbyor
202b7(rgyud): ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi// bde ba chen po yin par bshad// lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o// ye shes tsam la snyoms
202b8(rgyud): 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// ting 'dzin rab tu sbyor ba'ang bshad/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas thad 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas
203a1(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pa'o// dga' bar spyod pa grub par bshad// rjes sbyor ba rje su sgrub/ skyes pa ltar byed dga' spyod pa/ slar yang rjes sgrub
203a2(rgyud): par mdzad// lha mo kun la bde sdug pa// sbyar ba kun la mos pa ni// kun tu sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ ra sa ya na bde bar bshad// thad ldang ba kun 'gro ba// dngos gab dam par rab tu bshad// dngos gA
203a3(rgyud): chen po ldang ba char// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po bla na med// sangs rgyas dam pa kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis
203a4(rgyud): bshad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thaMd mnyam sbyor pa/ sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen// brag ni me tog
