263a5(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig spyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa yis// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar smra// sbas de ni rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing // skal pa dben pas 'grub mi 'gyu
263a6(rgyud): bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang // nga mnyes byas pas rnyed par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// 
263a7(rgyud): de nas brda' ni mkha' go ma'i// lus kyi mtshan nyid gang yin dang // dbang po'i yan lag dbye ba ni// grub par gyur pa de grub 'gyur// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mi bri zhing // rnam pa kun tu sba bar bya/ 
263a8(rgyud): gang gi thada'ang mi gdon te// g.yon pa'i kun spyod sgrub pa pos// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' gro yi// sngags rnams bag med pas 'don na// de la nga ni mo baMlta ste// mkha' go stong phrag du ma yis
263b1(rgyud): ngan pa'i bdag nyid can de ba// dam tshig 'joms shing ngan spyod// bram ze gsod par the tshom med// sdig spyod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// bslus gyur ngan pa'i bdag nyid// mkha 'gro ma yis zos gyur kyang
263b2(rgyud): de la nga ni skyob mi byed// gsang ba pa yi nang na ni// sgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra// bla ma dam tshig la 'khub// sangs rgyas 'jig rten de las lhung / he ru ka dpal lta dka'i rgyud// gang zhig srung bar byed pa ni/ 
263b3(rgyud): mkha' gro mar bcas dge slong nas// de la nga ni rje su 'dzin// bla ma la ni bsnyen bkur byed// gsong bar byed pa'i sgrub pa po// mkha' gro ma la rtag dga' ba// de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrub pa
263b4(rgyud): po ni dpa' nyid 'gyur// khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag/ sgrub po dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa// thams cad du ni ma chod par 'gyur// de ni rnal 'byor la rab 'jug/ yang dag
263b5(rgyud): sbyin pa'ang rig par 'gyur// he ru ka yi brtul zhu/ 'dzin// slob dpon dpa' bo mthong gyur pa// mthong zhing mthong zhing kun tu dga'// sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis// dpa'
263b6(rgyud): bo'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog/ lan bdun du ni brjod par bya// rab sngags hUM la sogs pas phye// de rnams 'bad phyag byas nas// sangs rgyas la sogs thad mchod// rtag pa nyid du dpal chen dang
263b7(rgyud): rol par ldan pa the tsho med// de yi thugs kar gnas phag mo// da dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// pho nya rnams dang lhan cig bcas// de dang gang zhig legs skyes pa// srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin/ 
263b8(rgyud): 'bab chu'i gram dang rgya mtsho dang // ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo dang // steng ka dang ni khron pa mtshe'u// khang stong dang ni lam srang dag/ tha du ni mkha' go ma// kun tu zhen par lta la gnas// 'jigs pa chen po dur
264a1(rgyud): khrod// mkha' spyod de bzhin sa 'og dang // ro langs kyang ni du ma zhig/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang stobs chen pos// de dag lhan cig dpa' bo che// ci bder bar ni rol par mdzad// 
264a2(rgyud): ri sul tshang tshing gsang ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang gsang ba'i me// phyogs ni de dang de dag tu// sgrub pa po dang sa steng ro la// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i sa dang gsad
264a3(rgyud): ba'i dpa' bo'i gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste gsum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che// sngags kyi rnam pa brgyad kyis dgod// de nas 'di la yang dag mthong // gsol bar 'gyur ba
264a4(rgyud): gdon mi za// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rnam mang po// mi badz+ra dmakha' gro 'jigs byed pa// dpa' bo 'jigs par gyur ni ni/ skrag cing rnam par 'byed par byed// gal tu dpa' bo mi 'jigs
264a5(rgyud): na/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni// rang gi gan/ su khyer nasu// mkha'agro ma ni de dag dang / rtag tu mngon du byed// bde ba can gyi gnas 'gro 'gyur// he ru ka dpal gus
264a6(rgyud): 'dod pas// mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnasu khyer// sgrub pa po ni sngags lus can// 'khor bar 'chi dang rga ba med// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las lta ba dang ha ha ra dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste
264a7(rgyud): sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// da ni rab tu bshad bya ba// gang gis sa stengs dbang du 'gyur// dpa' bo'i sngags kyi zla ba yin// rnal 'byor cho ga gnas pas 'grub// sgron ma myos byed bcas pa dang / 
264a8(rgyud): nya yi sha dang ldan par ni// dpa' dbang gnas skabs dzadu// nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa po'i// mtshan mo'i sbyin sreg byed la gnos dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// brgya dang rtsa brgyad ldan nyid
264b1(rgyud): kyis// thun gsum du ni sgrub byed na// rgyal po dpung dang bcas par ni// nyin bdun gyis ni dbang du 'gyur// phyed kyis dpa' bo blon po ste// de yi phyed kyis blon po yi// rgyal phran la ni sum cu gnyis// sreg
264b2(rgyud): pa'i rim gyis sbyin bsreg bya// nyi shus bram ze nyid la ni// nyi ma bdun gyis sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin rgyal rigs dag la bdun// sbyin sreg lnga po rje rigs la// rmangs rigs la ni sbyin sreg gsum/ 
264b3(rgyud): tha ma la ni sbyin srog gcig/ de ltar dpa' bos rigs rims gyis// zla ba gcig ni yang dag spyad// sngags kyi nus pa sgrub pa pas// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// dpa' bos chog snga ma yis/ 
264b4(rgyud): 'dod pas bsten na thob par 'gyur// sa stengs 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bzhin// dpal ldan skal pa bzang por 'gyur sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// yid 'ongs 'gyur bar gdas
264b5(rgyud): mi za// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rig sa lnga po dbang du bya ba dang phyag rgya chen po bsten pa'i cho ga'i lo'u ste bzhi cu pa'o// // de nas las kyi mchog rab ni// 
264b6(rgyud): gang gis shes na sgrub pa pos// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // bsang dang bskrad pa la sogs dang // rmugs dang rengs par bya ba dang // rmongs dang de bzhin phur bus gdab// tshig 'phrog lkugs par
264b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang // 'on dang de bzhin long ba dang // mi ning nyid du bya ba dang // gzugs ni yongasu 'gyur ba ste// las chen bcus 'di dag ni// rtag tu sgrub pa po yis bsgrub// dngos grub sgrub pa po la ni/ 
264b8(rgyud): ngan pa 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za// zad bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha' gro mas ni zad khyab// ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas// yul dang yul du mngon par skye// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo ya
265a1(rgyud): de rnams mkha' gro ma ru bshad// ku lu ta dang dgon po dang // sin+du'i yul dang grong khyer dbang // gser gyi gling dang sau raSh+Ta// de bzhin lha yi khyim dang ni// yi dwags grong dang
265a2(rgyud): kha ba'i gnas// kIny+dza 'am lAM pa ka yi yul// ka ling ka dang ko sa la// tri sha ku na o tra dang // kA ma ru pa mA la wa// lha mo'i mkhar dang rA ma'i dbang // go da ba ri ar bu tar// u d+yan dzA lan+na
265a3(rgyud): ra dang / bu la'i ram la ya sogs// yul 'di dag gi bu mo gang / dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma// de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te// yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug pa yin// rnal 'byor
265a4(rgyud): drug ku lu tar// mya ngan yul nam mo rnams// sar+b+ba'i yul na lA ma ste// rigs kyi gtso mo nag rer// lA pa ka dang sau raSh+Ta ra// rigs kyi lha mo rnams yino// yi dwags grong dang
265a5(rgyud): nag chen por// mkha' go pu bi ka ru btsas// kha dA ri dang kAny+tsa ni/ byis bcas ma ru bshad pa ste// pany+tsa la yi yul dag na// khyim gyi lha mo ka ling kar// brtul bzhu
265a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnams yin// ka sa lar ni sha za ba// yi drags grong du de bzhin du// rdo rje mkha' go sbom dbang phyug/ tra~M sha ku ner dum skyes ma// pu li ra ma la yi de bzhin// gser rir smri sha can rig
265a7(rgyud): skyes// bud med stong phrag nyi shu gcig/ lhag ma gzhan dag ji srid pa// dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni// 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor mi yin// he ru ka dpal sbyor ba che// de yi dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/ 
265a8(rgyud): mkha' gro nyi rtsa bzhi 'dis// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// 'gro ba kun ni 'di yis khyab// mkha'agro ma yi dam tshig 'di// sprul pa sgom pa 'di nyid yin te// bsam gtan la sogs ga
265b1(rgyud): ci'ang ru// sa stengs na ni rdzogs 'gyur ba'o// g.yon gyi spyod pa gcer bu yin// mtshan mo rtag tu mnyam gzhag pas// skyes pa 'am gal te g.yon pa kun// rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' bo 'gro
265b2(rgyud): phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// rang 'byung rtag tu mchod na ni// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // g.yon pa'i mchod pa la rab 'jug/ dpal he ru ki'i nges par brjod pa las yi ge nyi shu rtsa
265b3(rgyud): bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas dpa' bo me tog chu// 'thungs nas sngags 'di rjes dran bya// rtag tu 'di ltar bya ba nyid// phyag rgya
265b4(rgyud): lhan cig sgrub pa pos// mtshan mo rtag tu sha bza 'ab/ sngags 'di nyid kyis lan gsum bsngag/ myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur// 'thungs dang de bzhin byin pa dang // reg nas
265b5(rgyud): bzhag na gtso mo che// bden pas tshangs par spyod pa dang // thog mar bzhad pa'i phyag rgya yis// blta ba'i bsnyams ba grags ldan pa// mtshan mo'ang de bzhin nyin mo ni// 'dis ni
265b6(rgyud): bzhad pa dag tu bya// gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba gang // ji ltar gnas pa dpa' bo nyon// rtag tu de yi mchi ma 'byung // dad pas de yi spyi yang ldang // rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed// de bzhin gcer bus
265b7(rgyud): mchod pa ste// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug zad kyi// phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim pa nyid// dbugs 'byin bskul dang dgod pa dang // sgeg par gar ni ngo mtshar bas// snro Ta gang dag mdun byed cing // phyag rgya
265b8(rgyud): sngags ni rjes dran bya// ha ha he ha rnam brgyad bzhad// sna tshogs dbang phyug mchog tu dga'// hA hA zhes bya 'di nye bar// rtag tu mchi ma 'byung ba dang // de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing // bsam
266a1(rgyud): gtan gyis sngags legs par sbyor// gtso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni// spu ldang ba dang lhan cig de// rdo rje 'gom par mi bya ba// g.yon pas yongasu brtags pa yin// dpal he ru kir
266a2(rgyud): nges par brjod pa las bzhad pa'i sngags dang mkha' gro ma'i gzugs kyi sgyu ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas spyan ras gzir bshed// dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med mi// 
266a3(rgyud): gnas kyi dbye ba cho ga shes// skem la rtag tu mngon dga' ba'o// lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am khyim dag gam// dpa' bo'i gnas dang ri bor ni// mkha' 'gro ma yis dam tshig gnas// ring po nas kyang
266a4(rgyud): gzigs par 'gyur// phyag rgyas gcer bu mchod pa yi// lag pas go 'phang dam pa ste/ gos nyid kyis ni ba kab pa 'am gzhan// 'dod pa rnams kyi gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin
266a5(rgyud): sgra grol gtsor gyur pas// las rnams thad pam par bya// rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan// phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa yis// lha dang lha yi tshoDa kyis kyang
266a6(rgyud): ma mthong bar ni mchod par gyis// snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste// mkha' la spyod la gyen du mthor// me tog de dag ma lhung zhing // me tog sa la ma mthong na// gnas kyi khyad par la gnas
266a7(rgyud): dang / mkha' la 'gro ba stong phrag gis// gnas la dbang ni byed par 'gyur// ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang // ngag gi dbang phyug 'gugs par 'gyur// lha dang lha yi gtam shes shing // 
266a8(rgyud): rim pa ji lta bzhin du'o// skar ma'i rgyu ba shes par 'gyur// grong dang grong dang de bzhin dgon// grong khyer dang ni bzhi mdo dang // shing gcig dang ni dpa' bo'i khyim// ri rtse dang ni mtshan drung du// snyi
266b1(rgyud): po'i nye snying rtag dran na// lha dang mi yis mthong mi 'gyur// de bas yul phyogs 'di dag tu// sgrub pa po ni rtag tu gnas// yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can// shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas// 
266b2(rgyud): myur du lhung bar mi phyed par// sa rnams kyang ni gzhan du min// bdag gi lus la rnam bkod// sa la ku shi'i stan du nyal// yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad ni nyi du bzlas// rmi lam
266b3(rgyud): du ni bye ba kun// yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur// dus min 'chi dang bcom dang nyams// bya ba kun tu gang gyur dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // thad rmi lam dag tu ston// de bzhin sngags bzlas
266b4(rgyud): ral gri chu// mthe bong mar me me long la// sngags pa ba dag nyid rtag rnal 'byor// pra se na ni 'bebs par byed// bsgom sa nas lan bdun bzlas brjod pas// dge dang mi dge ston par
266b5(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas dpa' bo'i yi ge bdun// sngags dag da dpe ba nyid kyis te// nyi ma'i dbusu bsams nas ni// stong gi bar du bzlas par bya// shel gyi rnam pa lta bur ni// nad kyis
266b6(rgyud): gdungs la bstan par bya// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la ni// nad kun 'jigs par the tshom med// nad las rnam par grol 'gyur na// ston ka'i dus kyi zla ba 'dra// zla ba'i dbus rnam bkod cing // lag pa
266b7(rgyud): g.yon par 'khor lo nyid// yi ge shel gyi mdog ltar snang // nad rnams kun la dgod par bya// rims dang gdon srogs brjed byed dang // gzar sogs kun dang mdze can dang // dug gis zin sogs
266b8(rgyud): nad rnams dang // nad kun the tshom med par ni// zla gzugs yi ger bsams nas ni// phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur// mtshan mo gsang ba la gnas te// go mAng sa ni mngar gsum btags
267a1(rgyud): yig bdun gsang sngags shes pa dang / stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas// sngags pa nang par dus ni/ gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur// sbyin sgeg stong phrag bcu yis ni/ 
267a2(rgyud): yul 'khor dam pa rnyed par 'gyur// yang na gsang sngags rgyal po ni// gnas ni gang du bsams pa dang // de dang der ni de yi tshe// skye bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dkar po yis na zhi bar 'gyur// nag bro
267a3(rgyud): skad cig dag gis bsod// dmar pos dbang du 'gyur ba ste// 'phral du nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// ser pos thad gnon 'gyur te// 'di ni bstan bcos nges pa yin// ser pos dpung ni gnon pa
267a4(rgyud): dang glu dang 'khrul 'khor glang po gnon dkar po ba sems pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba nges par grol bar 'gyur// sprul chen brgya yis zin pa ni// de yang myur du glo bar byed// dug gis
267a5(rgyud): brgyal ba rnams mthong nas// rab tu sad pas sad par 'gyur// rims dang gdon dang brjed byed ni// lag pa mthong bas 'jigs par 'gyur// g.yul gyi dusu khu tshur bcings/ 
267a6(rgyud): yid la rtag tu zlos byed na// khu tshur ma bkrol de srid du// bya ba thams cad sgrub par 'gyur// dag po gal te lag na ni// mtshon cha 'phyar bar byed pa yang // ji srid khu tshur ma bkrol bar// mtshon cha gtog/ 
267a7(rgyud): bar mi nus// gzhan yang bya ba tha~Md ni// de bzhin nyid sgrub par byed// 'bras bu me tog 'dab ma dang // so rtsi de bzhin zas rnams la// lus kyi sbyor ba dang po ste// de bzhin gnyis pa nus pa yin// gsum pa
267a8(rgyud): dag ni ngag nyid// bzhi pa dmigs par mi 'gyur te// sngags kyi rgyal pos 'grub par 'gyur// sa bzhi shing dang bcas pa dang // rgya mtsho ske rags btags de la// 'dir ni 'grub par the tsho med
267b1(rgyud): khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bar// dmod 'debs phan 'dogs nus pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nye ba'i snying po'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u sna bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// 
267b2(rgyud): de nas pho nya la bsten te// yi ge bdun pa dang ldan pa// gang du las la yang dag brtsams// de yi mod la myur du 'grub// yi ge bdun pa'i cho ga yis// rnal 'byor ma dag rnam par dgod// 'khor lor
267b3(rgyud): legs par gnas pa dag/ rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis// g.yon pa nyid bskal dang bcas// gang gi gzung 'dzin bsams nas ni// kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos// gang la lag pa de bstan pa
267b4(rgyud): de ni nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// tsan dan dmar po 'i rdul dang ni// de bzhin ske tshe lan tshwa dang // bsgrub par bya ba'i da rkang rjes la// gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya// lag pa
267b5(rgyud): gnyis kyis mnyes nas ni// rnal 'bor ma la sbyin bsreg bya// mtshan mo rme sha can me 'am// dur khrod me la phye ma sreg/ bsgrub par bya la mngon phyogs te// sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam
267b6(rgyud): par bya// ji srid brgya yi bar du bzlas// des ni nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang // nor dang skye bo dbang du 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste// gzhan du ni ni nga mi smra/ 
267b7(rgyud): rdul de nyid ni blangs nasu// lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsres// dur khrod ras la btus nas ni// lan bdun bzlas la bzhi mdo ru// sor brgyad tsam du sa brkos nas// dag yi ming dang bcas par ni// 
267b8(rgyud): gang gi ming smos sbas 'gyur ba// de ni myur du gnon par 'gyur// phyi ma de nyid bzlas nas// 'bad ba yi 'o ma yis// de ni slar yang gsos gyur na// 'grub pa nyid the tshom med// phye ma de ni blangs nas
268a1(rgyud): / nas// myos byed lnga dang ldan pa ru// de ni dur khrod ras kyis bcings// dag yi ming yang bri bar bya// bzlas brjod lan brgya byas nas ni// dur khrod ni nges sbas na// bsgrub pa spro ba nyid 'gyur
268a2(rgyud): bton pa nyid kyis thar bar 'gyur// gton nas pa yi 'o ma yis// 'bad pas de bzhin bkru bar bya// slar yang gso ba de dag ni// 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las
268a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dag gi yi ge bdun gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas las kyi rab mchog ni// ngag gi dngos grub byed pa'o// ka ra bi ri'i me tog dpar// brgya rtsa brgyad ni
268a4(rgyud): blangs na su// 'bad de ba yi 'o ma dang // bzlas brjod rgya/ yang bya ba yin// lan re bzlas pa'i me tog gis// ling ka'i spyi bor bsnun par bya// de ltar shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ 
268a5(rgyud): ma bdun du bya ba yin// de nas nyin zhag bcug par// me tog dag ni blangs na su// chu bo chen por song nas ni// re re nas ni tshul dor// de dag thad rims bzhin du// lan re bzlas nas/ 
268a6(rgyud): rab tu bya// chu bor me tog tha ma ni// rgyun las bzlog ste rab 'bab na// chu dang bcas par blangs nas ni// sos ma reg par de 'thungs na// gsang ba'i rgyud las byung ba yi// sgrub po'i tshig ni 'gab par
268a7(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas skye gnas rgya bcings la// brgya rtsa brgya du bzlas nas ni// sngags pa bsgrub byar mngon phyogs na// bsgrub par bya ba'i lto bar gnas// de la yid kyi gnas bzhin du// blo ldan thun
268a8(rgyud): gsum mthe'u chung bskyod// bram ze gsod pa dag gis kyang // zhag bdun brgya byin sogs nges 'bugs/ tsan dan dmar po'i rdul las ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la/ tsha ba gsum
268b1(rgyud): gyis lus la bsku// pra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug/ sgrub pa po yi gsang gnasu// zangs ma'i khab kyis phug nas ni// seng ldeng mdag ma du med la// mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du bsro// lan brgya bzlas
268b2(rgyud): te bzlas pa'i mthe'o// me yi bdag po mdun na 'don// btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa ni// nges par 'gugs par byed pa yin// mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas pa// glo ga'i 'dab mar bri bya ba// gi wang
268b3(rgyud): dag gis bris nas ni// ming dang spel nas gang la ni// mngon par phyogs te brgya bzlas nas// seng ldeng mau la de gdongs shing // dur khrod ma steng sgrub phyir bshad// ji srid pra tshil ma zhu bar// bsras pa
268b4(rgyud): gyur na rgyal po ni// 'khor los bsgyur dang bcas par yang // nges par 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin// bsgrub par bya ba 'i rkang rjes las// tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// dur khrod lhag ma
268b5(rgyud): thal bas spros// sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus la// sang ldang ma ni du med la// rab tu 'bad pas sro bar bya// rdul de la ga pa gnyis kyis ni// mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas nas ni// ji
268b6(rgyud): srid ni bsregs pas 'grub// rdul de blangs nis ma yengs par// dbugs mi 'byin par sbas na ni// brgyal ba'i sems dang bral 'dra la// myos shing skyon rmongs pa nyid dang // rlung gi shugs kyis
268b7(rgyud): 'ongs nas ni// sgrub pa po yi steng du lhung // phyugs sam yang na pho nya mo// mkhas pa yis ni dbye ba yin// de lus kyi pho nya mor// bya ba 'di ni 'dzin po nyid// ka ra bi ri'i lcug mi ni// rlan bcas dpung
268b8(rgyud): pa'i tshad mnyam blangs// 'bar 'gyur ro bsregs me la dor// ji srid de ni ma tshig pa// myur du song ste de blangs la// rig pa lan bdun bzlas nas ni// gang zhig bzlas te bskor na ni// de ni de yi skad ce
269a1(rgyud): langs skyes pa 'am bud med rang gzugs can// rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs par 'gyur// ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar// brgya bzlas rgyal gyis sbyor ba las// sgrub pos gi wang gis
269a2(rgyud): phyugs la// me tog chu la gnas pa la// chu bo chen por zhugs nas ni// lta ba man chod chur bcug ste// lag pa sbyar ba'i dbus gnas la// rig pa stong du bzlas nas ni// lag pa gnyis kyis phyer
269a3(rgyud): blangs te// chu dang bcas par btung bar bya// de nas sgrub pa po de yis// tshig gi dngos grub thob por 'gyur// rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i chung ma ni// yid kyis nges par 'gags par 'gyur// lhar bcas lha
269a4(rgyud): mi mi rnams ni// myur du dbang du byed par 'gyur// zla sa pas tshig gis gsod 'gyur zhing // dbye dang bskrad pa nyid kyis dbye// sgrub pa po yi tshig nyid kyis// tshar gcod par na
269a5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// tshig tsam gyis ni chu bo'i dang / shi ngarta 'khrul 'khor rgya mtsho dang // glang po rta dang de bzhin sprin/ skyes bu'am yang nu bya yang gnon// yid kyis yid la gang
269a6(rgyud): 'dod pa// tshig gis zad byed par 'gyur// dgug pa yi ni sbyor ba dag/ bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa// ka ra bi ra'i me tog ni// dmar po yang dag blangs nasu// rigs pa lan brgya bzlas pa dag/ 
269a7(rgyud): skye gnas dbus gzhugs par bya// me tog de ni kha sbyar byas// gsang ba'i gnasu nges par sbyar// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ldan// sngags pas brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas// skye gnas dbus
269a8(rgyud): kyi me tog dang // sgrub pa po yis gcig blangs la// me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa// de ni mod la dbang du 'gyur// brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba yang // yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste/ 
269b1(rgyud): mngon 'gyur sems ni bzlog pa ru// skad cig gis ni dbang du byed// 'di ni yid ches dngos grub ste// don yod dbang du byed pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug dang tshig gi
269b2(rgyud): dngos grub lung bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas yi ge ha lnga na// las rnams thaMng sgrub byed pa// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du ngos grub rab 'jug pa'o// 
269b3(rgyud): ha ho ho ha~M// yi ge ha lnga lag pa yis// bskul dang ldan pas mnyes nas ni// kha nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing // dag bo de yi mod la 'chi// rang gi khrag ni thod gnas pa// srin lag gis khrag mnya
269b4(rgyud): bar bya// ji srid bskams kyi bar du ste// des ni bsgrub bya/ rnam par 'jig/ gal te khro ba 'bar ba dang / mig dmar pa yis bzlas na ni// dbu tshogs gnon par bcas pa yis// rgyal po
269b5(rgyud): myur du 'chi bar byed// byil dang ni ne'u le dang // bla dang wa dang mu sbyar ni// mkha' gro ma la stobs can sbyar// 'di/ dge myur du grub yin par// rgyud 'di la ni the tshom med// 
269b6(rgyud): bong la sogs spu las ni// srad bu byas te lan stong bzlas// gang gi mgul du bcings gyur pa// de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// lag par bzlas brjod stong byas te// ka ra bi ri'i me tog dang // yi ge re
269b7(rgyud): mngon bzlas la// sbrum ma la ni reg gyur na// mngal ni rnam par 'pho 'gyur te// btang na thar par 'gyur ba yin// gang la bsdigs mdzub byas te 'chi// slar yang 'tsho bar byed pa yin// dpal he ru kar
269b8(rgyud): nges par brjod pa las yi ge ha lnga'i las kyi cho ga ra le'u skye bani bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mkha' gro kun gyi snying po ste/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis
270a1(rgyud): / kyang // ngos grub thams cad bskyed byed yin// de nas mkha'agro ma'i rig pa chen po bzlas na rigs thad dbang du byed par 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas pas ni dpal chen
270a2(rgyud): po bskyed par 'gyuraro// mi rus kyi rgyu la phur bu sor drug pa byas la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs brgyud rnams gcod par 'gyur ro// zhing dang ra ba dang ma ha dang
270a3(rgyud): glang po che dang // rta'i gnasu brkos te sbas na thad sbas par 'gyuro// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na rgyal po'i sgor sa la byas pa'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa
270a4(rgyud): byas la/ mkhas pas bzhag nas nyin nag dang po la ma tu lung ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams dang ku su ma bsres pas sbyin sra ga brgya stong byas na de dbang du 'gyur// sngags 'di nyid
270a5(rgyud): kyis dgug dang / skems pa dang / rmongs pa dang / tshig 'phrog pa dang / long bar byed pa dang / dag pa nyid dang / slar ga tong bar byedado// de nas skyes pa bud med du bya bar 'dod
270a6(rgyud): na skyes pa'i ri'i me tog dang / ka ga a ni da ka'i 'bras bu dang / khwa'i sen mo dang / rkang pa'i 'og gi lpags pa cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag dang btags te ril bu bcu
270a7(rgyud): cig byas la grib ma la ska mo// de bzhin du zhag bzang po la lag pa la bcings te nyi ma gnyis pa la gang gi spyi bor phye ma bzhag pa de bud medu 'gyur ro// de nas skyes pa khir bya bar 'dod
270a8(rgyud): na gnam lcags ne'u le'i mgo bor bzhag la mtshan mo bdun gyi bar du brgya stong sbyin sreg byas la nyin zhag brgyad pa la gur gum dang mnyam por sbyar te// lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngo
270b1(rgyud): mngon par bzlas nas phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyir 'gyuraro// slar gso ba ni mtshan mo'i dusum pa 'gro ma rnams la mchod pa chen po byas te
270b2(rgyud): gtor ma byin na de'i 'og tu rnal mar 'gyuraro// rdzas rdzas ma yin par bya bar 'dod na// gsar gyi 'bras bu sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rdzas ma yin par 'gyuraro// a ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rnal
270b3(rgyud): mar 'gyur// de nas skyo bar bya bar 'dod na bya chen po gnas kyi sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun pa la smyo bar 'gyur// slar bzlog pa ni 'bras kyi phub ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur// 
270b4(rgyud): li'i spu zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe bsdus la gang gi ming nas smos nas sngags kyi sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba de gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de byi lar 'gyuraro// slar bzlas na rna
270b5(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur// bya rog gi rgyus pa la srid bu byas pa bzung la mngon par bzlas te gang gi mgul du btsongs pa de bya rog tu 'gyur/ gang dang gang gi rgyus pas srang bu byas pa la mngon
270b6(rgyud): par bzlas te mgul du bcings pa de de dang 'dra bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin khwa dang the ba dang rma bya dang / chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang bya rgod kyi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyuraro// ba lang gi spu la srad
270b7(rgyud): bu byas la ldan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te mgul du bcings na de ba lang du 'gyur// rkang bin pa la sogs pa gang dang gang gi spu las srad bu byas la mngon par bzlas te mgul du
270b8(rgyud): btags na de de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur// bkro laM na thar par 'gyu ro// 'bras pa la bzlas la nor gyi bdag po chen po'i khyim du bcug la lhag mas bdag nyid dang dbang bskur na
271a1(rgyud): / mtshan bdun gyis so ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyuraro// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las sangs rgyas zad kyi mkha 'og ma'i sngags kyi las zad kyi cho ga'iri le'u sa
271a2(rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa bdan pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' gro kun gyi dag gang ba'i// snying po rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// 'dod do thang sgrub byed pa'o// gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig
271a3(rgyud): rten gsum po ge yo byad cing // rje su dad pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag dngos grub rim gyiso// hA srA Ta pha hA ya nir+N+Na badz+ra ba ye nAM ki DA bud+d+ha rbas oM// sngags 'di bklags pas grub pa ste// las
271a4(rgyud): rnams kun byed dag pa yin// mkha' go rnal 'a byor ma rnams dang // khaN+Do ro ha lA ma sogs// mkha' grim ni thad kyi// sngags ni 'di nyid yin par grags// sa 'og yang na ma'o/ 
271a5(rgyud): ris ma// de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang // las ni gang dag yod pa dag/ sngags kyis de dag thams cad sgrub/ dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin// dngos grub bde rab stsol ba/ 
271a6(rgyud): 'di las shin tu mchog gyur med// 'jig rten gsum na ci yang med// gang phyir 'di ni bla med// las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin// mkha' go ma ni kun gyi gnas// mdor bshad rgyas par
271a7(rgyud): ma yino/ me tog 'bras bu snoT kyi// ri bo bzang po bri byi zhing // de yi steng du rtog bsgom pa// mkha' gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro ha rnal 'byor ma// dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' bo nyid// ha ha he he
271a8(rgyud): bya ba/ dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa ba na yi// mkha' gro dra ba'i bdade mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin pad+ma gar dbang dang / shrI he ru ka nyid dang ni// na mkha'i snying dang ni/ 
271b1(rgyud): mgrin nyid// rin chen rdo rje stobs po che// mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang // rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang // rdo rje hUM mdzad dpa' chen po// de bzhin rdo rje ral pa can// myu gu can dang rdo rje'i lus// rdo rje 'od
271b2(rgyud): ni nyid dag dang // 'od dpag med dang lha yi dag/ de bzhin mche ba rnams gtsigs dang // keng rus keng rus chen po dang // thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// 'gro ba 'di dag
271b3(rgyud): thams cad khyab// dpa' bo rnams dang mkha'i go nyid// rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs// bya ba kun la sgrub pa pos// 'khor b.re zhugs par blta bar bya// gab 'dod shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// 
271b4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rtag tu sgom// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis// mkha' gro dra ba'i bad ma tshig brjod// 'khor lo chen po drug kun gnas// de bzhin ngos grub kun gyi bzhi// 'di
271b5(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas bye ba dang // dpa' bo bye bas legs par gsungs// mkha' gro ma ni re re yi// 'khor ni bye ba dag tu 'gyu ra// rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' gro nyid// gzugs can ma dang dum
271b6(rgyud): skyes ma/ de bzhin lA ma la sogs ni// dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' ba dang mkha' gro ma thad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gi'i
271b7(rgyud): le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ji bzhin cho gas phyugs bsgrub bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 
271b8(rgyud): myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// sngags pas 'bras kyi phye ma las// rim bzhin du ni phyugs gzugs bya// mi dang ru sba la rnga mo dang / bong bu sbung kurti la sogs// de ltar sna tshogs phag dag
272a1(rgyud): phyugs 'di dag tu shes par bya// mtshan nyid ji ltar gyur pa dang // 'di rnams las ni bshad par bya// skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis// gsum mam bani 'am lnga nyid dam/ 
272a2(rgyud): skye ba dag dang bdun gyur pa// blugs rnamasu ni gdon mi za// gang gis kha yi dri zhim zhing // mig mi 'dzum par rnam par blta// bden par smra zhing mthong na dga'// rtag tu dam chos dga' 'gyur zhing // rang gi
272a3(rgyud): skye ba shes pa dang / lus kyi do ni rtag tu nam// mtshan nyid 'di dag ldan par ni// skye ba bdun du 'byung ba yin// de ni thos pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// bsnams pa 'am reg
272a4(rgyud): pa tsam gyis sam// gang gis thig le byed pa ste// ma da la 'grub par 'gyur ba ste// 'od ni rang dga'i gzugs 'chang 'gyur// de yi snying ka'i ro tsa na'i// mkhas pa yis ni blangs
272a5(rgyud): nas ni// snying po'i sngags ni bzlas nas// de yi thig le bya ba yin// sems can gang dang gang gi ni// gzugasu bye dpar 'dod pa na// de dang de yi gzugs ni// thig les 'gyur
272a6(rgyud): bar the tshom med// mkhas pas shing l-i khu ba ni// ro tsa nar bcas blangs na su// dpral ba thig le byas ni ni// de gzugs 'gyur ba the tshom med// phyugs nyid kyi nir spu yis/ lag pa spyi bor bcing/ 
272a7(rgyud): par bya/ de yi yan lag lngar ldan zhing // de yi spu dang rnam bsres la// lag pa spyi bor bcings ni ni// de yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med// rnal 'byor pa ni bsgoms shing zlos// mi rnams nus pa ldan
272a8(rgyud): yin yang // dka' zhing nyon mongs la dga' ba// dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa yin// glang po rta dang bong bu dang // ru sbal nga mo phag dang wa// khwa dang 'ug sogs bya rgod dang // khrung khrung khra dang sa ral/ 
272b1(rgyud): gzugs bzang ba dang gzugs ngan dang // lha yi gzugs de 'gyuraro// rnal 'byor dpa' chen rang dga'i gzugs// skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'di bas shin tu mchog grub pa// 'jig rten gsu
272b2(rgyud): na yod ma yin// dpal he ru'i ka'i nges par brjod pa las skye ba bdun pa'i sgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongs brje ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni// nges
272b3(rgyud): par dbang du byed 'gyur ba// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad// go mA nga sa ni myos byed bsre// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin bsreg byas// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur
272b4(rgyud): nasaphran tshegs mi ni smras ci dgos// kha chu so shing ngag dang ni// de bzhin rang gi lus bsnyes pa/ myos byed mi dang bcas pa yis// khams gsum po ni dbang du 'gyur// zla mtshan gyi
272b5(rgyud): ni khrag dang ni// zos nas rlon pa'i zas dag deng // mi yi sgra dang ldan pa yis// mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin// rang gi lus las skyugs pa 'am// mkhas pas rab
272b6(rgyud): sgras sbyin bsreg bya// nim pa'i shing la rab sbyar nas// mod la dbye bar 'gyur pa yin// mnyam par gzhag pas d+ha de ma// nyungs mar tshan der bsgres pa yi// bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg byas// 
272b7(rgyud): 'phral du 'chi ba 'am skrod par 'gyur// nyal dang ma nyal 'dug pa 'am// zas dang sbyor ba sogs rnams la'ang // mkhas pas rtag tu zlo byed na// de la bgegs ni yod ma yin// waM yi sha yis
272b8(rgyud): sreg blugs brgyas// yang dag bsregs blugs byed pa'i mi// de ni zla ba gsum rjes la// rigs kyi dbul ba 'jigs par 'gyur// sha chen dag gis la la zhig/ myos byed ldan pas sbyin
273a1(rgyud): // sreg byed// brgyartsa brgyad kyi bar du ni// sgrub pa po ni thun gsum byed// ma lus sa rnams spyod pa dang / zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur// tshim 'gyur mkha'agro ma de la// rgyal srid
273a2(rgyud): ster bar gdon mi za// lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni// thun gnyis bar du sbyin sreg byas// rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis// mkha 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur// go yu ba'i sha chang gis// phyi dang nang gi
273a3(rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya// myur du de yi lag tu 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'jug/ sngags kyi bzlas brjod mtshan mo bzlas// yul 'khor yang ni 'gugs par byed// de ltar nyin re byas na ni// rgyal
273a4(rgyud): po nyid de dbyed 'gyur// 'di las rab mchog gzha na dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin// rnal 'byor chen po/ rang dgas 'chi// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin cing rol// bal
273a5(rgyud): ba de bzhin pa la sha/ u dam bA ra nyid dag ni// spyi/ na sreg 'bum byas myur du ni// nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur// go mAngs dang myos byed bsre// rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin bsreg
273a6(rgyud): byad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes byas na// dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur// go ma yu ni bsreg byas pas// ci bde bar ni 'gab par 'gyur// go ma yu yis sbyin sreg gis// myur du nor bdag mnyam par
273a7(rgyud): 'gyur// brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med na yang // bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// lhag pa'i tshe dang sku sman TaM// mun ga ma sha tsa na ka/ sbrang rtsi gtsigs ma ske tshe dang // khyim gyi ta ma la 'dab
273a8(rgyud): blangs// kha bcings par ni 'gyur ba yin// ci rung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang du dga' ba der gan so// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yi sa dang gnas// he ru ka dpal rgyud yan/ 
273b1(rgyud): lag/ thams cad brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid can// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// tshan do ha ni mngon 'gyur zhing
273b2(rgyud): nye ba'i tshan do sbyang dka' ba// 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dung khrod chos kyi sprin/ shrI he ru ka gzhung spyod pa yi// 'di ni nang
273b3(rgyud): gi bdag nyid sa// pha rol phyin bcus rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma yi brda yi skad// mtho ris sa stengs 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag/ pu lI ra la sogs gang bstan pa// phyi nang bdag
273b4(rgyud): nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyalapo che// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso// kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing // zadu ni spyan zhal dbu// kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten
273b5(rgyud): na thang g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs// de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs pa
273b6(rgyud): yin dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// man
273b7(rgyud): ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dpa' bo'i brda yi skad ni// nga yis rgyu du sbas pa yin// gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra/ A li ki li zhes brjod pa// rgyu la sogs
273b8(rgyud): stong sngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra las sogs pa nA s+ya// d+hI srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa// bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba// go cha chen pos yang dag srung / 
274a1(rgyud): / sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thang rnam dag bdag// de bzhin gshegs
274a2(rgyud): pas 'thob cing // skye dang skye bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur// ji ltar sngon sogs sdig pa yi// mtshan nyid thams cad dben pa ste// gang zhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa// 
274a3(rgyud): la 'dod pa kun dbyung phyugs// dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod// me yi dbusu bzhag na ni// mar sar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing // snod kyi dri ma 'jigs par 'gyur// de bzhin shrI he ru ka yi// mtshan gyi sdig
274a4(rgyud): pa 'jig par 'gyur// bsam gtan sems dpa' tsam/ na gyis sam// klog cing kha ton bris pa yis// mtha ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba// yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob// rnamyo
274a5(rgyud): pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma/ lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan du/ dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs
274a6(rgyud): glu yi mchod pa yis// 'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di// mkha' spyod gnasu khrid par byed // de 'dra'i dpa' chen rnal 'byor ma// sa stangs na ni rnyed par dka'// dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud chen// gang zhig shwe
274a7(rgyud): nas ma dad pa// dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par// de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// mgul rgyan gad bu dpung rgyan dang // rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // do shal mgo yi phreng ba dang // ska rag
274a8(rgyud): sil sil sgra sgrogs pa// ri stengs sna tshogs pad+ma yi// lte bar a li ka li skyes// dkar mo bdag po rnam gnon cing // rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i// dpa' bo rnam
274b1(rgyud): 'byor ma tshogs dang // he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i// go 'phang mchog ni sgom par bya// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// 'khor bcas dbus sbyor ldan pa// thams cad dgyes shing gnyis med gyur// 
274b2(rgyud): 'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin// mos pa du ma'i sems can la// spyod pa sna tshogasau ston mdzad// sna tshogs tshul gyis gdal bya ba// thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yin// zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la
274b3(rgyud): gal te mos par ma gyur kyang // smod pa dag tu mi bya ste// chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya// gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa// gang gis chos nyid mi shes yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni/ 
274b4(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnam sa ni byung gyur tam// ma byung na yang rnam kun tu// bsam mi khya ba pa'i chos nyid ni// 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa
274b5(rgyud): yin// de ltar rnam par bzhag nas kyang // 'jig rten pa kun yong mi smad// de yi bgrod pa bsam yas shing // sid sa rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams// 
274b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i dbye ba nyid// sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams// de dang de la dga' ba bzhin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i rtog pa rmad
274b7(rgyud): du byung ba ngo mtshar dang bcos par byed pa bstan chos zad kyi rgyal po dpal he ru ka dpa' bo chen po bklags pas grub pa gzhan thams cad kyi mi thub pa gdod nas grub pa bla ma yin// dpal
274b8(rgyud): he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu gcig pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar pa Na chen pad+ma ka ra dang // grags pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan
275a1(rgyud): mtho ldan pa'i// rin chen dang mtshungs rin chen bzang po yi// mkhas pa pad ma ka ra'i zhal sngar ni// rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpalas bsgyur// lhag pa'i tshul
275a2(rgyud): khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing // dri med bka' don 'thad pa dang bcas par// rtog pa dang grags pa'i zhal sngar ni// sgra sbyar dge slong prad+d+he kIrti dang // mar pa sgra sbyar chos kyi dbang phyug gis/ 
275a3(rgyud): mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus kyi bla ma nA ro pa'i phag dpe dang gtugs pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi d+ha na ut+ta raM tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ mngon par brjod pa'i
275a4(rgyud): rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tsha'o// ji srid 'gro bdag gi mthar// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa'
275a5(rgyud): yos ni byed/ chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod/ dpal ldan rdo rje mkha'agro ni// sku gsum ye shes lnga yid ngos// mkha' gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs// 'gro ba
275a6(rgyud): sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji srid rdo rje mkha 'gro ma// kye na tu rtog pa'i bcing pa bcad// 'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug/ de srid rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di skad bdag gis thos
275a7(rgyud): pa dus gcig na// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang // mkha' go dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs te// der bac+doMs de bzhin gash+ye
275a8(rgyud): bzod pa bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhugs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje khro bo dang mkha' gro dang / mkha' / 
275b1(rgyud): ma'i dra ba mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i snying po ngas bshad kyis/ lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag po 'khor sna tshogs par rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon
275b2(rgyud): la yid la zung shig/ de la bcom ldan 'das la leg so// zhes gsol te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus pa ste/ 
275b3(rgyud): rgyas par min// dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// bla ma las kyang bla ma ni// mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste// mkha 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// gsang ba mchog gi
275b4(rgyud): dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// mkha 'gro sgyu ma sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i ma cho ga 'dir ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// mkha' gro dra
275b5(rgyud): sdom pa yin// thog ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di// b+ha gar sri da sgra gzugs skyes gnas// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// thog mar dbus mthar dri ma med// 'jig rten
275b6(rgyud): gsum du rnyed dka' ba// bsrub dang bsrabs par yang dag sbyong // gang la de la ji ltar bzhin// rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba// gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin// rtag tu nyes bral zhi ba
275b7(rgyud): ste/ na mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa// spro dang bsdu ba byed pa yin// rang bzhin dag pa rang 'byung ste// rnal 'byor ma yi bde bster// bzlas dang bsam gtan ldan pa dang // sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye
275b8(rgyud): shas kyi// de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon// dbugs 'byin par ma mchog dag dang // dri yi chu dang bcas pa dag/ mkhas pas ril bur byas nas ni/ 
276a1(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod// 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la// pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste// mthar thug dngos grub thad
276a2(rgyud): 'byung // dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi// dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur// ras rdzas thig las sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// 8
276a3(rgyud): dang gzhan yang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // zos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te// de ltar 'di la the tshom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog
276a4(rgyud): dag byed sdig pa 'jigs par byed// bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig la 'jug
276a5(rgyud): ba'i gsang ba sbas pa bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dang ngas la rnam par 'khrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i tong
276a6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dngos grub thad kyi gsang ba gsungs// chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub
276a7(rgyud): sede'i seder chen po la 'di lta ste// dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang // dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo
276a8(rgyud): chen po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thad gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po/ 
276b1(rgyud): gti mug rdo rje dang // dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje dang // dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang // dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang // de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi
276b2(rgyud): dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen pos rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po mkha'
276b3(rgyud): dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu las sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung bas
276b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu
276b5(rgyud): dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam pa ra gtsigs pa dang / dpa' chen po rdo rje dgra lha dang / dpa'
276b6(rgyud): bo chen po rdo rje dpag med dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo
276b7(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo
276b8(rgyud): chen po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje na mkha' snying po dang / dpal
277a1(rgyud): / po chen po rdo rje dpal he ru ka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'di
277a2(rgyud): lta bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis na mkha'i khams yongasu gang bar mthong // de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig
277a3(rgyud): gnyisu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyisu
277a4(rgyud): med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byo
277a5(rgyud): ma chen mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor mtshan mo pad+ma'i da ba mo zhes bya ba dang / mkha' gro mtshon mo rdo rje mkha 'gro mau zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma
277a6(rgyud): chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha'agro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' gro mtshan mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab tu ma ma zhes bya ba
277a7(rgyud): dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor mtshan mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna tshon ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor mtshan mo dpa'
277a8(rgyud): ba'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i mi'u thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes/ 
277b1(rgyud): bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mos bsrungs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jig byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
277b2(rgyud): mchen mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsongs zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta na ma zhes bya ba dang / rnakhyor
277b3(rgyud): ma chen mo bya gdongs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'tshong
277b4(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'bos
277b5(rgyud): ma chen mo 'khor los bsgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma tshan mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas na mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par
277b6(rgyud): hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang 'khyud pa dang / tsum b+ha nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongasu rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gang bar mthong // mthong na
277b7(rgyud): zhu sa te/ dpa' bo'i mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rje su dra no// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha'agro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyisu med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol
277b8(rgyud): tu phyin pa 'byung // de nas bac+doMs kyis ma mo'i tshogs tha~Md kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong me zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rjem mo khyi
278a1(rgyud): gtong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje sreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba
278a2(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba dang // rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyis na mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos
278a3(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyisu med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba dpal he ru kal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thad ngos po
278a4(rgyud): med/ mtshan nyid thad rnam par spangs// bdag nyid chos las ya/ nga dag byung // 'di ni dam tshig mchog yino// de nas bcom lnga na 'das kyis gnyis gnyisu med pa'i rdo rje go
278a5(rgyud): cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyag chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal
278a6(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje
278a7(rgyud): mchog dang / rigs drug po de ni yan lag drug tu dgod pa ste/ srung ba gnyisu med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyi su med pa las byung // rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu
278a8(rgyud): gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen po g.yo byed ma
278b1(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen po tsaN+Di ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang na mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thad kyi gnyisu med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par srung
278b2(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo chog gi mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gi spyi bos gtugs
278b3(rgyud): de nas dam tshig chen po rnar 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba du ma la
278b4(rgyud): thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongasu gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongasu ga nga bar mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna
278b5(rgyud): tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing sen rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyi su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tsho/ kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ 
278b6(rgyud): khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ chu dang me dang rlung dang / dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ de'i
278b7(rgyud): steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen por sprul pa la kun tu bzang po chen po byung
278b8(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par bzhug so// phun sum chags pa sna tshogs pas rgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis sdud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang
279a1(rgyud): // rnga ya ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang / g.yer ka'i dra bas mig mangs su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig srang bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu
279a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / smyo khyed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu gdug pa dang / ro langs dang / ro dang / ro sreg pa dang / 
279a3(rgyud): dang / lce spyang dang / lce spyang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' gro dang / mkha' go ma'i sgra phreng dang / a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dil bu dang / cang te'u sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye
279a4(rgyud): bar rgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang / dge ba'i las kyis grol ba sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs pa/ rnar 'khor bas bskor ba/ pad+ma'i
279a5(rgyud): gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ lag pa'i thal mo sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dus par chos kyi mchog zab mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal
279a6(rgyud): po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa// sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' gro dang mkha' gro
279a7(rgyud): ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dri ba can/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjesu bstan pa'i ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legasol/ 
279a8(rgyud): so// lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thad la rdo rje gsang
279b1(rgyud): ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ snying kar zla ba bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phral pa// bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni// mkha' gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// der ni gsang ba byin rlabs pa// snying po
279b2(rgyud): mchog ni legs par nyon// bla ma yi yang bla ma ste// mkha' go ma yi da ba'i sngam// oM swa b+ha ba shu d+d+haHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA badz+ra
279b3(rgyud): shud+d+ho haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+haH/ oM dz+nyA na shud+d+haHsarba d+hermAdz+nyA shud+d+heH/ oM sa ma ye shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsa ma yai shud+d+ho ta/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shU n+ya tA a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swar+b+ba
279b4(rgyud): ba.At+ma ko ta/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta su pra ti bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAd+d+he na badz+ra swe b+hA ba At+ma ko ha/ oM sarba man+ta shud+d+heHsarba d+harmAHsarbama?r+N+Na shud+d+hoH/ oM kro d+ha shud+d+haHsarba d+hAHkro d+ha huts+tsha
279b5(rgyud): !oM tsit+ta shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHtsit+ta shud+d+ho \u0f7f/ oM bAka shud+d+haHsa rba d+harmA bAka shud+d+ho haM/ oM kA ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHkA ya shud+d+ha/ he/ a dz+nyA na a mri ta shud+d+haHsarbe d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na
279b6(rgyud): mri ta shud+d+ho ha~M/ oM nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA nA nA sa ma ye shud+d+ho haM/ oM tsAr+ya na ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtsAr+ya na ya shud+d+ho haM/ oM trai yo ga bA ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA tri yo ga pa ri shud+d+ho haM/ aM a b+hi
279b7(rgyud): ka shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHa b+hi She ka~M shud+d+ho hwA/ oM pu \u0f7f shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHpU dza shud+d+ho ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a dA ya bu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kaN+ya/ oM maN+Da la shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA maN+Da la
279b8(rgyud): haM/ oM a d+hi pa ti shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA a d+hi pa ti shud+d+ho hu~M/ oM bI raM shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA 'i rau shud+d+hoh+ye/ oM yo gI ni shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo gI ni shud+d+hoha/ oM ta tA shud+d+ha rmAHsarba d+han+teHta tra shud+d+ho haM/ he
280a1(rgyud): ti he tu a pa ga ta sarba d+harmA he tu a pa ga to he/ ru i ti rU ka ra a pa ga ta sarba d+harmA rU ka ra a pa ga to ha~M/ ka i ti nA ka tsit+ta s+thi ta sarba d+harmA nA kA tsit+ta sI to haM/ oM dz+dza
280a2(rgyud): ta kA ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHdz+nyA Ti ta kA ra shud+d+heny+tsa/ oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAswa b+ha ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM dz+wa la shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA dz+wa la shud+d+he hi/ aM A ha ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA A ha ra shud+d+ha
280a3(rgyud): ta/ oM b+hak+ShaM shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA b+hak+Sha shud+d+ha ts+tsha/ oM a sa mA hi ta shud+d+hohaM/ oM a sa mA hi ta shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA a sa mAM hi ta shud+d+ho ha/ oM saM se ba dan shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA si saM bi da na shud+d+ho
280a4(rgyud): oM dwe Sha shud+d+haHsarba d+harma dwe la shuN+Di ts+yai/ oM mo ha shud+d+haHsad+harmA mo ha shud+d+haH/ oM rA ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA rA ga shud+d+heH/ oM mA na shud+d+heHsarbad+harmA mA na shud+d+hoH/ oM
280a5(rgyud): shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHi ra shud+d+ha ta/ oM kha badz+ra shud+d+haHsirba d+harmA kha badz+ra shud+d+ho tau/ oM tritsakra pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtri tsi kr-i pa ri shud+d+ha hu/ oM Da ki ni shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA TA ki
280a6(rgyud): ni shuSh+ToH/ a~M ku la shud+d+heHsarba d+harmA ku la~M shud+d+ho haM/ oM mA tri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHmA tr-i shud+d+ho Nu/ oM pi tri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHpi tri shud+d+ho ha~M/ 'di ltar ji nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar byed
280a7(rgyud): rnam par dag par shes par bya'o// pu rje oM a gau ra da ma ka o tI kau ka la ka hi pra gri so so su na si ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te/ shes
280a8(rgyud): pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag// bcu po de dag rnam par sgom// 'khor lo gsum yang yangs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge/ dus dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas// rnal 'byor ma yi
280b1(rgyud): yid dga' ba// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// mngon mtho he ru ka las byung // mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o// g.yon dang g.yasu bskor ba yis// dgod cing mchod
280b2(rgyud): dang bskor bya// gang gis de nyid shes pa yis// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// gang yang dbang bskur med pa la// gzhan de nyid ma bstan gcig/ mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis// dbang bskur slob ma dag
280b3(rgyud): la sbyin/ gzhan du slob ma spro ba dang // brgya la dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro// mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang // ngan pa der ni lhung bar 'gyur// glegs bam bshes min la ster ba// ngan pa de ma thag tu
280b4(rgyud): 'chi/ phol mig rigs dang dug dang nad// mkha' 'gro gdon gyis ga/ ces par 'gyur// mi sran bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis// gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// ji srid
280b5(rgyud): 'bad pa zad kyis// bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du// de nyid rtag tu sbas na ni// myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// bla mas tha mas cad rim bzhin du// mngon brjod rgyud kyi
280b6(rgyud): rim pa bzhin// lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor ba// gnyisu med pa'i ye shes 'gyur// de ma theg tu byang chub ste// mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur// mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra spang // bdag gi dam tshig mi
280b7(rgyud): shes shing // drag cing log ltar rang bzhin ngan// mi srun snying rje med pa dang // brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang // spyang zhing ngan la phrag dog can// skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par
280b8(rgyud): rtog pa mang ba dang // 'di 'di'i phyag rgya spang bar bya// sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin// puk+ka sI ni mdzes sdug blang // gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par rgyan// sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sem/ 
281a1(rgyud): // brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes// dpa' zhing chags bral ngo cha med// nga rgyal med cing ser sna med// sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste// rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis
281a2(rgyud): longs phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang // mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs// rtag tu ma hA mAM sa bza'// thad btung bas myos pa dang / ro yi
281a3(rgyud): gdan la 'dug pa dang // lpags pa chen po go su gyon// rjesu 'thun pa'i bza' ba za// zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang // grong ngam dgon pa dag tu yang // gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na// rtag tu chags pas
281a4(rgyud): mi gnas shing // rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la// yang na tshong 'dus gnas pa dang // nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i// mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa// nyan thos yongasu long spyod
281a5(rgyud): ba'i gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya// ji ltar skyes bu dbul po zhin// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas// rdo rje gar gyis rna ma pha rol// rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing // 
281a6(rgyud): sha chen za su bza'// myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi// dpa' bo'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i// sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na// g.yeng ba thad rnam spangs pa'i// de ni
281a7(rgyud): ye shes 'byung gnas te// shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung // gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i// gnyi su med pa nyid la gnas// rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang // sgom pa'i spyod pa la gas
281a8(rgyud): na/ bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim// phyag rgya che dang nges par rol// sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis// rnam grol sangs rgyas zad kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos gru
281b1(rgyud): 'gyur// g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yi no// sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni// sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed// rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang // gnod sbyin klu yi
281b2(rgyud): bu mo dang // gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo// 'dod pa'i long spyod dag la spyod// de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa// A li ka li rtag tu sgom// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thad de bzhin rnar brtag/ dpa'
281b3(rgyud): bos brda' rnams bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yi lag g.yon gyis// brda' rnams la ni 'jug par bya// dpa' bo'i gnasu gyur pa 'di// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro kun g.yon las
281b4(rgyud): byung ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid// mdzub mor rnam bar snang mdzad bzhugs// gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas// sri na lag dpa' bo dngos grub can// tha ma la ni mi
281b5(rgyud): zad sku// sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas// g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni// dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad// lag mthi la pho nya 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab tu shin tu nges
281b6(rgyud): byas te// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// sgrub pa po yis shes par gyis// sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad// me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad// rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags// 'o byed ma ni stong pa ste// de
281b7(rgyud): bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin// dbus kyi dpa' bo thad ni// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegasul// gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing // rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams// de dang lhan
281b8(rgyud): cig bza' bas bza'// dpa' bos thad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' go dra ba'i bad mchog yin// phan tshun rjes 'og thams cad kyi// sna tshogs brda ni bshad par bya// mkha' gro ma yi mtshan nyid
282a1(rgyud): / dang po nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang // sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bshad par bya// ras ris dang ni sku gzugs dag/ 'dri na de bzhin dam tshig dang
282a2(rgyud): sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis// gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa// sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzes pa yi// phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // lha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba// 
282a3(rgyud): mi ni smon mchog dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i// rnal 'byor mi ni yang dag 'dus// mkha'agro ma yang yang dag 'dus/ rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ bla ma rgyud pa'i
282a4(rgyud): bka' bzhin du// slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir/ bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas// sngags dang rgyud la le/  par bslabs// gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang // mngon brjod
282a5(rgyud): bla ma'i las la mkhas// phyugs kyis mchu na nyid sngags pas rtogs// sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang / rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang // mkha' go ma yang de bzhin
282a6(rgyud): tephyi rol ma mo'i phyag rgya dag/ phag mo yi ni rigs las byung // dpa' bo kun gyi spyod pa dang // 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu bslabs// phyi yis rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ mtshan
282a7(rgyud): nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas/ he ru ka dpal rigs las byung // dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs// yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang // slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas// rnal 'byor ma yi
282a8(rgyud): rgyud spyod dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba// bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim// tha~Md rgyud rnams rnam par shes// 'grib pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang // mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin to// bla na
282b1(rgyud): med pa'i spyod pa dag/ shes rab pha ral phyin las byung // phyi rol bstan bcos yongs la mkhas// phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog/ sbyor ba'i sgom par ldan pa dang // yid gnyis med pa nyid kyi
282b2(rgyud): ni/ bza' ba thad bza' ba bya// yi ge brgya pas thad// gsang sngags bstan par bsgoms na su// rang gi ming dang ldan par ni// gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya// rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla// don
282b3(rgyud): rnams zad 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// mkha'agro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang // snying po dang ni nye snying dang // gsang sngags btus par rjesu srung // 
282b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la// yi ge'id kyil 'khor legs bkod nas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskye da// 'di ni gsang sngags tha // ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog
282b5(rgyud): gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste// gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin// gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin/ 'gro ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab// de nyid 'di ni mi bstan te
282b6(rgyud): dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yis// sgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med// skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed// byams
282b7(rgyud): pa'i go cha bgos pa ste// snying rje chos kyi go cha yin// shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin// nyon mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs// phyir bzlog chen mos srung ba dang // rdo rje zhal bzhis rna
282b8(rgyud): mtshan// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha sbyar gsum gyis rdo rjes mtshan// thams cad mchog gi srung ba che// dngos grub zad rab tu stsol// bka' yi 'khor lo srung ba che// phur rtsa
283a1(rgyud): bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur// srung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis// sgrub po po la byang chub stsol// rdo rje phur bus rab dang // rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang // steng gi gur dang bla re yis// gdug pa
283a2(rgyud): bdud ni bskrad byas nas// mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin// gang gis rang sems thul ba yis// bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin// gang la gang gis gsod pa yin// mnyam po'i sems ni dri yin te// glu
283a3(rgyud): bzhi pa ni byug pa yin// tsan dan dkar po lus yin te// mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no// me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pas gtor ba yin par bshad// rang bzhin dag pa bdug pa ste/ ma
283a4(rgyud): pa'i sgom pa bdug pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa ba ston pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas bac+doMs rdo rje mkha
283a5(rgyud): 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba gsungs pa// de na sa yang dag bshad bya ba// mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa bzhin// phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni
283a6(rgyud): mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs// tshes grangs med cing skar ma med// bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin// gtsang sbra
283a7(rgyud): med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin// dus dang tshod las rnam par grol// dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes// sems can kun gyi don yang
283a8(rgyud): byed// ril bu dang ni ri rtse dang // chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang // shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i gnas// me mo'i khyim me dur khrod dam// sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum
283b1(rgyud): dang / lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas// khyim me bzhi mdo dag tu ni// sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// gnas ni brtag pa byas nas kyang // yid ni gang du dga' ba der// 
283b2(rgyud): bde mchod dam pa ni// de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur// sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni// du mar dbye ba'i sgom pa yis// ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni// sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang // bzod pa'i pha rol
283b3(rgyud): phyin pa yi// me tog 'bad pas 'gram par bya// sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong bden// mnyam par gzhag pas rgya cher bya// rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa sgrub/ tsha
283b4(rgyud): pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas te// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya// dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni// sems can kun gyi don yang bya// phyi dang nang du bltas na ni// chos rnams thad stong pa yin// byang
283b5(rgyud): chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa// sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas// rang gi snying kha mkha' dkyil du// nyi ma'i da kyil 'khor gnas par sgom// de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa// 
283b6(rgyud): ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin// sna tshogs 'od zer ga/ sal ba yis// rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab// sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni// byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin// nam mkha'i
283b7(rgyud): khams ni bsgom dga' bas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin// til gyi gang bu lta bu yi// lha dang khro bos khyab par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub seder dang // byang chub sems dang bla ma'i
283b8(rgyud): gcos lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni// bdag gis mchod cing brjed par byed// sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs// khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba rigs dag sen rnams// sang+yas
283b9(rgyud): gnas su dgod par byed// na mkha'i dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i// mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas su// thams cad gsum la skyabasu mchi// byang chub mthar thug bar du ni// sen ma lus gyur pa rnams// spangs
284a1(rgyud): go 'phang de la bzhag/ de la sgrub pa pos gsol gdab// dge ba'i lus byung ba la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabasu mchi/ rmongs pa'i gzugs can nga rgyal dang // gzugs dang / 
284a2(rgyud): tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnams shes de bzhin no// d+hU AM hrIHhUM hri/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang // rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug/ rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des
284a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thad ni/ he ru ka dpal rdo rje yi// migo dang na ba sna dang ni// lce dang reg pa yid de bzhin/ oM tsU tA a khaM he// gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang // de bzhin phrag dog 'dod chags dang
284a4(rgyud): ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid// skye mched dag ni sa/ mas cad la// dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin no// sa dang chu dang dang bzhin me// rlung dang na mkha' nyid dgo// lAM mA pAM tAM khA/ ltung byed
284a5(rgyud): ma dang gsod pa dang // 'gugs byed dang ni gar da bang dang // pad+ma'i dra ba mo lha'o// mkha' mnyam na mkha' lta bu 'o// de ltar phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rnams ni rno myor
284a6(rgyud): pas// tha ma la dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// yong su dag par shes par bya// tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste// bdag kyang yongasu dag pa yin// de nas gsum la skyabasu 'gro/ sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur/ 
284a7(rgyud): ba yis// he ru ka dpal dag gyur nas// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// he ru ka yi ge 'phang mchog/ thob nas sems can ma lus pa// 'di la 'jig cing 'god par shog/ oM pre kr-i ti pa / 
284a8(rgyud): shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHpra kr-i ti pa'i shud+d+hoH/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+hoH/ lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya// dngos med mdun sogs phyogs bcu ru// snying po'i phreng / 
284b1(rgyud): spro bar bya// des na snying po mthong nas// dra bar ba de bzhin te// rdo rjes sogs byin gyis brlabs// bla re mdar yi dra ba dang // rdo rje ma ni 'bar bar bskor// phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya// oM me di ni badz+rI/ 
284b2(rgyud): b+ha ba badz+ra ba d+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sha ra dz+wa la tA~M sha trAM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na lA rka hUM hUM hUM/ he ru ka yi bka' 'khor lo// gtso ba
284b3(rgyud): brgyad po 'bar ba dag / de mthode nas ni legs pa ru/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhal gsum phyag dgon pa ste// dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog
284b4(rgyud): 'dra// phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan// shes rab skyil krung legs par bzhugs// thod pa'i phreng 'dra ldan pa'i da dbu// mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyan bzhugs// rgyan rnams thad yongasu
284b5(rgyud): rdzogs// thad mtshan mas mtshan ma yin// dpe bya// dkun gyis rgyan pa ste// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad
284b6(rgyud): cing / dpa' chen bde ba'i go 'phang bzhugs// dkar zhing ser la ljang ku ste// zhal gdong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur// lugasu 'byung dang bzlog tshul gyis// de yi khro bo brgyad dag spro// rdo drag
284b7(rgyud): bo na la ka/ rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te// thal sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje nag po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba// khro ba 'di dag rnam par dgod// sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar/ 
284b8(rgyud): ljang ku du ba'i mdog can te// dkar zhing gnag la gur gum mdog/ rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thad ra'i rus pa yi// rgyan gyis sdud pa rab tu 'bar// ga
285a1(rgyud): brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// sna tshogs pa'i nang bzhugs shing // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag/ zhabs kyis mnan par rnam
285a2(rgyud): bar bsam// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang // thad dril bu cang te'u// shes rab bde bas legs par 'khyud// dmar ser dbu skra dag gis rgyan// ma
285a3(rgyud): ba rnams gtsigs 'jigs pa can// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// 'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te// des ni bdag nyid rgyan du byas// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// khro zhing 'bar la
285a4(rgyud): g.yo ba dang // drag cing 'jigs la rnam parar/ gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// g.yas pa rkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// lcags kyu zhags pa
285a5(rgyud): kha T+wAM 'chang // dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin// mgo yi do zhal sku la 'chang // thod pa'i phreng ba'i ska rags can// gdug pa zad zhabs 'og mnan// thabs dang shes
285a6(rgyud): rab mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya// khro bo gnyis po rnam par sgom// stang du gtsug tor 'khor bsgyur te// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnar/ 
285a7(rgyud): sgom// 'og tu rdo rjes 'ogo// dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni mdung 'dzin cing // zhags pa lcags kyu dril rdo rje// g.yas brkyang ba yi gan
285a8(rgyud): pas bzhugs// phur bu khro bo byas// da ni phyogs bcur rnam par spro// de la bka' lung bsgo ba ni// bgegs ni myur du med par gyis// gsang sngags rje su dran su// phyogs bzhi
285b1(rgyud): dag tu mnyam par gzugs// mthe bong sdigs mdzub sbyor ba yis// phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdab// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT shar du'o// oM grih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT byang du'o// 
285b2(rgyud): oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT nub tu'o// oM a na ya hoHb+ha ga bi bi d+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ lho phyogasa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la/ 
285b3(rgyud): rdo rje phur bus dgod cing mnan// lugasu 'byung dang bzlog pa yin/ oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Ta bi g+haM hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya sarba pA paM hu hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya
285b4(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA sarba duSh+TAn pa ya ti kA ya bAk+Shi t+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur bu rdo rje khro bo ru// bltas nas yod su brtag par bya// lugasu 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// 
285b5(rgyud): dngos grub rdo rjes brdung par bya// oM hUM badz+ra/ mung+ga ra badz+ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig/ gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla/ 
285b6(rgyud): oM kha badz+ra d+h+r-i ka badz+ra hUM phaT// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra a na lArka badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kut+tA li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM
285b7(rgyud): badz+ra kA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba la badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hi Sha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha tsakra brti badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA tA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ bka' 'di dag ni sgrub pa ni/ 
285b8(rgyud): de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur// mAngs rkang dang zhag kha chu// shu kra rak+ta lhan cig sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yis ril bur byas// zos na dngos grub nges par 'gyur// sngo zhing ser la
286a1(rgyud): ljang ku ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te// ser zhing gnag la ljang ku dang / dud ka ser la ser skya dang // dkar zhing ser la ljang ku dang // dmar zhing ser la ldang ba dag// de ltar bzhi ni
286a2(rgyud): bdag po bzhin// mi bskyod dbu rgyan dam tshig can// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes// 'di ltar khro bo thaMd kyang // dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed// 'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi// gtso bo'i bka' ni
286a3(rgyud): blang bar gyis// rnal 'byor pa ni gar gnas pa// bgegs rnams thad med par mthong // gcer bu 'am yang na mi gcer ba 'am// sgra grol thal bas yan lag byug/ ji ltar ji srid ma ngal bar// 'khor
286a4(rgyud): me dag gi bzlas pa byo// stong pa'i ye shes rje ni// dad pas dran ning mnyam par gzhag/ oM shu n+ya bAdz+nyA na dz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ oM a ni mit+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko/ 
286a5(rgyud): haM/ oM a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+mak+ko// / smig sgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni// sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag/ 'di ni mkha' dang mnyam pa li// chos med ches min pa
286a6(rgyud): yang med// na mkha' gos pa med pa ltar// dngos po med cing dmig su med// gang gi snying ka kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal// phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ khams gsum
286a7(rgyud): ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro/ gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal// dbang po'i g.yo ba rta kun nang du nges sbyar ba'i// ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur/ 
286a8(rgyud): pas khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba'i// mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur// sangs rgyas rjes drin rnal 'byor gyis// chos ni rje su dran pa sgom// ches
286b1(rgyud): rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi sku ni rang byung 'gyur// dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyi// shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa las// 'bar ba 'di ni the
286b2(rgyud): chom med// rtag tu snying la gnas pa yis// thig le gcig pu yi ge med// skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na// ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog/ sems pa rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// sems dpa'
286b3(rgyud): rjesu dran par sgom// seda'i rjes dran chos kyis ni// chos kyi sed khad par 'byung // bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa// smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang // mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni// zla ba'i dkyil
286b4(rgyud): 'khor dbus ni// rdo rje se nga kun mkhyen dag/ dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// sngon po yi ni zhal dang bzhi// rlung gi dkyil 'a khor rnam par bsama?// yi ge yaM las yang dag 'byung // sngo ba'i
286b5(rgyud): mdog can gzhu lta bu'o// rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan mar sgom// dud pa'i phreng ba khyab par dmigs// de yi steng du yi ge ram// me yi dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa/ gru gsu
286b6(rgyud): ba la dmar ba'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar bas khyab// nyi ma bya ba 'od mtha' yas// rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya// de yi steng du chu nyid// yi ge ba mchog las byung ba// du sha ra yi mdog
286b7(rgyud): 'dra ba// zlum la 'od zer phreng ba can// de yi steng dus dkyil 'khor// lam las byung ba ser po ste// zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan// 'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs// rnal 'byor de steng sgom pa ni// ri
286b8(rgyud): rab lhun po mchog gyur pa// zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi// rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes// yi ge sum las legs par byung // 'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o// de yi steng du bsam pa ni
287a1(rgyud): / bruM ni dkar po las byung ba// de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyun// dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes
287a2(rgyud): shing da ba dan phreng bas rnam par rgyan// zur gyi cha ni thad dang // sgo dang sgo 'khyud mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan cing // phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab po// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// brgyad
287a3(rgyud): po dkar po'i mdog can la// de yi dbus pad+ma che// sna tshogs mdab ma brgyad pa la// lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar bcas// dkar po ser po
287a4(rgyud): de bzhin te// dmar dang ljang ku zhal bzhi pa// zhi zhi nga dgod dang khro ba dang // rnam par 'gyur ba shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang dgra sta cang te'u dang / 
287a5(rgyud): gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ tshangs pa'i lpags pa gosu banabs// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag/ phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te/ sede'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// dbu rgyan
287a6(rgyud): thod pa'i cod pan can// rgyan rnams thaMd yongasu rdzogs// dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan// thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can// cod pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab dang
287a7(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog/ bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas// sku ni gnyi su med par thim// mnyam pa nyid las byung ba la
