335b3(rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan cig/ gsang sngags khro ba tshig gis bzla/  pa'i dngos grub steng bar mdzad/ dkyil 'khor ma lus zad bya// mnyam par gnag ste bzlas pa bya/ shes rab thabs kyi cho ga
335b4(rgyud): bzhin// rnal 'byor bzlas pa da cin ster// rnal 'byongs da ma/ 'gro dpal// mngon sum dun mchog kyang stsol/ ma he tsa ru/ katu hUM To/ oM a A/ i A
335b5(rgyud): U i e/ a i a aHhUM hU hU~M phaT swA hA/ hrIHhaha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+rI bai ro tsa nI ye hu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarbabud+d+ha DA kI nI yaM badz+ra bad+d+hA nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ dpal
335b6(rgyud): khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po dang / nye bo'i snying pa'o// oM DA ki nI ye DA hu hUM phaT/ oM lA me lAM hu hUM phaT/ oM khat+tA ra he khi huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ya ru hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ka ra ka ra ka huM hUM phaT/ oM pra
335b7(rgyud): tsaN+De hu swA phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru ka huM hUM phaT/ oM tsar+thAk+Shi ye hu sU phaT/ oM ban+d+ha Ta ka hu~M hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba ta ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tra sa ya trA swe ya bi huM hU~M phaT/ oM ma~M hA nA sa hu hU phaT/ oM k+Sho b+h+rU~M yak+Sho tA
335b8(rgyud): ya saM huM hU~M phaT/ oM bI ra ma tA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hriM hriM AM huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI ya huM hUM phaT/ oM hriHhraHbaM hu hUM phaT/ oM li ke shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM paM pheM bi huM hUM phaT/ oM dru man+ta ye hu hUM pha
336a1(rgyud): oM phaT phaT oM huM hUM phaT/ oM ai ra ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha ba huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI ra bi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ba tsa ma huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+haH
336a2(rgyud): b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA la baM bi nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta bA tA la ga ta b+hu dza ga sarbaM pA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma da bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kan+d+ha
336a3(rgyud): ar+g+ha bahu hU phaT/ oM suM b+he dwe mu h+nA phen/ oM hriM hriM ma tsu hU~M phaT/ mi ha la kiN+De su~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+hI dz+r-IM ba~M hu~M phaT/ oM kha gA nan hU~M hUM phaT/ oM g+na thA sa su~M hUM baT/ oM tsakra the ga tu hU~M phaT/ oM
336a4(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro haM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM hi hai haM hu hUM phaT/ e dzin r+t+ti nI yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M hUM oM hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra barmi NI ma du hU~M phaT/ oM ki li ki li he hu hUM phaT/ oM su bI ra
336a5(rgyud): hU~M phaT oM si waM si li tsu hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba li hu~M hU~M phaT/ a hi li hi l-i bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra gr-i nI le huM hU~M phaT/ oM d+hi Shi d+h+we l-i bi hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bIr+ye hu hUM phaT/ oM kA kA ts+yai
336a6(rgyud): hu~M hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM shA na s+yai hU~M hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye hu hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA b+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA tI ma hu hUM phaT/ oM ya~M ma deSh+NI NI me huM hUM phaT/ oM ya me mtha/ 
336a7(rgyud): nI mi hu hUM phaT/ 'di dag ji ltar rim pa yis/ bezlas bsgom pa byas nas ni// ye shes bdud rtsi skem byas nas// rang gi lha mi skyer bas gnas/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las
336a8(rgyud): dbang po rnan pa'i sgom pa rje su bstan pa le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa// de nas mchog gi dam pa bshad/ mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag sangs rgyas
336b1(rgyud): kun dang mnyam skyong gas 'gro ma ma snyam pa mchog gcig car 'jug pa mthong nas// rdo rje sems dpa' thaskams nas spro// A li ka li las byung ba/ tse rug ni da nyid byas/ ser
336b2(rgyud): dang sngo dang ljang ku ste// steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o// dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can// spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste// phag mo yis ni rnam par rgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo la
336b3(rgyud): g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs// drag po gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing // bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// zla ba phyed dang ral pa mching // sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon// skra
336b4(rgyud): la phyag rgya dag gis mtshan// phyag rgya sdom pa mchog yin te/ stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste/ gcer bu skra ni gr-i
336b5(rgyud): ba yin// de yi sku dang zhal dang mtshan// byin pa gnyis kyis la gas par 'khril// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mchud nga mchu ni pi di dam// g.yer kha yi ni skra rags can
336b6(rgyud): rigs kyi dga' bas rnam par myos// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku tsa 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin// tshangs pa'i lpags pa
336b7(rgyud): brgyang nas ni// mgo bo'i steng du phyag gis 'dzin/ cang te 'u sgra ni spyan pa dag / chos kyi smras ni rab tu 'gengs// ga yon dang g.yas kyi mduni/ mkha gro bzhi po nur sgos// g.yas phyogs
336b8(rgyud): mkha' gro ma lA la/ byang du dum skyes gzugs can ma// sngo dang ngur smrig dkar la ser// spyan gsum rnam bsgyur dag po dang // dkar sngon ljang dmar ngur smrig ste// de ni rab tu cher 'bar ba'o// 
337a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyogasu bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub thad rab tu stsol// g.yon phyogs dmar dang sngo dang ljang // dkar po steng gi zhal de bzhin// ljang dang dmar po ser po ste// steng gi
337a2(rgyud): sngon po bde ba'ang de// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs kyis gos mchog 'chang ba dang // skra grol ba ni 'jigs pa ste// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnar rgyan// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs
337a3(rgyud): 'og gnon// phyag rgya lnga yis rna rgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje dang ni phyag na bsnams// na ra'i lpags pa gosu banabs// dril bu cang ti'u de bzhin te// mgo za'i gri gug phyag na bsnam
337a4(rgyud): g.yer ki'i ska rags sgra sgrogs pa// rkyang rgyan ru lu ru lu'i sgra// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs te// gdan gcig la ni rnar bzhugs// snying
337a5(rgyud): la dam tshig ye shes ni// de mdog phyag dang phyag mtshan te// rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/ mi bskyed pa yi cod pan can// thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas ni// mtshan dang depe pad dang
337a6(rgyud): bcas pa/ ye shes gcig tu byas nas ni// mkha 'gro ma yi sdom pa bzlas/ oM AHshrIHbadz+ra he he ru ru ka DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra hu hUM phaT/ oM hrIHha ha hu hUM phaT/ oM AHbadz+ra bA rI hI ye/ 
337a7(rgyud): rkye baM/ DA ki nI dzA la she ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po'o// nye ba'i snying po'i// oM badz+ra DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra/ 
337a8(rgyud): lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra khaN+Da ro hi hu~M hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dI pI NI ye swe hA/ 'di dge ji lta'i rim pa yis// bzlas pa dang ni bsgom pa bya// dusu bzhi'i rjes 'brangs rim pa yis// dam tshig sdom pa/ 
337b1(rgyud): / gnyis med pa// mar me lnga yang bza' bar bya// rtag tu dur khrod nang du sgom// nub bdun du ni sbyor ba yis// mi snang dngos gang nges par 'grub// mthong bar byed par yang kun 'gro// sna tshogs gzugs
337b2(rgyud): can bde ba che// bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing // skom gyi btung ba'ang de bzhin te// phyogs kyi gos can gar gyis ni// myos shing myos pa lta bur gnas// grib ma yang ni med pa ru// rnal 'byor chen po
337b3(rgyud): rnam par spyod// ma hA ru d+hir bcas pa yi// de chen chu ni mnyam ldan pas// mAM sa sna tshogs du ma dag/ rtsa gcig pa yi bza' ba bza'// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// rtag tu zhen pas 'gro
337b4(rgyud): bar ba// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba'i// ye shes mig gis mthong ba yi// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' gro ma ra bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sdom pa'i cho ga ste le'u bcu dgu
337b5(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// cho ga bzang po bzhin nang ni// zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/ yang ni zhal ni bcu gnyis te// phyag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// yang na sna tsho/ 
337b6(rgyud): phyugs kyi zhal// phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya// yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang // mkha' gro ma dang gzungs dang ni// pha rol phyin pa'ang de bzhin te// 
337b7(rgyud): phan tshun bye brag can gyi zhal// mdog gi bye brag smob dang // phyag ni stong dang 'bum gyi bar// sna tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang // sna tshogs pa yi zhal ldan pa// sna tshogs pa yi gar mdzad
337b8(rgyud): cis g.yas brkyang ba yi g.yengs pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan la sogs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug dang / kun
338a1(rgyud): bged gzhon nu dang // karti ka dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku ba ra dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / sna tshogs pa'i bdud dang / bge
338a2(rgyud): pad kha sbub tu zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bltas te/ 'jig su rung ba gzhan rnam par 'gyur ba// dag po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ bzhad pa/ mi sdug pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa/ dpa' ba
338a3(rgyud): sgeg ga rngam pa/ smin pa rnam par g.yo gasnyems pa zhi ga g.yo ba/ zhal mig g.yo ba/ zhal rnam par gdangs pa/ rnam par rol pa/ ljags rnam par bskyod pa/ sna tshogs pa'i nyams kyis
338a4(rgyud): mchog gter bar mdzad pa'o// thod pa'i phreng ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rdo rje sedar spyi gtsug rgyan// spyan gsum sta
338a5(rgyud): gi lpags pa banabs// mgo rlon phreng bas sku lus rgyan// phyag rgya drug po sku la rdzogs// phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud mdzad pa'o// / la phag mos 'khril mdzad cing // phyogs kyi gos
338a6(rgyud): can skra grol ba// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te// rdo rje sdigs mdzub thod pas 'khyud// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud// 
338a7(rgyud): dga' bas khyab cing rnam par myos// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i ku tshwa 'chir ba dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// glang po'i lpags pa brkyang ba ste// lcags kyu zhags pa dag sta dang
338a8(rgyud): mdung rtsa gsum pa mgo bo nyid// cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang // mda' dang gzhu yang de bzhin te// thod pa'i dpag tho mdung thung dang // bsdigs mdzub dang ni gtum shing dang // 'khor la ral
338b1(rgyud): gri rin chen dang // pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang // dbyug to yu ba rdo rje can// ga da mdung dang pa Ti s+ya// gshin rje dbyig tho chu gri dang // dung dang ru dang pa Ta ha/ pi wang gling bu rdza rnga che// rdza rnga mtshon cha phyag
338b2(rgyud): mtshan bsnams// rtse mo rno bar bltas nasu// sna tshogs phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'a byung // ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar// phyag rgya sna tshogs de bzhin te// cho ga sna tshogs de bzhino// mkha' gro ma
338b3(rgyud): sogs 'khor rnams dang // dpa' bo dag ni thad dang // rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs dang/ mdog ni mtha' yas sna tshogs mdog/ phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa yin// phyogs kyi gos 'chang sgra
338b4(rgyud): grol zhing // sna tshogs nyams kyi bde ba can// 'jigs rung dag po ha ha bshad// sna tshogs gar gyis longs spyod cing // glu dang rol mo nyams de bzhin// sna tshogs dam tshig zas rnams
338b5(rgyud): dang / me tog sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// dri dang bdug pa de bzhin gos// mar ma phreng ba yid 'ong ba/ phun sum tshogs pa'i mchod pa rnams// mdog ni smin mchog dam pa// 'di ltar
338b6(rgyud): sngags pas bsgoms nas ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis rdzogs byas nas// der ni phreng ba sngags kyang bzlas// yi ge nyi shu gnyis bsres nas// lha mo rdo rje phag mo no// 'di ltar de bzhin bsgom pa
338b7(rgyud): byas zhal gdong sna tshogs legs mdzes pa// phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// byang chub pha rol phyin pa ste// sa 'dzin thad de bzhin// 'di ltar cho ga byas nas
338b8(rgyud): nid/ phreng bas gsang sngags bzla bar bya// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM/ ka ra ka raraM/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tra sa ya ta~M sa ya~M/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hr-i hriM/ hraHhraHpaM pheM/ phaT phaT da ha da ha/ 
339a1(rgyud): / pa tsa patsa/ b+hak+Sha b+h+rak+ShA/ bA sa ru d+hIr/ an+ta lA ba la bi ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hU dza ga sarba bAd+haSh+Tha ya tat+t+wa ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ tsAhriM/ d+h+r-i d+ha~M/ k+ShaSh+Ta/ hA hA/ 
339a2(rgyud): // ka~M la~M ka li/  ma sa maM/ ma ti ma~M/ d+ha ma b+hi Te/ mu ts+tsha pa/  trA~M khris pa d+d+he ba swA hU~M/ 'di ni snying po mchag yinate/ la sa rnams cid byed pa do// da'i sem
339a3(rgyud): rang ming dang // rnal 'byor mos pas rtag bzlas na// ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing // 'gro ba'i gnasu 'gro bar byed// dus ni de ma thag tu yang // sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin// rdo rje phag mo'i gas
339a4(rgyud): sngags 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba thad stsol// oM badz+ra bA rA hi/ pro ta gre pr-i te ge/ ha na ha na/ prA NAM/ kaM ki Ni kau ki Ni/ khai khi Ni khu la ni d+hu na d+huH/ badz+ra ha ste/ sho Sha ya sha Sha ya/ kha T+wAM ga k+Sha
339a5(rgyud): pA la d+hA ri Ni/ ma hA bi shi ta/ nAM sA sha ni/ mA nu Sha a tra prA dz+ri/ sin+na d+h+ya na ra si ra mA lI grin+na ta d+hA ri Ni/ sum+b+ha ni sum+me/ hanaH/ ni prA NA~M/ sarba pA pa satwAn/ sarba ba shwe nA~M/ ma hA ts+tsha
339a6(rgyud): san+na da ni/ kro d+ha mUr+Ne daMSh+Ta ka rA li ni mahA mu dwe/ shrI he ru ka de ba s+ya/ a gra ma hi ShaM/ sa ha sra shi re/ sa ha sre b+ha ha be/ sha ta sa ha sra A na ne/ dzA li ta te dza se/ dzA la mu kha/ bi ga la lo tsa ne badz+ra
339a7(rgyud): shrI rA re badz+ra A sa ne/ mi li ti/ mi li ti/ he he hUM hUM kha kha/ d+hu d+h+ye/ ru ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ a dr-i ti/ ma hA yo gi nai pa thi ta sid+d+ha/ dr-i dr-i d+hi d+hi/ daM daM/ d+he d+hi/ gr-i gr-i he he he he b+hi me ha sa ha
339a8(rgyud): sa bI re hA hA ho ho hUM hUM/ trai lo kya bi nA sha ni/ sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti ta thA ga ta ba ri bA ri te huM hUM phaT/ siM ha rU pe khaHga dza rU be ga te lo kya u da ra/ sa mu dra me kha le gra sa hu hUM phaT/ bI ra
339b1(rgyud): dwe ta huM hUM hA hA ma hA pa shu mo ha ni/ yo gI shwa ritAM ki nI sarba lo kA nAM/ ban+d+ha ni/ sat+ya huM hUM phaT/ b+hU ta thA sa ni/ ma hA bI ra ba ra ma sid+d+ha yo gI bi d+ye shwa ri phaT/ huM hUM phaT swA hA/ rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags/ 
339b2(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje phag mo mchog/ snying po mchog tu grub pa yin// gang gis bzlas dang sgom pa yi// de yis las rnams kun grub ste// the tsom med par mod la 'grub// bdag nyid gnas mchod pa ste/ 
339b3(rgyud): phyi rol nam yang ma yino// grub pa'i khrag 'thung de nyid kyi gsang sngags rtsa ba brgyad ldan pa// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bI raM shA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kalpag+ni so ni b+ha ya huM hUM mdzad// oM dza nA ma kuH
339b4(rgyud): nA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM daMSh+Ta ka ra lo gra b+hI Sha na mu khA ya huM hUM pha Ta/ oM sa ha sra b+hu dza b+ha su rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM pa ra shu pA sha d+ya ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+hi ra Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM byA g+h+rA
339b5(rgyud): dzi nam+ba ra d+ha ra ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA d+hurmen+na kA ra ba pu ShA ya hUM hU~M phaT/ 'di ni khrag 'thu ga gsang sngags te// bdag nyid bsgo/ ma zhing mchod par bya// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ 
339b6(rgyud): b+hA ra hi ba hu~M hUM phaT/ oM Ar+ya b.rate trai lo kya ma hA te bi d+ye shA ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sarba b+hU ya ba he ma hA badz+re huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra A sa ne a pa rA dzi ta ba byaM ka rin tra b+h+rA ma Ni huM hU~M phaT/ 
339b7(rgyud): oM sho Sha Ni r-i Sha Ni kro d+ha kA rA li ni huM hUM phaT/ oM san+ta sa ni mA ra Ni su br-i b+he da ni pa rA dza ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ba~M dza ye dza~M b+ha ni sta~M b+ha ni/ mo ha ni huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ra hi/ ma hA yo nI kA me shA ri
339b8(rgyud): kha ge huM hUM phaT/ na maHni thams cad du bya'o// gsang sngags 'di yis las kun bya// A li kA li rdo rje ni// phag mor bdag nyid sgom byas na/ rtsa ba brgyad kyi sngags ldan pas// bdag nyi
340a1(rgyud): / kyang ni mchod par bya// zhal bzhi byin rlabs byas nasu// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+has mchod// yang na zhal bzhi kun rdo rje// de yi lte bar he ru dpal// bdag nyid sgom pa byas ni ni// 'khor
340a2(rgyud): dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin sgom/ ba sha la sogs bza' zhing sgrug// bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba 'dug/ skye ba can ni bai shar grags// dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang // mtshams
340a3(rgyud): med pa ni byed pa dang // gang zhig slob dpon smod pa dang // theg po chen po smod pa dang // phyugs de rnams ni bsod nas kyang // rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// phyags de rnams ni dgag pa yA
340a4(rgyud): sgrub pos sngon du skyed pas bya// phyugs bdun dang ni de bzhin phyu gas// bong bu mi dang ru sbal dang // khyi dang rnga mo ce spyang na// phyug sa kyi mar me 'di rnams ni// sgrub pa'i dge ba'i
340a5(rgyud): yan lag grags// rigs kyi kha dog dbye ba'i phyugs/ rkang bzhi rnams la glang po che// bya rnams las ni dang sbyar te// dud 'gro rnams las chu g.yo ba'i// lha rnams
340a6(rgyud): kha ru lha bshos te// 'di ni phyugs kyi rtag par bshad// grub pa'i sgrub pa rnam bshad pa// bya rog bya sgra lce sbrang dang // skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang // krung krung bzhad dang kang bu ka/ 
340a7(rgyud): bza' dang sbyin bsreg gtor ma bya// dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom bya bo// khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang // sran ma nag po 'bras dang ldan// ro yi khar na sbyin bsreg bya// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa
340a8(rgyud): brgyad par bya// de nas re de langs nas ni/ tsi bgyi zhes ni sgra 'gyur zhing // sa 'og 'gro ba 'am ral gri 'am// tshar gcod pa ni 'dogs nyid dang ni// ril bu mig sman gser rnams sam// 
340b1(rgyud): rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len/ gcig cig sbyin par byas nas ni// 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grug/ rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin// mngon par
340b2(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor gyi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srung dang phyir bzlog rim pa ni// rgyud gzhan las ni sbas
340b3(rgyud): pa yin/ srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rgyud 'dir rab tu bshad par bya// nges brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// the tshom bza' bar mi bya ste// san rjesu srung ba'i phyir// pad+ma mdab brgyad bri bar
340b4(rgyud): byaH pad+ma'i lte ba ge sar can// de rgyab sna tshogs rdo rje ste// gan da mdzes gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// de yi phyi rol ska rag sa can// mdab ma bcu drug bri bar bya// der ni cha
340b5(rgyud): rnams rnam bkod de// de yis phyi rol yongasu bskor// mkhas pas lte bar bri ba na// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis po// de yi lte bar dgod pa ni// hUM ni 'jigs pa rnam 'jigs
340b6(rgyud): pa/ hUM gi lte bar yi ge baM// baM ni lte ba yi ge gsum// bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel zhing bri// mkha'agro ma ni bin po dag/ de yi g.yon nas dgod bskor ba/ r-I lA kha rU de ru dgod// r-i rA laM lAM
340b7(rgyud): lhan cig tu// mkha' go dgod cing ming dang ni// rnam par spel zhing bri bar bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rim ji bzhin// mkhas pas mdab mar dgod bya ba// khaM pre shar gyi mdab ma la// byang
340b8(rgyud): du ka ci nyid yin te// nub tu ka paM kho na'o// lho ru ba mo nyid yin// me sogos dbang ldan phyogs rnamasu// su ba a khaM ba laM ba hri/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// yi ge hUM dang spel nas/ 
341a1(rgyud): // sa bon dag ni bri bar bya// kaM khaM ga g+haM nga/ tse tsha dza/ 'di dag ni pad+ma'i ska ragasu bri'o// rdo rje cha ni bcis pa// bskor la bin dus rnam par rgyan// mdab ma'i phyi rol bcu drug tu// 'khor
341a2(rgyud): lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri/ de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs pa// g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod par bya// mkha' gro dang ni dpa' bo'o// aM ai/ bA ma maM pA pa ba su su she ba~M su ma hi bi kha~M/ me tsa ra
341a3(rgyud): haM se// a tsa hai su be me ge/ tse ba maM/ 'di ni hri dang spel nasu// oM dang sbrel zhing bri bar bya// sgrub pa'i ming ni nang du bya// ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brang bri// dz+nyA nya TaM dza Da TuM NeNaM/ ta tha da d+ha naM/ paM pheM
341a4(rgyud): b+haM maM// phyi rol tu ska rags bri'o// 'khor lo'i phyi rol grub pa zhi ba'i// nang du sgo ni 'brel par bri// ji ltar khA gdong la sogs rim pa'i bar// gshin rje 'joms sogs sa
341a5(rgyud): bon dgod// ke e shAM su/ yaM yaM yaM yaM/ yaM r-i laM wa shase ha/ sbyar zhing / hUM dang phaT dang rnam par spel// ming dang ya nga ni spel bar bya// sgo yi steng du rtse bzhi pa'i
341a6(rgyud): rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya// zur rnamasu ni nyi zla dang // rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya// de steng rkang brgyad kyis brjod pa'i// khro ba brgyad pa'i zhal du blta// phyi rol ska rags dbus dag tu// phyir bzlos 'di dag
341a7(rgyud): bri bar bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bi kuN+Da badz+ra he ru kA ne/ oM hUM badz+ra he ru ka tsakra ban+ti sarba lo ki ka lo kar+b+ha ra Ni/ yan+t+ra man+t+ra n+na nur+yA pra ya~M ga d+hi ni yai na ke ni tsit+tan tan sarba ni A kaD+D+h+ya a kaD+D+h+ya
341a8(rgyud): tar+dz+dza yau ta rdza ya/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ha na ha na/ da ha daha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ kyA k+ShA/ dz+r-I dz+nyI/ ma tha ma thaM/ bi d+h+waM sa ya bi d+h+waM sa ya/ sha ta sa ha sra ta tsur+N+Na yau tsUr+N+Na/ 
341b1(rgyud): oM phaT/ badz+ra he ru koSh+NI Sha tsakra baN+Di ta s+ye ba mu khaM tsak+Shu ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hUM hUM/ a mu ka s+ye/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ huM hUM phaT/ 'di yis yongasu bskor byas nas// kA yi lto ba'i dbus dgod// yi ge k+Sha/ 
341b2(rgyud): yi phyi rol du// tha yis yongasu bskor byas nas/ dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongasu bskor byas nas// dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongs bskor/ he ru kar bdag bsgom byas/ nas// yi ge
341b3(rgyud): bdun pa'i sngags kyang bzla// oM hrIHha ha a mu ka sa shAn+tiM ku ru huM hUM phaT/ rigs ngan yang na bram ze 'om// rgyal po'i bu mo'i khyad par du// rang byung me tog blangs nas// glang chen me tog dang
341b4(rgyud): bsres dang // byang chub sems ni mnyam ldan pa// ro tsa na dang lha na cig sbyar// pad+ma rdo rje chu de bzhin// mig sman chen po dang bsres nas// lha mchog 'khor lo bri bar bya// rdo rje phreng
341b5(rgyud): bas rnam par bskur// mi yi lpags pa 'am/ gro ga 'am/ yang na yi dwags gos kyang rung // bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ mar da nga'o ma blangs na su// gsang sngags rkang pa
341b6(rgyud): brgyad kyi brjod// de bzhin brtul zhugs can gyis mchod// gser ram dngul gyi bum pa drag/ ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chus/ gang ba'i dbus bcug na su// 'khor lo srad pu dkar pos ri/ 
341b7(rgyud): phreng ba'i gsang sngags de la zla/ de nas dbang bskur sbyin par bya// nad yod pa ni nad med byed// nad med pa yang na du byed// myos byed chang gi dbusu naM/ mkhas pas de la bcug nas ni// nad
341b8(rgyud): med na du byed pa ste// ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brang // gang yang rung ba'i las rnams la// phreng ba'i sngags kyis rnam par bskor// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i 'khor lo ni// mgo bo'i nang du sbas nas/ 
342a1(rgyud): / ni mkha'agros de la byin rlabs ni// gdon mi za bar byed par gyur// ci 'dod thad 'grub 'gyur te// bgegs med par ni dngos grub 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
342a2(rgyud): bla ma las srung ba'i phyir bzlog gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas de yi sgom pa bshad// sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa'o// skad cig gis ni bdag nyid// lha mo phyir
342a3(rgyud): bzlog rim pa ste// zhal bzhi pa las phyag bcu drug/ gdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// bgegs ni pad+mo'i 'og mnan nas// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
342a4(rgyud): dbus na gnas// dkar zhing sngo la dmar dang ser// ste/ ngagi zhal gyis rnam par rgyan// rgyan rnams zad yongasu rdzogs/ na bza' dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan
342a5(rgyud): can/ 'chi ba yang dag 'tsho ba'i mchog spyan gsu ma pa la 'jam pa'i ngag/ gzhan ni gtug cing gtum pa la/ bsdigs mdzub rdo rje gsor mdzad cing // dril bu zhags pa
342a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje ral gi mdung dang ni// dag sta thod pa lcags kyu dang / gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mda' ni dam pa'i gangs par byed// tho ba 'khor lo mi 'jigs pa// dngos grub thad
342a7(rgyud): rab stsol ba'o// yang na 'di la zhal brgyad pa// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i ngos dag tu// g.yas pa sngo zhing dmar la ser// drag shul ha har bzhad pa'o// g.yon pa ldang zhing dmar ba dang // 
342a8(rgyud): dud ka dag gi mdog can yin// steng ni mdzes shing zhi ba ste// ska lus zla ba'i mdog cano// de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// dad pas shin tu mnyam
342b1(rgyud): gzhag ste// 'chi ba 'tsho ba'i rigs sngags bzla// oM a mri ta saM dzI ba ni// ma hA a mr-i ta su mu khe dzI baM// pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba badz+ra pad+ma sa ma yo ga mA ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta bi tha bi taH
342b2(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ A A/ A a swA hA/ 'di ni khri tsam bzlas byas pas// 'chi ba thaMd 'tsho bar byed// dus min 'chi bzhi 'gyur zhing // 'chi ba las ni nges par spong // gzhan du rnal 'byor ma dgyes na// 
342b3(rgyud): rma du byung bar mdzad pa ni// so so nas ni gang mdzad cing // hi hi dag gis dga' ba dang // ho ho dag gi dgyes pa dang // he ha dag gis tshig tu smra// huM huM dag gis rdzogs pa'o// huM huM dag ni bas
342b4(rgyud): gtan// phaT phaT dag gis gsod pa dang // huM hu dag gi phur bu'o// dzaHdzaHdag gis legs par dongs// sa sa dag ni bden par byed// nges par leg so zhes pa'i sgra'o// 
342b5(rgyud): huM bruM dag ni gsod pa'o// hUM b+h+yAM hAM b+h+rUM hAM hU dag ni thal bar klog pa'o// ha ha dag gis gsal bar byed pa'o// b+huM b+h+yAM dag ni gzo byin byed// d+hi d+hi dag gis legs par drongs// 
342b6(rgyud): sbyi dag ni mchod pa'o// so so dag gis dngos grub zad kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o// hi hi dag ni rmongs pa'o// l-i la dag ni shis pa'o// de de dag ni 'dzin pa'o// ji ji dag ni legs par drongs// 
342b7(rgyud): hu~M hu~M dag ni 'khor ba'o// hri hri dag ni gsong ba'o//  dzA dag rmugs par mdzad pa'o// ho ha mdzad pa rjesu chags par bya'o// he ha dag ni srung ba'o// ha ha dag ni dgyes pa'o// rdo rje dag ni gdug pa'o// g+hu g+hA dag
342b8(rgyud): ni me tog/ ga ga ni dri'o//  re ni gsang ba'o// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// zhi ba la sogs cho ga yi/ rim pa 'di lo rje su gnang // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i las
343a1(rgyud): / thams cad byed pa sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim/ rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste// gsang ba kun gyi
343a2(rgyud): mchog tu bshad/ rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud pa'i rim// gsang zhing gsang la mchog tu gsang // bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te// 
343a3(rgyud): bdag nyid ha ru kar byas nas// mkha 'og mas ni yongs khyab// skra lus dmar po 'jigs pa che// ye shes lnga las nges byung ba// dmar zhing sngo la ldang ba dang // sar zhing zhi la steng zhal dkar// spyan gsum
343a4(rgyud): pa la phyag bcu gnyis// galas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dang / sgrub su 'o/ sa nas zhabs 'og gnon// phyag rgya drug dang zla ba phyed// sna tshog
343a5(rgyud): rdo rje ral pa 'chang // glang po'i lpags pa gosu ban bas// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri mdung ni 'jigs pa 'i mchog/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu
343a6(rgyud): 'chang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan// de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni// de yi
343a7(rgyud): mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis
343a8(rgyud): med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// kA yi ye shes las byung ba/ de yi sku dang zhal phyag mtshan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sad rnam pa
343b1(rgyud): sgom// bcu gnyis cha las nges 'byung ba// dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che// thad mkhyen pa nges 'byung ba// sngags kyi rgyud ni 'di ru bzla/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM/ a A/ i I/ u U/ 
343b2(rgyud): ai/ a aMHDA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra huM hUM paT swA hA/ oM a A aM AHhu hUM paTau/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// aM badz+ra bA ra hi/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e o/ aM aHhuM hUM phaT swA hA
343b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye a A/ a aHhu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po dang / nye bo'i snying po'o// oM DA kI nI ri huM hUM phaT/ oM lA ma r-I huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he laM huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye l-I huM hUM phaT/

343b6(rgyud): oM a ku ri ka dz+nye hUM phaT/ oM ai hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dza Ti la nyaM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI ra TaM huM hUM phaT/ oM baM huM phaT/ oM badz+ra hA kA ra dza hUM phaT/ oM su hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dra Da hUM phaT/ oMSh+TaM hUM
343b7(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra b+ha dAT+Ta hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+he ra ba Na hU~M phaT/ oM haM hU~M phaT/ oM bi ru pAk+Sha ta hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la ba~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsa~M huM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badz+ra da hUM phaT oM khaM
343b8(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM ha ya gr-i ba d+hi hU~M phaT/ mo sha~M hUM phaT/ oM A kA sha gan+d+he ni hUM phaT/ oM tse hUM phaT/ oM ha ru ka ba hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma net+te shwa ra'i hUM phaT/ oM me hUM phaT/ e thi macan
344a1(rgyud): / hUM phaT/ oM na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra satwa b+h+rUM hUM phaT/ oM me hUM phaT/ oM ye hUM phaT/ a ra hUM phaT/ oM le hUM phaT/ oM be hUM phaT/ oM she hUM phaT/ oM She hUM phaT/ oM saM hUM phaT/ oM ha hUM
344a2(rgyud): phaT/ 'di dag ni dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' ba
344a3(rgyud): dmar// mkha'agro ma ni sngon po ste// rdo rje dral bu mnyam par ldan// 'jigs byed chen po gzhin rnam sbyar// zhe sdang gis khyab pad chen po// gsung gi 'khor lo dpa' bo dkar// mkha'agro ma ni dmar
344a4(rgyud): bo ste/ pad+ma dril bu mnyam par ldan// 'dod chags kyis khyab bde chen po// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ser// mkha' gro/ ma dkar me yi mdog/ gti mug gis khyab bde ba che// mkha
344a5(rgyud): 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams// sna tshogs mdog tu/ na snod chen po kha gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// dam re sa rad// ral ljang ku'o// gshen rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams// sngo zhing
344a6(rgyud): ser la ldang ba dang // de bzhin dkar ba'i mdog cano// 'khor la sogs pa thad kun// spyan gsum g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// dpa' bo stag gi lpags banabs shing // lha mo thad gcer bu
344a7(rgyud): ste/ skra grol ba ni rnar mdzes// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// thod pa kha
344a8(rgyud): nA ga 'dzin cing // dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams// thod pa rdo rje pad+ma dang // 'khor lo yang ni de bzhin// mkha'agro ma sogs khwa gdang dang / gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams// bod pa dang ni kha
344b1(rgyud): 'dzin/ me long dri dang ro dang reg/ gos mchog yid 'ong ba dang // cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin// mkha'agro ma ni thod pa dang // khA T+wAM ga yang 'dzin mdzad cing // dril bu cang te'u gri gug bsnams// kha gdong
344b2(rgyud): la sogs lha mo rnams// phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag/ zad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ thugs kyi 'khor lo dag po ste// gsung gi 'khar
344b3(rgyud): lo bskyod pa'i zhal// sku yi 'khor lo zhi ba ste// mkha' gro ma ni bzhin rnam sbyar// ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni// dbus kyi gtso bor rnam par brtag/ sangs rgyas byang chub se de' 'am// khro bo sna
344b4(rgyud): tshogs du ma 'am// kha tsog de bzhin gshegs pa 'am// ma mo rigs kyi khyad par dang / 'od zer can nam bskul byed ma/ shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin// gang dang gang dag sgom pa ni
344b5(rgyud): yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag/ de yis dregs par bya sa pa ni// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// yang na rnga rje sems dpa' ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar
344b6(rgyud): gnas// bad mkhyen cing thad mdzad// bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan
344b7(rgyud): pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' gro rigs kyi cho ga'i rim// sna tshogs du ma'i rigasu bshad// mdor bsdus na ni gsum dang lda// 
344b8(rgyud): drug du yang ni rab tu grags// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste// mkha' gro ma 'khor la sogs kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin// sku kun so sor 'a
345a1(rgyud): / bsteng gzhan du thams cad ma mo'i rigs// dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong ba// yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin// bac+doMs dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pos// de kho na nyid
345a2(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon 'di bshad cing bstan pa// hUM bruM a hr-i khaM baM// de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams// rab tu g.yo zhing brgyal nas kyang // rdo rje ye shes rjes
345a3(rgyud): su dran/ mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rim// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// 'di ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang // rdo rje mkha' go rab tu grags// thog
345a4(rgyud): mar rdo rje mkha' gro ste// gnyis pa sangs rgyas mkha' go yin// gsum pa rin chen mkha' gro ste// bzhi pa pad+ma'i mkha'agro yin// lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' gro ste/ drug pa rdo rje seda'i
345a5(rgyud): yin/ lnga po he ru kar shes bya// rdo rje dpa' bo ya de de nyid// na mkha'i zas kyis longs spyad cing // zla ba'i zas kyi longs kyang spyad// sprul pa'i longs spyod na mkha' ste// pad+ma'i
345a6(rgyud): zas kyi longs spyod sprul pa ste// sna tshogs longs spyod sprul pa ste// sna tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa// mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag/ gangs kyi rang bzhin lta bar bsil// dag pa'i mdog can
345a7(rgyud): mchog gi mdog/ zla ba'i zer dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ spyan gsum skal pa sna tshogs bzang // sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus na gnas// rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs// thad ral// 
345a8(rgyud): pa'i cod pan can/ thod pa'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin te// phyag rgya drug ni thad rgya/ rang gi gdan la legs par bzhugs// glang po seng+ge r+ha dang ni/ rma bya dang ni na mkha' lding // de yi steng du yi dwags gdan/ 
345b1(rgyud): bsgoms na dngos grub rab tu stsol// rdo rje lag gis sa la reg/ rdo rje dril bu dkur brten cing // zhal gyi mchu ni rnam par bsgyur// 'khor lo dril bu 'gying dang bcas// rin chen dril bu 'ang de bzhin te// pad+ma'i
345b2(rgyud): dril bu'i rim pa dang // dril bu smor rdo rje nyid// thams cad snyems par rnam bsgoms te// rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam pa// dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar bya// sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'khor
345b3(rgyud): los bskor ba ste// rin chen pad+mas de bzhin bskor// sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba ste// dbusu rdo rjes bskor bar bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar ni// khang pa brtsegs pa yid 'ong mchog/ rigs drug
345b4(rgyud): dag ni rnam par dgod// der ni gnas sogs rim pa dgod// dkyil 'khor dbus dgod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la// pul+lI ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum
345b5(rgyud): bu dang // rab gtume ma'o// byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang // gtum mig ma'o// nub tu u rgyan ni keng rus can dang // 'od ldan ma'o// lho ru a ra bu da na mche ba rnar gtsigs
345b6(rgyud): pa dang // sna chen ma ste dbus ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ste// dpa' bo sku mdog nag po// mkha' gro ma thal ba dang / sman gyi mdog can// dpa' bo ni rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu dang // mkha' go ma ni thod pa dang /

345b8(rgyud): byang du ri me shwa 'od dpag med dang / mi'u bung ma'o// nub du bI ko Tan rdo rje 'ad dang / lang ka'i dbang phrug mo'o// lho ru mA la banardo rje sku dang shing grib ma'o// dpa' ba'i sku lus dkar po/ mas/ 
346a1(rgyud): // 'gro ma ni ser po'o// dri ma med pa'i sa na dbus ma ste// sangs rgyas mkha'agro ma'o// 'od byed pa sa'i dbus ni rin chen mkha 'gro ste/ shar gyi sgo ru kA ma rU ba na mu gu can dang
346a2(rgyud): sa srung ma'o// byang du oM dran rdo rje ral pa can dang // 'jigs byed chen mo'o// nub tu tri sha ku ni dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// lho ru ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma
346a3(rgyud): ste dpa' bo ser po// mkha' gro ma ljang ku'o// 'ad 'gro ba'i so'i dbus pad+ma'i mkha' gro/ de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor ka ling ga na rab bzang dang // sngo bsangs lha mo'o// byang du la~M bA ka rdo rje bzang dang
346a4(rgyud): rab bzang mo'o// nub du ka tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o/ lho hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma ste// dpa' bo dam ra po/ mkha' go ma ni dkar ma'o// sbyang dka' bi'i

346a7(rgyud): 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor na ga ran he ru ka dang / rab dpa' mo'o// byang du sin d+hAn pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o// nub tu ma ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur
346a8(rgyud): ma'o// lho ru ku lu tA na rdo rjes dar dang / brtson chen mo ste/ dpa' bo ni sna tshogs kyi mdog can la/ mkha' gro ma dud pa'i mdog can// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol tu// yi dwags phreng bas

346b2(rgyud): su ni// ring du songs mkha' go maM// lA ma mi g.yo ba yis// legs pa'i blo gos dum skyes ma// gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin// sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang // bzhi pa dmar ba'i mdog can yin//

346b8(rgyud): grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// zad pa'i steng na yang dag gnas// 'khor lo so sor bsgoms nas ni// 'khor dang bcas pas yongs khyab// ye shes sedar
347a1(rgyud): / thugs khar blta// rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// bsgoms pas thim par byas nasu// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis// dbang bskur nas
347a2(rgyud): ni rim par smra/ oM AHbaM hUM/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// srog dang rtsol ba rim pas bya// mnyam par spros nas dbang bskur byin// ji ltar rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// dogs pa med par bzlas bsgom
347a3(rgyud): bya ji ltar gsang sngags rjes 'thun par// dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa ba// hUM b+h+rUM/ oM hriM kha ba~M/ oM a baM hUM/ oM shrI ma hA su khaM badz+ra satwa DA ki nI dza la shaM ba ra hUM phaT/ swA hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ka
347a4(rgyud): a la la la aHsUDA ki nI dzA la shi bar sprur swAhA/ mo shrI rat+ma Ta ki tA ma a/ DA ki nI dz+wa la saM bar sI phaT / hA/ oM shrI pad+ma TI ke hI hI ma d+hu oM hA DA kau nI dzal shi bar hA
347a5(rgyud): swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra DA ka aHsU phaT DA kaM nI dz+wa la sha ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bi shAT+Ta ka ho khaM A hU DA ki nal saM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM praM hU phaT/ i ka
347a6(rgyud): hU~M phaT/ oM ke tsa hUM phaT/ oM ma hUM phaT/ oM pra hU~M phaT/ oM be hUM phaT/ oM me hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM bi hUM phaT/ oM AM hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM
347a7(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ oM aM hUM phaT/ oM oM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM shrI hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM tsa hUM phaT/ oM
347a8(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM khaM hU~M phaT/ ma hUM hU~M phaT/ oM sha~M hU~M phaT/ oM oM hU~M phaT/ oM tsa hUM pheMT/ oM he hUM 'iT/ oM su hU~M pheMT/ a baM hU~M phaT/ oM me hU~M phaT/ oM baM hU~M phaT/ i tsa hU~M phaT/ oM ba hU~M pha/ 
347b1(rgyud): me hUM phaT/ oM DA hUM phaT/ oM le hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM rU hUM phaT/ oM kaM hUM phaT/ oM u hUM phaT/ oM she hUM phaT/ oM su hUM phaT/ oM ya hUM phaT/ oM yaM hUM phaT/ oM yaM hUM phaT/ oM ye hUM phaT
347b2(rgyud): 'khor lo sogs pa thams cad kun// sgom la gnas nas bzlas pa bya// 'khor los sgyur drug lhan cig tu// mkha'agro mkha' gram bzlas bya// dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba yis// dam tshig dam
347b3(rgyud): tshig mchog gyur pa// gnyis meda'akhyud pa'i sbyor ba yi// gsang sngags bzlas na dngos grub 'gyur// zla drug ngas te gzhan min par// 'khor los bsgyur drug dngos grub 'thob// yang na rdo rjes dang
347b4(rgyud): dang / rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang // pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po dang // dbang phyug rta mchog he ru ka/ gnas sogs pa yi sbyar ba yis// mkhas pas nges bskams nas ni/ rim par sbyor
347b5(rgyud): ba'i rim pa dang // brgyud pa'i gnas kyi rim pa dang / rnal 'byor ma yi bka' dag ni/ bla ma'i brgyud pas 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan du sngags pa 'khyor byed cing // bka' ni nam yang
347b6(rgyud): mthong ma yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rigs dag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bka'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor
347b7(rgyud): lam ni rnyed dgaka' ba// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor snying po// gzhan gyi rnal 'byor rjes 'thun par// yi ge las byung gcig car tshul// gcig car mtshan ma phyag mtshan 'dzin// gcig car rdo rje sader
347b8(rgyud): ste/ bde ba chen po bla na med// de ru 'jug cing de yi tshul// gcig car he ru ka dpal mchog ston ka'i na mkha' dri med ltar// zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa/ 
348a1(rgyud): / 'jigs shing rab tu 'jigs par mdzad// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum rnal 'byor ma yi gtso// zhal gdong g.yon dkar g.yas dmar ste/ steng
348a2(rgyud): gi zhal ni ser la mdzes// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ sangs rgyas lnga yi byin rlabs can// stag gi lpags po gsu banabs// mgo ba'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag
348a3(rgyud): zhabs kyis pad+mar gnod par bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas mkhyud// phag ma yi ni byin pas 'khril// gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pas// dbu skra grol ba phyogs gos can// sku mdog mnyam
348a4(rgyud): zhing mtshungs par ldan// dum bu'i rgyan gyi skar gas can// de yi zhal dang phyag mtshan can// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab tu stsol// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rgyal ba'i lpag
348a5(rgyud): pa steng du ste// tho ba mdung ste gzhan du ni/ tshangs pa'i mgo brgyan pa la// zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la rgyan// phyag rgya dag gis sku la rkyen// rdo rje mtshan ma dag
348a6(rgyud): gis rgyan// rdo rje phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// 'og bag dag gis sku regs byas// dpung rgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa ste// sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni// 'od ltar cho ga'i snying po shes// phag ma
348a7(rgyud): bar gnas pa ni// rgyal ba'i lpags pa rnam par spangs// phag mo rgyal ba'i mtshan sogs las// cang te'u gi gug rnams kyis rgyan// bcom ldan 'das ni lte ba'i dbus// pad+ma mdab brgyad yi 'ang / 
348a8(rgyud): ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma mdog mdzes la// pad rnam dag mchog dam pa// shar gyi mdab sogs phyogs cha la// mkha' gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod// shar du mkha'agro ma dgod cing // byang du lA ma
348b1(rgyud): de bzhin te// nub tu dum skyes ma yino// lho ru gzugs can ma yin te// sngo dang sar dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku dang ni bzhi pa'o// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// spyan gsum drag po gzi brjid can// 
348b2(rgyud): skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// skra grol ba ni yid 'ong ba// phyogs kyi gos can mgo yi phreng // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // de bzhin
348b3(rgyud): gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing // rdo rje mdung mchog phyag na 'dzin// snyems pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos// sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang // ljang ku steng gi zhal dkar ba
348b4(rgyud): ser zhing sngo la ldang ba dang // steng gi zhal gdod dag la dmar// dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dkar la zhi// ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang // steng gi zhal ni ser po mchog/ 
348b5(rgyud): bdud bzhi po ni zhags kyis gnon// bac+doMs lag dong gis lta// zur gyi char ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// de yi steng du thod pa ni// byang chub 'o mas rab gang
348b6(rgyud): ba/ phyi rol dam tshig gsum 'khor la/ khang pa brtsegs pa legs par mdzes// shar phyogasu naM gau rI ste// byang du de bzhin tsau rim// nub tu rab rmongs ma yin// lho ru yang ni ro langs ma// me la wAH
348b7(rgyud): byed ma yin te// bden bral du ni gtum mo yin// rlung phyogs sme mo nyid yin te// dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste/ de bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni// dkar mo sar la sngo ljang ku// skul byed dmar la sngo ldang
348b8(rgyud): kuH rab rmongs ma ni snga ser ljang // ro langs ma ni dkar sde ldang / lbos byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog/ dmar dang sngo dang ljang ku'o// gtu mo yang ni ljang sngo sar// sme mo yang ni dung sngo ljang / he ru ka ma snga
349a1(rgyud): ljang dmar// 'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang // spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyogs kyis gos 'chang gar dang bcas// yi dwags gdan la legs par bzhugs/ phyag rgya lnga
349a2(rgyud): yis rnam par rgyan// khan+d+ha thod pa dril bu dang // cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu thogs// thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan byas/ 'di ltar gnas dang nye gnas kyi// dngos grub
349a3(rgyud): thad rab tu stsol// 'di ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo ni// lha mo dkar mo la sogs pa// rnal 'byor ma ni rab tu bshad// bsnyen pas bka' drin stsol mdzad// thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'grub// lha ma
349a4(rgyud): mkha' spyod grub nas ni// mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phyang rnyed// de yi phyi rol gsung 'khor lo// shar du bi waM stangs thab/ sa ma/ byang du gling bu'i stangs thabs ma// nub du rdza rnga cha stangs
349a5(rgyud): thab lho ru rdza rje'i stangs thabs te// sngo dang ser dang / dmar ljang ku/ me sogs rdo rje bzhad ma ste/ rdo rje sgeg mo rje klu/ rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang ldeng ku'o// de dag
349a6(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// gcer bu dbu skra gol ba dang // thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// spyan gsum pa la yid 'ong ba// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// tsham ngam lag pa'i stangs thabs kyis// rdo rje dril bu
349a7(rgyud): stangs thabs can// khrig ma mnyam par byas nas ni// pad+ma bskor ba'i stangs thabs can// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// tshan do dang ni tshan do ha// de dag 'od bag med dbu rgyan// sku yi 'khor lo'o sha
349a8(rgyud): du ni// me tog ma byang bdug ma// nub du mar me lho ru dra// ser dang dud ka dmar dkar po// me long ro dang reg bya chos// me phyogs la sogs mtshams bzhi ste// zla ba'i mdog can dmar ljang dkar
349b1(rgyud): de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // zhabs kyis kun tu gar byed cing // phyag tu mchod pa thogs nas ni// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // cang ti'u ni phyag na bsnams// thod pa
349b2(rgyud): yi ni phreng ba can// lha mo de dag 'das dang // nye ba'i 'dus dur khrod dang // nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te// rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan byas// sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang // rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgrog/ 
349b3(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu de bzhin te// sngo dang ljang dang dmar dang ser// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi phyogs kyang de bzhino// me las sogs pa'i mtsham su ni// gshin rje sreg la sogs pa dag/ dmar
349b4(rgyud): dang sngo dang dud ka ser// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rang gi mtshan ma cang te'u dang // gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang // spya na gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// gcer bu gar gyis gnas pas
349b5(rgyud): bzhugs// bidi phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan// thod pa yi ni phra nga ba can// rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can// ji lta'i rim pas su gnas// de yi snying kar ye shes sems// sku gsung thug
349b6(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo gsum// gtso bo'i bdag po bsgom par bya// dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba yi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ ji lta bu yis bsgoms pa na// rje su bstan pa'i sgom pa las// ye shes
349b7(rgyud): lcags kyu dag gis ni// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// ji ltar rim pas mchod dbang bskur// gcig tu bsdus te bstims nasu// ji lta'i rim pa bsgoms nasu// ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang
349b8(rgyud): bya spro bsdu srog dang rtsol ba yis// 'thor 'thung rim pas byas pa yis// slob dpon gyis kyi bzlas pa bya// oM AHhuM hUM/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis// grangs med par ni byas nasu// ji srid
350a1(rgyud): skyo bar ma gyur par// gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni// mnyam par gzhag te bzlas par bya// dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni// sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya// oM AHhUM/ oM shrI ba
350a2(rgyud): he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA kI nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA rA hi huM hUM phaT/ oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM ru bI NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gau rI hu~M hUM phaT/ oM
350a3(rgyud): rI huM hUM phaT/ oM pra mo ha huM hUM phaT/ oM bai tA li huM hUM phaT/ oM puk+ka siM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+Da li hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM g+hasma ri huM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka b+he huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi na su hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra be sha~M huM hUM phaT/ 
350a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra mr-i da ge huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mu re dze hU~MphaT/ oM badz+ra hA s+yai huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra/ gI te huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ni tu huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe huM hUM phaT
350a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+hU pa huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dI pe hu~M hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pa badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ oM ra sa badz+rI hu hUM phaT/ oM s+phar sha badz+ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+harma d+ha tu badz+ri hu hUM phaT/
