350a7(rgyud): NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma thA nI ye huM hUM phaT// / dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas// mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid
350a8(rgyud): can// rang gi thabs dang rig pa'i lus// gnyisu med par mnyam pa'i bdag khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas// 'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni// he ru kar ni byas nas kyang // sa rnams gsum
350b1(rgyud): ma lus par// thad der ni bsdus nas kyang // sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste// 'khor lo sgom pa'i bzlas pa'o// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong
350b2(rgyud): ba na// dam tshig can nyid langs dus// de bzhin gshegs pa zad dang // dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// mkha' gro dang ni mkha' gro ma// kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya// khro ba bong ba'i dgyes pa
350b3(rgyud): yi/ longs spyod las ni byung ba yi// rab rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas nas// bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te// ra ma ha na da Ta Na su ra A ma hA su hUM ba ra dzo i ni ka ma la su hu/ a la la la ho// su ra
350b4(rgyud): a ut+ta ma ma hAM/ ma hI sadz+dza/ u ma dzo i ni dza la ma ho// A I/ A A ra ho/ a ru he byi nu su ba ya na ha/ su ra a ru huM de hi ba ra TA i ni// dza la su hU bi sa pha na ta ro Na Na pa da hi ma hA
350b5(rgyud): su hU ma dz+nyA mu hA ma~M k+ShA pa lag kha u/ tud+d+ha sa thA na i su hUM/ bidz+nyA u mo khu su hUM/ i na i du// khe la tha oM mo khu su hu/ ba su i paM ka u madz+dza ta nu na ba rA/ A pa da tr-i/ b+hU
350b6(rgyud): dza ta nu muSh+mA hA su hU~M/ i la da rA ya/ u ma hUM/ a ra bI a gi a paM u ra su// 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni/ dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste// snyan cing 'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i/ 
350b7(rgyud): dbyangs// dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas// mkha' gro'i dra ba dri med rnams// gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ma// sbyor bas dngos grub thad 'grub// dgyes pa
350b8(rgyud): 'di yis bskal na ni// bde ba chen po stsol ba yin// sbyar ba yi ni dus dag tu// rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar// thog ma dbus dang mthar thug par// yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags zla/ 'khor lo
351a1(rgyud): / dag ni brtan byas te// dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// thad snying kar brtan byas te/ bsgoms pas zad
351a2(rgyud): brtan par 'gyur// gal ta bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod// dngos grub thad gnas pa yin// oM badz+ra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya badz+ra he ru ka/ tra no pi taSh+Tha/ DI D+ho me b+ha ga/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ga a
351a3(rgyud): nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo ma b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shre ya/ ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ badz+ra he ru ka mA me muny+tsa he ru ko b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 
351a4(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing // yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa// he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin/ phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa ra bcu drug mdab ma la bkod cing // rje su bstan pa'i
351a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun// bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar bde bar gnas par/ ba// rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni// khams
351a6(rgyud): gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid// de ltar srid pa'ang stong pa yin// bsgoms pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas// 'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med// phreng ba me
351a7(rgyud): cing sngags kyang med// gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang // cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med// rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis rim pa'ang med// rdo rje
351a8(rgyud): chen po dngos 'dzin pa// rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa// 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med// bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni// lte ba'i dbus rnam
351b1(rgyud): bar sgom// yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa// lha yi gzugs sgom pa ni// de yi dbus rnam par bsam/ sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can// de yi lus las 'das gyur te// sems kyi dngos
351b2(rgyud): btsal du med// chags pa med cing chags bral med// chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa/ snying gi pad+ma'i dbus ni// brtags pas legs par rnyed pa ni// yid kyi ngal bsos byas pa ste// rna myor
351b3(rgyud): ma kun bud med yin// phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o// zla ba'i steng du brgya phyed rgyan// ye shes sems ni bsam pa ni// mchog ste spyad par bya ba med// bla ma'i man ngag lam dang ni// sems
351b4(rgyud): ni mchog tu 'bar ba yis// 'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni// 'ji garten du mas ma rtogs te// sbyor dang sbyor ba bral byas nas// go 'phang gcig pus khyab pa yin// 'di ltar byang chub
351b5(rgyud): 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste// dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge la sa byung gzhan du yang // stag ngan gzhung lugs log pa'i bla gros de nyid ni// mi ning shes rab long ba gzugs
351b6(rgyud): bzhin 'bras bu med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba bshad pa ba// thod pa
351b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchog dam pa// de nyid sbyor ba kun gyis mchog/ dngos grub thaMd rab stsol pa// gsang ba legs par spa bya zhing // gang gis su la'ang mi bstan to// de nyid mchog gi sgom pa bcwa
351b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas// gsang ba bstan par sba bya zhing // bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya// dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba// sgrub pa po yis nges bstan pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
352a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yi/ sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje lte ba'i dbus ni// yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bya// de yis khyab par bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog/ gnas med
352a2(rgyud): zhi zhing dge pa ste// rtog pa thad rnam spangs yin// A li kA li las rang 'byung // gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan// 'dzam+bu'i
352a3(rgyud): mngon can mnyam pas khab// 'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i zhal// sems dpa' kun gyi sgom pa ste// gnyis med chos ni bla na
352a4(rgyud): med stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// na ra'i lnga gas pa steng du brkyang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// mgo bo'i phreng bas
352a5(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni// rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ye/ shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa// kha nA ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor
352a6(rgyud): 'byor// thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste// 'jigs pa ma lus mi 'jigs gal// gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun// 'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad/ 
352a7(rgyud): gdugs pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong // zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mtshan// rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes// rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgya macun// sna tshogs pad+ma mdab brgyad kyi// 
352a8(rgyud): lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon// ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can// yi ge bruM las byung bar sgom// thugs
352b1(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo snying ka ru// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom// gsung gis 'khor lo kha la sgom// sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin// sngo dang dkar dang kar ba dang // phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa// rdo rje dril bu
352b2(rgyud): mnyam par ldan// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang // rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// dkyil
352b3(rgyud): 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu// yi ge gsum sogs las byung ba// zod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sdom pa gsum
352b4(rgyud): gyi mchog dam pa// mkha' gro ma dang lA ma dang da dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// pad+mar phyogs kyi gan sa la dgod// thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te// mkha' 'gro ma ni
352b5(rgyud): kha dog ser// lA ma pa la sha yi mdog/ dum skyes ma ni sngon po ste// gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar// thod pa dang / ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te// sgo rnam
352b6(rgyud): su ni lha mo bzhi// khwa gdong la sogs mkha' gro ma// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang gu drag po'i gzugs cano// mtsham su gshin rje sreg la sogs// rab 'jigs rishin tu 'jigs
352b7(rgyud): ba ste/ thod pa dang ni khA T+wAM 'dzin/ mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te// cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid// bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ phyogs kyi gos
352b8(rgyud): mchog 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// me long ro dang dri dang ni// reg gi mchod pa bzhi pa ste/ sa bcu dag ni rim pa dang / sku gsung thu/ 
353a1(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun// byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ ka las sogs pa nyi shu bzhi// mgo la bin dus mnan pa ste// gsal byed spu gnyis
353a2(rgyud): dang yang sbyar// mthar ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu tha~Md ster// gsal byed mkha' gro ma yi ming // mthar ni huM hUM phaT yin te// 'di ltar rab gtu
353a3(rgyud): mkha'agro ma// sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ hUM AHoM/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// pad+ma'i mdab la mkha'agro ma// gsal byed mi nang dang bcas pa// hUM ni gnyis pa
353a4(rgyud): nyid yin te// mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// kha gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni// ya ra la wa/ gsal byed drang ni bcas pa ste// mthar ni hUM dang phaT dang sbyar// gshin rje sreg
353a5(rgyud): ma la sogs pa// sha Sha sa ha// gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang // phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus sang / sa rgyas thod pa yi// gsang sngags de bzhin rje su dran// oM aM
353a6(rgyud): AM/ i I/ uM uM/ e ai/ aM oMHSha swA hA/ khams dang phung po skye mched la// go cha rnams ni sbyar bar bya// ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dag/ mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya// 
353a7(rgyud): mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams// rang ming gsal byed hUM byas te// 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar// sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba// rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste// bde rim pa bzhin du
353a8(rgyud): sbyar// mthor mthung du ni rab sbyar bas// gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dang // 'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor nas/ 
353b1(rgyud): dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya// dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun// sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// 'di
353b2(rgyud): ltar thad rab tu brtag/ dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing // ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog/ yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya// sngags kyis de nyid bzlas par bya// oM shrI bud+ha ka pA li praM AHhUM
353b3(rgyud): DA ki nI dzA la she ba ra hUM phaT swA hA// 'di ni yod sbyor ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes mchog/ gang du dam tshig nyams pa la// sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya// zhi bar gyur nas bla na med pa// 
353b4(rgyud): rnal 'bor ma yi dbang yang bskur// dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis// phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya/ yang na dam tshi ga sdum pa blang // bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// bdag ni mi
353b5(rgyud): shes pa rmongs pa ste// dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams// bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzad cig/ gtso bo rdo rje dzin pa ste/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ 'gro ba'i gcol
353b6(rgyud): skyabasu mchi// des ni the tsom med byas nas// nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu
353b7(rgyud): rtsa drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba// gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang // 'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun/ sangs rgyas
353b8(rgyud): rnams kyi gnas mchog yin// mi zad gnyid med rnam par dag/ thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// a yi ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ spyan
354a1(rgyud): gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// ral pa zla phyed dbu la rgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i
354a2(rgyud): dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag rgya dag gis rnam par rgyan// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams
354a3(rgyud): rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin// dngos grub thad rab tu stsol// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes sems dpa' snying ka ru// 'khor lo gsum
354a4(rgyud): gyi mchog kyang sgom// hUM las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang // AHlas gsung gi 'khor lo s+ye/ de yi phyag mtshan dmar po'o// oM las sku yi 'khor lo ste
354a5(rgyud): de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin// dpa' bo rnal 'a byor ma mnyam sbyor// sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med// raM las/ phyag rgya chen po ste// lte ba'i dbus rnam par bsam// i las b+ha
354a6(rgyud): ga pad+ma ste// byang chub zla ba di ma med// u ni snying kar bsam pa ste// e ni mgo la rnam par dgod// e ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgad// oM ni mig tu dgod pa ste// a ni go char byas nasu// a ni mdun
354a7(rgyud): gyi mtshon cha'o// l-i las lha mo spyan yin te// raM las dam tshig sgrol ma yin/ l-I las lha mo gos dkar mo// rA las rin chen yang dag 'byung // rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron// dkar zhing pa la
354a8(rgyud): sha yi mdog/ dmar zhing 'dzum+bu chu bo'i mdog/ zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum degyes pas rnam par myos// thams cad phyogs kyis gos can te// rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan
354b1(rgyud): 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang // pad+ma dmar po rin chen dang // rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin// gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste/ 
354b2(rgyud): mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs// thod pa yi ni cod pan can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste// dbusu gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan// 
354b3(rgyud): zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum zad pa'i phreng ba can// me long dang ni pi wang dang // dri dang dung dang bcud kyis len// chang
354b4(rgyud): gi gtung ba lag pas mchod// gzhan du ji ltarabadag po bzhin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// skyil krung phyed par legs par bzhugs// lag po snyim pa'i thal
354b5(rgyud): mo yis// mchod pa lag tu thogs nas no// 'di lha'i cho gas thams cad mkhyen// a li de nyid dri ma med// gseng po mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa ni
354b6(rgyud): sngags kyi de nyid cho ga dag/ sku gsung thugasu yang dag sbyar// oM shri ma hA su kha badz+ra sautwa a// a hAM TI ka nI dzA la shaM ba ra swA hA/ oM sid+d+ha lo tsa ni i a/ hUM swA hA// oM sa ma ya tA re tut+tA ra
354b7(rgyud): tu ro ro AHhUM swA hA/ oM pad+ma d+hA we bAt+tA ra ba si ni sa ya~M AHhUM swA hA/ oM rat+na ku le kaM ka rA dz+wa la~M nI rA AHhUM swA hA/ oM rU ba badz+rI trA~M/ oM shab+da badz+rinA~M/ oM ge d+ha badz+rI ShaM/ oM res badz+ra
354b8(rgyud): hrIHzad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus gnas par sgom// a li rdo rje gsang ba ste// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba// do yi gsang ba bshad
355a1(rgyud): pa yin// rnal 'byor pa yi dus bzhi ru// bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya// som nyi thams cad spangs nas ni// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan// ye shes 'khor lo mthong
355a2(rgyud): nas ni// dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur// de dag gcig tu bstim na su// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu// 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang
355a3(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po// da ltar sen gsum po la// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag thog ma med pa'i mchog yino// mngon par rjod pa'i rgyud bla
355a4(rgyud): ma'i bla ma las rdo rje seder bskyed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad// dza mapa'i rdo rje sgrub pa ni// maM gi ye shes las byung ba'i// 'jam pa'i
355a5(rgyud): rdo rje bde ba che// zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste/ sku mdog dkar po dri ma med// spyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can phyag rgya dag ni 'bar bas rgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can// 
355a6(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid// ser dang ljang ku de bzhin te// steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste// lha yi
355a7(rgyud): dngos grub 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje dri ba bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri po ti 'dzin pa ste// ut+pal dang lcags kyu nyid// ye shes lus can rnam par sgom// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po no// 'khor
355a8(rgyud): lo'i dbus rnam par sgom// sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltara'o// gsang sngags 'di ni rje su dran// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gsang ba ni// gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig
355b1(rgyud): can/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o// oM shrI ma hA su kha many+dzu badz+ra a ma hUM DA ki nI dza la saM ba ra swA hA// rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni/ brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla// gsang
355b2(rgyud): gsum 'khor lo spros nas no// khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// gang gis su la'ang bstan mo bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'jam pa'i rngo
355b3(rgyud): rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yi ge dgu pa sgrub pa ste// k+Sha yi ye shes las byung ba// gdug pa thaMd za byed pa// za byed mkha' gro za
355b4(rgyud): byed cing // rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed// mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ba// na mkha'i longs spyod za byed cing // zhal du ga phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// g.ya
355b5(rgyud): brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// gdug pa'i bdud ni za byed cing // 'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs byed ma'o// sa bub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs// stag gi lpags pa
355b6(rgyud): gosu banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa mnan// phyag rgya dag gis sku lus rgyan// zhal gyi mche ba
355b7(rgyud): rnar gtsigs// 'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs zhing // sngo dang dud ka ljang ku dang // dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o// drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs// thal ba sprin
355b8(rgyud): gyi mdog can la// gdug pa thaMd rab 'joms ma// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing // dbang du rdo rje phag mo ni// de mdog steng zhal phag mgo ste// gnyis
356a1(rgyud): // su med par mnyam par ldan// skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin
356a2(rgyud): cing / tshangs pa'i lpags pa banabs pa ste// rdo rje mdung dang cang te'u dang // gri gug zhags pa mgo bo dang / phyag du ral gri 'phyar ba ste// drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa// snying kar ye shes mkha' gro
356a3(rgyud): ni/ kha gdong la sogs yongs kyis khyab// 'khor lo mdab brgyad dbus dag tu// g.yon nas g.ya su bskor nas ni// dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod// mkha 'gro mchog ni dgod par bya// ya ra la wa
356a4(rgyud): sha ShaM sa haM/ ye shes 'khor lo mkha 'gro dgod/ zhug bdun par du bsgoms nas ni// gang yang thun ni bzhi yi rim/ chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du// bsgom pas dngos grub nges
356a5(rgyud): par rnyed// 'phrog pa dang ni bsod byed cing // gang du las ni ci 'dod pa/ mkha' go ma yi 'khor los 'grub// las 'dir yid gnyis dpyod pa med// sngo dang pa la sha ya mdag
356a6(rgyud): dmar dang bzhi pa sar po ste// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// smo Da mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal// dmar dang sngo dang dud ka ste// zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu mdzes// thad spyan gsum pa yi zhal
356a7(rgyud): skra grol ba la phyogs gos can// khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal/ 'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te// gsum po khyi yi zhal gdong yin/ bzhi pa phag gi zhal gdong ste// g.yon dang galnga
356a8(rgyud): pa'i zhal gdong ni// drag po'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin// gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong no// g.yon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin// thugs ri rnga mo rta dang ni// seng+ga ra dang glang ma he// gzha
356b1(rgyud): yang dom gyi zhal yin te// thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan cas
356b2(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// yi dwags gdan la gar gyis bzhugs/ mi'u thung la skye gnas rings// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thugs rje'i ra yis rnam par myos// sku gsung
356b3(rgyud): thugs kyi gsang ba ni// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// hUM AHoM/ 'di ni gsang bar bshad pa ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dbus// ye shes mkha' gro snying ka ru// mkha' gro'i yo ge'i 'khor
356b4(rgyud): le nau ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod cithim par rnam par sgom// mnyam par gzhag nas yi ge rnams// srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla// rang gis thor 'thung byas
356b5(rgyud): nasu// gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes s+ho// oM shrIk+Sha DA ki ni dz+wa la sa bar hUM hUM pa swA hA/ thog mar gsal byed mi nga dang hUM// ma thar ni paT dang rnam par sbyar/ mkha'agro zla
356b6(rgyud): bshad pa yi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thang stsol// mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni sbyin mi bya// zhag bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te/ rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms nas ni// 
356b7(rgyud): 'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' gro ma'i// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las kA'i mkha 'a gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// 
356b8(rgyud): de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/ e li mkha'agro sgrib pa ste/ a li ye shes las byung ba// a li mkha' gro mchog dam pa// zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/ spyan gsum 'jigs
357a1(rgyud): pa rab 'jigs pa// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang // thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sna tshogs
357a2(rgyud): rdo rjes spyi gtsugs mnan// dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng // stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// phyag rgya dag gis sku la rkyen// rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid// sred dang phra dog dus mtshan nyid// zhabs
357a3(rgyud): kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad// gdul dka' thad 'dul mdzad cing // bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can// sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes// dkar ba'i mdog can sked pa phra// lha yi gzi brjid
357a4(rgyud): 'bar ba can// sngo zhing ser la dud ka dang // g.yas pa 'i zhal yang de bzhin te// ljang ku dmar dang ser skya ste// g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes// steng gi thal kha sprin mdog zhi// 
357a5(rgyud): / chags shing rjesu chags pas lta// thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs// sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can// a li ma kha 'gro ma yi sku// phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus// thod
357a6(rgyud): pa'i phreng bas dbu la rgyan// skra grol ba yis rnam par myos// spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can// de yi mdog can sku rags can/ byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor
357a7(rgyud): bas yang dag gnas// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// lha mo'i ku tsa 'chir ba'o// ji ltar mkha' gro'i phyag rgya ltar// mkha 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar// phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang pa la// khab
357a8(rgyud): 'jug lpags pa banabs pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang // mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid// dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin te// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo do// 
357b1(rgyud): dang 'gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid// snying kar rtsibs ni brtsis pa'i// 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni// ye shes mkha' go rnam par sgom// de mdog zhal dang
357b2(rgyud): 'dug stangs dang // phyag dang phyag rgya de bzhin te/ shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma yi ge a'i rigs pas byung ba'o// byang phyogasu sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'
357b3(rgyud): 'gro ma yi ge AM las byung te bzhugs pa'o// nub phyogasu na mkha'i mchog ces bye ba'i mkha' gri ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o// lho phyogasu gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma yi
357b4(rgyud): go i las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o// ma'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu mkha' gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste/ thog ma che ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'
357b5(rgyud): 'gro ma yi ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o// bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o// rlung gi phyogasu dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro
357b6(rgyud): ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' go ma yi yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru// dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod
357b7(rgyud): ba/ yi ge raM las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro mo dang // yi ge l-i las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' gro ma dang / yi ge rI las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mazha
357b8(rgyud): 'gro ma dang // yi ge lA las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'agro ma dang // mkha' gro ma ni da kun gyi// yan lag bcus rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag ni dag pa ste// bad spyan gsum
358a1(rgyud): rnam sbyar zhal// sku lus dkar po thad zhal// sngo dang ljang ku gnyis med bde// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni// mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// phyogs
358a2(rgyud): gos can gar dang bcas// skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog/ mdung dang mgo bo thad kun// sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams
358a3(rgyud): ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing // thugs rje'i re ni yongasu rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan// mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// thaMd oM la la yi sgra/ 
358a4(rgyud): ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// Ar+tha ni gsung du 'gyur/ ba yin/ a ni sku yi rdo rje ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i dbus// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog
358a5(rgyud): sengs gsungs pa ste// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yi na// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'o mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor la sogs pa zad dgod// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// gcig tu
358a6(rgyud): chos kyi ro yang sgom// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// 'khor lo'i mchog gi tshogs dang spro// mchog de mthong na
358a7(rgyud): slar yang bsdu// yan lag bcus mchog dam pa// sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid de// rdo rjes ni bcu gsum pa// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba// sbyang dka' ba dang mngon
358a8(rgyud): du gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan// de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po// 'khor lo'i lha mo rnar dgod// dgyes pa chen
358b1(rgyud): po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpas dbu sa'o// 'khor la sogs pa kun gyi sngags// ming dang gsal byed hUM byas te// de dag mthar na phaT dang sbyar// sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sbra/ 
358b2(rgyud): ni// rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas// gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya// bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang // mnyam par
358b3(rgyud): gzhag ste mi smra bzla// rang gi mthor 'thung byas nas ni// blo ldan srog stsol bzlas pa bya// oM shrI A li DA ka a aM.a DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra hUM phaT// srid pa ma lus thaMd kun// dngos po med pa'i rang
358b4(rgyud): bzhin te// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid/ sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams// sems can khams ni cha gnas da bas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod
358b5(rgyud): par bya// mnyam par ma gauzhag sems kyis/ ni/ sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid// chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin// chos rnams bdag
358b6(rgyud): med nyid yin te// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni/ rje su brtag par bya ba yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba A li'i mkha' go sgrub pa ste le'u
358b7(rgyud): sum cu tham pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/ thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor cha// dngos grub chen po legs stsol ba// bskyed pa'i rim
358b8(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// si oM dA las rdo rje 'byung // de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de// gsal byed mkha' gram mchog gyu
359a1(rgyud): // ba/ sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog/ thams cad rims kyi mchog dam pa// zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i sgra// zla ba phyed pa zhi pa
359a2(rgyud): 'dzin/ thod pa'i phreng bas spyad pa ste// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang // spyi gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya dag gis sku la mtshan// lha yi rgyan gyis spud pa ste// skal ngan mu stegs can
359a3(rgyud): rnams ni// zhabs kyi pad+mo'i 'og tu man ne// lnga pa lnga yi rim pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyi mnan// skyil krung byed pa'i gar zhabs can// zhal drug gis ni rnam par rgyan// khyab 'jug
359a4(rgyud): ge ni lpags pa banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rgyan pa ste// rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud// gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can// skra grol ba la spyan gsum can// mchu dang
359a5(rgyud): ni rnam 'chir zhing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'a/ la// byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshor zhing // byin pa gnyis kyi sa mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde/ 
359a6(rgyud): tshangs pa'i lpags pa yan lag ni// phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang // dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs// mdung rtse gsum dang ral gri dang // cang
359a7(rgyud): te'u zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba nyid// ser dang dud ka dur smrig ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu// pi la dang ni nye pi la// mkha' gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar// 
359a8(rgyud): chos kyi mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje mkha' gro ma nyid ni// yi ge dI las yang dag 'byung // g.yon gyi phyogasu dgod par bya// yi ge si las nges byung ba// rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje
359b1(rgyud): mkha' gro ma gnyis ni// sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal// spyan gsum pa la gzhin rnam bsgyur// skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa ste// zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o// zhal lnga pa phyag bcu
359b2(rgyud): par spyan gsum dag po 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs// mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// phyogs kyi
359b3(rgyud): gos can skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng ba'i sku rags can// rkang rngub g.yer ka'i sil sgra can// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// 'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa
359b4(rgyud): rdo rje gsor zhing bsdigs mdzub kyis// gnyis med par rnam par rgyan// thod pa gnyis med rnam rgyan te// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog/ sku
359b5(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi dbu la rgyan// dngos grub thad rab stsol ba// ye shes mkha' gro ma dbus// 'khor lo gsu/ ma gyi thabs kyang sgom// oM gyi ye shes mkha' gro ni// thug
359b6(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'i dbus ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' gro ni// rang gi snying kar de dag sgom// sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// gnas la sogs pa'i rjes rim pa// de ru bsam zhing
359b7(rgyud): rnam bsgoms te// gsum po'i rim pa rje su spro// des ni dngos grub gnyis med pa// mkha' gro ma dang lhan cig sgom// ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams ni// bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas
359b8(rgyud): par bya// oM shrI pra Na ba DA ka A A/ oM hU DA ki ni dzA la saM ba ra a swA hA/ oM hU~M d+harma ut+ta me// ma hA badz+ra DA ki nI ya dwe hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sa~M sA ga ra ut+ta me ma hA badz+ra DA ki nI ya sa~M hU
360a1(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA// gsang gsum ye shes bzlas nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya// gsal byed rang ming hUM gnyis dang // mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya// gsang gsum
360a2(rgyud): 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms nas// dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis// b+ha gi'i dbus su bsgom par bya// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// thugs kyi 'khor lo
360a3(rgyud): nA da gsum// gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te// mkha' go ma gsum mkha' gro/ sdud cing bskyed par mdzad pa ste// b+ha gar rdo rje phag mo ni// gsang ba gsum du rnam par sgom// de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba
360a4(rgyud): yis// de na nga rgyal rnam spangs nas// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de bzhin bsgoms dang bzlas pa bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing // 'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba// bram ze
360a5(rgyud): che dang sbrang rtsi mar// ma hA mAM sa ma nyams ldan pa// de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te// bza' ba dag/ ni bza' bor bya// 'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med// yongs bzung
360a6(rgyud): ba'i 'khor yang med// longs spyod min pas longs spyod la// 'tsho ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bsten// longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing // rnal 'byor sgom
360a7(rgyud): pa'i skom yang btung // gzhan du gang yang btung ba min// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas// bcom ldan mkha' gro pi la ba// rnal 'byor mo na nye ba
360a8(rgyud): la/ thabs ni pi la bar shes bya// shes rab nye ba'i pi la ba// grong khyer mthar ni pi la nyid// grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la/ zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba// pi la dang ni nyi pi yin// skad cig sbyor ba pi
360b1(rgyud): la sa// dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste// mthu stobs dum ldan par ni// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin// pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing // lha ba shos dag kyang de bzhin sgrub// dpa' bo mkha'agro ma 'dus na/ 
360b2(rgyud): dus la 'thun pa 'dus byas nas// glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang // 'dus pa mchog gos mchod par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud
360b3(rgyud): bla ma'i bla ma las gsal byed mkha' gro sgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ba// dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// mkha'
360b4(rgyud): 'gro ma dang mkha' gro sbyor// dam tshig mchog dgi sdom pa yin// chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste// mkha'agro ma yi bde ba che// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// dkyil
360b5(rgyud): 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa// de yi dbus su 'khor lo cha// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par rgyan// dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes// A li ka li mnyam par ldan
360b6(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ni// rang gi sa bon las bskyed// yi ge hi las yang dag 'byung // dus mtha'i me ltar ba
360b7(rgyud): tu 'jigs// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum ljags ni bskyong ba'i zhal// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon// khro ba dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i mthar yang
360b8(rgyud): 'khrug pa ste// ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i lpags pa yis// rked par sku rags
361a1(rgyud): bcings pa yin// bod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'chang // dpral ba las ni rdo rje phreng // khro bo mthong nas rnam par brtag/ lha rnams thad tshar yang
361a2(rgyud): gcod// keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'chi ba 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag rgya dag gis sku lus rgyan// snoT rgyan gyis spud pa ste// phyag dras
361a3(rgyud): pa la zhal lnga pa// sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can// sngo dang sor dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku dkar po zhi ba ste// rdo rje dal bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo yi nau sku lus khab// lha chen lpag
361a4(rgyud): pa 'dzin mdzad cing // bla re tshul du brkyang bar ma dzad// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// drug pa nanaM cang ti'u dang // zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan// g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed
361a5(rgyud): de zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing // rmongs shing rab tu myos par mdzad// rdo rje phag mo de mdog na// skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste// thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ca
361a6(rgyud): dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// mgul bas 'khyud cing myos pa ste/ de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams// gri gug cang ti'u mchog
361a7(rgyud): kyang 'dzin// drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo// 'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' gro ni// mkhas pas re'u mig dbusu dgod// shar du sangs rgyas mkha'agro ste// byang du las kyi mkha' gro yin// nub du
361a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i mkha' gro ste// lho ru rin chen mkha' gro yin// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang // ljang ku dang ni ser po'o// 'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyi bzhu/ 
361b1(rgyud): ljang ku ser po dmar po sngo// dkar po steng ltas dril bu dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud// g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs// dmar po ser dang ljang ku dang // dkar po yang ni da
361b2(rgyud): bzhi no// pad+ma dril bus snyoms 'jug cing // lha mo'i nu ma 'chir ba'o// ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar// ljang gu dkar po'i kha dog ste// rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug/ g.yas brgya
361b3(rgyud): ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// de dag mkha' go lnga yin te// sdom pa lnga yang de nyid do// me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru// sangs rgyas mkha' gro las mkha' gro// pad+ma'i
361b4(rgyud): mkha' gro rin chen mkha'// zhal gsum pa nya phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rgyan rnams thad yongasu rdzogs// phyag
361b5(rgyud): rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can// mgo yi phreng bas rnam par rgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mda' la sogs pas rgyan// zhags
361b6(rgyud): ba lcags kyu phyag na mdzes// 'dod pa thad stsol mdzad cing // thugs rje'i ri ni yang dag rdzogs// thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos// cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can// dgyes pa
361b7(rgyud): stsol bas bde ba ste// de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis// dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs khyab// du ma'i gzugs dang gzugs sdug ma// rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma// rta gdong dang ni drag po'i
361b8(rgyud): gdong nga rdo rje drag pa snyan grags ma// rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sen// rdo rje gzhon nu me de bzhin// kaM po tsi yang de bzhin te// rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni// rdo rje ma mo 'ang de bzhin te// dri can ma dang 'dzag
362a1(rgyud): byed zhal// zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te/ khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs// rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te// rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni// sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byed ma// na la
362a2(rgyud): ki dang ser skya ma// rdo rje 'bar ma thal sbyor mo// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid de// dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mkha'agro ma// mkha 'gro ma ni de dag kun// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// gsus
362a3(rgyud): pa 'chang la skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// phyogs kyi gas can gang mchog ste// mgo bo'i phreng bas
362a4(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// thaMd ro yi gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // gas pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rdo rje mchog
362a5(rgyud): ni gser byed cing // dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog zhal ga sum dpa'i zhing skrag pa ste// thugs rje'i nyams ni yongasu rjon/ spyan ni zur gyis gzigs mdzad cing // dgyes pa'i
362a6(rgyud): stsol bas g.yo ba ste// dngos grub zad stsol mdzad cing // sgrub pa po kun rje su chags// zla ba drug gis sgrub pa po// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub// yid gnyis med par dngos grub mam
362a7(rgyud): mkha' gro thod par bya ba pa yin// dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang // mkha' la spyod par the tshom med// nang gi pho brang de nyid ni// re'u mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas// lho ru lha mo bzhi bkod la
362a8(rgyud): mkha' gri ma ni dngos grub ste// phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri// snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni// lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing // mkha' gro ma sogs mtshams rnamasu// zung bzhi pa la
362b1(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag/ sgo rnams ni lha mo bzhi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// zung bzhi chen thang dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtsha
362b2(rgyud): rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de yi nang du re'u mig dag/ sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste// 'di ltar mkha gro mkha' 'gro ma/ dra ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste// byang
362b3(rgyud): chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin// dbu su sa ni bcu gsum ste// phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod// 'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par// sdom pa
362b4(rgyud): mchog ni bsgom par bya// da ni thugs kyi ye shes te// ye/ shes mkha' gro mkha' gro ma'o// phung po khams dang skye mched la/ cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya// ye shes mchog gi
362b5(rgyud): sdom pa ste// gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod// phyad dang phyed rnam par dgod// mkha' gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbu sa// dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che// ye shes
362b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bkug nas ni// zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par ba// ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas// gtso bo dag ni rnam par sgom// bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyis// dam tshig mchog ni
362b7(rgyud): dri sa med// kha spu khung bu thaMd las// dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas// sems can ma lus dam tshig gi// mkha' go ru ni rab gnas bya// 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang // gsang ba gsum
362b8(rgyud): du gzhug par bya// sngon grub pa yi mkha' gro ni/ byin rlabs gan su dgod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje theg cha te// mkha' gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhags// sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa yis// bla na
363a1(rgyud): med pa'i go 'phang ster// dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par// skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom// lug su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// 'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro// ba spu'i khung bu las
363a2(rgyud): mdun du// pad mchog spros nas mchod par bya// rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas// 'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par sgom// ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu// sprin gyi 'brag sgra lta bur bzla// 'gro zhing 'ong ba
363a3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs tshe// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te// g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang // 'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang / 
363a4(rgyud): nad med pa ni nad yod byed// nad yod pa ni nad med byed// de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni// las 'dir the tshom med pa yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// bsgoms dang bzlas la
363a5(rgyud): dga' ba dang // dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni// thogs pa me/ da par tshe yang bstan// 'di ltar ngang gi cho gas bzlas// sangs rgyas gnasu legs par 'jug/ der ni dam tshig
363a6(rgyud): 'khor lo ni// mkhas pas sgom mchod bzlas pa bya// gseng sngags 'di dag bshad par bya// oM shrI badz+ra DA ki ni AHhUM hUM DA ki ni dz+wa la shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA kI nI A
363a7(rgyud): b+h+rUM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI kar+m+ma DA ki a khaM hUM DA ki ni dz+wa la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ka a hrI hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI rat+na DA a
363a8(rgyud): hU~M DA ki nI dzA la she ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ mkha' gro bzhi po de dag dang // mkha'agro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste// byin pa gnyis
363b1(rgyud): kyis legs par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhabs// phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par sgom// lha mo mngon du byas nas ni// snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin// oM shrI badz+ra bA rA hi
363b2(rgyud): baM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shri TI kI nI TAM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI lA ma lAM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI khaN+Da ro he khaM huM hUM sa swA hA/ oM shrI rU pi Ni rU hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o// 
363b3(rgyud): mtshams kyi mkha'agro ma'i sngags ni// oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI karmA DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI rat+na DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 
363b4(rgyud): sgo ru mkha'agro ma yi sngags// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thaMd ste ra// bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te// ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab// oM hUM ba hUM rU pa huM hUM phaT/ oM su ru ba hUM
363b5(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dun+ti huM hUM phaT/ oM prA b+hA ka ri huM hUM phaT/ shar phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po dged pa ste/ sku lus dkar ba'i mdog can la// de yi gsang snga
363b6(rgyud): bshad pa yin// oM badz+ra pA DA ba mu khi huM hUM phaT/ oM g+ho ra mu khi huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra g+ho Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM ya sha swa ni hu~M hUM phaT/ lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya// 
363b7(rgyud): sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste// de yi sngagasu bshad pa yin// oM badz+ra dU ti huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra na khi huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kau ma rI huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kA buts+tshi huM hUM phaT/ nub phyogs kyi ni snam
363b8(rgyud): bu la// lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yi no// oM badz+ra bai tA la huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sa yi ki huM hUM phaT/ oM gan+d+ha ri huM hUM phaT/ oM bi ma ba da ni huM hUM phaT/ byang gi snam bu la lba/ 
364a1(rgyud): mo bzhi sku mdog ljang gu de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ oM tsat+na shaM kha re huM hUM phaT/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ti huM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa rU pa hu hUM phaT// / oM badz+ra kan+d+ha ni huM hUM phaH
364a2(rgyud): dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te// de'i sngags bshad pa// oM shrI badz+ra khA li huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI ya
364a3(rgyud): shaHka ri huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI nA lA ra ka huM hUM phaT/ sgo rnamasu ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs ldan pa ste// de'i sngagasu bshad pa/ shar du oM shrI badz+ra
364a4(rgyud): baM ga le dzaHdzaHhUM hUM phaT/ lho ru e shrI badz+ra dz+wA li mi hUM hu hU phaT nub du oM shrI badz+ra kut+tA li paM baM huM hUM phaT/ byang du oM shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bi ho hUM hUM phaT/ thad gsal byed mtha' ru ni/ 
364a5(rgyud): ni sbyar zhing mchog rims bzhin// sngags pas de ltar bzla/ sa na ni// mkha' gre mini dra ba yi// sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste/ zla ba drug gi bde dbang 'gyur// gcig tu byas te
364a6(rgyud): bsdus na ni// rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can// dra ba'i mchog ni/ 'grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ni// khri 'am bdun du bzlas na ni// gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub pa
364a7(rgyud): snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis// dpa' bo mkha' gro ma grub cing // rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur// gzhan gyi lusu zhugs 'gro zhing // mi snang ba dag thob nas ni// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod
364a8(rgyud): smob gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig gi sdom pa las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
364b1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas mkha' gro'i cho ga'i rim// sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha'agro yi// lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya// rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa// sangs rgyas mu steg
364b2(rgyud): can yin te// rtag tu lung ni spang mi ba// dkoka gsum ni mi spang zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabasu 'gro/ shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na// rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub
364b3(rgyud): 'gab/ gcig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis lus ni rnam par bsam// sngo zhing dag la gzhin rnam bsgyur// gtum zhing 'jigs pa 'jigs par mdzad// zhal gyis mche ba rnam pa
364b4(rgyud): gtsigs/ ral bzla phyed spyi gtsug 'ching // sna tshogs rje sa ral pa gnom/ bod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rkyen/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs/ ba hUM badz+ra las byung sa
364b5(rgyud): lus can// phyag rgya dag dang yang dag ldan// stag gi lpags pa gos banabs// skyil krung byed pa legs par gnas// spya na gsum drag po'i sku lus can// mgrin pa bzhi
364b6(rgyud): la zhal bzhi pa// bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan// stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog/ gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng // dus mtha' las byung ngo shal can// gdug pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon
364b7(rgyud): nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang // sred pa gti mug phrag dog ste/ dus mtshan ngo ni khas phub la// gdug pa'i bgegs ni 'jigs pa cam/ dzad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon// namakha' dang ni skya ba dang / 
364b8(rgyud): dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang // ljang ku stang du bltas pa'i zhal// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo dag dang bde bas 'khyud// kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis// chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu/ 
365a1(rgyud): sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes pa ba// dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// chos kyi 'khor lo khar sil dang // lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang
365a2(rgyud): lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis// na ra'i lcags pa brkyang nas bsnams// shar du mA tang gi dang DoM bi ka/ dza ra ki dang pu ka si// kha Ta ki dang shaM ba ri// d+hi ba ri dang
365a3(rgyud): sa ma ri/ lha mo brgyad po de dag ni// ji bzhin rim pas rjesu dgod// ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar// dud pa yi ni mdog can to// dmar dang ljang dang dud ka'i mdog/ brgyad pa dkar po nyid yi no// sgo rnams
365a4(rgyud): su ni dgod bya ba// khrag 'thung rdo rje gtu mo dang // rdo rje sring mchog ma dang ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mi ste// gdul dka' zad gsol mdza da tsang // thal ba sprin mdog ljang ku dang // dmar dang sngo
365a5(rgyud): dang lhag par 'jigs// brgyad pa'i dbus chos khar sil/ thod pa cang te'u gro gug ste// phrag pa'i steng du go 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams ni lha mo bzhi// thod pa kha T+wAM mi 'jigs
365a6(rgyud): pa// chos kyi khar sil cang te'u// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// yi dwags gdan gyi steng du ni// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum// phyim
365a7(rgyud): mi len dang cog pu pa// gzhi ci bzhin dang stan cig pa// bla gab med dang shing drung pa// dgon pa pa dang dur khrod pa// khrod pa dang ni phying ba'o// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// sbyangs pa'i yon tanan
365a8(rgyud): dag sgom// ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog/ ro gcig du ni rnam par sgom// oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra he he ru ru kaM A huM hUM phaT/ oM maM ma taM gi huM hUM phaT/ oM DaM badz+ra DoM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM
365b1(rgyud): raM rA dza ki huM hUM phaT/ oM puM puk+ka si huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM ba ta ki huM hUM phaT/ oM she sha ba ri huM hUM phaT/ oM dzaM dzi ba ri huM hUM phaT/ oM saM sa ma ri huM hUM phaT/ oM hai he ru ki huM hUM phaT/ oM baM badz+ra tsaSh+T+rI hu~MhUM
365b2(rgyud): phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra rASh+Ti si hu hUM phaT/ oM b+ha~M badz+ra b+hai ra bI huM hUM phaT/ de kun gcer bu skra grol ba// spyan gsum pa la zhi ba ste// mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing // phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus rgyan// zod
365b3(rgyud): phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang // sgeg pa dang ni rngam pa dang // drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te// bzlas dang sgom pa spro zhing bsdu// lus ngag yid la bde bar gnas// sen mos pa sna
365b4(rgyud): tshogs pa// gdul ba'i thabs kyi bde ba yis// yul la yongs/ spyod pa na// bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob// sems can thams cad 'di yis bde// 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyi
365b5(rgyud): ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi// mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'o le'u
365b6(rgyud): ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni// pad+ma mdab ma brgyad mchog gi/ lte ba ge sar bcas pa la// de yi dbus rdo rje che// ma
365b7(rgyud): ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can// phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs// rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing // bsdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang // zong
365b8(rgyud): pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing // dpa' bo'i lpags pa bsnams shing 'dzin// cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ chu lha 'jigs pa/ 
366a1(rgyud): myos pa gnon// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par rgyun// phyag rgya dag gis sku la rgyan// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// stag gi lpags pa gos banabs
366a2(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba cod pan mchog/ mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sbyar zhing // khro bar lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs// mdab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri// mtha' yas dang na nor rgyas dang // 'jog po pad+ma
366a3(rgyud): pad+ma che// dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / ser dang dung pa'i mdog can te/ ljang ku dang ni ser po ste/ thal mo sbyar bar byas na ste/ bac+doMs la mngon
366a4(rgyud): phyogs pa// 'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed// skrag pas lha zhing gnas pa'o// bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can// 'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad// g.yas pa dud
366a5(rgyud): dmar po ste// g.yon pa ljang ku dud kha'o// steng gi zhal na ma/ 'a lding gdong // zhal rnams bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa'o// nyi ma dam ra po'i gzi brjid can/ nyi ma bcus nyi mnyam 'a/ 
366a6(rgyud): phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing // byin pa gnyis kyis leg sa bar 'khril// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa// gi gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // 
366a7(rgyud): dril bu yang dag ldan// lha mo'i mchu ni rnam par 'chir// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // spyan gsum pa la sku rags can// 'dzum+bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku// gnyisu med par sbyor bar gnas/ klu ni
366a8(rgyud): rang gi chung mar bcas// chu lha 'ang chung mar bcas pa dang // chu lci'i lus ni dkar po can// bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed// snying kar oM shes 'khor lo dag/ de mdog phyag dang zhal yang spyod
366b1(rgyud): de yi snying ka ts+tshan hUM dgod cing // lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te// klu yi rang snying de nyid la// hUM nA hUM ni rnam par dgod// gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni// khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya// chu bo
366b2(rgyud): 'gram 'am rgya mtsho 'am// khron pa 'am klu yi mtsho dang ni// rdzing bu lteng ka rnamasu ni// blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya// yang na klu yi gnasu ni// sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ki hUM nA nA/ 
366b3(rgyud): ga bar ShA pa ya hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA// 'di dag bsgom te khwa tsam bzla/ dus bzhi dag tu stong du'o// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur// dam/ 
366b4(rgyud): tshig sbyin sreg mchod dusu// glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas// 'o/ ma dag ni bza' zhing btung // rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla// 'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis// 'o mas sbyin sreg bsregs
366b5(rgyud): blugs bya// 'o ma'i shing gi bud shing bya// 'o ma'i shing gi ya ma shing dang // 'o mar bcas pas sbyin bsreg bya// bum pa 'o mas yongasu dgang // me sogs mtshams dang phyogs
366b6(rgyud): rnams// 'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ oM e a nan+ta ya hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM ba bA su ke hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM ta/ k+Sha ka hUM nA hUM swA hA/ oM paM pad+ma d+hu nAM hU swA hA/ oM maM ma hA pad+ma hUM nA~M swA hA/ oM
366b7(rgyud): shaM kha pA la hA nA hUM swA hA/ oM ke ka ko Ta hU nAM hUM swA hA/ oM aM oM nan ti tep+te hUM nA swA hA/ oM hUM ba~M ba ru~M Ne ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye nA gau baR+ShA pa ya hUM nA hU~M swA hA/ 'di bzlas khro bo dang bcas pas// kun gyi
366b8(rgyud): bzlas pa khri tsam bya// 'o ma 'bras snying zasu bza'o// dbang po thul cing yod mi smre// bre gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du// khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur// mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing
367a1(rgyud): smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te// 'di la the tshom ma byed cing // dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni// yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la// de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du// yongasu bzlas te// sa
367a2(rgyud): rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te// chu 'gram gyis sprul pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te// mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur// te// de nas chu ba'i
367a3(rgyud): nang du gzhug/ de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing // 'dzam+bu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur// sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing // nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed// sen thad bede reg nas// 
367a4(rgyud): phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni// bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// gang gi snying kha kho nar ni// he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yi/ char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur// r-i'i steng du 'dzegs
367a5(rgyud): te rtse gsum pa la yongasu bzlas na ser ba gcod par la/ gyuraro// cang te'u la yongasu bzlas nim mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyuraro//  du tha ma skye 'a ma
367a6(rgyud): // dgra sta la yongasu bzlas na gsod par byed// kha T+wAM ga le yongasu bzlas na zhi bar byed// gau gug la yongasu bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu bar gsod par byed// mgo bo la yongasu bzlas
367a7(rgyud): na 'chi ba slong bar byed// rdo rje gsor zhing yongasu bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub du 'gyuraro// dril bu la yongasu bzlas na mi dga' ba yongasu 'gugs par byed// glang po che'i lpags pa la yongasu
367a8(rgyud): bzlas te bting na por snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te// dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldogo// phyag rgya dag la yongasu bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyu ro// sa ste du ni kun
367b1(rgyud): spyod cing // ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba
367b2(rgyud): mchog ni mdor bsdus nas// skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa// he ru ka dpal gzugs bya// sngo zhing drag po rnam sbyar ba// drag po spyan gsum zhal drug mchog zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin// sno/ 
367b3(rgyud): rdo rje dbu mchog la// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sku la mgo bo'i do shal can// phyag rgya dag gis rnam par rgyan// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// phag ma
367b4(rgyud): yis ni sku la rgyan// zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste/ g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog/ g.yon pa dmar la ljang ku'o// stang gi zhal ni rtag gdong ste// dkar zhing sprin mdog dag
367b5(rgyud): cing 'jigs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni 'chir ba ste// rgyal ba'i lpags pa gosu banabs// mkha' ga/ ma yi rigs 'dzin cing // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ 
367b6(rgyud): rdo rje mtshan gyis rgyan pa ste// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin// gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te// phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad// dkyil 'khor
367b7(rgyud): dag ni thad kyang // zhabs gcig du ni rnam par sgom// glang po'i gdong dang byi'u'i gdong // seng+ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te// dang po khyi yi gdong yin te// gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin// gsu
367b8(rgyud): pa phag gidong yin te// bzhi pa khri yi gdong ca no// gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid// sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin// mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste// zad mkhyen cing tham/ 
368a1(rgyud): cad pa// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang // de bzhin sgom zhing rnam sgom ste// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol// mngon par brjod pa'i
368a2(rgyud): rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub pa ste// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag
368a3(rgyud): nyid sgom zhing rnam par sgom// sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi// sku lus sin dur 'dra mi g.yo// me tog ban tu ka lta bu// zhal gsum pa la phyag dag pa// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs
368a4(rgyud): sode'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// khong pa'i phreng ba'i da rgyan can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ dbu skra mdzes pas 'a khri la 'i ste/ thabs kyi zhal mamun ma 'chir zhing / 
368a5(rgyud): mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste// rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste// pad+ma dmar po'i dbus bzhugs shing / 
368a6(rgyud): 'dod pa thad rab tu stsol// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// zha la drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung // sdang gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong // drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi/ shar gyi mdab la rdo
368a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon pa'i phyogs rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ nub kyi phyogasu rdo rje gzi brjid mchog/ lho yi phyogasu rdo rje rin chen mchog/ me yi phyogasu rdo rje ye shes mchog/ bden bral phyogasu
368a8(rgyud): rje rig mchog ma// rlung gi phyogasu rdo rje grub mchog ma// dbang ldan phyog su rdo rje bal mchog ma// sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog mo// rdo rje gzi brjid mchog me ste// rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang / rdo rje ma
368b1(rgyud): ba mchog ma'o// lha mo de dag thams cad kyang // dmar ba'i mchog can zhal gsum pa// phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste// zad rgyan/ 
368b2(rgyud): gyis rnam rgyan cing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rang gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril// zhags pa dang na lcags kyu dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// grwa bzhi dag du mda' gzhu dag yongasu 'gengs
368b3(rgyud): ba gnas par bzhag/ sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje sor zhing bsdigs mdzub dang // zhags pa dang / 
368b4(rgyud): ni yang dag ldan// gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang // ltar 'khor lo sogs phyag 'tshal// de snying ye shes lha mo ni// sku gsung thugs dang bcas pa sgom// ye shes
368b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// chos kyi r-i ni mnyam par thi ma// ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni// cho gi'i rim pas yang da// ga bsdu// dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis// zla
368b6(rgyud): ba'i de nyid 'gru par 'gyur// oM shrI badz+ra bA rA hi A baM huM hUM phaT swA hA// oM shrI badz+ra gu h+ya ut+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra sa ma ya ut+ta ma huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra te dzot+ta me huM hUM
368b7(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+rA rat+nat+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra dz+nyAnat+ta me hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra bi d+ya oMt+ti me hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra sid+d+hot+ta me hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra b+has+phot+te moM hU~M
368b8(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra dz+wa lot+ta ma dzaHhuM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra a mr-i tot+ta me hu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shri badz+ra kr-i d+hoSh+Tha me be huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra daMSh+Tot+ta ma ho/ huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'ang
369a1(rgyud): dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// sgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya// bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni// chos rnams kun dang chos can ni// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag/ sems can thaMd rab tu brtag/ rnal
369a2(rgyud): 'byor gnas ni chos yin te// gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhag/ gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te// chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu// bdag med chos ni chos yin te// chos las chos ni yod ma yin/ 
369a3(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dag pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma dag cho
369a4(rgyud): ga'i rim// pad+ma mdab lnga bris nas ni// lte ba ge sar khad par mi/ de yi dbusu phag mo ni// dmar zhing smoT 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal gsu ma ba la phyag drug mdzes// spyan gsum dbu skra
369a5(rgyud): grol ba ste/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ phyogs kyis/ gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ skyil krung byed pa gar dang bcas/ phyag rgya drug gis sku can cing // mgo bo'i phreng
369a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa ste// gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang // dus mtshan khes sgrub byas pa la// zhabs kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs// dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba ste// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par rgyan// thod
369a7(rgyud): pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// mgo bo dong ni gri gug 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// snying kar ye shis dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugasu sbyor las byung
369a8(rgyud): shar phyogs lha mo ya mi ni// g.yon du bskor nas rnar dgod// rmongs byed ma dang skyod byed ma/ skag byed ma dang tsaN+Di ka/ spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sngo dang dka
369b1(rgyud): dang sar pa dang // ljang ku dud pa'i mdog can te// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgya ma/ phyogs kyi gos can gang/ 
369b2(rgyud): gyi mchog/ mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cid pon 'chang // thugs rje'i nyams kyi bde ba ste// gnyis med sbyor bas mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems sogs mchog de nyid/ 
369b3(rgyud): phag mo dang ni rdo rje sems// yang mi ni dang rnam snang mdzad// rmongs byed ma dang pad+ma'i gar// spyod ma dang khrag 'thung ste// skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang // tsaN+Dika dang rta mchog ste// rdo rje sems sku dka
369b4(rgyud): po ste/ rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin/ pad+ma gar dbang dmar po ste// he ru ka dpal sngon po yin// rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste// rta ma cho ga dag ni ljang ku'o// yang na so sor bsgom par
369b5(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa// phyag dag spyan ni gsu ma pa ste// phyag rgya dag gi mtshan gyis rgyan// rdo rje dril bu thod kha nAM/ ral gi cang te'u mgo bo 'chang // na ra'i lpags
369b6(rgyud): brnabs gar dang bcas// rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM dang // cang te'u dril bus mtshan pa'i mchog/ yang na thaMd phyag bcus// zhal gang
369b7(rgyud): drug par bsgom par bya// de dag gsang sngags 'di yin te// oM shrI oM baM baM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI h+na yo huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hriM mo maM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hreM hri sa huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM
369b8(rgyud): hUM hUM saM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI phaT phaT tse hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de dag no rnal 'bor ma dag gi gsang sngagaso// oM haHbaM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM na ma he hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM swA hA hu~M hri huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 
370a1(rgyud): oM bau Sha Ta he he hri hUM phaT swA hA// oM hUM hAM ho tre hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT haM hi hAM hUM hUM phaT swA hA// 'di ni dpa' bo dag gi sngags// bzlas pa dang ni bsgom tsam gyis// 'khor lo
370a2(rgyud): drug ni mchog grub cing // 'khor lo sgyur ba thob pa ste// 'khor los bsgyur drug rgyal por 'gyur// ma 'pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs// stobs chen rtsal mchog rnyed pa yin// phyag mtshan drug/ 
370a3(rgyud): la rtag mchod cing // cho ga bzhin du mngon sngags ni// de ni myur du grub nas ni// rnal 'byor rgyal po mchog kyang thob// mi snang la sogs grub nas ni// khams gsum dag tu rnam par dpyod// 'gro ba
370a4(rgyud): drug gi sems can grol// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs yang na 'khor lo zur drug la// bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad// rngam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba/ 
370a5(rgyud): bdag po ni// gur gum gyi ni mdog lta bu// gzi mdangs la// bar ba'i 'od can te// phyag rgya chen dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi dbangs kyi rang ngo bo// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i
370a6(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'ukhyud// ral gri po ti kha nA ga/ thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa dang // ut+pa la dang cang te'u// gur gum mdog dang sngo ba dang // dmar dang ljang ku steng
370a7(rgyud): zhal dkar// chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa che// sems can khams ni rab gol byed// shar sogs g.yon bskor dgod pa ni// rta mchog ci ba'i ka dang bcas// de dag de ru dgod byas pas// 
370a8(rgyud): 'jam pa'i rdo rje rang nyid grub// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo dang dmar dang dkar sngo ljang // yan lag dag tu dpa' bo dag/ mkha'agro ma dang lhan cig bcas// rdo rje sems dang phag
370b1(rgyud): mo dang / rnam snang mdzad dang yi mi ni// pad+ma gar dbang rmongs byed bcas// khrag 'thung dang ni skyong byed ma// rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma// ljang dang dad pa'i mdog can te// de lta'i sku mdog rnam par sgom// 
370b2(rgyud): zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o// thod pa dang ni gro gug 'dzin// dpa' bo thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ rang gi phyag mtshan gnyis med sbyor// dril bu lhan cig yang
370b3(rgyud): ngag ldan/ cang te'u ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhug/ stag gi pagos pa'i sham thabs can// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mgo bo'i do shal 'dzin pa ste// thaMd yaM
370b4(rgyud): dwags steng du bzhugs// dbusu 'jigs byed dus mtshan dag/ lha mo byon pa gnyis kyis 'khril// skra grol ba la phyogs gos tsan// snying kar ye shes dam tshig ni// sku gsung thug
370b5(rgyud): dang rnam par sbyar/ go cha gnyis pa yang dag sbyar// gnas kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' gro ma rnams dgod gsang ba gsum ni snying kar gnas// khwa gdong la
370b6(rgyud): sogs mkha' go ma// phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod// zur du gshin rje sngags la sogs// thams cad gcer bu rnam par sgom// sngar bshad mdog dang phyag mtshan te// yi dwags gdan la yang
370b7(rgyud): dag bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas// drag po skra ni grol ba ste// thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba can// rang gi phyi dang nang du yang // pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag/ sgom zhing rab tu
370b8(rgyud): bsgom par bya// spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas pa bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs spros nas
371a1(rgyud): / 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par bya// nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'khor lo gsum gsang bsgom nas bzlas// de nyid gsum dang sngags lhan cig/ dpa' bo dang ni mkha' gro
371a2(rgyud): ma hUM hu phaT ni mtha' ru ste// 'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya/ rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya/ oM shrI many+dzu badz+ra AHhUM ma huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ha badz+rA satwa tsu
371a3(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ oM baM badz+ra bA rA hi huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM na maHhi badz+ra bai ro tsan huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM haM yoM ya ma ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM swA hA hU~M pad+ma nan+te shwa ru hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hrI mo mo ha ni huM hUM
371a4(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ oM bau Sha Ta he ha ru ka hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hriMs ny+tsa la ni hu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM ho badz+ra sur+ya huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM saM tA sa na huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM phaT ha pa ra NA
371a5(rgyud): shwa huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM kA/ kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+yai huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ya hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi ye hu~M hUM
371a6(rgyud): phaT/ oM ya ma du tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma doSh+NI NA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi lag gnyisu// go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni// gang zhig ji ltar 'dod
371a7(rgyud): pa rus las rnams zad byed pa yin// the tsom med par las byas na// nges par dngos grub gzhan du min// yang na mgon po sa bcu'i dbang // pha rol phyin pa ban la gnas// sbyin dang tshul khrims
371a8(rgyud): bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab drug pa ste// thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang // ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyad
371b1(rgyud): dka' ba dang mngon du 'gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// 'di yis rnam par dag pa sgom// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// 'phags pa'i bden par rnam par
371b2(rgyud): sgom// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang // 'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te// bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpal// chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam dag ste// ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin// 'di ltar rnam par
371b3(rgyud): dag pa sgom/ gnyisu med par sbyor ba'i lam// gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog sgrib pas rjesu bstan pa dang // ji bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang // bla ma'i

371b5(rgyud): rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster// mngon par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma 'o bla ma las gnyi su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i sgom le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas gzha/ 
371b6(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// brda' ni mchog du gsang ba ste// brda' ni yongs mi shes par sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste// 'odi ni nges par shes pa na// dngos grub 'grub par the tshom med// dra zhes bya
371b7(rgyud): kha skyes bur bshad// di zhes bya ba bud med yin// pu zhes bya ba gnon pa yin// su zhes bya ba za ba nyid// ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad// ya zhes bya ba chung mi nyid// b+hi zhes bya ba sring mo yin// b+hi zhes
371b8(rgyud): bya ba mdza' mor bshadad+halu zhes bya ba bu mo yin// sri zhes bya ba khrag du bshad// so mi ni bi'i btung ba yin// pi zhes bya ba thug pa ste/ pi zhes bya ba de bzhin bshad// ba zhes bya ba za ba yin/ 
372a1(rgyud): b+hu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin// pi zhes bya ba dur khrod yin// du zhes bya ba ro yi no// TI zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma// gA zhes bya ba lA ma yin// tri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma// ku zhes bya ba
372a2(rgyud): mkha' gro ma// ha ni khaN+Da ri nyid ma// dza zhes bya ba byin pa nyis// ba zhes bya ba gsong bor smra// swa zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin// mi zhes bya ba nya yin la// byo zhes bya ba bza' ba min// byo zhes bya ba
372a3(rgyud): btung ba min// ga ni bgrod dang bgod min yin// ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin// sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro/ ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo// du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo// su zhes bya ba skal bzang mo// na zhes pa
372a4(rgyud): ba skal ngan ma// sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can// a zhes bya ba dam tshig can// A zhes bya ba dam tshig med// I zhes bya ba'o/ sa pa yin// na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin// so zhes bya
372a5(rgyud): ba chags pa yin// 'di dag yi ge'i brda' yin te// dbang bsku ra dus rnal 'byor pas// bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya// dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te// dam tshig mchog ni shri
372a6(rgyud): pa dang / dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus// dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang // dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya// ma dad pa la sbyin mo bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las brda'i le'u ste suM
372a7(rgyud): cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob// bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing
372a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i mdab ltar dkyus ring mig/ rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'// tsan dan sar pa'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// de rigs las byung shes par bya// bud gang ba
372b1(rgyud): ma'i gser 'dra zhing // dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'// dza ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan// de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur// thad ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs// dri dang gos ni sngo la dga'// ut+pal
372b2(rgyud): sngon po'i dri yod pa// de ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro// bud med par dkar 'dra mdog gang // rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba dri// de yang de bzhin dpa' mo'i blo// dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang // gzugs bzang
372b3(rgyud): gos ni dmar ba dang // ma la ki dang ut+pa la dri// de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin// ser zhing ldang ba'i bud med gang // gos ni dkar la dga' ba dang // mgo la me tog dri dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs

372b7(rgyud): dang / g.yon nas lta bas rnam par blta// lha mo rnams dang gar smra ba// da ni dam tshig ldan par bshad// bud med gang byas de nyan cing // rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra// rigs kyi bya ba mi rmongs
372b8(rgyud): ste/ rang gi bstan bshad mi 'dor la// rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad// phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba// g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud// lha mo rnam
373a1(rgyud): dang kun smra ba// de ni nges par bde bar 'gro// mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni// rkang pas ri mo 'di byed cing // mgo ni dbyug par byed pa dang / zur gyis lta zhing lag bston/ sgrub
373a2(rgyud): pa po la khyad par du// de yos rang rig dran pa dang // 'khur ba 'am ko ko dag dang na// sna dag du ni thal mo ston// zur gyis lta zhing lan cig bsngags// zlos shing rigs la rnam par lta// bden par
373a3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i rnal 'bor ma// nges par dam tshig can yin na// de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung // ya mi ni dang skag byed ma// 'dod
