400b2(rgyud): yi yi ge de bzhin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de blangs nas// slar yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+ma na ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni bzhi
400b3(rgyud): ba dang / nyi mas slar yang gdab par bya// yi ge nyi shu btab nas ni// bcu drug pa yis stan du byas// 'og tu me yi gzi brjid can// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa
400b4(rgyud): yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yis dge// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang // nyi ma'i bu yis rnam par
400b5(rgyud): dbye// uSh+ma na yi bzhi po dang // dang po yi ni gsum ba la// gzi brjid kyis ni gdan du byas// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // bco lnga pa yis gdan gnyis bya// uSh+ma na yi ga
400b6(rgyud): bo nyid lnga pa yi ni thog ma la// bcu drug pa yi gdan du byas// nyi shu rtsa gcig de yis blangs// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma dang / mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum
400b7(rgyud): pa dang / bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang // dang po yi na gsum pa dang // uSh+mA na yi gsum pa nyid// nyi shu rtsa gcig de bzhin te// nyi ma yis ni
400b8(rgyud): mnyam par mnan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// gzi brjid kyis ni gsal bar byas// mthar gnas pa yi thog mar shes// der yang
401a1(rgyud): bcu drug pa yis gdab// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang // thog ma yi yang dang po dang // bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa dang
401a2(rgyud): theg ma yi yang dang po dang // gnyis pa yi yang dang po dang // de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o// bcu bzhi uSh+ma bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas// ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang // nyi ma yi ni
401a3(rgyud): gzi brjid can// gsum pa yi yang gsum pa dang // bco lnga pa yis gdan du byas// gnyis pa yis yang gsum pa dang // gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang // ka sha'i yi ge sa bon te// nyi shu
401a4(rgyud): lnga pa gdan du byas// slar yang bsdu bar bya ba ste/ sku ni legs pa btub ste// dbang chen gyis ni gdon du byas/ uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // ya rga
401a5(rgyud): brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin sum cu gsum pa nyid// sum cu rtsa gsum de bzhin te// lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun bsdu ba'o// de nas kyang ni btub bya// gnyis pa yang ni de
401a6(rgyud): bzhin te// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // uSh+ma na yi gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // 
401a7(rgyud): lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang // gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha/ ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Shi b+ha ya/ hrauM hrauM/ hraH
401a8(rgyud): bai pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rAdrA mA la ba la wi ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga ta/ b+hu dza ga se be bA tardza ya tardza ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kan+d+ha/ hA hUM/ 
401b1(rgyud): dz+haiMdz+haiM/ k+ShuM ts+tsha/ hAM hUM/ hrIM hrI/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ huM hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags te// bya ba zad sgrub byed pa'o// 'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa/ 
401b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum na yod min to// dang ldan khrag 'thung sngags shes na// gzhan dag snying po med rtswar mtshungs// rtsa ba'i sngagasu bshad pa yin// mngon par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las
401b3(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis// snying po'i yi ge bdun nye snying po// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa
401b4(rgyud): bon dang // de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis// yi ge bar ma dor byas pa// yan lag dag ni he ru ka/ dpo' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba// re'u mig dag tu sgom pa ste// he ru ka yi bdag por
401b5(rgyud): 'gyur// yi ge gcig tu yang dag gnas// ma na ma swA hA ga~M Sha Ta hUM hU brda dang yang dag ldan// sgrub pos snying po bshes par bya// dang po snying ka nyi da ste/ gnyis pa spyi bor
401b6(rgyud): par ba// gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar// bzhi pago char gyur pa yin// lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste// dag pa mtshon cha zhes bye ra 'dod// de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid// yi ge gnyis
401b7(rgyud): pa dag dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcig yang dag sbyar// yi ge dag pa brgyan par bya// dbangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni// yi gau bdun pa nyid kyang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcug pa nyid ni// mkhas pa
401b8(rgyud): yi ge brgyad par sbyar// dbyangs yog gnyis pa dang sbyar ba'o// yi ge dgu pa brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid// yi ge banus pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa
402a1(rgyud): / niHyi ge nyi shu gcig pa gzung // mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dbangs yig bco lnga
402a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan// yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes pa// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i// yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod// dbangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni// yi ge bco brgyad pa ru sbyar// dbangs yig
402a3(rgyud): gi ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar// phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbyar// yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar// phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbyar// yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar// dbangs yig
402a4(rgyud): bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge nyi shur lnga par sbyar// dad+ya ngas yig gnyis pa dang ldan par// yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug
402a5(rgyud): 'gyur// yi ge nyi shu brgyad dag ni// yi ge bco lnga ba dang sbyar// gsum pa'i dang por yang dag ldan// 'og gi tshon ma dang bcas// de bzhin dbangs yig gnyis par sbyar// yi
402a6(rgyud): ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig par// dbangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// yi ge sum cu gnyis pa yang // dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan par bya// yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ 
402a7(rgyud): nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya// phyi mo'i bzhi pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa'i// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yi no// phyi rol lnga pa nyid dag ni// sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan// 
402a8(rgyud): mkha' gro ma rnams sgrub byed yin// sum cu brgyad pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thaMd sgrub pa ni// 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// bin cu rtsa gnyis pa nying
402b1(rgyud): ni/ me dang 'og tu bsgrub par bya// bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar// yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyor// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid
402b2(rgyud): dag kyang // bzhi bcu rtsa drug por ldan pa// dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod cing // bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod// de bzhin
402b3(rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis// mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod// lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thams cad
402b4(rgyud): 'grub byed pa// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med// de ba zhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'ang // dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ yi ge rnams las 'di mchog ste// dag rnams nges par gsod
402b5(rgyud): byed yin// snga tshan bzhi las bya nyid// yi ge lnga/ bcu rtsa dag pa// dbyangs yig drug pa dag dang sbyar// an+tas+tha yi// bzhi pa dang // dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya// de
402b6(rgyud): bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur// yi ge drug cu rtsa gcig nya da// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// 'di nyid mchog
402b7(rgyud): ni yin par bshad// de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba ni// mkha' gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod// yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig dag
402b8(rgyud): dang ldan/ mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog yin// drug cu rtso bzhi pa nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bye ba dag/ dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan// grub sbyin thar pa chen po'o// yi ge drug du
403a1(rgyud): / rtsa lnga pa/ me la gnas par yang dag ldan// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba// dngos grub kun sbyin bde gshegs gsungs// yi ge drug cu cu drug pa// dbangs yig
403a2(rgyud): gsum pa dang sbyar ba/ bya ba kun las grub sbyin par// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// / yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa// yi ge gnyis pa yang dag ldan// rnal 'byor ma yi dgos pa kun/ 
403a3(rgyud): 'di nyid byed par the tshom med// drug cu brgyad pa nyid dag las// der ni yi ge ba sbyar ba// 'og gi char ni brtag par ba// yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa// yi ge gnyis par yang dag sbyar// yi ge kun
403a4(rgyud): la mdzes pa ni// 'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ sum cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba da ga// gdod nas grub pa yin par ni// de bzhin gshegs
403a5(rgyud): pa'i zhal nas gsungs// yi ge bdun cu lnga pa nyi da// ma mo'i drug pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog yin te// dge ba kun las dam pa yin// bdun cu rtsa drug pa
403a6(rgyud): nyid ni dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing // 'og tu me dang ldan pa las// gzhan dag mdzes pa yod ma yin// yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun pa// der na da dang sbyar bar bya// mkha' gi ma yi mdzes
403a7(rgyud): par 'dod// bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod// yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa// bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyad par dpe// gdod na/ 
403a8(rgyud): gab byed 'di yin te// dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o// yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa// de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar// phyi mo yi ni lnga pa la// de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad// 
403b1(rgyud): ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang // brgyad cu dgu pa de bzhin te// ma mo lnga pa blangs byas te// de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa// ma mo'i lnga pa blangs byas te// yi ge dgu bcu gcig par sbyor// ma mo yi ni gnyis
403b2(rgyud): pa dang // yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi// yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa// gdug pa thams cad skrag byed pa// ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu
403b3(rgyud): gsum pa// yi ge ginyis pa dag dang ldan// ma mo bcu gsum pa nyid ni// yi ge lnga pa dge dang sbyar// gdug pa thams cad 'khrig byed// mkha' go ma yi bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs yig bcu bi naM
403b4(rgyud): pa yis ni// yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyar// bco lnga pa yis rab tu sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni// yi ge dgu pa dag dang sbyar// stang du thig le yang dag gnas// yi ge dag ni sgrub pa
403b5(rgyud): ste dang mkha' gro ma yi khyad par yin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ steng du bi ni dus rnam par rgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu
403b6(rgyud): gcig pa// yi ge bcu gsuM pa dang sbyar// thog les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// 'byung po kun ni skrag byed cing // sgrub po bos ni dga' ba yin// dbyangs kyi yi gau lnga pa la// yi ge sum
403b7(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis sbyar// dbyings kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum cu gsum dang sbyar// me mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang // yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhir sbyaro// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag dang ni// 
403b8(rgyud): yi ge sum cu drug dang sbyar// dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag/ yi ge sum cu bdun dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba// ma mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni// yi ga
404a1(rgyud): bzhi bcu gcig dang sbyar// dbangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang ni// yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar/ 
404a2(rgyud): ma mo'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang // yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis po dag/ yi ge bzhi bcu dgu dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ phyi mo'i lnga ba nyid
404a3(rgyud): dang ni// yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa// thig les kyang ni rnam par rgyan// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa// thig las kyang ni rnam par rgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar
404a4(rgyud): yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa// thig les mgo la mnan par bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge drug cu drug cu sbyar// phyi mo gnyis pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge drug cu
404a5(rgyud): bdun dang sbyar// bdug pa'i dngos gru kun 'gru bcing // sgrub pa po la dbang yang stsal// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi ba dang // yi ge bdun nu pa dang sbyor// thig les kyang ni rnam par
404a6(rgyud): rgyan// phyi mo yi ni bzhi pa yis// yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar// bco lnga pa ni rab blangs te// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni// yi ge bdun cu bzhi par sbyar// phyi mo bcu bzhi dag pa ni// yi ge
404a7(rgyud): bdun cu gsum dang sbyar// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bdun cu bzhi dang sbyar// pi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun cu bzhi par sbyar// phyi mo bcu bzhi
404a8(rgyud): dag pa ni// yi ge bdun nu gsum dang sbyar// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ yi ge bdun nu bzhi dang sbyar// phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun nu bdun dang sbyar
404b1(rgyud): thig les kyang ni nar rgyan// phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun nu brgyad dang sbyar// thig le gnyis kyis rnam par rgyan// phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang // yi ge 'dun cu dgu dang sbyar// ma mo'i bzhi
404b2(rgyud): pa nyid dang ni// yi ge brgyad cu pa dang sbyar// thig les mgo la mnan par bya// dbangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni// yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar// thig le sgra yis bskyed pa ste// thig les kyang ni rnar
404b3(rgyud): rgyan/ dbangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag/ yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar// 'og dang stong gi yi ge gangs// dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste// 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngagasu// mkhas pa rnams kyi shes par
404b4(rgyud): bya/ dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing // mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa na// dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal/ bklags pas grub pa don yod pa// oM ni dang por sbar bar ba
404b5(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT ni mthar sbyar ba/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te// grub pa thams cad grub byed yin// de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi// dpa' bo thad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro ma
404b6(rgyud): ni dra ba yi/ 'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod/ oM shrI badz+ra he ru ru ke hU~M hUM phaT DA ki nA~M dz+wa la shaM ba ra swA hA/ hA sA ra ba sa la dzA nI ki DA Ta pa hA hUM ka ru ru he he badz+ra ba~M shrI oM/ rig pa'i
404b7(rgyud): rgyal po'i snying po ni/ ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur// rnga ba hUM hU~M ha ha hrI/ oM// yi ge ba dang yoM dang ni// yi ge mo dang rje nyid dang / hUM dang phaT ces bshad pa yin// oM ba badz+ra bA nA hi/ ha ya~M ya ma nA
404b8(rgyud): hri moM mo ha nI// hreM hraM saM tsa la nI/ hA hUM saM tA saM mi phaT phaT tsaN+Di ke/ rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bsgrags// re'u mig drug la rnam par sgom// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go tsha'i
405a1(rgyud): snying po sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ snying po bla mad bshad par bya// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ lha mo ga/ 
405a2(rgyud): snying po'i sbyor ba ni// bcu gsum pa ni bdag nyid dge/ pad+mo dbus phag mo ste// mdab ma la ni lha mo dgod// sgo bzhi dag gi phyogasu ni// lha mo'i snying po rnam par sgom// oM las byung ba'i rtsa
405a3(rgyud): gdong dang // rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra// drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang // mi 'phrog ma dang dri med ma// hUM mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo// sreg lugs ma dang phaT byed ma/ rang 'byung ma dang bcu gnyis
405a4(rgyud): te/ ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin// rje phag mo zhes bya ba// dngos grub thang stsol mdzad pa// sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang // ljang ku steng zhal dkar po ste// spyan gsum pa la
405a5(rgyud): bzhin rnam sbyar// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can// gsus pa rlo zhing skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos can 'dzin pa ste// rang
405a6(rgyud): gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas// 'jigs byed tsa muN+Di 'jigs mos// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang // rdo rje dril bu zhags
405a7(rgyud): pa dang // lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / dag sta dang ni bsdigs mdzub dang // na rA'i lpags pa steng du brkyang / sku rags deng ni dpung rgyan dang // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// sa
405a8(rgyud): rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thugs rje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste// mdab la lha mo thams cad dgod// ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste// ser dang dmar dang ldang ba dang // lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can
405b1(rgyud): te/ me phyogs dmar la dud kha ste// sngo ba dang ni dkar ba dang // dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// skyil krung phyed pas legs par
405b2(rgyud): bzhugs// thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnams bsgyur// zad yi dregs gdan la bzhugs// thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad
405b3(rgyud): cing zod pa rakas bkang ba dang // dril bu cang rde'u sgra yang sgrogs// lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin// sgo rnamasu ni sgo bsrungs te// dpa' bo'i steng du rnam par bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba
405b4(rgyud): yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la dbu skra brdzes// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spung pa ste// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje mgo bo phag na bsnam
405b5(rgyud): thams cad rnam sbyar gsus pa 'phyang // thad mgo bo'i phreng bas rgyan// sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste// ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog gnyis pa// gcer bu pad+ma'i rgya yang che/ 
405b6(rgyud): rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// tha~Md rang thabs gnyis pa ste// bcu gsum pa ni rnam par sgom// snying po mchog ni sgom pa yin// 'dod pa zad rab tu stsol// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
405b7(rgyud): bla mas go cha dang lha mo'i snying po sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dag pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni
405b8(rgyud): myur du dngos grub 'gab pa'o// sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong // tsan+dan gyis ni nye bar bsku// dri bzang di ldan sa la ni// me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing // spos kyi di yis nyams dgar
406a1(rgyud): / byad/ bdag gi bya ba kun bas shing // phyogs bcing ba ni byas nasu// de nas rdza rnga'i bcing byas te// ra mig bzhi bcu dag zlum la// yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par ba// der gnas
406a2(rgyud): ba las dpa' bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed btu// rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa// dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub poso// thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur la// re'u mig sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga
406a3(rgyud): ba yi ni khyad par bya// brgya phyed byed pa yang dag blang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye// re'u mgo sum cu drug pa blang // gsum pa yis ni khad par dab// de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa sI
406a4(rgyud): ni khyad par bya// de nas nyi shu lnga pa bzung / nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// sum cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang / 'u mig bco lnga pa yor ldan/ lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas// 
406a5(rgyud): nas nyi shu gnyis pa bzung // bcu gcig pa yang de bzhi no// mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod// re'u mig ni bcu dgu pa// ma yi bu dang yang dag ldan/ re'u mig gsum pa
406a6(rgyud): rnam par dbye// ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang // yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur// slar yang yi ge de dag nyid// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// de nas
406a7(rgyud): rang byung blangs nasu// re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa bzung // bcug pa yang de bzhi no// don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i// tshig na gnyis
406a8(rgyud): pa yin par bshad// re'u mig bcu dgu pa nyid la// nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan/ sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te// r-i'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu
406b1(rgyud): pa dang yang ldan ldan// mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni/ shin
406b2(rgyud): tu mnyam par gzhag ste btu// de nas go rims bzlog pas gzung // re'u mig las ni dang po nyid// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung
406b3(rgyud): bcu gcig pa yang de bzhino// chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi// tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad// re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // re'u mig sum cu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang // su
406b4(rgyud): cu gsum pa yang dag blang // re'u mig bcu pa/ sum pa yir ldan/ re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid// go rims bzlog pa sgrub pos blang // re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re'u mig nyi shu
406b5(rgyud): gsum pa la// gnyis pa dag ni yang dag lnga na/ steng du thig les brgyan par bya// de nas chu yi sa bon gzung // brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me yi bu yis khyad par dge// 
406b6(rgyud): yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam rgyan pa'o// oM ni sku la gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// rig rgyal 'khor
406b7(rgyud): lo sgyur ba'i sngags// 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bde mchog rdo rje 'jig byed// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru// dkyis
406b8(rgyud): 'khor snang ba'i don du ni// gdug pa kun la khyad par du// 'di na rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang // brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur// sha chen dag gis zad kun// rdo rje yang ni med par bshad// 
407a1(rgyud): rnal 'bor thun mong brjod pa ni// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o// oM suM b+ha ni saMm b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na
407a2(rgyud): ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thadu// 'jigs bde mi bzang bar ba shod // na mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog/ pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnar sgom// gdug pa thams cad
407a3(rgyud): nges par gnon// phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan// zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// thod pa'i phreng bas rnar rgyan// sangs lnga yi cod pan can// thad
407a4(rgyud): kun gyis rnar spyad// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phya ga rgya dag/ sku lus drug po thugs rje'i nyams// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon// u ma mchog gi
407a5(rgyud): ku tsa gnon// khros pa'i spyan gyis rnar gni/ sku la mgo yi do shal can// mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la bcings rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin
407a6(rgyud): te// lcags kyu bsdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste// dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas// thugs kar dpral ba phyag rgya ste// bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gi
407a7(rgyud): lcags kyu 'chang ba ste// mdung dang mgo bo tsang te'u dang // na ri'i lpags pa'i steng du ste// phyag ni bcu drug de bzhi no// stag gi lpags pa gos banabs// rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku// sde
407a8(rgyud): dang dkar dang ser ba dang // dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes// dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste// spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag
407b1(rgyud): ldan las rnams zang byed pa dge/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngo// bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni/ mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste/ sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / dud kangur smrig bsres pa ste// mche ba rnam par
407b2(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon// na ra'i rus pas sku rgyan cing // sna tshogs khro bo'i rigs kyang
407b3(rgyud): 'phro ba zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje bsdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste// rang gi rigs dang gnyis mda' khyud// khro bo'i lta ba gzigs mdzad cing // dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa'i
407b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'ching ba ste// 'jog rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis// khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste// tho ba
407b5(rgyud): dbyug to mda' dang ni// ral gri dril bu da ba zhin te// yang na rdo rje dril bu dang // thams cad khro bo'i rigs rje sa 'gro// 'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te// zhal gsum pa la
407b6(rgyud): phyag drag pa// thad spyan gsum dngos gab mchog/ sku gsung thugasu sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa// sum cu rtsa bdam rnam par dag/ yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
407b7(rgyud): par bya// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gah+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra hUM hUM phaT/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong
407b8(rgyud): nas// thaMd bskyed par rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba te// kha sbyar ldi yis ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin// snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin// de bzhin gyi/ 
408a1(rgyud): dang phag gi shazangs kyi gnag pud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // rgyal srid thad rab 'gab
408a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste// gsum char rgyur las byung ba yin// chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi// thod pa la ni su zhig smod// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // zla ba phyed pas rgyan de
408a3(rgyud): byasad/ dpa' bo'i dpa' de bang yin par bshad// khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las srung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i
408a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyi bris pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sde tshan brgyad ni rnam sgom pa// mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i da
408a5(rgyud): gnas par// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnar sgom// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// g.ya/ sa brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zhal rnam bsgyur zhing
408a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa ste// mche ba rjer gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// ral pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste/ phyag rgya
408a7(rgyud): drug gi mtshan gyis rgyan// stag gi lpags pa gos brnabs// rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams// sku la thod rlon do shal can// thugs rje'i nyams kyis khyab par mos// dkar dang sngo
408a8(rgyud): dang sprin gyi gzugs// sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni// ser dang dmar dang ldang ba dang // dud pa yi ni mdog can no// rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas// rang
408b1(rgyud): gi rigs dang yang dag 'khril// tshangs pa bshus nas brnabs par mdzad// rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa
408b2(rgyud): steng bcom ldan baM hUM ngas 'byung ba// 'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar// shar mdab lha mor dgod pa ste// ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te// me la sogs pa'ang
408b3(rgyud): dgod par bya// de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin// A li mkha' gro ma dang ni// ka yi mkha' go ma de bzhi// tsa yi mkha' gro ma dang ni// Ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dag ste// dgar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // 
408b4(rgyud): sngo ba'i mdog can lho phogs// dmar dang dud ka ljang ku dang // ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas// ta yi mkha' gro ma dang ni// pa yi mkha 'gro ma de bzhin// de nas sa yi mkha' gro ma/ 
408b5(rgyud): sha yi mkha' go ma brgyad pa// de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi// rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis
408b6(rgyud): gnon// rnam bsgyur mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// skra gol thugs rje khro bo bzhin// dag po yul 'khrug byed pa ste/ 
408b7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// 'gro ba thang smon byed// zad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u yis rgyan pa// sde tshan mkha' gro bde ba ste// 'di dag
408b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor mi yis sgom// yang na phag mo dag du bya ste// bdag mo yang ni bzhag par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po ste// mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya// sku gsung bugasu sbyor ba
409a1(rgyud): dag/ sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug/ oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha huM hUM phaT swA hA// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag/ ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grub// sde tshan mkha' gro
409a2(rgyud): dam pa mchog / b+ha ga'i dbu su bsgom par bya// a shaM/ kA ka/ tsarma tsa/ Ta tra pa ka/ ta pa~M sa te tha/ pa ba na dza ya ma bA ha tsa/ sha ra b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa ni// rtag tu dus
409a3(rgyud): su 'di brgyad bza'// rgas dang nad dang 'chi med par// skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa/ zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// de ma rnyed na'ang sa lus bya
409a4(rgyud): skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing / phyug sa ni zas sa rta spyad na// skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud
409a5(rgyud): bla ma'i bla ma las sde tshan gyi sbyor ba 'i le'u ste dag cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad khya ba// rnal 'byor mchog gis gar dag// dpa' bo dang
409a6(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor ma// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad// mkha 'gro ma sogs mkha'agro ni// gar da wa yi gzugs bya// phag ma'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang // zhal ni gar da wa ru byaM// 
409a7(rgyud): sngar bshad gnas dang phyag mtshan dang // zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya// sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yi so// mkha' gro ma ni lag mdung thogs// thugs kyi 'khor lo bad
409a8(rgyud): kun// mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can// gsung gi 'khor lo rma ba'i gdong // sku yi 'khor lo sing+ge'i gdong // khyi dang phag dang / 'ug pa dang / khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin te// zur la
409b1(rgyud): gshin rje sreg sogs kun// ma he ri dwags zhal gdong yin// dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang // spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog dam pa// sdug
409b2(rgyud): bsngal thams cad zad par byed// rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag/ rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag dang // ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster// ma thos
409b3(rgyud): pa yi chos bstan pas// san rnams ni srid las grol// bla na med pa nyid bstan pas// mi snang la sogs dngos grub 'gyur// su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum// de kun de ma thag tu
409b4(rgyud): mthong // sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'a byor ma'i// gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te// mkha' go ma mo de bzhin// sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams// bzlas na dngos
409b5(rgyud): grub rab ster cing // rtag tu bde ba zad 'thob// rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas ni ni// gar da'i dngos grub ma kha' la 'gro// brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob
409b6(rgyud): mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar 'gyur// dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur// nad yod pa'ang med par 'gyur// la ngas pa yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga
409b7(rgyud): thob 'gyur// bong bu'i sha dang rta sha dang / khyi dang ba lang glang po mi// rnga mo lce spyang de bzhin te// brgyad po'ang mnyam pa mchog yino// rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'// dri chen
409b8(rgyud): chu dang sbrang rtsi mar// bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas// yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gzugs yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing // rang gi gzugasu rang 'gyur
410a1(rgyud): ba yin// rnal 'bor gang dang gar gnas par// bza' ba yang ni bza' bar bshad// 'ogo dang mi 'gro de bzhin te// btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur// mchog 'di yA
410a2(rgyud): ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni brjod mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / 
410a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' go lnga yi rnam sgom pa// rigs las brgyad pa'i cho ga yin// gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te// 'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o// nga nya Na na ma
410a4(rgyud): zhes pa// 'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa//  ni rdo rje mkha' gro ste// nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' gro yin// Na ni rin cha na mkha' gro ste// na ni pad+ma'i mkha' gro yin// ma ni snob mkha'
410a5(rgyud): 'gro ste// mkha' gro lnga ni mchog yin te// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis// 'dod las grol ba'i
410a6(rgyud): 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / pad+ma ra waM lnga pa yin// sde dang dkar ba nyid dang ni// ser dang dmar po ljang ku dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog/ rin chen phyag rgya'
410a7(rgyud): de bzhin te// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin// glang po sang+ga rta dang ni// rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te// khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi mo dang // dbang phyug che dbang po yA
410a8(rgyud): de rang rig yan lag dang bcas pa// gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir// dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod// 
410b1(rgyud): lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas// lnga po bdag nyid lnga yino// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du'o// lho dang nub dang de bzhin te// byang na nyi ma'i dkyil
410b2(rgyud): 'khor ro// yang ni dbus zla ba ste/ shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan// de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sra ba dang
410b3(rgyud): bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha' gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o// rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje sgra dang / de dag ni sangs rgyas
410b4(rgyud): mkha' gro'i dkyil 'khor te// seng+ge'i gdan khri'o// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang / rdo rje Ta ha ra dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / de dag ni ron chen mkha' gro'i dkyil
410b5(rgyud): 'khor ste/ rta'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje ma da bal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg bye dang / rdo rje dri pra/ la dang / de dag gi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ste/ rma bya'i gdan
410b6(rgyud): khri'o// rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje klu dang / rdo rje dpa' bo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / de dag ni las kyi mkha' gro'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o// dpa' bo de dag kyang
410b7(rgyud): rang gi rigs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba can spyan gsum pa// rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yi dwags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o// mche ba rnar btsigs
410b8(rgyud): shing rnar 'gyur ba// stag gi lpags pa gsu ba nabs// zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ tsang te'u'i sgra hA dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do
411a1(rgyud): shal gyis rgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mkha' gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang gu/ nub dmar po lhas
411a2(rgyud): bo// las kyi mkha' go'i shar ser po/ byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ pad+ma'i mkha' gro'i shar dkar ba/ byang ljang ku/ nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin chen mkha' gro'i shar ljang ku
411a3(rgyud): byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lho sngon po/ sang+yas mkha' gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang ku/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang / pad+ma rin chen
411a4(rgyud): phreng ba yin/ chas ni yongasu bskor bar bya// grwa ba zhim mo bzhi sgom ste/ ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni// ma mo zhe sdang nyid yan te// chags pa yi nim mo dang // phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te
411a5(rgyud): me yis phyogs la son par dgad// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang // skra galo ma la bzhin rnam bsgyur// sgra na gsum pa la gcer bu ste/ phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin/ 
411a6(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa// yi dwags gdan la rnar bzhugs/ dbang chen me dang chu dang ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas// rigs kyi gdan la bzhags pa yin// 'khor lo rdo rje
411a7(rgyud): pad+ma dang // ral gri thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug yang ni phyag na 'chang // ma ning las byung lha mo sgom// thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// skyil mo krung ni phyed pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srung ba dang
411a8(rgyud): rdo rje 'gying ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dad gdong dang / rdo rje bde mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang / rdo rje rta mchog ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni// sgo rnams dang ni mtshams te// sde dang ljang
411b1(rgyud): dang dmar ser po// dmar dang sngo dang dud ka dkar// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dang / dril bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ tsang te'u yang ni de bzhin te// thod pa dbyig to mdung dang ni// dgra sta thod pa kha
411b2(rgyud): T+wAM ga/ mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa'o// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzas// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// thod pa yi ni phreng ba
411b3(rgyud): 'chang // mgo bo'i do sha la rnam par rgyan// nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni// g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam sbyar zhal
411b4(rgyud): spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can// rang gi ring dang gnyis ming sbyor// snying rje yi ni nyams can te// phyi rol rdo rje yi dwags kyis// yongasu bskor bar bsgom par bya// thog mar gsal byed
411b5(rgyud): ming dang hUM// mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya// snga ra bshad cho ga'i bsrung ba bya// phung po khams dang skye mched dang lus ngag yid las bsgom par bya// mkha' gro zhal drug phyag
411b6(rgyud): bcus// rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis// gnyi su med par mnyam par ldan// mdung dang lcags kyu thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang // cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang // na ri'i lpags pa 'dzin pa yi
411b7(rgyud): sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang ku/ dung ka dang ni dkar ba dang // dkar dang sngo dang sar dmar dang / ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o// ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang / dmar dang ljang ku pad+ma'i mdog// dmar dang
411b8(rgyud): dkar dang sngon po dang // ser dang ljang dang na mkha'i mdog ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog/ de dag mkha' gro lnga yi ni// zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin// yang na zhal
412a1(rgyud): / gcig phya gnyis sgom// phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcas// mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams naso// mthar ni huM hUM phaT dang sbyar// oM mahA su kha badz+ra DA ka hU Da ki nI dzA la sha ba
412a2(rgyud): ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka bruM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha rak+Sha DA ka traM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha pad+ma DA ki hrIHDA ki nI dzA
412a3(rgyud): la shaM ba ra A hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bi shwa DA ka khaM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ de dag ni mkha' gro lnga'i snying po gsang sASha te/ 'di ni yis kyi snying por gyur pa yi no// oM badz+ra DA
412a4(rgyud): kad hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bud+d+ha DA ka nyaM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na DA ka Ne hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ka na~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bi shwa DA ka maM hUM phaT/ yis dam tshig ro gcig pa// mkhas pas sgom par byas nas
412a5(rgyud): / dam tshigs ni le dbang bskur// sprob mchod pa rna sgom// dkyor dag ni thad kyang // go 'phang dranas dbang yang bskur// sna Da phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog de bzhin 'khyud dang num pa na// 
412a6(rgyud): b+ha ga'i ling ka'i sbyor ba dag/ yis rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya dag/ rnar lta zhing nges par brtag/ dga' ba dang po shes rab te// mchog tu dga' ba mnyam par sbyor/ 
412a7(rgyud): bde bar dga' bar grub pa che// lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin// sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor// sbyor ba che dang yis sbyor// de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o// thig le'i gzhung gi sbyor shes na/ phra ba'i sbyor
412a8(rgyud): bas blta bar bya// thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob// cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni// myur du rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// 'di ni nges pa kho na'o// mngon par brji/ 
412b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gan
412b2(rgyud): par// ye shes zla ba rnam par sgom/ A li yi ge las byung ba// rdo sa dar bde ba che// kha ba kun da'i mdog lta bu// dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsu
412b3(rgyud): pa la thugs rje'i nyams// sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla dbus bzhugs// stong pa'i yas las byung ba// zla ba phyed par ral pa 'ching // thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams zad yang dag rdzogs// 
412b4(rgyud): rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas// snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa// dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal// rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje dril bu
412b5(rgyud): mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni rnam 'chir te// rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang // ba nA ga dang thod pa 'dzin// yi ge A dang nyi dbus bzhugs// rdo rje seda'i rnar sgom// oM lnga
412b6(rgyud): rdo rje zla ba ste/ I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrulo// e las chos kyi rdo rje ste// oM las smon sgyu 'phrul ma// lha mo bzhi po de dag ni// de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o// skra grol ba la mig po che// snying rje
412b7(rgyud): char pas rnam par mos// rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// s+phoT yi dwags steng du sgom// gtso bo shes rab skyil mo krung // zod pa'i phreng ba'i dang rgyan
412b8(rgyud): 6/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnar rgyan// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dngos grub thad rab tu stsol// ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal
413a1(rgyud): 'byor bzhin// de yi mdog dang pag mtshan 'dzin// lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang // snying po sbyor ba mchog yino// gsang ba mchog dgyes pa na// thad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ 
413a2(rgyud): gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid// mkha'ag ma yi snying po mchog/ gsang ba'i ye shes dam tshig ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin// u ni snying kar sgom pa ste// U ni mgo bar de bzhin// 
413a3(rgyud): oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste// oM ni mig tu dgod par bya// e ni go char dgod pa ste// aHni mtshon du rnam par dgod// sku gsung thugasu sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par
413a4(rgyud): gnas// yis dam tshig sbyor ba yis// bla ma dad mchog dang dbang yang bskur// mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yi sa// chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yis// dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste/ 
413a5(rgyud): gnyisu med pa'i mchog grub pa// dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste// dus gzhi dag tu rnar sgom// kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni// thun bzhi la ni rnar bsam// snying rjes kun la
413a6(rgyud): 'gro bya zhing // cha med par ni rjer sgom// thad rdo rje se dar ste/ shes rab che med rjesu 'gro// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor// bdag nyid rdo rje bdag po yin// bgrang du med pa'i rus pa yin// ye shre
413a7(rgyud): bzlas pa yin par bshad// bzlas pa yis sgom pa ste// sprul pa dag ni spro ba'o// de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin// cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa byA// u o o u AM aHoM AHa AHi I/ 
413a8(rgyud): u AHe A/ oM oM aM AHhUM swA hA// dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po bzla// dag byed bsod nams chen po ste/ dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa yin// sdug bsngal te/ 
413b1(rgyud): / 'joms byed cing // dge ba kun gyis 'bras bu ste// gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste// rna dben pa'i sa phyogasu// mkha'agro ma yi snying po yi// dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba/ lha mo bzhi po dga' ba
413b2(rgyud): ste/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde// rigs kyi bde ba bcas// rang byung rdo rje se dar yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyar gyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi
413b3(rgyud): pa'o// sod nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa// gdug pa zad za byed pa// ma rungs phyi dang nang 'joms pa// na mkha' stong pa lta bu las// yi ge kA las mngon byung zhing // mkha' gro 'bri ba bde mchog
413b4(rgyud): niHphya gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsuM pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal// g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs pa la// ma rungs bdud kyi dgra gnon cing // phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas// thod pa dril
413b5(rgyud): bus yang dag 'khyud// thod pa'i dbu su yid 'ong ba'i// rdo rje mchog gis rnar mtshan// ye shes bdud rtsis yod/ sa gang ba// lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas ni// smob pa yi sku lus
413b6(rgyud): la phyag rgya dgas sku yang rgyan// zhal gdong mche ba rnam btsigs shing // spyi gnag thod pas rgyun du byas// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang // rdo rje sede'i dbu rgyan can// 
413b7(rgyud): rje 'jigs byed sgom pa yin// dogs pa rnar spangs shing yongasu dag pa'i blos// rnar rtogs pa'i dri mo'i khyad par med par byed// byams dang snying rje'i rgyan du byas// 'dzem med bya'i rnal 'byor le/ 
413b8(rgyud): par bslabs pa'i bdag/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i dur khrod chen po na// ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrogs par byed// pheM gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed// gzhan yang sgrub
414a1(rgyud): // bo rnal 'byor 'thun pa'i yul du sgrub// yang na nal ni bzhi pa dang // 'di la phyag brgyad rnam par sgom// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po// zhal dag bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa mdzad// mdu
414a2(rgyud): dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ cang te'u mgo bo gri gug thogs// sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags// hA hA hI hI hAM hUM phaT/ phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing // dpa' bo'i gtsog pu 'jigs mdzad pas// 
414a3(rgyud): gdul dka' thed 'dul mdzad cing // sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro// bsam gtan dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// khro bo yi ni sku ru sgrub// dam tshig bza' zhing
414a4(rgyud): bzlas pa bya// dmi tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla/ mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nasu// chos rnams ma lus pa sgom par bya// oM ak+Sha hU~M phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa zad
414a5(rgyud): byed cing // mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing // srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed// sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa// bklags tsam
414a6(rgyud): gyis ni nges par 'grub// gdug cig gnod khyed sems can dang // ma rungs las la chags pa dang // log par lta dang bcos pa las// 'od dag nges par bza' bar bya// sangs rgyas
414a7(rgyud): sprul pa'i rgyan rnams spro// khams gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed// sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni// ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla// oM phaT che ge mo b+hak+Sha ya phaT/ kA hUM phaT
414a8(rgyud): bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni// mAM sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang // skra grol rol la mnan pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin// gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du ni// khri
414b1(rgyud): phrag stong du bzla zhing sgom// rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// khams gsum po dag bsod par 'gyur// mkha'agro ma ni 'khor bcas pas// bza' bar yang ni rnam par bsam// bdag nyid
414b2(rgyud): rdo rje khab thogs pa'i// khro bo snying du bzhugs par bya// snying dang sgyu ma rkang dang rus// sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing // mtshams med lnga rnams byed pa dang // gdugs pa can rnam
414b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor// rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas// zhag bdun gyis ni phebs par 'gyur// bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis ni// 
414b4(rgyud): bdug pa dag gis zos par 'gyur// nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang // las 'di dag la 'jug parabya// gcer bu skra grol byas pa yis// gshin rje'i
414b5(rgyud): phyogasu kha bltas te// khyim bya'i stan gyi ra ba yis// me ya~M gsang sngags bzla bar bya// hUM phaT raM/ mtshams med pa 'dis zhes bya ba// ra ra ra hUM
414b6(rgyud): phaT ji bzhin bzlas pa byos tsom gyis// nyin zhag bcu pa dag gis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang // 'chi bar yang ni the tsom med// gal te sdig can slar ldog na// 
414b7(rgyud): 'di la zhi ba'i las rnams bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas nas// 'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// oM swAhA/ a A baM A mu ka pA pa bI ra ho b+he bi Sh+ya ti ta sa s+yai ba
414b8(rgyud): n+ti b+h+raM tu/ baM aM a oM swA hA// 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gyon// zhi ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas// dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go/ bya rog khyi dang byi la dang // na ku la
415a1(rgyud): yi sha rnams bza'// thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las khro bo 'jigs byed chen
415a2(rgyud): bo'i bdag po kha sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srid pa'i nang na skye ba bdun// sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni// lha yi gzu
415a3(rgyud): can yid 'phrog pa// lha yi gzugs can gzi brjid dpal// ba shu'i nang na rgyal po yin// skal bzang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro/ sgra yi myu gu de bzhin ring // mig ni dkyus ring
415a4(rgyud): mig kyang dmar// pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs// de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung // lus las lha yi dri 'byung zhing // kha yi dbugs ni ga bur dri// ldan
415a5(rgyud): pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor// gcin dang pos gla rtsi dri// tshig ni 'jam par 'gyur ba dang // lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jam// dpa la yi dri dang ldan// skra dkar gnyer ma
415a6(rgyud): las rnam grol// lus kyang snum zhing mnyan pa dang // snying dang thod pa lte ba ste// des na ro tsan ru 'gyur// grib bdun dang pa'i bgre su 'gro/ snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te// dkon mcho
415a7(rgyud): gsum la rtag tu dad// sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs na// mi gsod me yis tshig mi 'gyur// srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag/ 
415a8(rgyud): gang yang rung ba za mi nus// de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste// mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog/ 'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni// bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad// dro chen chu/ 
415b1(rgyud): rang byang chub sems// mkhas pas blangs te ril bu bya// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te// blo dang ldan pas sgrub par bya// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas// nye ba'i snying
415b2(rgyud): po lan 'bum bzlas// de 'di lag tu byin nas ni// sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin// de 'di de ma thag tu yang // mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed// de ni dben par khyer na su// mnyam par
415b3(rgyud): bzhag ste bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang las rnams rab bshad bya// dngos grub sgrub pa'i mchog dam pa// de yi spyi bo'i sgra bcad nas// gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni// de bsres
415b4(rgyud): the gur byas nasu// gang gi mgul du bcing byas pas/ de 'dra ba yi gzugasu 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa yin// de yi lpags pa blangs nas ni/ 
415b5(rgyud): de la he ru ka dpal bri// mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub/ ni// he ru ka dpal byed pa yin// rkang lag lpags pa bla ngas nas ni// 'byung ba'i skra dang bcas
415b6(rgyud): bsres nas// phyi ma'i ril bur byas nasu// mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya// mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// lag pa g.yon pas
415b7(rgyud): de blangs te// mthe bong sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis// khu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na// de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs// rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blangs// rang skra zhags pa blangs
415b8(rgyud): nas thogs// g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni// baM gu lnga yis rnam par kri/ phyogs gar nor gyi gang ba yis// de yi phyogs mthong blangs par bya// khyim du bkod cing steng
416a1(rgyud): // 'dug nas// sngags bzlas nas na mkha' la spyod// oM dzA a baM a baM hUM ho pa ra har to// be tsa ra ri dza hri swA hA/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos// yid la gang 'do ci yang
416a2(rgyud): rung / de dag thams cad myur du 'gags// khyim ni gang bar yongasu mthong // mAM sa dag ni zos na su// lha yi lus gyur pa yin// rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te// des ni shi ba dbang du 'gyur// 
416a3(rgyud): chu ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// skra dang bsres nas de bsgril te// the gu cho ga bzhin du ni// bsgril nas zhag pa dag tu bya// g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par// gang gi ming gi bzla
416a4(rgyud): brjod kyis// zhags pa btab na ma thag/ lha mo 'gugs shong de 'dun gnas// de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 'di la dkyil
416a5(rgyud): 'khor dngos grub ni// ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas// gzhan yang rgyun tu byas pa dang // rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par// bya// chu ba dag gis mchod phyir thogs// 
416a6(rgyud): de ru bdar ba'i tsan dan gyis// byug pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ni// mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin// sgrub pa til mar chen po yis// mig sman nges par byas nas ni// grib ma
416a7(rgyud): yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhag gis bskus na ni// mtshan mo'ang nyin par lta bur 'gyur// rnal 'byor rkang dag zos nas ni// tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ji srid
416a8(rgyud): gnas par mi bkres shing // yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran// rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba yin// sgyu ma phye mar byas na su// mkhas pas
416b1(rgyud): grib ma la yang skam// gang gis mgo la bzhag pa na// de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs// sngags pas glo bzos nas ni// de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur// rkang pa blangs nas sa snun na/ 
416b2(rgyud): char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed// blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas skam// tsan dan dmar po dang bsres nas// de ni phye mar byas nasu// bud med gang la byin ni ni// 'dod pas gsungs pa'i
416b3(rgyud): bud med gang // dbang du gyur te mngag gzhug byed// pus mo'i rus pa kI la ya// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/ gang gi ming bcas sbas pa yis// de yi rigs rgyud med par
416b4(rgyud): 'gyur// rnal 'byor dzi hwa zos na ni// ngag gi dngos grub da dag tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor hr-id zos na ni// sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur// so yi rgyal po bzhi po dag/ steng
416b5(rgyud): 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang // bung ba yi ni bshog pa dang // chub mi'i mdab ma rdul dang ni// rdul 'dis sgrub pa byas nas ni// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs// rtswa rnams
416b6(rgyud): phye mar byas pa yi// bud med thams cad bskams par 'gyur// rang byung me tog ro tsa no// a la ga ta dang gur gum gyis// thig le sngags pas sbyar na ni// 'khor los
416b7(rgyud): bsgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mig 'bras che ba yis// pha rol sde ni 'bad par 'gyur// 'bad nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni// de ma thag tu 'o ma 'gugs// rnal 'byor
416b8(rgyud): mtshan ni zos tsam gyis// bud med sa bon mod la 'gugs// rnal 'byor so dang sen mo phyes// gang gi gang gis mgo la gtor// grub pa brgyad po 'grub pa yin// pha dang / 
417a1(rgyud): bu ni yin na yang // rnam par sdang bar byas par 'gyur// mchu phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// kha ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// sna phyir byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// 
417a2(rgyud): dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur// mgo bo'i lpags pas mngon btags te// kha yi drung du mngon bzlas na// lha rnams kun gyi gtso
417a3(rgyud): bor 'gyur// thod pa yis ni sbyor ba yis// rak+ta 'gugs par byed pa yin// thod pa kha ni sgrub pa yis// gnod par byas pa kho na yin// in+d+ra ba ru ro tsa na// de gnyis gcig tu
417a4(rgyud): bsres byas nas// gang la thig le gcig gyur na/ dbang po'i gnos ni mthong bar 'gyur// ro tsan dang myang smras/ dag/ lhan cig tu ni byug pa yis// thub pa
417a5(rgyud): med pa stobs 'gyur te// pha rol dag ni gnon par 'a gyur// pu tran dza li ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas// bud med gang la phyes gtor na// de ni 'dod
417a6(rgyud): pas myos gyur na// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas// ro tsa na dang pu tres gnyis// lhan cig tu ni bskus pa yis// 'byung po kun dang 'byung mo rnams// ci bzhi zhes ni sgra bzhin du
417a7(rgyud): de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur// ci 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang dzi ban ti// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas te// shi ba'i mig dang mog sman sbyar// bskal par gnas kyi bar
417a8(rgyud): du ni/ 'tsho bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// chu srin lag ni ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas// nA ga mdo lhan cig tu// ril bu dag tu byas nas kyang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres
417b1(rgyud): nas// mig gi sman ni byas gyur na// nor skyong gi ni glang po yang // mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang // de la bdag gis zhon na ni// glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang // gzhan gyis mi thub par
417b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// pha rol sde ni 'joms byed cing // gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i// ci 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur// 'bram ma daN+DI ro tsa ni// lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis// rig byed rgod pa
417b3(rgyud): med par 'gyur// rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na// ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu// ril bu dag tu bsgrub byas nas// rma ba'i 'jug mas bcings na ni// bung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te// 
417b4(rgyud): lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing // rig pa 'dzin pa 'ongs par 'gyur// de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur// lha yi gzhal med
417b5(rgyud): khang 'phrog cing // lha yi bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur// 'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing // mi 'dod sems can don yang byed// mjug mthur bltas byas na ni/ 
417b6(rgyud): gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur// blangs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la// mjug ma bskor ba byas na ni// sgo
417b7(rgyud): dab bas ni 'jug par bya// lha min bu mo lhan cig rol// lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len// 'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te// 'dod pa'i lha yi gzugasu 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas mang
417b8(rgyud): po yis// sini don rnams byed cing 'gro/ de nas yan lag lnga pa yi// cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni// spu dang lpags pa sha dang ni// rus pa rkang pa blangs na su// dri chen chu dang shu kra dang / 
418a1(rgyud): // mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu// ril bu byas nas bsgrub par bya// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// kha yi nang du smras nas ni// na mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
418a2(rgyud): ro tsa na dang lhan cig tu// khams gsum du ni rgyal cher 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las skyo ba bdun pa'i phyogs chen sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drag pa'o// / 
418a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang gi chos kyi yig sgom pa// rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor// bdag med chos ni yang dag sgom// rang chos yi ge mchog dga' ba// chos kyi sku lus
418a4(rgyud): rang byung yin// yi ge he las nges 'byung ba// he ru ka ni rnam pa dar sgom// yi ge hi las nges 'byung ba// rdo rje mkha 'gro rnam par skom// hUM gi ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje hUM
418a5(rgyud): mdzad rnar sgom// hUM gi yi ge las byung ba// mi bskyod pa ni rnam par sgom// baM gyi ye shes las bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// oM b+hU aM b+h+rUM las
418a6(rgyud): byung ba/ sangs rgyas mkha' gro rnam par sgom// oM tA re swa las byung ba// rin chen mkha' gro rnam par sgom// hrI hAM a las nges 'byung ba// pad+ma'i mkha' gro rnam par sgom// khaM ha ho ha wa
418a7(rgyud): byung ba// sna tshogs mkha' gro rnar sgom// DA las mkha' gro ma nyid// yaM las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// b+h+rUM las lha mo sa la spyod// baM las mkha' la spyod pa yin// maM las ma mo nyid yI
418a8(rgyud): te/  dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan grags ma// he ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste// ru las dag ni byung ba yin// ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste// yig gsum las byung he ru ka/ maM las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ 
418b1(rgyud): saM las kun tu bzang po yin// lo las 'jig rten mgon po ste// kI las sa yi snying po'o// baM las phyag na rdo rje ste// me las byams pa nyid yin te// khaM las namakha'i snying por grags// 
418b2(rgyud): gaM las na mkha'i mdzod yin// sa las sgrib pa kun sel ba// ga las spos kyi glang po yin// dz+ha las ye shes rtogs kyang yin// a las blo gros mi bzad pa// pra las spobs pa brtseg
418b3(rgyud): pa ste// sa las ngan song kun 'dran pa// sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa// dza las dra ba can gyi 'od// tsa las zla ba'i 'od yin te// ra las byung ba'i rin chen 'od// spu las nyi ma'i 'od mi
418b4(rgyud): nos pa las rdo rje 'od kyang yin// ma las mthu chen thob pa ste/ su ni su d+ha na yin no// b+ha las bzang skyong nyid yin te// sa las blo gros rgya mtsho'o// kun tu bzang po 'jam
418b5(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten mgon po sa snying po// phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang // na mkha'i snying po na mkha' mdzod// sgrib pa rna ma par sel ba dang // spos kyi glang po nyid
418b6(rgyud): yin to// mi zad pa dang ye shes tog/ slob pa brtsegs pa mchog yon te/ mya ngan kun 'joms nyid la no// ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni/ dra ba zla ba rin chen dang // nyi ma rdo rje 'od mtsha
418b7(rgyud): sted/ su d+ha na dang rin chen thob// rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong // de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste// phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar// de dag dam tshig du bshad// dngos grub kyi ni grub pa stsal
418b8(rgyud): rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang // bskul byed dang ni rin chen sgron// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin to// ro langs rdo rje gzhon du ma// ke po dzaM dang de bzhon te// sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin// ye shes sgom nga
419a1(rgyud): / rdor 'jigs ma// ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma// sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo// spyan dang mA ma ki mchog dang // rgyal mtshan sor 'brang ma dang // rma ba dang ni ri khrod ma// lu gu
419a2(rgyud): rgyad dang phyir bzlog ma// lha mo gtsug tor rdor 'jigs ma// sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// gsal byed ming dang bcas par ni// mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar
419a3(rgyud): bor bya// tha mar swA hA mnyam par sbyar// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol// gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal// bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin// shes rab mthar ba bzhi po ni// 
419a4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don kun sgrib byed yin// 'dod rgyal dbyug sngon de stobs po che// brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste// khro bo chen po sngon grub pa// gdug pa zad nges par
419a5(rgyud): gnon// dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo// khrag 'thung lha mo ba rgyad pa yin// sngar bshad mkha' gro ma rnams te// khro bo brgya da dang gnyis med gnas// rtsa ba'i brgyad
419a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i sngags// ming dang yang dag sbyar bar bya// gsal byed oM ni kun tu yang // mthar ni hUM phaT swA hA ra sbyar// gsal byed ming dang hUM dang ni// mthar ni phaT dang swA hA ra sbyar// gzu
419a7(rgyud): dang sgra yi lha mo dang // dri dang ro yi lha mo ste// mdab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar// phyogs kyi gos can skra gal ma// reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags// gnyisu med par yang dag gnas
419a8(rgyud): dbusu khrag 'thung rgyal po ni// lha mo'i reg pas bde bar bzhugs// snying po chos kyi dbyings grags// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // ye shes se dang gnyis med bzhugs// rdo
419b1(rgyud): rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste// gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o// de ni gsang ba de nyid mchog/ rdo rje can ni yang dag stsol// che ba'i mchog ni 'dus
419b2(rgyud): pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs pa// bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma// rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin te// rdo rje mkha' gro nyung zad cig/ sgyu 'phrul sdom
419b3(rgyud): pi'i rgyud yi no// rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud yin// nges brjod rgyud ni bla med pa// 'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin// ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis
419b4(rgyud): sems can rje su bzung ba'i rgyur// 'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ste// rigs ni rnam pa lnga pa shad pa// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ 
419b5(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// bdag po nyid bya ba yin// ji ltar ming gi rjes 'thun par// nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dag/ rje sgrub pa po yis ni// nges brjod rgyud kyi las
419b6(rgyud): rnams bya// yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te// gnyi su med pa'i sgom pa nyid// theg pa chen po'i dam pa mchog/ dngos grub tshe dang ldan par 'gro/ de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya/ 
419b7(rgyud): gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim// yi ge haM las nges 'byung ba// bdag nyid he ru kar bsgom pa// sku lus dkar la drag shul che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spyan gsu
419b8(rgyud): pa la zhal lnga pa// phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral pa zla phyed debu la bcing // sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya dag gis sku lus rgyan
420a1(rgyud): stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// mgo bo'i do shal gyis rgyan pa// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku steng zhal sngo ba'o// bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang // rdza
420a2(rgyud): dang ni dang drag po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje rag pas gnyis med gnas// rgyal ba'i lpags pa mchog kyang 'dzin// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsal// thod pa ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ 
420a3(rgyud): rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// bdad bzhi po ni zhabs 'oganon// reg pa'i rdo rje ldang ba dang // dkar ba'i mdangs kyis gzugs can pa// ljang dang ser
420a4(rgyud): dang dmar ba dang // dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste// steng gri zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs// skra grol ba ni rnam par myos// se d+hi'i rnal grol phyag rgya can/ byin pa gnyis
420a5(rgyud): ni legs par 'khril// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sgra na gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// rdo rje thod par mnyam par lnga na// dri bu cang te'u yis rgyan// mdung dang kha
420a6(rgyud): nA phyag na bsnams// chags pa chen po me yi 'od// phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams// gdug dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sna tshogs sen 'dul bar mdzad// thugs rje'i nyes
420a7(rgyud): ni yongasu rdzogs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus yang sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis gnon par rnar sgom// 'khor kun dag ni zhal gsum
420a8(rgyud): gathod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te// rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs// rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can no// 
420b1(rgyud): dam tshig gnyisu med par sbyor// thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis gnon// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni na
420b2(rgyud): sgom/ mtshams rnamasu ni bum pa dag/ thod pa zla ba yongs gang // zur rnams ni sgo bsrungs te// ji ltar mdog gi cha rnam so// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba
420b3(rgyud): zhabs 'og gnon// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can can// thugs rje khro bas rnam par myos// dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba// ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rim pa'ang
420b4(rgyud): de bzhin no// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni// khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbus ni/ rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na// rang
420b5(rgyud): gi byin rlabs 'chang ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas mu stegs na la sba// 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin// rnal 'byor ma yi drin yino// gnas
420b6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod// shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin// sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyor ba gsum
420b7(rgyud): gyi rnam dag don// 'di ni dri med skom pa mchog/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu
420b8(rgyud): rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i mir// mA ma ki dang spyan dang ni// lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo// 'od zer can dang dzaM b+ha la/ lha mo skul/ 
421a1(rgyud): / byed sa 'dzin ma// rang gi sa bon las byung ba// phyag bcus kyis rnam par rgyan// spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// sede'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje skyil mo
421a2(rgyud): klung gis gnas// rigs byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste// phyogs gos can ro yi gdan// skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// khro bas lta zhing thugs rje'i
421a3(rgyud): nyams// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// de nyid ye shes mchog las byung // so so yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shes gdon mi za// khro bo sna tshogs gzugs can ni// dpa' bo rang
421a4(rgyud): nyid las byung ba khro mchogs kha 'gro 'byung ba ya nga// gos pa med par nyams pa yi// bdag po sgom pa nyid yino// mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rnam par
421a5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can// sI nga ka'i pad+ma'i dbus ni// rdo rje mkha'agro thugs brtse can/ 2/ de nyid ni gnas mdzad cing // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun bya
421a6(rgyud): chub semaso// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis// mchod 'os thams cad mchod pa yin// gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba// de ni rgyal bas mchod par
421a7(rgyud): bzhed// nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis// rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis// yid 'dod rnams kyis lus la 'dod// mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs
421a8(rgyud): nyid thob par// gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos med bzhi la dgod pa yis// lha yi gzugs sgom pa yi// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po/ 
421b1(rgyud): ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yi// bstan pa tsam du lags 'byung ba'o// rgyud na dan dam ma yan te// dan dam yang dag skyes pa na// snyan pa tsam
421b2(rgyud): du lags 'byung ba'i// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi// gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te// de bya
421b3(rgyud): de ru 'khor ba nyid// smyo bye de nyid can gyis min// gal te de nyid med gyur na// de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya// 'on te de nyid ldan 'gyur na// de la 'khrug pa ci zhig yod// gnas dang
421b4(rgyud): ba'i gnas mchog rnams// bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nus bag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni// sen
421b5(rgyud): bsam pa'i dbang gis te// bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir// de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol/ bya// rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor// de yi khams rnams
421b6(rgyud): zad par 'gyur// de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni// thugs rje thugs gdungs ring
421b7(rgyud): bo nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs// de rnams do gyes pas dngos grub mo chog/ ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur// des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu 'bang sgrub pa rung / 
421b8(rgyud): sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa yi// spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spongs la// de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya// gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa// 
422a1(rgyud): / rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can// bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas// smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis// gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu min// gang
422a2(rgyud): rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur// rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la// de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam// lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyi
422a3(rgyud): nyer bstan na// rnal 'byor chen mo 'di gsal 'gyur// ye shes sgron ma'i mchog 'thod na// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' ba ro// dang pa'i
422a4(rgyud): tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no// mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du// 'gro kun don ni byed pa'o// dpal ldan rdo/ 'aton par ni// mngon 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// spyod pa 'di
422a5(rgyud): la nges par ni// ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur/ bar// sems ni dag par gyis shig ces// sems can rna/ mas la bdag gsol 'debs// gang gis rmad 'byung
422a6(rgyud): snying rjer ldan// gang gis gsungs pa de nyid 'gyur// rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' gro ma ni snying kar dgod// snying kar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor// thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyar te// gzhan
422a7(rgyud): yang rdo rje dgod bya ba// chos kyi dbyingasu rnam par brtag/ rang gis na mkhar sbyor na su// gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par sgom// rang gi chos kyi yig dgod pa// rang drod rang bzhin dri ma med
422a8(rgyud): rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgom// ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yis// gzhan nyid gzugs kyi sgom pa la// yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi// dbang po gzhan ma sgo
422b1(rgyud): par byas/  gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya// mngon par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug du rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
422b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di gsung so// rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni// na mkha' lta bur dri ma med// 
422b3(rgyud): stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya// legaso bya ba rnams byin nas// rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las// legs so legs so ye shes che// nges par brjod pa
422b4(rgyud): mchog gi mchog/ legs so rdo rje tshul dra ga po// sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab// leg so gnyis med sbyor ba ni// mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la/ 
422b5(rgyud): leg so zhes bya nges par sbyor// 'dod pa med pa/ 'i skom pa ni// legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon// theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di// gnyis med ye shes mchog dang
422b6(rgyud): ni/ man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste// legaso rdo rje bla ma kun// de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma// legs so 'khor dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub bla na med pa byin// rdzogs te cang mi gsung
422b7(rgyud): bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med
422b8(rgyud): pa'i mkha' go ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba gsang ba'i yang gsang bas
